name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dothan, AL
description: Conveniently located on travel routes, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dothan, AL provides an easy rest stop with a variety of comfortable rooms and suites. Looking for great golf? We’re just 15 minutes from the Robert Trent Jones Golf Trail championship courses at Highland Oaks. Families who stay at our hotel often visit Water World Water Park, historic Landmark Park, and The Carver Museum among many nearby attractions.When you arrive, treat yourself to complimentary cookies and a cup of coffee before you settle into your room and log into free Wi-Fi. Our business center lets you take care of office tasks 24 hours a day, and if you need a break, work out in the fitness center or swim a few laps in the heated indoor pool.  Our spacious rooms and suites feature comfortable bedding, satellite TV, and other modern amenities. You can brew a cup of coffee in the in-room coffeemaker and settle in with a free weekday newspaper. Get your day started with a free, hot breakfast served on classic diningware in our breakfast area. Our accessible rooms offer added convenience. As a guest of the Country Inn & Suites, you can experience southeast Alabama’s best attractions. If you’re on a family vacation, don’t miss a trip to the Water World Water Park or Adventureland Theme Park, only minutes from our hotel. You can tour The Carver Museum to learn about the life and contributions of George Washington Carver, a world-famous botanist and educator. Before you head to Dothan Regional Airport (DHN) to fly home, make some time to visit these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Homewood, AL
description: Set in a quiet neighborhood off I-65, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Homewood, AL puts you within eight miles of attractions like the Birmingham Zoo and Birmingham’s Civil Rights District. Fuel up with our free, hot breakfast before shopping at Riverchase Galleria or browsing the boutiques in downtown Homewood. If you're a sports fan, catch a game at the University of Alabama at Birmingham, about 10 minutes away. Here for work? Birmingham-Jefferson Convention Complex is just an eight-mile drive from the hotel.After seeing the sights, recharge in our relaxing outdoor pool and hot tub. We also offer a fitness center for refreshing workouts, free on-site parking, and free Wi-Fi to help you stay in touch with friends and family. Our spacious rooms and suites feature microwaves and refrigerators, so you can heat up a snack and have a chilled drink to sip on while you watch a movie on your room’s flat-screen TV. Sleep well on comfortable bedding, and then wake up each morning to enjoy a cup of coffee from the in-room coffeemaker before you head to our dining area for the free, hot breakfast. Skip the hassle of downtown while still enjoying quick access to Birmingham when you host a business meeting, conference, or social event with us. Take advantage of our meeting space for up to 50, along with staff support, an on-site business center, and free internet access. Our hotel is about a seven-mile drive from attractions like the Birmingham Museum of Art and the popular Riverchase Galleria mall. You can also head to the Five Points South district to explore shops, restaurants, and the landmark Vulcan Park, home of the world’s largest cast-iron sculpture. Nearby attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Madison, AL
description: Located right off I-565, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Madison, AL makes a great home base for both business and leisure travel in the area. Must-see Huntsville attractions like the U.S. Space & Rocket Center are within an easy 15-minute drive of the hotel. Business travelers will appreciate our location just two miles from Huntsville International Airport (HSV) and 15 minutes from downtown Huntsville.After a day of work or play, take a dip in the indoor pool or decompress with a workout at the on-site fitness center. Free Wi-Fi lets you check emails or research local attractions while our free cookies and coffee in the lobby are a nice pick-me-up. Here for work? Corporate travelers can use our Business Center to put the finishing touches on that big presentation. In the mornings, don’t miss our free, hot breakfast, available to all of our guests. Our spacious rooms and suites make it easy to relax after a long day of work or play. You can catch up on your favorite TV shows or use the free internet access to browse your favorite sites. Stash any restaurant leftovers in the handy in-room fridge so you can reheat them later in the microwave for a midnight snack. To wake up in the mornings, brew a fresh cup of coffee in your room’s coffeemaker before you head out. Our hotel’s 750-square-foot meeting room comfortably seats up to 40 guests and offers a convenient location close to Huntsville’s airport. With essential audiovisual equipment, free high-speed internet access, and support or recommendations from our friendly staff, you have just what you need for a successful event. A midsize Huntsville suburb, Madison offers proximity to some of the area’s most interesting attractions. Visit the U.S. Space & Rocket Center to indulge your inner astronaut, or take your prospective college student to tour the University of Alabama in Huntsville. Don’t miss these attractions while you’re in the area:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Monroeville, AL
description: Located near the Literary Capital of Alabama, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Monroeville, AL welcomes guests with Southern hospitality and boasts an excellent location for exploring local sites. Discover attractions that inspired Harper Lee's writings, like the Old Courthouse Museum and the Faulk Property, or spend the afternoon on the water at Claiborne Lake. Corporate visitors appreciate easy access from our hotel to nearby businesses like Georgia-Pacific and Harrigan Lumber Company.Back at the hotel, unwind by our outdoor pool and stay in touch with the office using free Wi-Fi. In the mornings, a complimentary, hot breakfast makes it easier to start your day. Make yourself at home in one of our comfortable rooms or suites featuring 42-inch flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. In the morning, wake up with a fresh cup of coffee and browse the free weekday newspaper before enjoying our complimentary, hot breakfast. You can surprise your partner with a romantic stay in a whirlpool suite, where you’ll enjoy extra living space and an in-room whirlpool. In Monroeville for a business trip or family gathering? Our hotel provides a flexible space for up to 72 guests to help you organize and host a successful event. Our meeting room includes audiovisual equipment and free Wi-Fi and can be configured multiple ways to fit the needs of your corporate session, reunion, or reception. Monroeville, the childhood hometown of Harper Lee, is a small area full of traditions and charm that inspired the setting of To Kill a Mockingbird. Make time to embark on the self-guided Monroeville Historic Walking Tour to catch a glimpse of iconic city landmarks. Explore our charming town even more by visiting these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Montgomery East, AL
description: Situated just minutes from downtown Montgomery, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Montgomery East, AL is a perfect choice for business travelers and vacationers visiting Alabama’s state capital. Our I-85 location makes it easy to explore popular sites like the Montgomery Zoo and The Shoppes at EastChase. If you’re in the area to visit your favorite student, our hotel is within six miles of Alabama State University, Auburn University at Montgomery, and Huntingdon College.When you return to the hotel, grab a delicious cookie from the lobby and unwind with a dip in the indoor pool. Free Wi-Fi lets you check the latest Hornets score, and our 24-hour business center offers on-site productivity. After a restful night’s sleep, get your body moving in our fitness center, fill up at our free, hot breakfast, and then venture out to explore downtown Montgomery. Whether you're visiting local universities or attending a business conference, you can rest in a comfortable hotel room with free Wi-Fi, a work desk, and a refrigerator.  A microwave makes it easy to enjoy leftovers from local restaurants and in-room coffee facilities keep you energized for excursions to the Montgomery Zoo. Our convenient location near downtown makes our on-site event space a perfect venue for corporate meetings and family gatherings. Audiovisual equipment, catering options, and free Wi-Fi are available, and our professional staff ensures every detail of your event receives the proper attention. Locally known as The Gump, Alabama's capital is bursting with museums, universities, and political institutions. Whatever your reason for visiting, you can take advantage of our proximity to some of Montgomery's greatest attractions, including Alabama State University and the Montgomery Museum of Fine Arts. Don’t miss these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Saraland, AL
description: Mobile, known as the Azalea City, is only a 10-minute drive down I-65 from the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Saraland, AL. The young and young-at-heart will love touring popular destinations like Battleship Memorial Park, and hotel guests visiting during Carnival can experience the country’s oldest Mardi Gras celebration. We’re also just 15 minutes away from the Mobile Alabama Cruise Terminal, and we offer a complimentary shuttle to and from the terminal for all hotel guests.During your stay, you can enjoy the city’s hustle and bustle during the day and Saraland’s Southern tranquility at night. Relax with a dip in the hotel’s outdoor pool and hot tub, work out in the fitness center, or research the top area attractions with our free Wi-Fi. At night, unwind in our freshly painted rooms and suites featuring new carpet. You can begin the day with our free, hot breakfast before stopping by the business center to print your cruise boarding pass. Our guest rooms feature free high-speed internet access and 32-inch flat-screen TVs, perfect for watching your favorite shows before bed. Take advantage of amenities like a microwave and a refrigerator, along with a work desk and an in-room coffeemaker. The variety of family-friendly attractions in Mobile, Alabama ensures that each member of your crew can find something to do. Stroll through the gorgeous foliage at Mobile Botanical Gardens, and browse breathtaking works of art at the Mobile Museum of Art. Don’t miss these other local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tuscaloosa, AL
description: Cheer on the Crimson Tide at the University of Alabama, see a concert at Tuscaloosa Amphitheater, or enjoy a riverboat cruise on the Black Warrior River, all within minutes of the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tuscaloosa, AL. Our hotel’s location off I-20/59 and I-359 offers easy access to UA for prospective students taking a campus tour and families visiting current students. Business travelers appreciate that the hotel is also close to Michelin, Nucor Steel, and Mercedes-Benz.After a day of adventure, grab a book and head outdoors to relax by the pool. Need to reenergize after a long drive? Enjoy complimentary cookies and coffee in the lobby, and then stretch your legs in the fitness center. After touring the University of Alabama or attending business meetings, relax in our comfortable rooms and suites. Satisfy late-night hunger by warming up a snack in the in-room microwave and then relaxing in front of the flat-screen TV for an HBO special. In the morning, brew a fresh cup of coffee before heading to the dining room for our complimentary, hot breakfast. Traveling to Tuscaloosa with a sports team? Reserve a block of rooms and enjoy special amenities through our Sports Approved Program. If you need to meet with your team, you can use the breakfast room and pull up meeting notes on your tablet using free Wi-Fi. After the game, take advantage of our laundry facilities to clean everyone’s jerseys before the trip home. In town for a game at UA? Head just two miles from the hotel to the shops at Midtown Village to find something new to show your school spirit. For a cultural outing, explore the Kentuck Art Center, which features local artwork. You can also see live performances at the Bama Theatre. Be sure to check out these local favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Chandler, AZ
description: Located off I-10, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Chandler, AZ puts you close to such popular attractions as the Wild Horse Pass Casino, Rawhide Western Town, and spring training stadiums. You can spend the day seeing the monkeys at the Phoenix Zoo or explore the Sonoran Desert at the Desert Botanical Gardens. Choosing our hotel in Chandler makes it easy to explore downtown Chandler, the Eddie Basha Collection of Western and Indian American Art, and the Crayola Experience Chandler. Intel and Honeywell are close if you’re in town for business.Here with your four-legged friend? We offer several pet-friendly rooms and suites as well as a secure, fenced-in run area and complimentary doggie treats at the front desk, available upon check-in. After a day spent exploring Chandler, you can enjoy the Arizona sunshine with a swim in the outdoor pool or a soak in the hot tub. Our fitness center offers cardio equipment for a vigorous workout. And if you’re attending an event at the Phoenix Convention Center, you can print tickets and confirm the details in our business center. When it’s time to leave, Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport (PHX) is about 13 miles from the hotel. Each of our 64 hotel rooms and suites is equipped with modern amenities that include a 32-inch flat-screen HDTV, free Wi-Fi, and a well-lit work desk. You can store your favorite snacks and beverages in the in-room refrigerator and heat your snacks in the microwave. Chandler boasts a central location less than 20 minutes from Phoenix and Tempe, making it ideal for leisure and business travelers. Nearby stadiums host spring training for the Los Angeles Angels, the Chicago Cubs, and the San Francisco Giants. You can go shopping, hike the Sonoran Desert, or play a round a golf at these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Flagstaff Downtown, AZ
description: Whether you plan to hike Coconino National Forest, snowboard at Arizona Snowbowl or check a national park off your bucket list, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Flagstaff Downtown, AZ provides the perfect home base for your Flagstaff adventures. Situated in the heart of downtown, our hotel is steps away from the best breweries, restaurants and shopping that the area has to offer and provides remarkable views of the surrounding mountains and forests. Plan an unforgettable outing to the Grand Canyon, about 80 miles from the hotel’s property, or stick closer to home while you explore nearby attractions like Lowell Observatory, Wupatki National Monument and Sunset Crater Volcano National Monument. Visiting a loved one at Northern Arizona University? Embrace comfort in one of our 51 hotel rooms and suites, equipped with thoughtful amenities like a microwave, a mini refrigerator and free Wi-Fi. To upgrade your stay, reserve a studio suite, which offers additional space plus extras like a seating area and a comfortable sleeper sofa. Whether you’re attending a small team huddle or hosting a company-wide presentation, our flexible meeting room offers comfortable accommodations for up to 15 guests. In addition to free high-speed Internet access, guests are welcome to take advantage of complimentary printing services in our 24-hour business center. Teeming with ponderosa pine forests, snow-capped mountain peaks and picturesque nature trails, Flagstaff offers an abundance of outdoor entertainment for visitors. You can practice your skiing technique while hitting the slopes at Arizona Snowbowl and attend an evening constellation tour at Lowell Observatory. In addition to two national monuments, you can also see these local highlights:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Flagstaff, AZ
description: Pull off Historic Route 66 and settle into your spacious room or suite at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Flagstaff, AZ. Our hotel is ideally located for day trips to the Grand Canyon and is just minutes from the beautiful sights of the Walnut Canyon National Monument. Visit your favorite student at Northern Arizona University, just seven miles away, or treat yourself to a day of shopping at Flagstaff Mall or in Historic Downtown Flagstaff, both less than four miles away. Science buffs can plan a trip to Lowell Observatory, and outdoor-lovers enjoy the scenic views at Coconino National Forest. After cheering on the Lumberjacks at Walkup Skydome, enjoy a refreshing plunge in our heated indoor pool. You can catch up with friends using free Wi-Fi or snuggle up by the fire pit on the spacious outdoor patio. Our business center keeps you connected to the office with access to computers, a printer, and fax and copying services. Reserve one of our spacious guest rooms or suites, where you can curl up with a book, connect online with free Wi-Fi, or relax in front of great programming on the flat-screen TV. When you're ready to call it a day, slip into the comfortable bed and rest assured that a free, hot breakfast will be waiting in the morning. Every hotel room has a microwave and fridge ready for when your kids crave a snack. If you’re traveling with family or a group, upgrade to a one-bedroom suite with a separate living room and a sleeper sofa. Start your adventures in Arizona at the Country Inn & Suites, Flagstaff, located off Historic Route 66. You’ll find mesmerizing beauty on the ground at Walnut Canyon National Monument and in the skies at Lowell Observatory. After touring Northern Arizona University or shopping at Flagstaff Mall, experience the nightlife of historic downtown Flagstaff. The Arizona Snowbowl offers excitement at every season, from thrilling ski slopes to scenic hiking trails. We're also conveniently located for day trips to Wupatki National Monument or Coconino National Forest. Don't miss these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Mesa, AZ
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Mesa, AZ offers convenience before you even check in thanks to a free shuttle from two airports—Phoenix-Mesa Gateway Airport (AZA) and Falcon Field Airport (MSC)—both just 15 minutes away. Before retiring to your room or suite, spend some time exploring the local area, including the shops and restaurants at the Superstition Springs Center and the local golf courses. Fill your itinerary with family-friendly sights like The Dolly Steamboat and Goldfield Ghost Town, or spend the day exploring downtown Phoenix, just 30 minutes away.Before you head out for the day, be sure to stop by the dining area for our free, hot breakfast. After a workout in the fitness center or a relaxing swim in the outdoor pool, treat yourself to complimentary cookies and candy in the lobby. Need transportation? We offer on-site car rental services as well as a free shuttle to destinations within a five-mile radius. Settle into one of our 126 guest rooms and suites offering all the comforts of home. Enjoy free Wi-Fi as well as an in-room refrigerator and microwave for chilled beverages or late-night snacks. The LCD TV is equipped with cable channels, so you can find your favorite HBO shows. Our whirlpool suite is ideal for couples planning a relaxing, romantic getaway. We also offer spacious suites with a separate living room and sofa bed to ensure your family has plenty of space to unwind. With a convenient location just off Route 60 and free airport shuttle service, our hotel is the ideal venue for your corporate gathering, wedding, or seminar. We offer more than 1,400 square feet of event space, which includes a dedicated boardroom and two meeting rooms that can be combined to host up to 100 attendees. Couples choose our wedding packages for the elegant banquet space and outdoor terrace overlooking the pool. The Country Inn & Suites in Mesa sits off US Route 60 near top attractions like The Dolly Steamboat and the Rockin’ R Ranch dinner theater. Spend a day shopping and riding the carousel at Superstition Springs Center before attending a show at East Valley Children’s Theatre. Downtown Phoenix is only a 30-minute drive away, so rent a car and head into the city to see a game at Chase Field. Traveling with a sports team? We’re 10 miles from nine prominent athletic facilities, including Big League Dreams and the Red Mountain Baseball Complex. Before you go, don’t miss these highlights of the area:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Page, AZ
description: Conveniently located just off Highway 89, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Page, AZ offers modern hotel rooms and suites near the southern shore of Lake Powell. Hike to the Horseshoe Bend overlook to photograph the picturesque Glen Canyon and Colorado River. You can also tour Antelope Canyon, one of the country’s most-visited slot canyons, or take a day trip to soak in the breathtaking beauty of the Grand Canyon.After a day of hitting the trails, plan to take a well-deserved dip in our indoor pool or reward yourself with complimentary cookies and coffee, available throughout the day in our lobby. Our hotel also features a well-equipped fitness center, should you want to log some extra cardio during your stay with us. Each of our 92 guest rooms features a coffeemaker, a flat-screen TV, and free Wi-Fi, so you can check your email and social accounts after a day of boating on Lake Powell. Turn on your favorite show and then pop popcorn or heat up leftovers in the microwave. Each morning, you can look forward to beginning your day with waffles, fresh fruit, and more at the complimentary, hot breakfast served in our dining room. The Country Inn & Suites, Page, AZ offers two meeting rooms: the West Meeting Room and the East Meeting Room. Each venue spans 390 square feet and can accommodate up to 25 people. Take advantage of audiovisual technology like projectors and free Wi-Fi, and talk to our helpful staff about possible configurations for the tables and chairs. Known for its striking natural beauty, the area around Page is filled with canyons, reservoirs, and scenic overlooks that offer awe-inspiring views. Set aside one day of your trip to drive out to the Grand Canyon, or book a rafting excursion through Glen Canyon. Our hotel is also within easy reach of spectacular hiking at Zion National Park. Check out these nearby attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Phoenix Airport, AZ
description: Fly into Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport (PHX) and take the complimentary shuttle to the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Phoenix Airport, AZ. Located between downtown Scottsdale and downtown Phoenix, our hotel is also minutes away from Arizona State University in Tempe. You can see an Arizona Diamondbacks game at Chase Field, attend a concert at Talking Stick Resort Arena, and visit monkeys at Phoenix Zoo.For relaxation without any traveling, head down to our outdoor pool and whirlpool tub. Later, you can relax by the lobby fireplace with some complimentary cookies and coffee. Start every morning with an invigorating workout in our fitness center and a delicious meal from the free, hot breakfast. We also offer free Wi-Fi throughout the property so you can easily upload vacation photos to social media. Step off our free airport shuttle and into the comfort of one of our 88 guest rooms or suites. Set up your laptop on the work desk and check email using our free high-speed internet access. When you're ready for a great night's rest, you can turn down the sheets on the pillowtop mattress, close the blackout drapes, and wind down with your favorite shows on the flat-screen TV. Our studio suites come equipped with sleeper sofas to ensure your family has plenty of comfortable space to relax. Ideally located near the Phoenix airport, our hotel features a complimentary shuttle and free parking, making it convenient for guests to attend events and visit attractions. Our meeting room can hold 12 to 20 guests, and we offer free Wi-Fi, a projector screen, and two whiteboards. Cheer on the Arizona Diamondbacks at Chase Field or the Phoenix Suns at Talking Stick Resort Arena, both just five miles away. You can shop, dine, golf, and relax in Scottsdale, located just 15 minutes from the Country Inn & Suites. Spend a day touring the Arizona State University campus, where you can see a show at Grady Gammage Memorial Auditorium. Don't miss these  attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Phoenix Airport
description: When you land at Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport (PHX), you can board our free 24-hour shuttle to reach Radisson Hotel Phoenix Airport in about 10 minutes. Once you arrive, savor a delicious meal in our on-site restaurant, or relax with a dip in our heated outdoor pool. Need to keep your family or business clients entertained? Our hotel is located near downtown Phoenix, where you can find attractions like Chase Field, Talking Stick Resort Arena, and the Arizona Science Center.After you finish exploring Arizona’s capital, unwind with a workout in our fitness center or a cocktail in the on-site bar. Our valet dry cleaning service will take care of your clothes, and if you’d like to bring your car or a rental vehicle, we offer parking for USD 6 a night. Please contact the front desk if you have questions about parking. The following certification shows our hotel's commitment to guests' safety. For more information, visit Safehotels Certification. Our inviting hotel rooms are decorated in shades of brown and tan that accentuate the Southwestern landscape around the hotel. Sink into a Simmons® Luxury Plush EverNU bed and enjoy your favorite shows on the flat-screen TV. For more space, book one of our suites with a separate living area. Whether you’re planning a corporate gathering or a festive wedding reception, the Radisson features more than 4,000 square feet of flexible meeting space to accommodate your needs. Our location near the PHX airport offers easy access for your out-of-town guests, and amenities like free Wi-Fi, audiovisual rentals, a 24-hour business center, and on-site catering simplify your planning.Let our dedicated wedding coordinator help you create memories for up to 180 guests in our elegant Canyon Ballroom. Holding an important team meeting? Enhance your event with picturesque poolside views from our Sunset Ballroom. When you visit the casual RBG Bar & Grill on site, you can enjoy traditional and Southwestern-style American favorites for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. For an enjoyable evening with friends or colleagues, stop by our Lobby Bar and wind down with a glass of wine or a classic cocktail. Our hotel lies approximately 10 minutes from the Phoenix airport and less than 15 minutes from downtown Phoenix, where you can explore museums and cheer on the Arizona Diamondbacks at Chase Field. You can also escape the heat and see a show at Comerica Theatre. Don’t miss these attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tucson Airport, AZ
description: Hop off your plane at Tucson International Airport (TUS) and enjoy stress-free travel to the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tucson Airport, AZ thanks to complimentary, 24-hour hotel shuttle service. After settling in, explore local attractions like Old Tucson, where you can see Wild West-inspired stunt shows and musicals. You can also stop by the Arizona-Sonora Desert Museum to tour the zoo and the botanical gardens or go for a hike at Saguaro National Park. Visiting your favorite student? Catch a Wildcats baseball game at The University of Arizona, less than eight miles away.After a day of sightseeing, unwind with a rejuvenating dip in our hotel’s hot tub while your children splash around in the outdoor pool. Even your furry companions can enjoy our hotel thanks to pet-friendly accommodations. If you work up an appetite on your Tucson-area adventures, swing by our lobby for complimentary coffee and cookies to keep you fueled. Connect to the office and share photos of El Tiradito from the privacy of your hotel room thanks to free Wi-Fi. Use the microwave to heat up leftovers and store your favorite drinks in the fridge to enjoy during a movie night with HBO. Our pet-friendly rooms also include a convenient work desk and a free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper. Upgrade your stay to a hotel suite to enjoy a spacious living room with a sofa bed. Our hotel's convenient location near I-10 and I-19 makes travel to attractions like the Tucson Museum of Art and Old Tucson a breeze. You can also attend one of the many concerts, festivals, and sporting events held at the Kino Sports Complex, only four miles away. Explore the area’s unique desert landscape at Saguaro National Park, or find a quiet getaway in the city at the Tucson Botanical Gardens’ Zen garden or butterfly greenhouse. Must-see attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tucson City Center, AZ
description: Pack your swimsuit and sunglasses for a relaxing stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tucson City Center, AZ, conveniently located off I-10. Cheer on the home-team Wildcats at the University of Arizona, less than three miles from the hotel, or browse nearby galleries and window-shop along downtown’s Fourth Avenue. Take the kids on a nostalgic journey to the former movie studio at Old Tucson and ride the Cox Wildlife Carousel at the Reid Park Zoo. Our hotel’s free, hot breakfast provides the energy you need to enjoy every minute of your visit.After a hike at Saguaro National Park, return to the hotel for a soothing soak in the hot tub. We also offer a fitness center so you don’t have to miss your daily workout. Spend afternoons lounging by our outdoor pool and surf the web using free Wi-Fi. Be sure to bring your favorite snacks since our rooms and suites include microwaves and refrigerators. If you need to get a report ready, you can spread files out on the work desk and check your email using free Wi-Fi. Ideal for everything from business conferences to family reunions, our 480-square-foot meeting room has space for up to 35 guests. Take advantage of dry-erase boards and audiovisual equipment rentals to deliver an impressive presentation. Located in the beautiful Sonoran Desert and surrounded by Tucson's scenic mountain ranges, our hotel is a relaxing retreat for business and leisure travelers alike. Visit the cactus forests of Saguaro National Park, play the slots at Desert Diamond Casino Tucson, or see FC Tucson soccer teams compete at the Kino Sports Complex. Set aside time for these other must-see attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Yuma
description: Located just off I-8 and only three miles from Yuma International Airport (YUM), Radisson Hotel Yuma makes it easy to relax thanks to a complimentary airport shuttle and inviting rooms with plush bedding. Enjoy convenient access to Marine Corps Air Station Yuma, Fortune 500 businesses like Johnson Controls, and shopping at destinations like the Yuma Palms Regional Center. We’re also close to great nightlife at attractions like the Cocopah and Quechan casinos.Whether you’re here to attend business meetings or explore local attractions, you can start each morning with a hearty free breakfast in our on-site restaurant. Visit our sparkling indoor or outdoor pools, or head to the laid-back lobby bar when you’re ready to unwind. If you need to work, slip into our business center and use our free Wi-Fi to connect to the office. Our state-of-the-art fitness center makes it easy to maintain your workout routine while you travel. Our 154 hotel rooms combine contemporary furnishings with a lively color scheme to create a calming, yet cheerful experience. After a restful night’s sleep on premium bedding, brew a cup of coffee while watching the morning news on an HDTV. When you host a business meeting or a celebration at the Radisson in Yuma, your guests can enjoy access to our business center and free Wi-Fi. With more than 3,000 square feet of flexible event space, room for up to 275 attendees, and a location close to Yuma International Airport, our facility provides the ideal venue for almost any occasion. Before heading to meetings or visiting local attractions, enjoy a complimentary breakfast at Market Grill Steak & Seafood, our on-site restaurant. From sizzling Angus steaks to fresh entrée salads, the menu features savory dinner selections of traditional American fare. For additional convenience, room service is available.Our lobby bar, Lobby Lounge, serves memorable martinis, classic cocktails, and more than 25 wines. Join us in a casual setting that’s perfect for meeting with friends or colleagues. Within a 10-minute drive of the hotel, you can explore the natural beauty of the Yuma Conservation Garden, wander through the history of Yuma Territorial Prison State Historic Park, or play a round at Desert Hills Golf Course. Our hotel is also a short walk from the Yuma Palms Regional Center and its 500,000 square feet of retail space, restaurants, and entertainment options. Don’t miss these local favorites during your visit:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bryant (Little Rock), AR
description: Situated in the suburbs just southwest of downtown Little Rock, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bryant (Little Rock), AR offers a restful retreat off I-30 with easy access to the area's top attractions. Explore exotic animal habitats at the Little Rock Zoo, join the crowds for a concert at Verizon Arena, or bike across the Big Dam Bridge, all less than 30 minutes from the hotel. Are you an adrenaline junkie? You can get your heart racing with a trip to the I-30 Speedway, only seven minutes away. If you're looking for a more leisurely afternoon, browse brand-name bargains at the nearby Outlets of Little Rock.When you need a break from sightseeing, sunbathe by the seasonal outdoor pool. We also offer a fitness center for keeping up with your workout routine. You can take your dog for a walk around the block for a bit more exercise before returning to your pet-friendly room to connect to free Wi-Fi. Be sure to pack your favorite beverages and snacks since every one of our 63 rooms and suites offers a microwave and a refrigerator. You can also get your caffeine fix thanks to the in-room coffeemaker. Need to stay productive? Sit down at the spacious work desk and connect to free Wi-Fi. When you're ready for a break, you can watch a program on your 49-inch LED TV. The Country Inn & Suites features a 750-square-foot meeting space within 20 minutes of the Bill and Hillary Clinton National Airport (LIT). The event venue can accommodate up to 60 attendees for anything from family reunions to business seminars. Impress your guests with flawless presentations using free Wi-Fi and a pull-down projection screen. Head east on I-30 for a 20-minute drive to downtown Little Rock. While you're there, don't miss a chance to check out the Arkansas State Capitol. For something to do closer to the hotel, the Outlets of Little Rock are just five minutes away and offer hours of retail therapy. Visit these attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Conway, AR
description: Choose the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Conway, AR to enjoy a convenient home base less than three miles from the University of Central Arkansas, Central Baptist College, and Hendrix College. If you're traveling with a sports team, the Don Owen Sports Complex is five minutes away and nearby I-40 lets you reach downtown Little Rock in about 30 minutes. Before you head home, browse the artifacts at the Faulkner County Museum or admire the paintings and photographs at the Baum Gallery, both less than four miles from the hotel.Whether you’re here for a business meeting or a family vacation, make time to relax with amenities like an indoor pool and a hot tub. Stop by the lobby for a complimentary cookie to nibble while you read a book. We also offer free Wi-Fi throughout the property and a 24-hour business center for corporate travelers. No matter what your itinerary includes, be sure you’re up early every morning for our free, hot breakfast. The Country Inn & Suites provides a variety of accommodations with modern necessities like free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and DIRECTV with HBO and Disney Channel. You can warm up a snack in the microwave and store drinks in the fridge to enjoy while you work at the desk. Spacious suites with a separate living room and a sleeper sofa are available for groups and families. Reserve our versatile meeting room to host up to 100 guests for a business meeting, family reunion, or sports team event. You’ll have access to free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment, and our experienced staff can provide catering recommendations. The 24-hour business center gives you a quiet place to prepare for your next meeting. After touring local colleges and universities, you can drive about 30 minutes to downtown Little Rock for excellent shopping, dining, and live entertainment. Take in local history at the Cadron Settlement Park and Faulkner County Museum. Families don’t want to miss the games at Hogwild Family Fun Center or the seasonal corn maze at Lollie. Find these exciting activities nearby:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, El Dorado, AR
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, El Dorado, AR on Highway 82 puts you within two miles of the heart of downtown. During your stay at our hotel, discover how the oil boom of the 1920s placed El Dorado on the map with a trip to the Arkansas Museum of Natural Resources. Explore the bustling strip of Main Street, El Dorado’s downtown district, home to shopping, dining, and more. If you’re looking for some fresh air, be sure to check out the South Arkansas Arboretum, featuring local and exotic flora only a mile away from the hotel.We want you to be as comfortable as possible during your stay at the Country Inn & Suites, El Dorado. Immerse yourself in the hot tub for a soothing soak after a day of sightseeing or business meetings. Lounge by the heated indoor pool, or log a few miles of cardio in the hotel’s fitness center. Afterward, you can head to your room to catch your favorite TV show before settling down for a good night’s sleep. Unwind from a day on the road in one of our inviting rooms or suites featuring comfortable bedding, a microwave for heating leftovers and a refrigerator for stowing your favorite beverages. Catch up on the news with our free weekday newspaper. With our convenient location on Highway 82 near the heart of El Dorado, the Country Inn & Suites is the perfect space to host your upcoming corporate event or family gathering. Rent the boardroom with space for up to 12 guests or the larger meeting room for up to 60 guests. Take advantage of our additional amenities like a flat-screen TV and light refreshments to make your guests feel relaxed during breaks. Ask about group rates and planning assistance. El Dorado is teeming with exciting things for visitors to do. Travel less than 30 minutes to reach Moro Bay State Park for an enjoyable day of fishing and hiking. Stay near the hotel and explore the shops in downtown El Dorado, just two miles away, or browse the stores at Mellor Park Mall, three miles away. Don’t miss out on these popular attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Hot Springs, AR
description: Located off Highway 7, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Hot Springs, AR makes it easy to experience popular attractions like Lake Hamilton and Oaklawn Racing and Gaming. Families can drive about 15 minutes from our hotel to reach the roller coasters at Magic Springs Theme and Water Park, and couples love being about 10 minutes from the thermal baths and spas along Bathhouse Row.Traveling with your kids? You can save money with a free, hot breakfast, served daily, and free stays for children 18 and younger in the same room with an adult. Make time to play in the heated indoor pool or work out in our fitness center, and then upload photos of your Hot Springs vacation with free high-speed internet access. Free high-speed internet access helps you stay connected while in-room movies keep your kids entertained in each of our hotel rooms and suites. If you need an energy boost, help yourself to a complimentary cup of coffee made with your in-room coffeemaker. Downtown Hot Springs has plenty to keep you entertained thanks to the thermal pools in spas on Bathhouse Row and a variety of inviting shops. If you’re visiting in February or March, be sure to catch the breathtaking tulips in bloom at Garvan Woodland Gardens, less than 10 minutes from the hotel. Set aside time for these popular nearby attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, North Little Rock, AR
description: Located just off I-40, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, North Little Rock, AR puts you within easy reach of major businesses and less than three miles from concerts at Simmons Bank Arena. Explore all that Arkansas’s capital has to offer, from the Statehouse Convention Center and Riverfront Park to kid-friendly attractions like the Museum of Discovery. Here on government business? Drive about four miles for meetings at the Arkansas State Capitol building, and then treat yourself to a traveling Broadway performance at the Robinson Center.After a day of shopping in downtown Little Rock or strolling along the river, head back to our hotel for a dip in our seasonal outdoor pool (open Memorial Day to Labor Day) or a jog on the treadmill in our fitness center. Here with your kids? Take advantage of on-site laundry facilities and our free, hot breakfast, which serves healthy and delicious options daily from 6:30 to 9:30 a.m. For a midnight snack, stop by our Inn Case Market. Whether your idea of relaxation involves free Wi-Fi or a 50-inch flat-screen TV, our comfortable hotel rooms and suites offer everything you need to unwind. Fall asleep each night on fluffy pillows, and wake up to a hot cup of coffee thanks to in-room coffee facilities. Need a crib or a rollaway bed? Just ask. Need an affordable and convenient meeting space near downtown Little Rock? Contact our dedicated, professional meeting planners to book our facility’s flexible meeting space for up to 100 guests. We offer fax and copy services in our 24-hour business center, free Wi-Fi, and complimentary on-site parking to ensure your meeting is stress free. Our hotel lies near some of the most popular destinations in the Little Rock area, including the Statehouse Convention Center and the Arkansas State Capitol building. Take your kids to the Museum of Discovery to have fun while learning something new, or play a round of golf at Burns Park, home to two beautiful courses. Don’t miss these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bentonville South - Rogers, AR
description: Stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bentonville South - Rogers, AR off I-49 for easy access to Walmart’s corporate headquarters, Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art, and scenic Beaver Lake. Our award-winning service and accessible location make it easy to relax during your trip. Families love the indoor pool and the free cookies in the lobby, while business travelers appreciate the free Wi-Fi and 24-hour business center at our hotel.Need some stress relief? Crush a workout in the fitness center, or enjoy a soothing soak in the hot tub. If you prefer to unwind in the comfort of your room, each room and suite features the enhanced comfort of a Serta Perfect Sleeper® bed. Sink into a Serta Perfect Sleeper® bed when you stay in one of our rooms and suites. Before drifting off to sleep, check your email and social media with free Wi-Fi. In the morning, you can brew your own cup of coffee with the coffeemaker before heading over to enjoy our free, hot breakfast. Whether you’re hosting a corporate event or a family reunion in Rogers, our Country Inn & Suites in the Arkansas Business Corridor offers meeting space and convenient perks like our business package. Welcome up to 30 attendees and take advantage of amenities such as snack and beverage options and audiovisual equipment. Our hotel is ideally suited for tour groups, sports teams, wedding parties, and government and corporate travelers. For some outdoor fun, hike or bike a portion of the 36-mile Razorback Greenway, which stretches from Bentonville to Fayetteville. You can take an afternoon to explore a piece of area history at the Peel Mansion Museum & Heritage Gardens. Don’t miss these popular attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bakersfield, CA
description: Situated just off CA-99, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bakersfield, CA provides a convenient location near downtown’s top attractions. Our hotel is just minutes from the heart of Bakersfield, where you can find Kern County Fairgrounds and the Mechanics Bank Arena, Theater and Convention Center. If you’re in town with your family, don’t miss the California Living Museum, home to a huge array of plants and animals native to Kern County.After a day of shopping at the Valley Plaza Mall, treat yourself to a soak in our hot tub and enjoy free cookies and coffee from the lobby. Our hotel is pet-friendly, so you can bring your four-legged companion along. Each of our 63 rooms welcomes you with comfortable bedding and a work desk so you can stay on top of your business projects. The refrigerator and microwave make it easy to store and reheat food items, and the coffee and tea facilities allow you to get a caffeine boost any time of the day. Host up to 50 guests in the Wible-Plaza Room, our 1,200-square-foot meeting space suitable for training, meetings, and social events. Equipped with everything you need for a successful get-together, our facilities offer free Wi-Fi, a business center, and a variety of audiovisual equipment. Bakersfield is a great home base for exploring Kern Country. Admire the works of local artists at the Bakersfield Museum of Art or catch a hockey game at the Mechanics Bank Arena, Theater & Convention Center downtown. The Kern County Fairgrounds are only two miles away. Even when the fair isn’t in town, exciting events are happening throughout the year. Check out these nearby favorites:

name: Radisson Suites Hotel Anaheim - Buena Park
description: When your family is ready for a getaway, head to Radisson Suites Hotel Anaheim - Buena Park, located less than a mile from Knott’s Berry Farm and even closer to Medieval Times Dinner & Tournament and Pirate’s Dinner Adventure. Get your tickets to Disneyland® Resort, only five miles away, and then hop on our complimentary hotel shuttle that takes you directly to the park.After a day of rides and shows, head back to the hotel to unwind in our outdoor pool or hot tub. Flora Restaurant makes dining easy, and our tour desk can help you arrange transportation or buy tickets for the family’s next adventure. Traveling for work? Stay productive in our fitness and business centers. The whole family has room to spread out in one of our 200 spacious rooms and suites. Each suite is 500 square feet with a living room and a separate bedroom. We also offer Business Class rooms with work spaces, free Wi-Fi, and an optional boardroom table. All rooms include two TVs and convenient amenities like a coffeemaker. Radisson Suites Hotel Anaheim - Buena Park offers more than 3,600 square feet of elegant event space that is ideal for business meetings and social events of up to 400 people. Our expert staff is happy to work closely with you on every detail, from decorations to customized catering menus. We also offer delectable catering recommendations to enhance any size gathering. During your stay in Buena Park, dine at the innovative Flora Restaurant, open every day for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Our chefs have created an eclectic menu that showcases the vibrant flavors of Southern California. Room service is also available at select hours, whether you’re craving breakfast in bed or a relaxing, quiet dinner in your hotel room. Our hotel is within 10 miles of some of Orange County's top attractions. Reserve a ride on the complimentary shuttle for an easy trip to Disneyland® Resort and Knott's Berry Farm. Spend a low-key day touring the Richard Nixon Presidential Library and Museum or seeing a movie at Buena Park Downtown before an entertaining dinner at Medieval Times. Don't miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Radisson Hotel Chatsworth
description: Situated two miles south of the intersection of SR-27 and the Ronald Reagan Freeway, Radisson Hotel Chatsworth provides easy access to the best of SoCal. In a peaceful location bordering Simi Valley, our hotel is near local businesses and renowned institutions like the Ronald Reagan Presidential Library. It’s only a half-hour drive to San Fernando Valley movie and animation studios, plus iconic LA attractions such as the Hollywood Walk of Fame. Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) is just over 30 minutes away.Here for work? Stay productive with free high-speed, wireless internet and an on-site business center. Our hotel’s lounge is the perfect place to meet clients or colleagues after a day of meetings. If you’re here on vacation, you can enjoy a leisurely room service breakfast before taking a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool. Keep up your workout routine in our fitness center, and then relax with a cold drink in our secluded courtyard. Our flexible meeting facilities offer more than 4,000 square feet of space with a capacity of up to 160 attendees. You and your guests can take advantage of free high-speed, wireless internet and convenient access to nearby hot spots like Simi Valley and San Fernando. Meet with your management team in the comfort of our professional boardroom, or plan an elegant wedding reception in the well-appointed Caprese event room. Want breakfast in bed? Order from our extensive room service menu. Settle into our on-site restaurant for a fresh, seasonal meal. Chefs at Caprese Restaurant prepare delectable Italian-American dishes with locally sourced ingredients. In the evening, relax with a carefully crafted cocktail in the laid-back atmosphere of Caprese Lounge. Step into a recreation of the Oval Office at the Ronald Reagan Presidential Library, or browse designer labels at Westfield Topanga & The Village. Want to go rock-climbing in scenic SoCal surroundings? Our hotel is close to several open spaces and state parks. Movie-themed thrills at Universal Studios Hollywood and other Los Angeles attractions are a short drive away. Don’t miss these area favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dixon, CA - UC Davis Area
description: Located right off I-80, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dixon, CA - UC Davis Area is a convenient choice for guests visiting the University of California, Davis, which is only six miles away. Soak up the California sunshine and partake in outdoor activities at Northwest Park or Hall Park, both less than 10 minutes from our hotel. If you’re traveling with family, be sure to visit Cool Patch Pumpkins to explore the internationally renowned pumpkin patch, and the Jelly Belly Factory to see how their famous jelly beans are made.If you’re in town for work, take advantage of our 24-hour business center. You can fuel up each morning with our free, hot breakfast that includes items like eggs, Belgian waffles, and yogurt. During warmer months, guests are also invited to enjoy the California sunshine in our refreshing outdoor pool. Perfect for leisure travelers with kids or business travelers who want extra space, this all-suite hotel features 80 studio suites with either two double beds or one king bed. Relax in the sitting area with a sleeper sofa and store drinks and snacks in the mini fridge. In the morning, brew a hot cup of coffee before heading to our free, hot breakfast. Right off I-80 and minutes from UC Davis, our hotel’s location is an ideal place to host your next social event or business seminar. Our 900-square-foot meeting room features audiovisual equipment, customized catering, and a flexible space to suit a variety of business and social occasions for up to 50 guests. Attend events at the UC Davis campus, or make an easy 30-minute drive on I-80 East to the capital city of Sacramento. Savor the California weather by spending time outdoors at Hall Park or Northwest Park. Both parks feature playgrounds and are located about two miles from the Country Inn & Suites. Other attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fresno North, CA
description: At the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fresno North, CA, you can enjoy amenities like a heated indoor pool and a great location just 10 minutes from downtown. Spend an afternoon shopping at River Park, take in live performances at The Tower Theatre for the Performing Arts, or let your kids get hands-on at The Fresno Discovery Center. Located just off Highway 41, our hotel is about eight miles from Fresno Yosemite International Airport (FAT) and offers quick commutes for both business and leisure travelers.Here for a sports tournament? Stay less than three miles away from the Save Mart Center at our hotel. You can fuel your morning with our free, hot breakfast, stay on track with your routine at our fitness center, and end every night with a dip in our hot tub. After taking the kids for an adventure at Fresno Chaffee Zoo, use free Wi-Fi to share photos and then pile on the bed to watch an HBO movie. Have an early morning? Every room and suite offers a coffeemaker for a quick caffeine jolt. Book a suite for added conveniences like a microwave and refrigerator. Fresno’s pleasant year-round temperatures are perfect for enjoying outdoor activities like touring the vineyards at the Fresno State Winery and strolling the streets in downtown Fresno—home to museums, art galleries, and parks. Don't miss these popular stops:

name: Radisson Hotel Fresno Conference Center
description: Conveniently positioned in the heart of downtown and only a seven-minute walk from the Fresno Convention & Entertainment Center, Radisson Hotel Fresno Conference Center makes it easy to get to important meetings and events. Between client consultations, you can walk to nearby restaurants and bars or see your favorite big-name musician in concert at the Save Mart Center. For a breath of fresh air, stroll through Courthouse Park, conveniently situated across the street.Planning a business summit or wedding reception in Fresno? We offer more than 15,000 square feet of on-site meeting space, capable of accommodating up to 500 guests. To ensure your out-of-town attendees have a hassle-free arrival, we offer complimentary shuttle service to and from Fresno Yosemite International Airport (FAT) and the Fresno Amtrak station. Parking is also available for just USD 5 a day and is complimentary on Fridays and Saturdays. After your meetings, you can lounge by the outdoor pool or take a mind-clearing jog in the fitness center. Each of our 197 hotel rooms and suites provides a quiet, comfortable place to rest in between seminars and breakout sessions. Thanks to a well-lit work desk and coffee and tea facilities in each room, you can touch base with the office and stay caffeinated around the clock. Situated in the heart of downtown, Radisson Hotel Fresno Conference Center offers seven flexible spaces for noteworthy corporate seminars and company galas. For a fairy-tale wedding, book the beautiful 6,890-square-foot Sierra Grand Ballroom and allow our expert staff to arrange room blocks and airport transportation for your guests. Need a smaller space? The Skyroom, positioned on the ninth floor, features stunning skyline views of Fresno. Whether you’re filling up on breakfast favorites or meeting with clients over fresh salads, Zest California Grill & Bar is the perfect stop for casual dining. Start your meal with house-made chips and salsa, and then dig into one of our signature entrées like roasted half-chicken. Later on, you can celebrate the closing of a business deal with drinks at Zest Bar, the sports-themed bar located in the hotel’s lobby. Situated halfway between San Francisco and Yosemite, Fresno features its own fun mix of attractions. Take a five-minute walk to Chukchansi Park to cheer on the Fresno Grizzlies baseball team, and then test your luck on the slots at Club One Casino next door to the hotel. Taking a family vacation? You’ll find fun for all ages at Fresno Chaffee Zoo and Island Waterpark. Don’t miss these favorites during your stay: By car:Take N Gateway Boulevard to E McKinley Avenue. Then, take Exit 59 and CA-41 to Van Ness Avenue. The hotel will be on your left. By car:Head northwest on Sante Fe Avenue toward Tulare Street. Turn left after 0.4 miles. Next, turn right onto Van Ness Avenue. The hotel will be on your left.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Monterey Beachfront-Marina, CA
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Monterey Beachfront-Marina, CA provides the perfect springboard for exploring the picturesque Monterey Bay area. Walk to Marina State Beach in about three minutes for a day of sunbathing and boogie-boarding, or drive to the Monterey Bay Aquarium to meet penguins, octopuses, and otters. Cannery Row, once home to a series of sardine factories and the inspiration for one of John Steinbeck’s novels, now houses restaurants, pubs, and eclectic boutiques.Once you’ve explored Monterey County, return to our hotel and unwind in your room with free Wi-Fi. We also offer a business center and a free, hot breakfast that includes waffles, French toast, eggs, and bacon. Boasting 145 guest rooms within walking distance of Marina State Beach, our hotel provides convenient accommodations for family vacations and outdoor enthusiasts. Thoughtful amenities like in-room microwaves and refrigerators make it easy to store and prepare snacks for a day at the beach, and free Wi-Fi lets you share your favorite surfing photos to social media. In town on business? Add a fresh press to your suit using the room's iron and ironing board before your client meeting at Dole. Whether sunbathing, hiking, or wine tasting are more your speed, Marina offers an abundance of activities for guests to enjoy. Hop in your car to admire the beauty of the Pacific coastline along 17-Mile Drive, or delve into the history of the region with a trip to the National Steinbeck Center. If you’re in town on business, treat your colleagues to a round of golf at the Bayonet and Black Horse golf courses. Don’t miss out on these top attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Oakland Airport
description: With a complimentary airport shuttle and a location near I-880 and Oakland International Airport (OAK), Radisson Hotel Oakland Airport is a convenient choice for busy travelers. Our hotel’s position places you within walking distance of Oakland Arena and RingCentral Coliseum, perfect for concert goers and fans of the Oakland Athletics baseball team. Planning to explore the Bay Area? We’re within 20 miles of San Francisco and Berkeley.After a day of travel, you can relax and reconnect thanks to our outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. The on-site Starbucks® coffee shop and RBG Bar & Grill help you refuel with sweet treats and delicious American fare. If you need to host a meeting, reserve one of the sleek rooms in our event facility, and prepare your presentation in our business center. More than 7,400 square feet of space and a convenient location just minutes from the OAK airport make our Radisson the ideal venue for your event in Oakland. Allow our dedicated staff to help you choose the right meeting room and catering options. For an elegant setting that’s perfect for a wedding reception, we offer a gorgeous outdoor courtyard. Specializing in classic American cuisine, our RBG Bar & Grill lets you enjoy a hearty meal for breakfast, lunch, and dinner without leaving the hotel. The restaurant’s bar is also a great place to grab a drink after work or to catch up with friends over late-night cocktails. If you’re in a hurry, run in for an energizing coffee and breakfast sandwich from our Starbucks® coffee shop. Room service is available if you’d prefer to have a meal in private. From tranquil redwood parks to the bustling Uptown entertainment district, the Bright Side of the Bay has something for everyone. Spend the morning exploring the Oakland Aviation Museum, and then pick up a new outfit at Marina Square Center. If you’re a baseball fan, you’ll appreciate being within walking distance of Oakland Athletics games at RingCentral Coliseum. Visit these top destinations during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Ontario at Ontario Mills, CA
description: Prepare for a hassle-free stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Ontario at Ontario Mills, CA, located near both Fontana and Rancho Cucamonga. Our hotel sits at the intersection of I-10 and I-15 and affords easy access to trade shows at the Ontario Convention Center. See a pro soccer or hockey game at the Toyota Arena, and then go shopping at the Ontario Mills mall or catch a NASCAR race at the Auto Club Speedway, both just minutes from the hotel.Let us deal with the traffic while you relax aboard our complimentary shuttle to and from Ontario International Airport (ONT). When you’re ready to unwind, you can soak up the sun at our outdoor pool or gather around the fire pit with a complimentary cup of coffee from the lobby. Snag a free cookie on your way through the lobby and work it off later with a jog or a stroll on our fitness center’s treadmill. Need to work? Visit our business center to check email using free Wi-Fi and print agendas or handouts prior to a business meeting. Pack your favorite snacks and drinks since our rooms and suites include a refrigerator and a microwave. If you’re traveling for work, you can look your best with the help of a hair dryer, a full-length mirror, and an iron with an ironing board. Free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with HBO provide entertainment options for relaxing at the end of a busy day. Book one of our two 700-square-foot meeting rooms or reserve the 400-square-foot boardroom for your upcoming corporate or social event. To deliver impressive presentations, take advantage of audiovisual equipment and free Wi-Fi. Whether you’re hosting as many as 50 guests or as few as 10, we have the ideal space to accommodate your needs. Known as the Gateway to Southern California, Ontario features attractions like Sierra Lakes Golf Club and Ontario Improv, both just minutes from the hotel. When you book a room at the Country Inn & Suites, you can also enjoy day trips to Los Angeles, 35 miles east on I-10, and Disneyland® Resort, about 45 minutes southwest. Check out these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, San Bernardino (Redlands), CA
description: Conveniently located off I-10, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, San Bernardino (Redlands), CA is the perfect place to kick-start your vacation in sunny San Bernardino. You can hit the hiking trails at Big Bear Lake, watch the races at Auto Club Speedway, or pick apples at Riley’s Farm, all less than 30 miles away from the hotel. Visiting your favorite student at the University of Redlands? Drive about five minutes to reach the university’s scenic campus. If you’re traveling on business, you’ll be glad to know San Bernardino’s downtown is less than 20 minutes away. To top it off, we’re a pet-friendly facility, so there’s no need to leave your furry companion behind.*After a full day of leisure or business meetings, relax poolside while basking in the California sunshine. You can keep up with friends, family, or colleagues using free high-speed internet access or hit the fitness center for a stroll on the treadmill. Each morning, our free, hot breakfast offers you a convenient way to fuel up for your day.*Pet policy: One pet under 20 pounds allowed per room. A USD 50 pet fee applies. Enjoy your favorite snacks and beverages on the road with the convenient refrigerator and microwave in each of our spacious hotel rooms and suites. If you’re traveling for work, you can stay on top of important business with free Wi-Fi and a work desk. Upgrade to a suite to enjoy options such as a kitchenette or a whirlpool. Planning a business meeting or personal event in the San Bernardino area? The Country Inn & Suites offers a flexible on-site space for up to 40 guests, perfect for your next gathering. Contact the hotel for information on discounted group rates for your event. NASCAR action keeps adrenaline enthusiasts entertained at the Auto Club Speedway, just west of the hotel. Looking for family fun? Everyone can enjoy a day of apple picking at Riley’s Farm as well as shopping, dining, and festivals in Redlands. Don’t miss these exciting attractions while you’re in town:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, San Carlos, CA
description: Situated in the heart of the Bay Area, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, San Carlos, CA is just 11 miles from San Francisco International Airport (SFO) and 23 from San Jose International Airport (SJC). Our hotel offers business travelers easy access to corporate offices in San Mateo, San Jose, and San Francisco, including Oracle’s headquarters, which are only minutes away.Looking to see famous area sites? Drive or take the Caltrain to see the Golden Gate Bridge, Chinatown, and the Moscone Center, all roughly 40 minutes away. Within seven miles of the hotel, families enjoy the Stanford Shopping Center and CuriOdyssey, a hands-on science museum, while golfers love the Crystal Springs Golf Course. After a full day, unwind at the hotel with our modern fitness center. In the mornings, you can fuel up for your day with free grab-and-go breakfast items or find a filling snack at the on-site Inn Case Market. Feel at home in our rooms and suites offering free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, and a spacious desk with an ergonomic chair. Whip up a snack with your in-room microwave, and grab a cold drink from the refrigerator before heading off on your next adventure. Board the Caltrain at San Carlos Station to make the 24-mile trip to downtown San Francisco without worrying about traffic. While you’re there, attend a convention at the Moscone Center, eat in Chinatown, or tour Alcatraz Island. Our hotel also lies near these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, San Diego North, CA
description: Nestled in San Diego’s Sorrento Valley neighborhood near I-5 and I-805, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, San Diego North, CA provides a quiet, up-to-date retreat close to the University of California San Diego (UCSD). Our hotel is ideal for families who love being less than 30 minutes to La Jolla beaches and attractions like LEGOLAND®, SeaWorld, and the world-renowned San Diego Zoo. Here on business? Make your commute worry-free by taking our hotel's complimentary shuttle to nearby corporations like Qualcomm and business parks like San Diego Tech Center.Fuel up for your San Diego adventures with our hotel’s free, hot breakfast, and enjoy a snack or drink from our Inn Case sundries market as the day winds down. You can stop by our lobby anytime for complimentary cookies and enjoy a rejuvenating dip in our beautiful, palm-lined outdoor pool. The following certification shows our hotel's commitment to guests' safety. For more information, visit Safehotels Certification. With plenty of space to stretch out, each of our 180 hotel rooms and suites feels like a home away from home after a busy day of meetings or sightseeing. Wrap up business projects with free Wi-Fi at the work desk, or pop popcorn in the microwave for a family movie night courtesy of the flat-screen TV and HBO channels. Providing ideal facilities for Sorrento Valley-area events, our hotel offers more than 5,000 square feet of space across seven meeting rooms. Our meeting space can accommodate up to 190 guests, and we offer audiovisual equipment rentals, catering options, and free Wi-Fi to make your events more successful.Planning your wedding in sunny San Diego? Our hotel makes a picturesque wedding venue! Featuring beautiful event space, a variety of packages, and the assistance of our dedicated events team, our hotel can help you create the wedding of your dreams.                                 After a busy day, head to the on-site Sorrento Valley Restaurant for a delicious dinner of salmon filet or Black Angus beef paired with an ice-cold beer or a glass of wine. Bask in Southern California's gorgeous weather during a kayak excursion at La Jolla Shores or a family outing to LEGOLAND®. The Country Inn & Suites offers a convenient location in the Sorrento Valley neighborhood, about five miles from campus tours at UCSD and about a 20-minute drive from downtown San Diego. Don’t miss these local attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel San Diego-Rancho Bernardo
description: Conveniently located between North and South San Diego, Radisson Hotel San Diego-Rancho Bernardo offers a quiet home base for a family vacation or a business trip. You can take I-15 nearby to reach the San Diego Zoo Safari Park, 15 minutes away, or drive 30 minutes to visit Del Mar beaches or downtown San Diego’s Gaslamp Quarter. Close by, the Rancho Bernardo area boasts dozens of championship golf courses, wineries, hiking trails, and outdoor parks, including Black Mountain and Hodges Reservoir. If you’re here for work, you can take advantage of our location near corporations like Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Northrop Grumman, Sony, ASML, and BAE.Hotel amenities like free Wi-Fi and complimentary parking ensure your visit to San Diego is stress-free. After a long day, you can relax in our outdoor pool or get a workout in at our fitness center. For easy breakfast or dinner options, enjoy delicious meals made with fresh, local ingredients at our on-site restaurant. Planning a celebration or business meeting? We offer extensive event facilities. Business and leisure travelers can rest easy in our 178 rooms and suites. Each room includes premium bedding, pillowtop mattresses, and free Wi-Fi. Convenient amenities such as refrigerators, work desks, and coffee and tea facilities help you feel at home. Host up to 130 guests in nearly 4,000 square feet of elegant, well-appointed event space. Our Meeting Solutions Certified property provides full audiovisual services, catered meals, and special business packages to help make your conference or reception run smoothly. Planning to tie the knot? Our Rotunda Ballroom is perfect for rehearsal dinners and intimate wedding receptions. With high ceilings, a large dance floor, and an adjacent patio, the space provides a truly memorable experience for you and your guests.                                     If you need to work through dinner or simply prefer to eat in the privacy of your room, order a delicious meal from room service.                                 Our on-site RB Bistro and Bar offers local, contemporary cuisine in a stylish setting. Enjoy the breakfast buffet with hot selections cooked fresh in our kitchen, and order satisfying entrées like sirloin steak or flavor-packed pasta dishes for dinner on the outdoor patio. After your meal, relax with a cocktail or a craft beer at our full bar and watch a game on one of our flat-screen TVs. Radisson Hotel San Diego-Rancho Bernardo offers a tranquil atmosphere without sacrificing proximity to all of the best San Diego and North County attractions. You can drive less than 40 minutes to family-friendly spots like the San Diego Zoo Safari Park, LEGOLAND® California, and SeaWorld San Diego. Be sure to visit these local favorites: By car:Take I-5 North to the 163N/15N highway. Once on the I-15 N highway, take a left off of Exit 24. You can take the toll road exit if you have a Toll Road pass. By car:Take Exit 24 and turn right (from I-15 N) or left (from I-15 S) onto Rancho Bernardo Road. Drive less than half a mile and turn left onto W Bernardo Drive. After 0.3 miles, turn right onto W Bernardo Court. The hotel will be on your right almost immediately.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, San Jose International Airport, CA
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, San Jose International Airport, CA is a smart choice for business travelers seeking proximity to the SJC airport, the gateway to Silicon Valley. Our hotel is just three miles from the business expos and trade shows at the San Jose McEnery Convention Center and two blocks from the city’s VTA light rail, which offers quick access to the SAP Center for NHL hockey and Levi’s Stadium for San Francisco 49ers games. Planning a Bay Area college tour? Santa Clara University and San José State are just a few minutes’ drive away.Take our free shuttle from the SJC airport and then stretch out with an energizing jog in the fitness center. You can start each morning with our free, hot breakfast and then complete work projects easily in the privacy of your room using the desk and free Wi-Fi. When it’s time to relax, dip your toes in our outdoor pool or soak in the hot tub. We also offer coin-operated laundry facilities so that you can go home with a suitcase of clean clothes. Each of our 126 hotel rooms and suites is equipped with amenities to help you work efficiently, including free Wi-Fi and a comfortable desk with an ergonomic chair. Need an energy boost? Prepare a cup of coffee with your in-room machine. If you’re sharing travel expenses with a friend or on a family trip, consider booking one of our studio suites for extra space and a kitchenette. For a convenient venue just two miles from the SJC airport, reserve our California Room. Offering a choice of setups, the space can comfortably accommodate up to 40 guests. We also offer audiovisual equipment, free Wi-Fi, and flexible catering options to ensure your event unfolds with ease. Even if you have limited free time in San Jose, you can squeeze in an upscale shopping spree at Santana Row, or head to Japantown for fresh sushi or a bowl of ramen just a mile from our hotel. Kids and adults alike enjoy the hands-on exhibits at The Tech Interactive and the adrenaline-pumping roller coasters at California’s Great America. If you’re here to cheer on the 49ers, Levi’s Stadium is an easy light rail journey away. Get inspired by these area attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, John Wayne Airport, CA
description: Hop on our free airport shuttle and enjoy the comfort and convenience of a stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, John Wayne Airport, CA. Located just off Route 55, our hotel is less than three miles from John Wayne Airport, Orange County (SNA), the gateway to the O.C.’s commercial hubs, attractions, and beaches. Families will appreciate our location about 15 minutes from Disneyland® Resort and Disney California Adventure® Park. Want to spend time in the California sun? Build sandcastles or play in the surf at nearby Newport Beach. Business travelers can reach Irvine corporations and University of California, Irvine research labs in less than 10 minutes.Each morning during your stay, take advantage of the free, hot breakfast and then use our 24-hour business center to plan your daily itinerary. After meetings, sightseeing, or browsing the huge South Coast Plaza, lounge in our landscaped pool area and enjoy a revitalizing soak in the hot tub or chill out around the firepit on the patio. You can also stay on track with your workout schedule in our well-equipped fitness center, which is open from 6 am to midnight. With coin-operated laundry facilities on site, you can keep your gym clothes, swimwear, and business attire clean and fresh. Each of our studio-style suites has a refrigerator and a microwave, so you can be prepared when late-night cravings strike. Sink back on the queen-size sleeper sofa in the seating area and catch a movie or your favorite shows on HBO. In the morning, the in-room coffeemaker and free Wi-Fi will help motivate and prepare you for the day ahead. Whether you’re planning a board meeting or a college reunion, we offer 1,750 square feet of well-equipped event space about 10 minutes from the SNA airport. With seating for up to 90 guests, amenities like free Wi-Fi, and the help of our knowledgeable staff, your gathering is certain to be a success. Catch a movie, go bowling, dine out, or shop at The District at Tustin Legacy, a one-stop entertainment destination just a couple of minutes from the hotel. The boutiques and performing arts center at South Coast Plaza, the region’s largest mall, are also a short drive away. Our hotel gives you easy access to trade shows at the Anaheim Convention Center, science exhibits at Discovery Cube Orange County, and baseball games at Angel Stadium, all located less than a 15-minute drive away. Check out these great nearby attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Santa Maria
description: Welcome to beautiful Santa Barbara wine country! Radisson Hotel Santa Maria provides guests with a convenient retreat adjacent to Santa Maria Public Airport (SMX) and just half a mile from SR-135, perfect for exploring all the California Central Coast has to offer. Enjoy free parking at our hotel and easy access to nearby golf courses, Vandenberg Air Force Base, and the Santa Maria Airport Business Park. When you’re ready to sample the area’s renowned wines, ask our knowledgeable front desk staff for tips on visiting nearby vineyards like Cambria Estate Vineyards & Winery or Cottonwood Canyon Vineyard & Winery.Soak up the California sunshine as you unwind in our heated outdoor pool and hot tub. For a workout, set aside time for a workout in our fitness center. You can use free Wi-Fi to stay in touch with the office or visit our 24-hour business center when you have more work to do. Between outings, stop by our two on-site restaurants or enjoy a room service meal in bed. Our 184 pet-friendly hotel rooms and suites provide ample space, calming color palettes, and homelike conveniences such as free Wi-Fi and mini refrigerators. For a memorable stay, upgrade to a suite and enjoy extras like a balcony, a separate living room with a sleeper sofa, or two bathrooms. Business Class guests enjoy bonus rewards points, free drink vouchers, and a free breakfast. Planning a family reunion or an elegant gala? Our event venues offer more than 9,000 square feet of versatile space and professional amenities like audiovisual equipment, on-site catering, and free Wi-Fi. Work with our expert event planners to host an elegant wedding reception for up to 320 guests in our Enterprise Ballroom, or conduct a strategy session with your team in the professional setting of our Challenger Room. Thanks to two on-site restaurants at the Radisson, you can treat yourself to some of the area’s best dishes without leaving the hotel. Atrium Bistro serves a hearty daily breakfast and delicious Sunday brunch, while Vintner’s Grill features selections like crab cakes, filet mignon, and ahi tuna salad for lunch and dinner. If you need a caffeine boost between outings, head to Bob & Hardy’s Café Corner for gourmet black coffee and tasty espresso creations. Room service is also available if you’d like to indulge in breakfast, lunch, or dinner in bed. To experience stunning natural beauty on the shores of the Pacific Ocean, visit the nearby Guadalupe-Nipomo Dunes. You can step back in time with a tour of the expertly restored buildings at La Purisima Mission.
