Close to our hotel, the Santa Maria Museum of Flight offers exhibits about planes and the history of aviation. Don’t miss these local favorites: By car:Head southeast on Terminal Drive for 0.1 mile, and then take a slight right onto Airpark Drive for another 0.1 mile. The hotel is on the right.

name: Radisson Hotel Sunnyvale – Silicon Valley
description: Welcome to the recently renovated Radisson Hotel Sunnyvale – Silicon Valley! Our hotel now offers an elevated guest experience as a full-service Radisson. Whether you’re visiting Silicon Valley to do business or to cheer on the 49ers at Levi’s Stadium, you can enjoy a comfortable stay in a great location just off Highway 237. Corporate travelers appreciate the quick 10-minute drive to Norman Y. Mineta San Jose International Airport (SJC) and the free local business shuttle service. We’re also a short drive from tech sites on Enterprise Way as well as the headquarters of Google, NetApp, Juniper Networks, and Yahoo.Looking for a bite to eat between business meetings? Visit RBG Bar & Grill, our on-site restaurant, which offers tempting options for breakfast and dinner. Before you head out to explore San Jose or ride the Baby Bullet train to San Francisco, stop by our fitness center for a workout or order room service to enjoy a few more minutes in bed. After work, you can soak up the sun by our outdoor pool or have a drink with colleagues. The following certification shows our hotel's commitment to guests' safety. For more information, visit Safehotels Certification. Brew a cup of coffee, connect to free Wi-Fi, and get to work in one of our 180 guest rooms and suites. When it’s time for a break, you have a microwave and a refrigerator at your fingertips. Each room also offers a flat-screen TV with 40 channels, including HBO and NFL Network. Our Radisson hotel offers 2,000 square feet of meeting space suitable for up to 185 guests. Contact our professional event coordinators to discuss available audiovisual equipment, free high-speed internet access, and on-site catering.                                     For a convenient meal in the comfort of your room or suite, order something delicious from the room-service menu.                                 You don’t have to leave the hotel for a fresh, tasty meal thanks to RBG Bar & Grill, our hotel’s on-site restaurant. Indulge in a juicy Black Angus burger, vegetable curry, or grilled salmon, and finish your meal with a slice of cheesecake. The Radisson is near some of the best attractions in the San Francisco Bay area. For an active afternoon, head to the Santa Clara Golf & Tennis Club, where you can play 18 holes on a par-72 course or enjoy a game of tennis on one of seven lighted courts. Prefer a leisurely stroll? Downtown Sunnyvale boasts an array of boutiques and hosts some of the area’s most famous festivals. Don’t miss these highly recommended attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Colorado Springs Airport
description: Less than 10 miles east of downtown, Radisson Hotel Colorado Springs Airport offers a prime location for vacationing families and military, government, or business travelers. Arrivals and departures are a breeze thanks to our free 24-hour shuttle to and from Colorado Springs Airport (COS), just four miles away. Close by you can enjoy downtown shops and restaurants or take on outdoor adventures. Pack your gear to tackle Pikes Peak, or tote your camera to the majestic Seven Falls or Garden of the Gods for spectacular nature photos. Our hotel is also less than six miles from the U.S. Olympic & Paralympic Training Center and within easy reach of multiple corporations and attractions in the city.After a long flight or a day of outdoor pursuits, refresh yourself with a dip in the hotel’s indoor pool or a muscle-soothing soak in the outdoor hot tub. You can keep up your workout routine in our on-site fitness center during your stay and take in views of the Rocky Mountains over a delicious meal in our restaurant. Each of our 200 rooms and suites includes a plush armchair or sleeper sofa, perfect for reading or watching a movie on the flat-screen TV. You can stock the fridge with your favorite drinks and make popcorn in the microwave to enjoy while you relax. Business travelers appreciate thoughtful amenities like a spacious work desk and free Wi-Fi. Conveniently set between downtown Colorado Springs and the airport, our Radisson hotel offers flexible spaces that can accommodate up to 200 guests. You can hold an unforgettable wedding reception in our ballroom or conduct a productive business meeting in one of our smaller venues. To make your event successful, our professional staff offers seamless planning and exquisite catering.Organizing a get-together? Our hotel is a great place for reunions of any kind, with Pikes Peak and Garden of the Gods providing opportunities for group activities. Our location near Peterson AFB, the United States Air Force Academy, Fort Carson, and Schriever AFB has also made the hotel a popular setting for military reunions.                                     With room service, you can stay in and still enjoy a tasty meal, snack, or dessert.                                 Visit our on-site Bistro Colorado Restaurant and enjoy a menu showcasing a variety of sandwiches, salads, and entrées. Whether you’re starting the day with our hearty breakfast buffet or ending your evening with after-dinner drinks, you can gaze at the mesmerizing Rocky Mountains from the comfort of your seat. After a day of hiking, head to the Bistro Colorado Lounge for a cold beer, a flavorful cocktail, or a fine vintage. From hiking and biking to mountain climbing and white-water rafting, Colorado Springs is known as a haven for outdoor enthusiasts. If you prefer a gentler pace, you can explore the buzzing downtown, which is packed with boutiques, specialty shops, art galleries, and craft beer taprooms as little as 15 minutes from the hotel. Pamper yourself with a spa treatment or explore the city’s museums, which feature exhibits on everything from pioneer life and aviation history to the Olympics. Don’t miss the following attractions during your stay: By our free 24-hour airport shuttle:Upon arrival from your flight, call the hotel for pick-up. Our shuttle will meet you across the street outside the baggage claim area.

name: Radisson Hotel Denver Central
description: Located at the intersection of I‑25 and I‑70 and about three miles from downtown, Radisson Hotel Denver Central offers a premier starting point for business and leisure travelers alike. During your stay, travel just a couple of miles to Coors Field to cheer on the Colorado Rockies baseball team, or venture to the nearby Bonacquisti Wine Company for wine tastings, live music, and food truck fare. When you’re ready to start your morning, we offer a delicious complimentary breakfast with fresh waffles, eggs, pastries, and more at our on-site restaurant, Teddy’s. After a day of sightseeing, you can head to our outdoor pool or hot tub for a relaxing dip or squeeze in an invigorating workout in our fitness center. In town for work? Stop by the business center to print handouts before your meeting. Whether you’re traveling for work or play, our 220 guest rooms provide everything you need to unwind each evening. Free Wi-Fi helps you stay connected to work and home while a 49-inch flat-screen TV lets you catch up on your favorite shows. After a restful night’s sleep in a plush bed, make yourself a cup of coffee with the in-room coffeemaker before heading to the on-site restaurant for breakfast favorites like waffles and fresh fruit. Positioned just 15 minutes from downtown Denver and the Colorado Convention Center, our meeting facilities offer approximately 3,000 square feet of well-designed event space, perfect for everything from corporate seminars to family reunions. Take advantage of catering services and rooms outfitted with helpful amenities like audiovisual equipment and free Wi-Fi. Teddy’s Restaurant and Lounge offers a convenient and delicious on-site dining option. Wake up to a complimentary breakfast, complete with make-your-own waffles, yogurt, fruit, assorted breads, and a steaming cup of coffee or tea. For dinner, choose from a menu of expertly crafted American and Mexican specialties. Here with colleagues? Our inviting lounge is a great place to chat over cocktails.When you’re looking for a snack between meals to curb your appetite, stop by the Radisson Mart, open 24 hours a day. Easily reach some of the area’s most popular attractions from our convenient location, which is just minutes from downtown Denver. Spend the day exploring the art collections at the Denver Art Museum, or cheer on the Colorado Rockies at Coors Field. If you're traveling with the family, the Denver Zoo and Downtown Aquarium provide great afternoon activities. Popular attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Greeley, CO
description: Perfectly positioned for outdoor fun near the Rocky Mountains, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Greeley, CO is a great home base for hotel guests. In town for the Greeley Kennel Club dog show or a UNC graduation? Our hotel in Greeley is happy to accommodate your four-legged friends.Start every day with a free, hot breakfast before heading to our indoor saltwater pool. After a refreshing dip, you can research local events like the Greeley Stampede using free internet on your laptop or the computer in the lobby. Unwind with free Wi-Fi and HBO access in our comfortable rooms and suites. Pop open a drink from the refrigerator and relax with your favorite shows or a game on ESPN before drifting off to sleep. Whether you're in town to catch a Bears game at the University of Northern Colorado or see a rodeo at the Greeley Stampede, you'll discover why our location near downtown is a convenient choice for every traveler. Be sure to visit these attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bradenton-Lakewood Ranch, FL
description: Just off I-75, the newly renovated Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bradenton-Lakewood Ranch, FL is ideal for vacationing families and corporate travelers visiting sunny Southwest Florida. Our hotel is minutes from local business parks and Lakewood Ranch, one of the fastest growing communities in the US. To experience the nation's best beaches, drive about 20 minutes west to Siesta Beach or 35 minutes north to St. Pete Beach, the top two ranked beaches by TripAdvisor's 2020 Travelers' Choice Awards. Our hotel is also a convenient base for sports teams visiting Premier Sports Campus, Ellenton Ice and Sports Complex, Nathan Benderson Park, and IMG Academy. Hungry? With more than 35 restaurants nearby and several within walking distance, finding delicious meals is a breeze.Feel free to stick around the hotel and enjoy a refreshing plunge in our outdoor pool, or grab a quick workout in our fitness center. Stop by the airy lobby for a free cookie any time of day, and join us for a free, hot breakfast each morning. Whether you’re in town to work or play, our hotel offers the essentials for a relaxing stay, including a Serta® Perfect Sleeper Elite mattress in every room and suite.  After a day at the beach, wash your wet swimsuits at our on-site laundry facility and then head to your room or suite to relax. Use our free high-speed internet access to post your photos on social media, or watch a movie while your laundry finishes. Business travelers appreciate the user-friendly workstations and coffeemakers, and in-room microwaves and refrigerators are lifesavers for families. Host a business seminar, birthday party, or wedding reception for up to 60 guests in our meeting room. With free high-speed internet access and audiovisual equipment rentals, your event is certain to be a success. Our hotel also welcomes tour groups and sports teams. Big draws to Bradenton include the Pittsburgh Pirates’ spring training season at LECOM Park, and IMG Academy, which offers sports camps for kids and adults. A cultural hub, the city is home to the Village of the Arts district, filled with art studios, galleries, and restaurants. If you enjoy hitting the links, check out one of the area’s many golf courses. Be sure to visit these area highlights:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Port Canaveral, FL
description: Begin your cruise with a comfortable stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Port Canaveral, FL, the closest hotel to the port terminal. Take advantage of the hotel's cruise parking package and leave your vehicle with us while you enjoy your voyage on the ship. During your stay, make a visit to the Kennedy Space Center or the Brevard Zoo for a fun activity for the whole family.If you’re not cruising, start each day with a free, hot breakfast before heading to the Kennedy Space Center or Cocoa Beach for the day. When you return, ease into our sparkling resort-style pool or grab some snacks from our 24-hour shop in the lobby. Kick back in one of our 150 spacious rooms and suites and catch your favorite shows on a 37-inch LED TV. Keep beverages cold in the refrigerator, or make yourself a hot cup of coffee. Our hotel features more than 3,000 square feet of event space. Book the Delta Room or Executive Suite for professional meetings of up to 12, or host a gathering for 100 in the grand Celebration Room.Traveling with a sports team? As a Radisson Hotel Group Sports Approved hotel, we offer great perks, including special group recognition, local restaurant coupons, and even complimentary use of the laundry room. The famous port isn't the only draw in Cape Canaveral. Make time to check out world-class beaches, inspiring family attractions, and, if the timing is right, a NASA rocket launch. Our favorite nearby attractions include:

name: Radisson Resort at the Port
description: Situated in the heart of Cape Canaveral, Radisson Resort at the Port makes it easy to stroll down Cocoa Beach at sunset or discover the world of space travel at Kennedy Space Center. Cruise passengers can book our park and cruise packages, which include round-trip shuttle service to Port Canaveral and free parking at the hotel. If you’re flying in, please contact us about available shuttle service from the airports in Orlando, Melbourne, and Sanford. If you’re driving to the hotel, you can take advantage of self-parking at a charge of USD 10 per day, and two charging stations for electric cars (one Tesla and one regular).Each morning, you can keep up with your workouts in our fitness center and then head to Flamingo’s Restaurant for a delicious breakfast on site. Spend the day exploring nearby attractions, practicing your backhand on our tennis courts, or relaxing in our impressive outdoor pool and hot tub. When you’re ready for lunch, Tiki Bar & Grill offers casual poolside dining, local brews, and specialty cocktails. After a full day, stroll through our beautiful grounds with fishponds and waterfalls. Afterward, you can head to Flamingo’s for dinner with live jazz music in the adjacent Lounge Bar. You can also order room service, available from 7 am to 10 pm daily. Spend a restful night in one of our hotel’s 284 rooms and suites. Each room features conveniences like a microwave, a refrigerator, and free Wi-Fi. Bringing your four-legged friend along? We offer pet-friendly rooms. In the mornings, brew your first cup with the in-room coffeemaker and head off to adventures at Cocoa Beach, just five miles away. As the largest conference center in the region, Radisson Resort at the Port is a prime destination for personal and corporate events. Host a wedding reception in the Grande Caribbean Ballroom, or book one of our breakout rooms for a board meeting. We offer more than 30,000 square feet of meeting space, and our staff can help you create customized banquet menus and connect to audiovisual equipment. Our hotel near Port Canaveral offers an on-site restaurant and two bars. Flamingo’s Restaurant, open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, serves American cuisine in a casual dining room that overlooks our pool and its waterfalls. After your meal, you can stop by Flamingo’s Lounge Bar to enjoy live jazz music and specialty drinks. If you’d like to sip a cocktail outside, head to our Tiki Bar, located next to the outdoor pool. Whether you’re vacationing in the area or embarking on a cruise, you can find plenty to see and do near the Radisson. Our hotel is within walking distance of outstanding restaurants and just a half mile from the ocean. Don’t miss these attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Crestview, FL
description: Located at the intersection of Highway 85 and I-10, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Crestview, FL provides a quiet retreat in Crestview, the Hub City. The beautiful white-sand beaches in Destin are only 38 minutes away, and Chautauqua Vineyard & Winery provides a fun afternoon of wine tasting, about 25 minutes from the hotel. If you have the kids in tow, enjoy some fresh air at Twin Hills Park or feed the lemurs at the Emerald Coast Zoo. We’re also within easy reach of Eglin Air Force Base.After your Destin beach excursion, return to the hotel to find complimentary coffee and cookies awaiting you in the lobby. If you crave more sun, you can take a refreshing dip in the outdoor pool. Before you head back to your room, stop by the business center to print off the next day’s passes to Gulfarium Marine Adventure Park. In the morning, join us in the dining room for our free, hot breakfast. Our guest rooms and suites help you feel at home with thoughtful amenities like free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. Stash some bottled water in the refrigerator, and then pack your beach cooler while you enjoy your first cup of coffee from the in-room coffeemaker. From birthday celebrations to business meetings, the flexible facilities at our hotel can easily accommodate events of all kinds for up to 50 guests. To enhance your gathering, you can present slideshows on the large screen and stream content via free high-speed internet access. Whether you have meetings at local business, are visiting a loved one at Eglin Air Force Base, or are vacationing at the beaches in Destin, our hotel offers quick access to the area’s top attractions via Highway 85 and I-10. Get up close to your favorite animals at the Emerald Coast Zoo, and don’t miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Gainesville, FL
description: Located right off I-75, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Gainesville, FL is the perfect home base for attending football games at the University of Florida, glimpsing alligators in Paynes Prairie Preserve State Park, and snorkeling at Devil's Den Spring. Our hotel is the perfect place to unwind after exploring the best of northern Florida. After a day of tubing or canoeing at Ichetucknee Springs State Park or dining at Celebration Point, retreat to your comfortable hotel room to recharge with free Wi-Fi and HBO movies before falling asleep under down comforters.Wake up every morning to our free, hot breakfast that offers a rotating menu of items like eggs, bacon, and sausage patties, and daily items such as fruit, Danishes, toast, bagels, and fresh-made waffles. If a daily stroll is part of your routine, stop by our fitness center for a brisk walk on the treadmill. Working? Get your tasks done efficiently with property-wide Wi-Fi plus a printer and computers in our business center. Relax afterwards with a soak in our heated indoor pool. Our attractive and spacious guest rooms and suites are designed with your relaxation in mind. Wind down for the evening with a great movie on HBO or upload pictures from the day using free Wi-Fi. In the morning, make a hot cup of coffee using the in-room coffeemaker and browse national news in a free weekday newspaper. Need a space to host a business meeting, birthday party, or baby shower for up to 50 people? The hotel’s attractive facilities include access to audiovisual equipment and free Wi-Fi to help you stage a successful event. We can also arrange catering for a luncheon or snacks and refreshments for meeting breaks. Whether you're visiting Gainesville on business or vacation, enjoy a convenient stay at our hotel located 15 minutes southwest of downtown. Enjoy easy access to nearby natural attractions like Gainesville-Hawthorne State Trail, just seven miles away, and Sweetwater Wetlands Park, less than five miles from the hotel. Don't miss these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Jacksonville I-95 South, FL
description: Enjoy attractive accommodations 10 minutes from downtown Jacksonville at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Jacksonville I-95 South, FL. We're located less than 15 minutes from the Mayo Clinic and provide a complimentary shuttle to the hospital from 7 am to 6 pm. Sports fans can get tickets to see the Jaguars at TIAA Bank Field or the Jacksonville Jumbo Shrimp at the Baseball Grounds of Jacksonville. If you're in town for a concert at Metropolitan Park, our hotel in the Baymeadows community puts you within 10 miles of the venue.After you’ve taken in the sights, head back to the hotel for a refreshing swim in our outdoor pool. Check social media using free Wi-Fi, and stop by the 24-hour business center to use the computer to print your travel itinerary. Wake up each day with an invigorating workout in the fitness center and a delicious meal from our free, hot breakfast. Offering comfortable beds and attractive décor, our guest rooms and suites help you rest after a day of travel or tailgating at the Jaguars football game. You can watch a movie on the flat-screen TV and share vacation photos with family via free Wi-Fi. Store drinks in the fridge and warm up snacks in the microwave. If you’re traveling with friends or family, reserve a spacious hotel suite with a separate living room and sleeper sofa. When you need a place to host business events or social celebrations, look no further than our 675-square-foot meeting room. The space accommodates up to 50 people and comes with audiovisual equipment for an additional fee and free Wi-Fi to help you deliver effective presentations. Let our professional staff suggest catering options and help you arrange the room in a configuration that best suits your needs. The Country Inn & Suites is close to excellent shopping and dining at St. Johns Town Center, and we're just 15 minutes from the Daily's Place Amphitheater. Several destinations, like Dave & Buster's, are within walking distance. You can spend a beautiful day sauntering along the sand at Jacksonville Beach or visiting animals at the Jacksonville Zoo and Gardens. We also offer complimentary, hassle-free shuttle rides to the Mayo Clinic. Don't miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Jacksonville West, FL
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Jacksonville West, FL offers a quiet retreat just 15 minutes from downtown Jacksonville. On a family vacation? Head to the Museum of Science & History for a peek into local history or a show at the Bryan-Gooding Planetarium. During football season, you can cheer on the NFL’s Jacksonville Jaguars at TIAA Bank Field. If you're in the area for business, several corporations are just a short drive away from the hotel, including the Southeast Toyota Technical Center.After a fun-filled day in Jacksonville, grab a complimentary cookie and cup of coffee from the lobby before you head to your room. When you’re ready to soak up some Florida sun, the sparkling outdoor pool awaits you. Each morning, our free, hot breakfast provides a variety of items to fuel your day. Other amenities include a fitness center and a business center.  Feel at home in one of our rooms and suites, which provide thoughtful amenities like coffee and tea facilities and flat-screen TVs. You can keep up with social media with the help of free Wi-Fi, then settle into a plush bed with a snack from the microwave or refrigerator. Whether you’re planning a corporate meeting or a family reunion, the spacious meeting room at the Country Inn & Suites is a great option. Amenities like free Wi-Fi, audiovisual equipment, and coffee and water service help to create an inviting atmosphere for your guests. Additionally, our helpful staff is always on hand to ensure your event is stress free. When you stay with us in West Jacksonville, you can enjoy easy access to some of the area’s most popular attractions. Catch a glimpse of over 2,000 animal species at Jacksonville Zoo and Gardens, or head downtown to peruse the art galleries and shop for take-home treasures. Interested in taking a day trip? St. Augustine is less than an hour away, and Jacksonville Beach is just a half-hour drive. Don’t miss these favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Jacksonville, FL
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Jacksonville, FL provides our hotel guests with a location that is just a few miles from Jacksonville Naval Complex and a little over 10 miles from downtown Jax. Orange Park Mall is less than a mile away, and you can hop on I-295 to reach the four Jacksonville city beaches in a little over 30 minutes. Business and government travelers can easily reach more than 50 major companies located within a five-mile radius of the hotel.All of our guests appreciate the free cookies, fruit, and coffee available in the lobby as a quick snack after a day of work or play. Monday through Friday, from 5 to 7 pm, we host a reception with drinks and hors d’oeuvres, where you can mingle with fellow guests. Other amenities include our sparkling outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel, and a free, hot breakfast every morning. Book one of our guest rooms or suites furnished with a comfortable Serta® Elite 2000 mattress and plush "touch-of-down" pillows for sweet dreams. You can unwind by watching HBO on the 32-inch flat-screen TV in a room or suite designed to make you feel welcome. Whether you're hosting an intimate social event or a small group business meeting, the Country Inn & Suites is ready to welcome you and your guests to our meeting area. If your plans are to host a larger function, our courteous staff can help you find the right local venue.Traveling with a sports team? Our Sports Approved Program provides your group with perks, including pre-registration, room discounts, and pre-keyed rooms for your group to take the stress out of travel. We also provide a personalized web page where you can post your team travel details. Whether you’re planning to enjoy our beaches, check out our museums, or explore Jacksonville, there’s so much to see and do while you’re here. With our convenient location south of downtown Jax and easy access to I-295, you’ll be within about 35 minutes of the best we have to offer, including these attractions:

name: Radisson Suite Hotel Oceanfront
description: For a relaxing getaway, choose Radisson Suite Hotel Oceanfront, located right on Melbourne’s beautiful beach along Florida’s Space Coast. Claim a lounger and umbrella on the famous white sand outside our doors, and make the most of your vacation with a surf lesson and kayak or paddleboard rentals. Looking for urban entertainment? Downtown Melbourne is just over four miles from the hotel. If you’re flying into the area, we’re less than seven miles from Orlando Melbourne International Airport (MLB) and only one hour from Orlando International Airport (MCO).Want a break from the sand and surf? Lounge by the hotel’s heated outdoor pool, or sip a specialty cocktail from the poolside bar on one of our two sundecks. You can take in stunning ocean views from the fitness center on the 15th floor and then make your way to the hot tub for a soothing soak. Our on-site restaurant and meeting venues also make business meetings and social gatherings easy. Each of our 168 suites features floor-to-ceiling windows and an oceanfront balcony, perfect for basking in the sunshine and enjoying breathtaking views. Sip a cup of coffee or use free Wi-Fi to check your email while the sound of the crashing waves serenades you. Our versatile oceanfront venues accommodate events both large and small, including executive meetings, conferences, baby showers, brunches, and many other social gatherings. Choose from one of our seven meeting spaces spanning approximately 11,550 square feet, and let our dedicated staff support you with planning, on-site catering, and audiovisual equipment. If you’re dreaming of a beachfront wedding, our ocean deck and elegant ballrooms are the perfect spot to host your ceremony and reception. Enjoy delicious food without having to leave the hotel at our on-site restaurants and bar. You can start your day with a hearty breakfast or a quick bagel with cream cheese at Lena’s Café. After a morning on the beach, the Canova Bar and Grill is the perfect spot to relax by the pool with family and friends over an ice-cold beer and shareable appetizers. End your evening back at Lena’s Café with a glass of wine and coastal-inspired cuisine. Prefer to stay in? Our room service menu features delicious meals and desserts you can savor in the comfort of your suite. Set right on Melbourne Beach, our hotel is also a great base for exploring the area’s attractions. Less than six miles away, historic downtown Melbourne offers shopping and entertainment, and you can browse hundreds of artifacts in the Foosaner Art Museum, just 10 minutes away. Take a day trip to explore nearby wildlife preserves or view launches from Kennedy Space Center. If launch tickets sell out, don’t worry—you’ll have an out-of-this-world view from your suite’s balcony. Don’t miss these popular attractions while you’re here:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Miami (Kendall), FL
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Miami (Kendall), FL places you just 15 miles from downtown Miami, keeping you close to the action without sacrificing peace and quiet. While you're staying at our hotel in Kendall, shop for deals at nearby retail centers like The Palms at Town & Country, located next door, or take the kids for an outdoor adventure at Everglades National Park.Unwind after a busy day with a swim in our outdoor pool or a jog in our fitness center. On-site laundry facilities allow for easy swimwear washing, and a 24-hour business center offers computer and printer access while you wait for the dryer to finish. Before you head out again, fuel up on our free, hot breakfast. For a comfortable stay on the outskirts of Miami, reserve a room or suite at the Country Inn & Suites. Wake up with coffee each morning and enjoy the convenience of a microwave and fridge throughout the day. Conveniently located near three different airports, including Miami International Airport (MIA), the Country Inn & Suites is a convenient place to host a small gathering for up to 12 people. Conduct your business meeting in our boardroom, which features free Wi-Fi and ample space for a successful presentation. Positioned between downtown Miami and the Everglades, the Country Inn & Suites, Miami (Kendall) adjoins one of the most popular shopping centers in the area, The Palms at Town & Country. Take the kids to Zoo Miami and the Gold Coast Railroad Museum, and then enjoy a rainforest adventure at Monkey Jungle. Check out these other Miami and Kendall attractions:

name: Radisson RED Miami Airport
description: Where the Miami River pours into Palmer Lake, you’ll find smart travelers flooding into Radisson RED Miami Airport. A five-minute shuttle ride from Miami International Airport (MIA), our hotel is ideal for highfliers visiting Little Havana, the Wynwood Walls or Miami Beach. A short drive from the Wynwood, Miami Airport and Miami Beach convention centers, we cater to corporate types too. We’re a block away from a rental car center as well as bus and train stations, so getting where you want to go is a breeze. Bold white and bright red make a spectacular contrast in our 157 hotel rooms. Choose a king bed if you’re traveling solo or with a special someone. Opt for two queen beds if you’ve got family or a coworker in tow. Either way, you can settle in with free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and Love-Yourself Lighting. Our rooms also equip you with a work desk so you can stay on task in between conference sessions. No monotonous meetings here! Our vibrant venue is 2,000 square feet of prime event space, perfect for catered receptions and corporate presentations alike. Let our multilingual team assist with setup and answer all your questions so you can focus on the guest list. Fresh beats, flavorful eats, RED style. What’s not to love? OUIBar + KTCHN offers epic Cuban, Dominican, and American cooking to keep you charged up and ready for the beach or the boardroom. Want to take it to a whole nother level? Head to our rooftop bar for a brilliant playlist and signature cocktails. Within arm’s reach of Wynwood, Little Havana and Historic Overtown, our neighborhood is steeped in Southern hospitality and island culture. Turn up the heat on Miami Beach, or keep cool in the world-renowned Venetian Pool. Explore the nightlife at Magic City Casino and Calle Ocho, and find daytime fun for the whole family at Jungle Island. If you’re a sports fan, bring your mitt to snag a foul ball at Marlins Park, stop by AmericanAirlines Arena for a Heat game or book a tee time at one of many championship golf courses. You can even plan your trip around the debut of Miami’s MLS team. Looking for something niche? Check out events like Art Basel, HookahFair or Florida Supercon.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Midway, FL
description: Welcome to one of the friendliest hotels in Midway, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Midway, FL. From the warm welcome at check-in to the tasty complimentary cookies and beverages, our team strives to make you feel like a valued guest. Our convenient location off US-90 and close to I-10 makes it easy for you to call on clients or take your family to see the state capitol building and local museums. You can be in Railroad Square Art District in 20 minutes to explore the shops and dining options. Doak Campbell Stadium, home to FSU athletics, is less than nine miles from the hotel.After a day of travel or sightseeing, there’s nothing better than a swim in our spacious outdoor pool. If you favor a more vigorous workout, head to our fitness center for a cardio session. You can catch up on work or print your documents in the well-equipped business center. And don’t forget to start each day with the delicious free, hot breakfast. Our pet-friendly rooms and spacious suites welcome you home. Settle in to watch an HBO movie, make a snack with the microwave, and chill your drinks in the refrigerator before you drift off to sleep on a comfortable bed. Find everything the Big Bend region of Florida has to offer when you choose our convenient location just off US-90 and close to I-10. You can explore nearby forested trails, lakes, and historic sites. Downtown Tallahassee is a short drive, so you can attend an FSU game at Doak Campbell Stadium, or visit the fascinating Tallahassee Museum. Don't miss these nearby attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Ocala, FL
description: The recently renovated Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Ocala, FL is near I-75, making it easy to get to some of Ocala's most popular destinations, including Ocala International Airport (OCF) and Ocala National Forest. When you stay with us, you're within minutes of kayaking on the crystal waters at Silver Springs and gliding through the air at Canyons Zip Line & Canopy Tours. You can also browse the galleries at the Appleton Museum of Art or bounce on trampolines at Sky Zone. Your inviting hotel room with premium bedding will be waiting to provide you with a night of relaxation.After a restful sleep, wake up to our free, hot breakfast and plan an adventurous day in Ocala using free Wi-Fi. Upon your return, you can pick up a free cookie and a complimentary cup of coffee as you breeze through the lobby on the way to the heated indoor pool. Our on-site fitness center is another option to help you decompress after a day on the go. Curl up and watch TV before easing into a restful sleep on premium bedding in your guest room or suite. Wake up to a freshly brewed cup of coffee freshly brewed in your room before heading out for a day of business meetings or outdoor adventures. Whether you're hosting a business meeting or a special celebration in Ocala, you will find ideal event facilities at our hotel. The inviting main meeting room accommodates up to 20 people and the breakfast room hosts up to 25. For your event, we provide a personalized web page to keep attendees up-to-date. Providing refreshments or lunch? Our staff can direct you to several nearby restaurants that can provide catering for your gathering. Located 15 minutes south of Ocala on I-75, our hotel is ideally situated for touring the area. You can go downtown to scout out restaurants and entertainment, or just as easily retreat to the peaceful Ocala National Forest for a walk through the woods. Don't miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Orlando Airport, FL
description: Welcome to the Sunshine State! Touch down at Orlando International Airport (MCO) and head straight to your comfortable room or suite at the newly renovated Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Orlando Airport, FL. Ideal for vacationing families or couples, our hotel lies within 20 minutes of Walt Disney World® Resort, Universal Orlando Resort™, and SeaWorld® Orlando. When you want a change of pace from theme park rides, enjoy top-notch shopping near the hotel at Orlando Vineland Premium Outlets and The Florida Mall. If white-sand beaches are calling your name, plan a day trip to Daytona or Cocoa Beach.After a fun-filled day of rides, return to the hotel for a refreshing swim in our outdoor pool. You can connect to free Wi-Fi to share your photos in front of Cinderella’s Castle and then grab a snack from the on-site Inn Case Market. Before you hit the parks the next morning, join us in our dining room to fuel up with a free, hot breakfast. Let friends and family know how much fun you’re having at theme parks or Kennedy Space Center by using the free Wi-Fi in your hotel room. Thanks to an in-room refrigerator and microwave, it’s easy to bring your favorite snacks and drinks along on vacation. If you’re traveling with a group, upgrade to a suite to enjoy a separate living room, a sleeper sofa, and an additional 32-inch flat-screen TV. Hosting a business seminar or a family reunion in Orlando? The Country Inn & Suites offers two flexible meeting facilities consisting of a boardroom that can hold 14 and a larger venue that can accommodate up to 50. Keep your attendees refreshed with complimentary coffee and water service, and play slideshows or videos with free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment (available for rent). The Country Inn & Suites boasts a prime location near multiple theme parks, including Walt Disney World® Resort and Universal Orlando Resort™. You can drive about 20 minutes to downtown Orlando to get a taste of the local culture by exploring a variety of restaurants and the lively nightlife scene. Shopping enthusiasts won’t want to miss the unbeatable deals at The Florida Mall, The Mall at Millenia, and Orlando Vineland Premium Outlets. Visit these local favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Orlando, FL
description: If you’re looking for a hotel near Orlando’s famous theme parks, choose the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Orlando, FL and you’ll enjoy the convenience of free shuttle service* to Universal Orlando™ Resort and Walt Disney World® Resort. With a location that’s near I-4, our hotel places you within a 20-minute drive of SeaWorld® Orlando, Epcot® Theme Park, and Disney’s Hollywood Studios® Theme Park and Jedi adventures. You’ll also be near The Wheel at ICON Park™, Madame Tussauds, and Orlando International Premium Outlets®. If you’re in town for a convention or conference, we’re about two miles from the Orange County Convention Center, which hosts expos, conferences, and sporting events year-round.After a day spent exploring Orlando attractions, you can unwind with a swim in our outdoor pool shaded by palm trees. For a more vigorous workout, check out the cardio equipment in the fitness center. If you have questions about what to see and do, stop by our Guest Services Desk to chat with a destination expert before you pour a complimentary cup of coffee and enjoy a cookie. If you need something you forgot to pack, we have a gift shop off the lobby. And before you catch the nearby I-RIDE trolley, begin your day with our tasty free, hot breakfast.*Shuttle service is provided by a third party. Make the most of your time in Orlando by choosing a hotel room or suite that includes cable and HBO on an LCD TV, free Wi-Fi, and a free, hot breakfast each morning. If you’re traveling with a group, ask us about adjoining rooms. Whether you’re planning a team-building session or a training event for 12, our meeting room offers everything you need. We provide free Wi-Fi and can assist you with audiovisual equipment rental for your presentation. Complimentary water and coffee can be provided, and our team can offer local catering recommendations. If you’re in town for a conference, the Orange County Convention Center is just a short drive away. Many of the top Orlando attractions are within a mile of our hotel. You can use the free shuttle service to visit world-class theme parks. See the city from atop The Wheel at ICON Park™, and shop for upscale bargains at the Orlando International Premium Outlets®. Don't miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Panama City, FL
description: Located off West 23rd Street, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Panama City, FL provides a convenient and enjoyable stay for your next vacation or business trip. Soak up the sun while lounging on the glistening sands of Panama City Beach, or spend the day shopping for take-home treasures at Panama City Mall. In the mood for outdoor entertainment? Tube down the lazy river at Shipwreck Island Waterpark or tee off at Bay Point Golf Club, both just minutes away from the hotel. When you return from your adventures, you can lounge by the outdoor pool or treat yourself to a complimentary cookie, available in the lobby. Squeezing in some work during vacation? Finish an important project in the 24-hour business center before heading to our free, hot breakfast to fill up on morning favorites like waffles and fresh fruit. A fitness center is also on site so you can keep up with your workout routine. After a busy day, find a peaceful retreat in one of our quiet rooms or suites. Catch up with your favorite HBO series, and then post pictures of your vacation on social media with the help of free Wi-Fi. In the morning, you can brew a cup of coffee and enjoy a complimentary weekday newspaper in the comfort of your room. Hosting a meeting in Panama City? Our versatile event space features helpful amenities like free Wi-Fi, a dry-erase board, and a projector screen to ensure your presentation is a success. When the meeting’s over, your guests can enjoy easy access to Panama City's beaches and corporate offices like Arizona Chemical and Trane. Just minutes from white-sand beaches, vibrant ocean experiences, and breezy golf courses, the Country Inn & Suites puts you close to some of the most popular Panama City destinations. Splash with the kids at Shipwreck Island Waterpark, or swim with bottlenose dolphins through Shell Island Tours, based only 20 minutes from the hotel. Don't miss these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Panama City Beach, FL
description: Book your next vacation at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Panama City Beach, FL, located just off Front Beach Road and minutes from the city’s pristine white-sand beaches. Perfectly situated between Shipwreck Island Waterpark and ZooWorld, our hotel is within easy reach of several family-friendly destinations. When you want a break from the ocean, take a leisurely stroll to grab an ice cream cone or stop by other nearby attractions like Race City, Frank Brown Park, and Kartona the Electric Speedway.When you return to the hotel, enjoy thoughtful touches like complimentary coffee and cookies in the lobby. A free, hot breakfast keeps you fueled for beach excursions, and free Wi-Fi makes it easy to post your favorite surf shots to social media. During your downtime, you can take a dip in our outdoor pool or lounge by the fireplace in the lobby. After a sun-filled day on the shore, unwind in one of our hotel rooms or suites while watching an HBO comedy on cable TV. Free Wi-Fi makes it easy to update friends on your travels, and a mini refrigerator keeps your favorite beverages perfectly chilled. For this year’s family reunion or corporate bash at the beach, invite up to 30 guests to meet at the Country Inn & Suites, Panama City Beach. You can take advantage of free Wi-Fi, a whiteboard, and audiovisual equipment rentals to make presentations shine. The Country Inn & Suites sits about five miles from live animal shows at Gulf World Marine Park and sunset cruises and dolphin-watching experiences through Shell Island Boat Rentals & Tours. For fun within walking distance, head to Coconut Creek Family Fun Park, which boasts a putt-putt course and a giant maze. Don’t miss these popular attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Pensacola West, FL
description: When you and the kids need some Pensacola time, book the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Pensacola West, FL, conveniently located just off I-10. This area of Florida has strong ties to Naval Air Station Pensacola (NAS), which is the home base of the Blue Angels precision flying team and a quick 30-minute drive from our West Pensacola hotel. Enjoy a free, hot breakfast before you set out each morning to explore key attractions like Pensacola Beach’s famous white sands, the National Naval Aviation Museum, and Perdido Key, all of which are easy drives from our hotel.If you’re traveling for work, take advantage of our business center or unwind with cable TV in your comfortable room. After a busy day of meetings, take a dip in the indoor pool, log a few minutes of cardio in our fitness center, or grab a book from our hotel library. Connect your laptop or tablet to the free Wi-Fi or tune in to one your favorite cable TV channels in one of our spacious rooms or suites. After a restful night’s sleep, wake up to a fresh-brewed cup of coffee from the in-room coffeemaker, browse a free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper, and then head to our dining room for a complimentary, hot breakfast. Whether you’re throwing a party for your family or need to impress important clients with a great presentation, our flexible meeting room is a great choice for up to 40 of your guests. We can equip you for success with free high-speed internet access, complimentary coffee and water service, breakfast and snack catering options, and audiovisual equipment. Feel the sand slip through your toes and listen to the sound of your kids playing on Pensacola's white beaches, located just 20 miles from our hotel. For heart-pounding family fun in dry clothes, head five minutes north to Five Flags Speedway. If you’d prefer shopping, you’ll find plenty of brand names at Cordova Mall, about 15 minutes to the southeast, near Pensacola International Airport. Don’t miss these popular attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, St. Petersburg - Clearwater, FL
description: Reserve a room at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, St. Petersburg - Clearwater, FL to be within easy reach of everything the Florida Suncoast Region has to offer. Located five minutes off I-275, our hotel in Pinellas Park gives you access to the anglers’ paradise at Skyway Fishing Pier, shopping expeditions at Sundial, and sports excursions at Tropicana Field. For some fun in the sun, make the half-hour drive north to beautiful Clearwater Beach. Business travelers have easy access to local companies such as Honeywell Aerospace, GE Aviation, Progressive® Insurance, and Lockheed Martin, plus the hotel is located within minutes of the Jabil Inc. and Raymond James Financial, Inc. headquarters.Experience relaxation when you settle into our tranquil rooms and suites during your visit to Florida’s Gulf Coast. Vacations begin properly with a plunge in the sparkling water of our outdoor heated pool. Guests are invited to indulge in complimentary cookies and coffee in the lobby. Each morning, enjoy a free, hot breakfast, and each evening, stretch out on fresh sheets. You can also take advantage of free Wi-Fi, a business center, and a fitness room.The Country Inn & Suites, St. Petersburg - Clearwater is proud to show our appreciation for military and government travelers by offering discounted rates or US per diem rates for your lodging needs. We are also SAM and CAGE Code approved. Take advantage of our military and government rates today. After a day at the beach or shopping at John’s Pass Village and Boardwalk, return to soothing comfort in spacious rooms and suites. Modern amenities can make your stay easy, such as a mini fridge, a microwave, and a flat-screen TV. Post vacation pictures to social media and plan your excursions with free Wi-Fi. Upgrade to a suite for added space and extras like a whirlpool tub or a separate living room with a sleeper sofa. Invite up to 50 guests to your bridal shower, business seminar, or birthday bash at our hotel. When you book our 500-square-foot meeting space, our professional staff helps you take care of the smallest details. We offer audiovisual and catering options and welcome your guests to connect to our free Wi-Fi. Positioned in Pinellas Park between Clearwater and St. Petersburg, our hotel makes the perfect location for all your adventures in west central Florida. Less than a half-hour drive puts you on breathtaking beaches or in bustling communities. Head 10 miles southwest of the hotel to Treasure Island, where you can discover aquatic sports, beachside shopping, and top fishing spots. Add these can’t-miss attractions to your itinerary:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Port Charlotte, FL
description: Conveniently located right off I-75 and Kings Highway, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Port Charlotte, FL is the perfect home base for your family’s stay in the Sunshine State. Experience the excitement of a Tampa Bay Rays spring training game at Charlotte Sports Park less than 20 minutes from our hotel, or explore the natural beauty of the parks in both Port Charlotte and nearby Punta Gorda. Golfers won’t want to miss any of the surrounding world-class courses, including Charlotte Harbor National Golf Club at Bobcat Trail and Deep Creek Golf Club.Our friendly staff welcomes you and your family, including the furry members, to spacious rooms equipped with free Wi-Fi and refrigerators. Watch the kids release some energy while you relax by the hotel's outdoor pool. Need to maintain your workout routine? Our fitness center has you covered. Before you head back out on the road, fuel up with our free, hot breakfast. After a busy day of travel, kick back in one of our spacious rooms or suites and enjoy a movie on a flat-screen TV. In the morning, you can sip a fresh cup of coffee while you use free Wi-Fi to check in on social media. Whether you’re planning a reception, seminar, or holiday party, our meeting room has what you need to make your event a success. Take advantage of great amenities like free high-speed internet access, surround sound, a projector and screen, and complimentary coffee and water. Our hotel's location at Exit 170 on I-75 puts you conveniently near all the charm and excitement of Port Charlotte. A 15-minute drive south takes you into historic Punta Gorda, where you can explore natural attractions and riverside shops. Don't miss these top local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Port Orange-Daytona, FL
description: Conveniently located just off I-95, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Port Orange-Daytona, FL provides an ideal home base for your beach vacation. Soak up the sun less 10 miles from the hotel at beautiful Daytona Beach or New Smyrna Beach. For more outdoor activities, head to one of four nearby golf courses or climb to the top of Florida’s tallest lighthouse, Pounce de Leon Inlet, for stunning views of Florida’s waterways and beaches. Take the family to Daytona's three amusement parks for roller coasters and go-karts before shopping at Tanger Outlets.Our hotel’s exceptional hospitality extends everywhere you look, from our free laundry facilities and our heated outdoor pool to our barbecue grill and patio. Stay energized throughout the day with our free, hot breakfast, and take advantage of our pet-friendly policy if you want to bring a furry friend. After a fun day at Daytona Beach, nothing beats coming back to your hotel room or suite and sinking into a Simmons Radisson Beautyrest Luxury Plush II mattress. Turn on the flat-screen TV to watch a movie on HBO, or check your social media with free Wi-Fi. To make your stay more affordable, children 17 and under stay for free in the same room as an adult. Choose the Country Inn & Suites to meet all your group needs, from rooms for sports teams to a well-appointed boardroom with space for 10. For larger events, our breakfast room is available to rent after 10:30 am. We offer you and your guests access to free Wi-Fi, a projector, and a portable screen. Start each day with our complimentary, hot breakfast before heading to the beach. Daytona blends the serenity of the ocean with an exciting racing history. Visit the Daytona International Speedway, home of the Daytona 500, only seven miles from the hotel. Three amusement parks right on Daytona Beach put you behind the wheel of a go-kart and a bumper car. Walk the boardwalk for some great food and fun, and be sure to check out these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tampa Casino-Fairgrounds, FL
description: If you’re visiting Tampa on business or treating the family to a memorable vacation, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tampa Casino-Fairgrounds, FL is your best bet. Our hotel in Seffner is just off I-4 and close to I-75, making it easy to get to the Port of Tampa for a cruise, Clearwater beaches, and the attractions in downtown Tampa. You can try your luck at the Hard Rock Casino and take advantage of our courtesy shuttle to the casino. The kids will remember your trip to Busch Gardens to ride thrilling coasters or a day at a water park. MidFlorida Credit Union Amphitheatre, the Florida State Fairgrounds, and Amalie Arena are minutes away and host a variety of concerts and events year-round.After a busy day, take time to unwind in our outdoor pool or get your heart racing with a cardio workout in our fitness center. Each of our rooms and suites include free Wi-Fi so it’s easy to share your travels with friends and family. And select rooms are pet friendly for well-behaved four-footed family members. Before you start your day, stop by our dining area to enjoy a free, hot breakfast. You can also snag a cup of coffee or a fresh cookie in our lobby at any time. Make the most of your stay in the Tampa area by choosing one of our comfortable rooms and suites, which feature Serta Elite® pillowtop mattresses, washable duvets, and touch-of-down pillows. Relax with an HBO series on an HDTV or surf the web with free Wi-Fi. Select rooms are pet friendly. Our flexible, 800-square-foot meeting space is the right choice for your corporate meeting, training session, or wedding shower for 50 guests. We offer audiovisual tools, free Wi-Fi, and a 42-inch LCD TV to display your digital presentations. Ask us about our beverage service. Make the most of your visit to the Gulf Coast when you choose this hotel. You’ll find it easy to visit downtown Tampa for live entertainment, the white sandy beaches on the bay, or Glazer Children’s Museum. You can meet a croc up close, see gorillas at the zoo, or paddle a canoe on a lazy river. Take our courtesy shuttle to try your luck at the Seminole Hard Rock Casino, or treat the kids to a day at Busch Gardens. Local area attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, St. Augustine Downtown Historic District, FL
description: Stay minutes from the oldest city in America when you reserve a room at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, St. Augustine Downtown Historic District, FL. Trolley tours take you from the hotel to the downtown area and to historical landmarks like the Castillo de San Marcos Spanish Fort and the Colonial Quarter. You can also head to St. Augustine Beach for some sun and sand or spend the day shopping at St. Augustine Premium Outlets.Get a strong start to your day with a workout in the fitness center and a delicious meal from the free, hot breakfast. Spend a few hours lazing by the outdoor pool or soaking in the hot tub. You can indulge in an afternoon snack at the lobby, offering complimentary cookies, coffee, and tea, before heading to your room to check social media with the free Wi-Fi. Best of all, our hotel offers free parking! Wake up refreshed each morning in one of our hotel rooms and suites, and make a cup of coffee while you plan the day's itinerary using our free Wi-Fi. When you return, catch up with the latest news on TV and heat up a snack using the microwave. Families and groups love our one-bedroom suites, featuring a separate living room and a sleeper sofa. If you’re planning a special getaway to explore the Colonial Quarter, upgrade to a romantic whirlpool suite with a refreshing whirlpool tub for two. Soak up the sun at nearby St. Augustine Beach, and walk the streets of the Downtown Historic District. You can experience the city's vibrant culture with a Red Train Trolley Tour or the Old Town Trolley Tours during your visit. Trolley pickups take place right outside the hotel, and the tours last about 90 minutes as they take you throughout the city. Animal-loving kids can explore the Alligator Farm Zoological Park, and you can get to know local history with a visit to the Lightner Museum or Old Florida Museum. Check out these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tallahassee Northwest I-10, FL
description: Located just off I-10, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tallahassee Northwest I-10, FL lies a quick 11-minute drive from the excitement of Florida State University. Head to Doak Campbell Stadium to cheer on the Seminoles as they rush the end zone, or take a stroll around the campus and through the university's art museum. You can easily access downtown Tallahassee’s shops and restaurants from our hotel as well as area favorites like the Tallahassee Automobile Museum.Between your adventures, relax in our hotel’s seasonal outdoor pool, or work out travel tension in our on-site fitness center. You can enjoy a free, hot breakfast every morning, and check what time the Florida State game starts using free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. If you’re here for work, take advantage of our business center and fax services at the front desk to stay on top of your schedule. Rest easy in your room or suite with free Wi-Fi and cable TV channels. In the morning, scan the headlines of a free weekday newspaper while you brew a fresh cup of coffee. Looking for a venue near I-10 and Florida State University? Our hotel offers a meeting space that can accommodate up to 38 guests. Be sure to ask about our group rates. Tallahassee offers you both the excitement of a college town and the serenity of nature. Check out Governor's Square for a quick bite to eat and lots of shopping, or visit Alfred B. Maclay Gardens State Park to take in the beauty of hundreds of blooms. Tallahassee is home to a number of historic sites such as the Florida Governor's Mansion, as well as these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tampa Airport North, FL
description: Less than nine miles from Tampa International Airport (TPA) and the Port of Tampa Bay, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tampa Airport North, FL provides an ideal resting place for land, air, and sea travelers. Our hotel offers free shuttle service to and from the TPA airport. Drive 35 minutes to Caladesi Island State Park, an inviting beach where you can soak up the Florida sun.If you prefer to unwind at the hotel, relax with a leisurely dip in our outdoor pool and hot tub. Be sure to stop in the lobby for free cookies between your adventures. If you want to catch up on email or touch base with friends and family, free Wi-Fi makes communication a breeze. Need to work off some travel fatigue? Stretch your tired muscles with a light workout in the on-site fitness center. Early check-in is available, and fees may apply. As you relax in your room or suite, catch your favorite HBO series on the flat-screen TV or use free Wi-Fi to plan your Busch Gardens adventures. Want a soothing cup of tea? You can make it fresh anytime right in your room. Located about 10 minutes from the Tampa airport, our on-site meeting room is the ideal place to host a business gathering or social event for up to 15 guests. To enhance your presentations, we provide free Wi-Fi and a plasma TV, as well as offer catering recommendations and help arranging audiovisual equipment rentals. Tampa is a lively city packed with entertainment and family fun. Spend the day with rehabilitated lions, tigers, and more at Big Cat Rescue, or head downtown to the historic Ybor City for authentic Cuban cuisine and live music. Other local favorites include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tampa/Brandon, FL
description: Whether your family is determined to ride every coaster at Busch Gardens Tampa Bay or soak up the Florida sunshine at the beach, you'll find an excellent home base at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tampa/Brandon, FL. Our hotel is just 15 minutes from the cultural hub of Ybor City and less than 25 minutes from Tampa International Airport (TPA). Sports enthusiasts can catch a Tampa Bay Buccaneers game at Raymond James Stadium, just 20 minutes away, and families can visit The Florida Aquarium, about a 10-minute drive away.Our sparkling outdoor pool and fitness center are great spots to unwind after a day of exploring Tampa-area attractions. If you prefer, relax in our comfortable common room, which features fireside seating. Use our business center to print off tickets to a Tampa Bay Buccaneers football game, and save money for concessions by starting your day with our free Grab & Go breakfast featuring a muffin, juice, snack bar, and bottled water. Kick back in your modern room or suite and check email with free Wi-Fi or watch a movie on the 40-inch flat-screen TV. Start each morning with a freshly brewed cup of coffee while you read the free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper. If you’re with family, upgrade to a spacious suite with a seating area, sleeper sofa, and second TV. We also offer whirlpool suites for a relaxing getaway treat. For sports teams convening before the big game or families getting together for an annual reunion, the Country Inn & Suites offers an outstanding gathering spot. Take advantage of 750 square feet of meeting space and the assistance of our expert, friendly staff, who can help with audiovisual equipment rental and catering services. Tampa is a vibrant city with an active arts scene, outstanding nightlife, and plenty of shopping along the exciting downtown Riverwalk. Football fans appreciate our proximity to Buccaneers games at Raymond James Stadium, and parents love being close to a huge range of kid-friendly spots like the KidZone at Topgolf. You can shop for a new outfit at Westfield Brandon to wear during a concert at Amalie Arena. Local favorites include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Vero Beach-I-95, FL
description: Get ready to relax when you stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Vero Beach-I-95, FL. Located off I-95 and Highway 60, our affordable hotel provides easy access to the tranquil shores of South Beach, known for its wide swathes of soft sand and its crystalline water. After swimming or sunbathing, treat yourself to a shopping spree at the nearby Vero Beach Outlets or a round of golf at Pointe West Country Club.When you return to the hotel, you can enjoy an invigorating workout in our on-site fitness center, or lounge by the outdoor pool to relax. Start every morning with our free, hot breakfast, and stay energized between activities with free cookies, coffee, and tea in the lobby. After soaking up the Florida sun, unwind in your hotel room or suite with a refreshing drink from the in-room refrigerator. Cuddle up with your dog in front of the flat-screen TV for a movie night, or use free Wi-Fi to post your beach adventures on social media. Our hotel offers event space capable of seating up to 20 guests in several arrangements. Host intimate meetings and social functions with free Wi-Fi, a pull-down projection screen, and plenty of refreshments. Our friendly staff is on hand to assist with everything from event setup to catering arrangements. In addition to serene, picturesque beaches, Vero Beach offers bustling stores, eclectic restaurants, and well-designed sports facilities. Historic Dodgertown, built decades ago as a training complex for the Brooklyn Dodgers, hosts local sporting events and concerts throughout the year. For saltwater fishing, surfing, and picnicking, take a day trip to Sebastian Inlet State Park. Check out these other local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Albany, GA
description: Located off US Route 82 and just nine miles from Southwest Georgia Regional Airport (ABY), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Albany, GA is a convenient stop for business and leisure travelers. Parents and prospective Albany State University students appreciate being only six miles from campus, while corporate guests staying at our hotel are close to the Albany Civic Center. For family-friendly activities, don’t miss a stop at the Flint RiverQuarium and Chehaw Park.After a busy day, grab a complimentary cookie in the lobby, and make yourself comfortable by the fireplace. Other ways to relax include resting in the dry sauna, swimming in the indoor pool, and soaking in the hot tub. If you need to prepare for a meeting, our business center offers free fax and copy services. After a long flight or day of meetings, kick back on the bed and enjoy a cup of coffee while you watch a movie on the flat-screen TV. Our rooms and suites also feature free Wi-Fi to help you stay connected to your home and office. For your next business meeting or private celebration, reserve the meeting space at the Country Inn & Suites. To keep attendees engaged, utilize the projector screen to show presentations or display videos on the flat-screen TV. We also offer a beverage and snack service and our professional staff is always on hand to help with the details. From sports games at the Albany Civic Center to symphonies at the Albany Municipal Auditorium, you can find plenty to do within a six-mile radius of our hotel. The kids will love a visit to the 800-acre parkland and zoo at Chehaw or to Flint RiverQuarium. Our favorite local attractions include:

name: Park Inn by Radisson Albany, GA
description: Located near Highway 82 just off Dawson Road, the Park Inn by Radisson Albany, GA places you near Albany State University as well as several of Southwest Georgia’s leading commercial and entertainment destinations. Our hotel is only minutes from area businesses like Procter & Gamble and MillerCorps’ Albany facility, and we’re also less than a 20-minute drive north of Southwest Georgia Regional Airport (ABY).Served seven days a week, our hot breakfast bar is complimentary with some hotel rates, and our fitness center is open 24. Our grassy courtyard and seasonal outdoor pool will help you relax, or you can work up a sweat in our sauna, also open 24 hours. Business guests appreciate our on-site meeting facilities for events with up to 50 guests. The Park Inn by Radisson Albany, GA features a wide range of accommodation types, making us a good fit for both business travelers and families. Each of our well-appointed rooms and suites features convenient appliances like an in-room coffeemaker, a microwave, and a mini-refrigerator, and you can also choose to upgrade to a room with a full kitchenette. If you have to stay on top of work while you’re with us, set up your laptop on your room’s spacious work desk and connect it to our free Wi-Fi. When you need a modern event venue for a conference, choose the Park Inn by Radisson Albany, GA. We offer flexible meeting rooms that can seat up to 50 guests, and our dedicated staff can set up round or long tables, chairs, and even audiovisual equipment. When it’s time to break, the hotel can provide coffee, soft drinks and water for a small fee. We also offer convenient group rates if your guests need overnight accommodations. At the Park Inn by Radisson Albany, our prime location places you close to the many attractions of Albany, Georgia. Visiting parents and students are just five miles from Albany State University and the ASU Coliseum. Outdoor enthusiasts can reach Chehaw Park and Flint RiverQuarium in just minutes, and history fans will enjoy the drive to Andersonville National Historic Site and Pebble Hill Plantation. Top local attractions include the following: By car:The hotel is just a 15-minute drive from the airport.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Alpharetta, GA
description: Conveniently located three minutes off GA-400, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Alpharetta, GA is a popular home base for business travelers and family vacationers alike. Our hotel is situated less than a 10-minute drive from the corporate offices of Microsoft and Honda, and we’re less than 25 miles from Atlanta’s best attractions, including the Georgia Aquarium and Truist Park—the home of the Atlanta Braves. For a breath of fresh air, drive just an hour to reach the beautiful North Georgia mountains and check out destinations like the picturesque town of Helen.After a morning of meetings in downtown Alpharetta, lounge by our hotel’s seasonal outdoor pool with a good book or catch up with loved ones using free Wi-Fi. If you need to take care of additional work assignments, you can stop by our well-equipped business center. When you’re ready to recharge, return to one of our 70 suites, each equipped with a microwave and a refrigerator for late-night snacks. In the morning, you can savor a fresh cup of coffee or tea brewed with your in-room coffeemaker while catching the news on the flat-screen TV. If you’re planning a training seminar, a workshop, or an interview session in Alpharetta, choose our flexible Mansell B Room meeting space. We can accommodate up to 112 guests for special events and offer thoughtful extras like audiovisual equipment and free Wi-Fi. Get the party started in our 1,350-square-foot venue, which features a small dance floor perfect for birthday celebrations, bridal showers, and other social gatherings. Discover a number of great things to see and do in and around Alpharetta, like picnicking at Wills Park, dining in downtown Roswell, or catching a concert at the Ameris Bank Amphitheatre. You can explore the historic ruins of manufacturing mills at Old Mill Park or plan a day trip to metropolitan Atlanta. Check out these nearby destinations:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Athens, GA
description: Located less than three miles from downtown restaurants and boutiques, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Athens, GA is an all-suites hotel perfectly situated for visiting the University of Georgia. Cheer on the Bulldogs at Sanford Stadium less than 10 minutes away. We’re one of the only hotels in Athens to offer free parking for guests, even during UGA games. Music lovers won’t want to miss catching a show at Athens’ legendary 40 Watt Club and festivals like AthFest.Before you take your family to the Bulldogs game, fuel up with our free, hot breakfast or a free cookie and a cup of coffee. When you’re ready to relax, take a swim in our indoor pool. Here for work? We offer free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel in case you need to check your email. Catch your favorite show on a flat-screen TV and then kick back to enjoy a restful night’s sleep in our all-suite hotel. Our spacious suites offer free Wi-Fi if you need to catch up on email, and snack time is easy thanks to an in-room microwave and refrigerator. From meetings of 12 to celebrations with 80 guests, the Country Inn & Suites offers excellent event facilities for your next gathering. If you need planning assistance, our professional staff can help arrange catering, audiovisual equipment, and a personalized web page unique to your event. Stay less than 10 minutes from the best attractions in Athens by booking a suite at our hotel. Before a show at the Georgia Theatre or the 40 Watt Club, take a fun and tasty tour of the Terrapin brewery. Stroll through the beautiful, tree-lined campus of UGA, and set aside time for a drink at local joints like The Globe. Don’t miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Atlanta Downtown South at Turner Field, GA
description: Conveniently situated off I-75, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Atlanta Downtown South at Turner Field, GA is an excellent choice for sightseeing in the "Hollywood of the South." You can cut down the amount of time you spend on the interstate since the Georgia Aquarium, the CNN Center, and Zoo Atlanta are all less than two miles from our downtown Atlanta hotel. To make the most of your time here, you can purchase a CityPASS, which allows you to visit five top destinations at a discounted rate.With free guest parking and free Wi-Fi, you can afford to take the kids out for ice cream after a Panthers football game at Georgia State Stadium. Our outdoor pool and fitness center also offer convenient relaxation opportunities. When you reserve one of our rooms or suites, you can kick back on the bed to watch your favorite HBO shows while sipping a cup of coffee. Connect to free Wi-Fi to purchase tickets to Zoo Atlanta or The World of Coca-Cola from the comfort of your room. With easy access to downtown Atlanta, our flexible meeting room is a great choice for holding your next event for up to 50 people. Our professional staff can help you arrange every detail, from catering to setting up audiovisual equipment for an important presentation. Your attendees can also take advantage of convenient amenities like free Wi-Fi and complimentary parking. Our hotel is ideally located on I-75, making it easy to visit top downtown destinations. Take a stroll through scenic Centennial Olympic Park and sample soda flavors from around the globe at World of Coca-Cola, both less than two miles away. Don't miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Atlanta Galleria/Ballpark, GA
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Atlanta Galleria/Ballpark, GA boasts a premier location just minutes from Cobb Galleria Centre and less than a half mile from the Atlanta Braves’ Truist Park, formerly known as SunTrust Park. The ballpark is also home to The Battery Atlanta, an exciting shopping and dining destination, and the Coca-Cola Roxy theater. During your stay, you can hop on I-75 and head downtown to visit attractions like the Georgia Aquarium, World of Coca-Cola, Mercedes-Benz Stadium, and Zoo Atlanta. Business travelers appreciate our proximity to corporate headquarters like The Home Depot and HD Supply, along with hotel amenities like free Wi-Fi and a business center.After a Braves game, you can walk back to your room, don your swimsuit, and relax in our indoor heated pool and hot tub. Complimentary breakfast will be waiting when you're ready to refuel after a good night's rest. Other amenities include a fitness center and free parking for hotel guests.  Reserve one of our 149 modern rooms and suites and enjoy amenities like free Wi-Fi and coffee and tea facilities. When you're ready to relax, you can heat up a snack in the microwave, grab a cold drink from the refrigerator, and choose a show from more than 60 cable TV channels. Choose one of our four event spaces at the Country Inn & Suites for gatherings of up to 125 people. Let our professional staff help you plan and execute a successful event with amenities like catering services and complimentary water service. Projection screens, audiovisual equipment, and free Wi-Fi help you deliver impressive presentations. Only in Atlanta can you watch a performance at the historic Fox Theatre, sample sodas from around the globe at World of Coca-Cola, and glimpse colorful ocean creatures at one of the world's largest aquariums. If you're a sports fan, you can walk to Truist Park to see a Braves game or head downtown to cheer on the Atlanta Falcons. For family thrills, splash around at Six Flags White Water or skydive indoors at iFLY Atlanta, located about five minutes from our hotel. Check out these favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Augusta at I-20, GA
description: Whether you’re in town for The Masters or to play the local links, the newly renovated Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Augusta at I-20, GA places you near the area’s top golfing destinations. Since we’re less than four miles from Augusta National Golf Club and Forest Hills Golf Course, it’s easy to pop back to the hotel and relax between spectating or a tee time. For a more diverse tour of the area, make time to explore downtown Augusta, which boasts the renowned Augusta Riverwalk, the Imperial Theatre, and the Morris Museum of Art.Before you hit the links, grab a free weekday newspaper, a cookie, and a fresh cup of coffee from the lobby. When you return, you can share photos of your favorite golf pros to social media using free Wi-Fi. Need to soothe sore muscles? Visit our heated indoor pool for a leisurely soak, or stretch out your legs in our fitness center. Corporate travelers appreciate our business center with printing capabilities. Find a comfortable retreat off I-20 in one of our 65 hotel rooms and suites. The in-room microwave and refrigerator make it easy to prepare your favorite snacks and drinks before a busy day downtown or on the rolling fairways. If you need to meet important work deadlines, connect to free Wi-Fi and set up a mobile office at the spacious desk. If you’re not a golfer, don’t worry: Augusta is packed with art, music, shopping venues, and more. Our convenient location off I-20 places you just 10 minutes from downtown Augusta, home of the Augusta Riverwalk and a bustling nightlife scene. History buffs won’t want to miss a visit to the Signer’s Monument, an obelisk dedicated to the state’s signatories of the Declaration of Independence. Check out these nearby favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Braselton, GA
description: Need a getaway to the Atlanta area? Reserve a quiet stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Braselton, GA, located just off I-85 about an hour north of the city. Enjoy a great value on spacious hotel rooms and suites near Château Élan's beautiful winery and golf club, both within five minutes of our hotel.
