For more thrilling entertainment, you can make the short drive to world-famous motorsports courses at Road Atlanta or spend the day boating on Lake Lanier.After meetings in our on-site boardroom, ease into our heated indoor saltwater pool or burn energy in the fitness center. Wake up with our free, hot breakfast before relaxing on our outdoor patio or by the fireplace in our lobby. We also offer a business center where you can wrap up work before treating yourself to something from the Inn Case Market. Surf the web or check email with free Wi-Fi in the comfort of your hotel room or suite. Thanks to an in-room microwave and refrigerator, you can enjoy drinks and snacks without leaving the hotel. Each room features a convenient work desk where you can focus on a presentation after eating the free, hot breakfast. Families love our spacious suites with a separate living room and sleeper sofa, and we offer romantic whirlpool suites for a memorable getaway. The Country Inn & Suites offers 2,000 square feet of versatile event facilities that can accommodate parties, business meetings, presentations, and more. Reserve the Magnolia Meeting Room for up to 75 guests and wow your party attendees with delicious catering. We also offer a boardroom for up to eight guests. Eliminate some of your hosting hassles with complimentary audiovisual equipment and free Wi-Fi. Located off I-85, our hotel is an excellent home base for exploring all that North Georgia has to offer. Take your kids to Lake Lanier to splash around Margaritaville at Lanier Islands and dine on the lake. You can attend thrilling races at Road Atlanta and the Atlanta Dragway. Want to explore the city? Just hop onto I-85 and head for shopping at Tanger Outlets or museum hopping in downtown Atlanta. Don't miss these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Brunswick I-95, GA
description: Make the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Brunswick I-95, GA your home base for exploring the sandy beaches of nearby Jekyll and St. Simons islands. The convenient location of our hotel off I-95 provides easy access to historical homes and plantations, beach adventures, and nature excursions. Spend an afternoon observing sea turtles at the Georgia Sea Turtle Center, and don't miss out on a scenic picnic at Blythe Island Regional Park, where you can also swim and fish.After a day of excitement at the coast, wade into our hotel’s heated indoor pool and relax. If you want to fit in a quick workout, use our on-site fitness center, or if you need to check in at the office, our business center is open 24 hours. Grab some complimentary cookies from our lobby and unwind before bed with a movie on the flat-screen TV.  In the morning, don’t forget to join us for breakfast favorites like fruit, waffles, sausage, and eggs before heading to Jekyll Island for some fun in the sun. After a day of beach adventures, relax in one of our spacious rooms or suites with a cold drink from the in-room refrigerator and make some popcorn in the microwave for a quick snack. Post your St. Simons or Jekyll Island vacation pictures online using free Wi-Fi. Located off I-95 and along Georgia's southern Atlantic coast, Brunswick is your gateway to adventures on St. Simons Island and Jekyll Island. Home to historic houses, ecological preservation projects, and beachfront excitement, Brunswick is full of adventure. Don't miss these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Buford at Mall of Georgia, GA
description: Experience a hassle-free stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Buford at Mall of Georgia, GA. Located just off I-85, about 30 minutes north of Atlanta, our hotel affords easy access to many of the area’s signature draws, including the Southeast's largest shopping center, the Mall of Georgia, as well as Infinite Energy Center, home of Georgia’s Swarm and Gladiators. After a day of hardcore shopping or getting some fresh air at Lake Lanier, put your feet up in front of the 43-inch flat-screen TV in your room or connect with home or the office using free Wi-Fi. Need to keep your energy level up? Take a dip in our indoor pool or hit the on-site fitness center. Printing and faxing services are available in the business center if you need to catch up on work. Whether you spent the afternoon shopping or exploring downtown Atlanta, you can end each day with a restful night in one of our comfortable rooms or suites. Bring along snacks and drinks, as each of our rooms and suites includes a refrigerator and a microwave. If you’re traveling for work, you can use the hair dryer, the full-length mirror, and the iron with an ironing board to make sure you look your best. Close to I-85, our hotel is a convenient meeting place for businesses in the North Atlanta area. Our nearly 700 square feet of meeting space can accommodate up to 50 guests and offers free Wi-Fi, audiovisual equipment rentals, and catering options to ensure the success of your event. Only 25 miles north of downtown Atlanta and right beside the Mall of Georgia in Buford, our hotel is ideally located for an Atlanta-based adventure. Drive to Truist Park for a Braves game, head north to visit the European-style winery at Château Élan, or find a steal at nearby Sugarloaf Mills. Make sure to include these popular attractions on your itinerary:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Canton, GA
description: For comfortable accommodations less than an hour north of Atlanta's Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport (ATL), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Canton, GA is an ideal choice. Just off I-575 at Exit 20 and Riverside Parkway, our hotel provides a welcome retreat midway between Atlanta and the Blue Ridge Mountains. After a day visiting state gardens and museums, relax in one of our spacious rooms and suites. For guests traveling with family, be sure to make a trip into Atlanta to explore the World of Coca-Cola and Zoo Atlanta.Our indoor pool is the perfect place to unwind after boating or fishing expeditions on nearby Lake Allatoona, and free Wi-Fi makes it easy to connect with friends and family back home. Corporate travelers appreciate our on-site business center along with our well-equipped fitness center. After a long day of travel, settle into one of our comfortable rooms or suites with free Wi-Fi and an in-room microwave and refrigerator. Start your morning with a fresh cup of coffee in your room before venturing out to explore Northern Georgia. For those traveling with pets, a limited number of pet-friendly rooms are available. Hosting an event in Canton? We offer a flexible meeting room with amenities like free Wi-Fi, coffee service, a screen, and a podium. After meetings, attendees can head to the downtown Canton Historic District to shop, dine, and explore. Commonly known as the place "Where Metro Meets the Mountains," Canton puts our guests conveniently between downtown Atlanta and the Blue Ridge Mountains. Our location off I-575 makes it easy to travel to estate gardens, museums, and shopping malls. Venture into Atlanta to visit the World of Coca-Cola and Zoo Atlanta, or drive up to the mountains for waterskiing and fishing spots on local lakes. Can't-miss attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Atlanta Airport South, GA
description: Nestled on the outskirts of Atlanta in College Park, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Atlanta Airport South, GA provides the perfect home base for your Atlanta-area travels. Less than 20 minutes away via I-85, downtown ATL is home to top attractions like World of Coca-Cola and the Georgia Aquarium. If you’d prefer to escape the city bustle, book a tee time at Browns Mill Golf Course and practice your swing on the rolling fairways. In the area for work? Our hotel is less than 10 minutes from the Georgia International Convention Center and Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport (ATL).After touching down at the ATL airport, hop aboard our complimentary shuttle with 24-hour service* to and from the hotel. Once you’ve had a chance to get settled in, squeeze in a work out in our fitness center or bask in the sunshine by the seasonal outdoor pool. If you need to touch base with the office, swing by our 24-hour business center. When you have some downtime, ride our 24-hour complimentary shuttle to the nearby MARTA (Atlanta transit) station to explore the city.*The shuttle is currently operating on a modified schedule. Please call the hotel to verify the hours of operation. Unpack your bags and kick up your feet in our comfortable rooms and suites, which feature free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. If you’re traveling for work, you can set up a mobile office at the spacious work desk and brew fresh coffee around the clock using the in-room facilities. Hosting a social event or corporate gathering? The Country Inn & Suites provides two flexible meeting rooms within easy reach of downtown Atlanta. The smaller space is ideal for intimate boardroom meetings, while the larger room can accommodate up to 50 guests for family reunions and company-wide seminars. In addition to free Wi-Fi, you can take advantage of audiovisual equipment to present slideshows and stream videos with ease. From our location in College Park, you can easily drive or take the MARTA to downtown Atlanta attractions like the High Museum of Art and the Atlanta Botanical Garden. Looking to impress clients or friends? Purchase tickets to a show at the acclaimed Fox Theatre, located less than 20 minutes away. Don’t miss these favorites during your stay: By airport shuttle:Our airport shuttle runs on a loop to and from ATL’s domestic terminal 24 hours a day. From the international terminal, exit the terminal and ride the Domestic Terminal Shuttle to the domestic terminal.At the domestic terminal:Follow signs for area hotel airport shuttlesGo across the street to the hotel shuttle area (purple signs)Wait in zone 3The shuttle arrives for pick-up at 15 minutes and 45 minutes past the hour, every hour. Please make sure to get on the Country Inn & Suites shuttle bus going south.

name: Radisson Hotel Atlanta Airport
description: Whether you’re here for business, leisure, or a layover stop, you can unwind at Radisson Hotel Atlanta Airport, just five minutes from Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport (ATL). Hotel guests enjoy free shuttle service 24 hours a day, with direct access to the ATL airport domestic terminal. If you want to experience Atlanta’s eclectic restaurants, world-class shopping, and vibrant nightlife, you can head downtown from the College Park MARTA station, just four minutes away, or make the 20-minute drive yourself. For business travelers, the Georgia International Convention Center is just a mile away from the hotel. Here to cheer on the Atlanta Falcons or Atlanta United? You can reach Mercedes-Benz Stadium in less than 20 minutes.After a day of travel or business, recharge in our comfortable rooms with access to hotel services like free Wi-Fi and room service or grab a workout in our fitness center. Need a break outside? Go for a walk or run on the trail through the back of our property. For delicious meals or a relaxing drink, visit our on-site restaurant and lounge. If you’re in town on business, you can use our on-site meeting facilities to host events or catch up with clients. After a long flight, stretch out on premium bedding in one of our 143 hotel rooms and suites. You can settle in to catch an Atlanta Falcons game on the 49-inch flat-screen TV, check emails with free Wi-Fi, and sip your favorite drink that you chilled in the mini refrigerator. Choose an accessible room for added convenience. Whether you’re hosting a business seminar, an interview session, or an engagement party, Radisson Hotel Atlanta Airport offers 2,500 square feet of flexible meeting space that’s ideal for the occasion. From on-site catering to audiovisual equipment setup, our knowledgeable staff can provide all the services you need to bring your event to life.                                     Prefer to dine in the privacy of your room or suite? Order a full meal or a snack and a drink from room service.                                 For a hearty breakfast, lunch, or dinner served with Southern hospitality and flair, look no further than Kina’s, our on-site restaurant. The contemporary, full-service eatery offers soulful cuisine in a relaxed atmosphere. Meeting with clients? Head to the bar and lounge area, where you can enjoy a variety of handcrafted cocktails, local brews, and tasty wines. Our hotel is located southwest of Atlanta in College Park, an area that provides hotel guests with a neighborhood feel just minutes from downtown Atlanta’s attractions. Whether you’re in town to attend a conference at the Georgia International Convention Center or to cheer on the Braves at Truist Park, don’t miss these must-see attractions: By car:Head to the south end of the airport parking areas and use Terminal Parkway to exit. Turn right onto Riverdale Road. Drive less than 0.5 miles, crossing over I-85. Turn left onto T Owen Smith Con and then turn left again onto Best Road. The hotel entrance will shortly be on your left.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Columbus, GA
description: Stay near I-185 at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Columbus, GA to enjoy comfortable accommodations close to Columbus State University (CSU) and Fort Benning. If you’re visiting loved ones at the university or military base, take advantage of our free high-speed internet access to post pictures of your group outing. Here to enjoy the area’s attractions? You can find live theater performances, premium shopping, local parks, and museums all within a seven-mile radius of the hotel.Make your trip easier with our free, hot breakfast available each morning, and enjoy a hearty meal of waffles, omelets, and sausage. To relax close to the hotel, soak up the Georgia sunshine during a refreshing swim in our outdoor pool, and then pick up a complimentary cookie on the way back to your room. You can also take advantage of our well-equipped fitness center to keep up with your exercise routine while you’re in Columbus. If you'll be staying with us on a Monday or Tuesday, don't forget to stop by our manager's reception for complimentary light snacks, beer, and wine from 6 pm to 8 pm. In our inviting rooms and suites, we offer amenities like free Wi-Fi and plush bedding to ensure you feel right at home. You can stock the fridge with cold drinks and use the microwave to pop fresh, buttery popcorn for a movie night on the LCD TV with cable channels. In the morning, brew a hot cup of coffee and check the news in the complimentary weekday newspaper before you head to our free, hot breakfast. Situated off I-185 and only four and a half miles from Columbus Airport (CSG), our hotel provides an ideal location for your event or reception of up to 35 guests. Meeting amenities include free high-speed internet access and audiovisual equipment. Plus, your guests are sure to enjoy our proximity to great shopping and restaurants. Visit our city to raft down the rapids of the Chattahoochee River, bike the 15 miles of the Columbus Riverwalk, or visit The Columbus Museum. Our hotel’s location near I‑185 also makes it easy to browse for bargains at Columbus Park Crossings or attend a performance at the Springer Theatre. Don’t miss the following Columbus attractions while you’re here:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Commerce, GA
description: Located off I-85 in the charming Banks Crossing neighborhood, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Commerce, GA welcomes guests with Southern hospitality. If you are planning a day of shopping at nearby Tanger Outlets, calling on local businesses, or exploring our natural wonders, our hotel is minutes from everything. You can attend an event at the Atlanta Dragway, take a self-guided walking tour of the historic downtown, or head to Athens to see the Bulldogs in action.After a busy day, take some time to unwind in our indoor pool or keep up your workout routine in our fitness center. There’s a business center to help you prep for meetings. And we help you stay on budget with ample free parking, free Wi-Fi, and a free, hot breakfast served each morning. Our friendly staff can direct you to dining options near the hotel, including Hawg Wild BBQ, Catfish House, LongHorn Steakhouse, and Cracker Barrel. Let us welcome you home when you choose our spacious rooms and suites at our hotel in Commerce, GA. From the free Wi-Fi to the handy microwave and refrigerator, we have anticipated what you need for a comfortable stay. For your next meeting or event, choose the Country Inn & Suites, Commerce, GA. Our 800-square-foot meeting room can accommodate up to 50 guests. Free parking, free Wi-Fi, and the ability to configure the tables and chairs to meet your needs helps to ensure a successful event. Plus our location just off I-85 makes it easy for your guests to attend. Commerce, GA offers visitors everything from thrills at the Atlanta Dragway to the thrill of hunting bargains at the Tanger Outlets. Located just off I-85, the Country Inn & Suites has the ideal location to get the most out of your visit. A short drive means you can enjoy a round of golf at Double Oaks Golf Club or let the kids have fun at the Funopolis Family Fun Center. And don’t miss these top attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Conyers, GA
description: Visit with your family for a comfortable stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Conyers, GA, situated just off I-20, east of Atlanta. Our pet-friendly hotel is conveniently located about five miles from family fun at Georgia International Horse Park, where everyone can participate in trail rides and view animals at the nature center. Plan a day trip to Atlanta to experience the Georgia Aquarium, 24 miles away. You can take a break from meetings for a tee time at Cherokee Run Golf Club, just minutes from your room or suite.When you check in, pick up free coffee and cookies, settle down next to the lobby fireplace, and log on to free Wi-Fi throughout the building. Our indoor pool and hot tub offer a place to relax with the kids. We provide a complimentary, hot breakfast in our hotel dining area. Look for our fitness center and business center to meet your needs. All of our accommodations come with modern amenities to meet your needs, including a refrigerator, a microwave, a flat-screen TV, and free Wi-Fi. If you travel with your family or a group, you can upgrade to a suite to enjoy more space and extras, such as a whirlpool tub, a separate living room, or a sleeper sofa. Our hotel’s 650-square-foot flexible meeting room can accommodate your event needs. For your seminar, training session, or personal celebration, book our space just off I-20. We offer free high-speed internet access, a personalized web page, audiovisual equipment, and staff assistance. Whether you come to Conyers to work or play, you have easy access to Atlanta’s many businesses and attractions, numerous nearby golf courses, and the Georgia International Horse Park. Located east of Atlanta just off I-20, our hotel makes a perfect center for your adventures in central Georgia. Don’t miss these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dalton, GA
description: After a long drive on the interstate, take a well-deserved break at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dalton, GA, which is located just off I-75 in the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains. You can explore downtown Dalton, attend an event at Dalton Convention Center, or hike around Chickamauga before returning to the hotel for a good night's sleep. In the morning, we set out Southern favorites like biscuits and gravy as well as lighter fare like yogurt and fruit at our complimentary, hot breakfast.To relax, take a dip in the heated indoor pool and then lounge in front of the lobby fireplace. While you’re in the lobby, grab a complimentary snack and coffee. Kick off your shoes in one of our comfortable rooms and suites, where you can connect online with free Wi-Fi or settle in front of your favorite TV show with a bag of microwave popcorn. Wake up each morning with a cup of coffee and peruse the headlines of the free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper. Known as the Carpet Capital of the World, Dalton is home to numerous outlets for carpets and rugs. After shopping, you can treat your family to an outdoor adventure at Chattahoochee-Oconee National Forests, Chickamauga, or Lake Winnie. Add these attractions to your itinerary:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Atlanta Airport North, GA
description: Located south of downtown Atlanta, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Atlanta Airport North, GA is less than a two-mile drive from the trade shows and expos at Georgia International Convention Center. For family-friendly activities, plan a trip to see the dolphins at the Georgia Aquarium, sample global soda flavors at World of Coca-Cola, and watch the pandas at Zoo Atlanta. For a day of thrilling roller coaster rides, make a visit to Six Flags, just 25 minutes from our hotel.If you’re flying into the area, you can use our complimentary shuttle for a quick six-minute ride from Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport (ATL) to reach the hotel, where you can unwind after your flight with free Wi-Fi and an indoor saltwater pool. Or simply grab a book and relax on our outdoor sundeck as you read. After an all-day drive, escape to one of our family-friendly rooms or suites for a peaceful night's sleep. You can keep snacks fresh in the refrigerator and research A-Town attractions using free Wi-Fi. Host important events and meetings for up to 50 guests in our hotel’s meeting space. Use the dry-erase board to encourage group participation and free Wi-Fi to stream videos. If you need to view a slideshow presentation, simply connect your laptop to the 62-inch plasma TV. Our convenient location off I-85 makes it easy to visit popular Atlanta attractions like the Georgia Aquarium, the Fox Theatre, and Zoo Atlanta. Don’t miss these local favorites during your visit:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fairburn, GA
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fairburn, GA places you just two miles from the renowned Georgia Renaissance Festival, an annual event that boasts entertainment like jousting matches, axe throwing, and artisan markets. For even more local fun, carve out time to explore downtown Fairburn, where you’ll find the Fairburn Farmers’ Market and a variety of antique shops. Want to get some fresh air? Plan a visit to Cochran Mill Park, where you can enjoy a scenic hike to Henry Mills Falls. Our hotel also places you within 30 minutes of downtown Atlanta and Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport (ATL).After a long flight or drive, swing through our lobby to grab a complimentary cookie and a fresh cup of coffee. If you need to research the MARTA (Atlanta transit) schedule, take advantage of free Wi-Fi and our 24-hour business center, where you can print and fax copies with ease. When you find a break in your schedule, lounge by the indoor pool or use the treadmill, stationary bike, or stair-stepper in the fitness center. After exploring downtown ATL, retreat to your guest room or suite with a plush Serta® Perfect Sleeper mattress. You can connect your laptop to our free Wi-Fi while you sip a cold drink that you stashed in the refrigerator. Upgrade to a suite to enjoy amenities like a separate living room, a sleeper sofa, and a whirlpool. Bring your corporate meeting or family reunion to our Fairburn hotel, where your guests can enjoy proximity to Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport and downtown Atlanta attractions. Our largest meeting space can accommodate up to 85 attendees and includes a ceiling-mounted projector and a retractable screen. We also have a boardroom available for smaller meetings. Contact our friendly staff today to ask about group rates and catering recommendations. Situated just twenty miles from the heart of Atlanta, our quiet Fairburn location makes a perfect base for adventures at the Georgia Aquarium or Six Flags Over Georgia. You also can drive about 30 minutes to see the Braves play baseball at Truist Park. Don’t miss these nearby attractions: By car:Head west on S Terminal Parkway. Use the middle lane to turn slightly right onto N Terminal Parkway. Continue straight, and after about a mile, use the left two lanes to turn slightly left. Merge onto I-85 S and continue straight for about 10 miles. Use the right two lanes to take exit 61 for GA-74 S. Use any lane to turn left onto GA-74 S/Senoia Road. Turn right, turn right again, and then keep left. The hotel will be on your left.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Griffin, GA
description: Stay just off US 41/GA-19 at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Griffin, GA, located about 35 miles south of Atlanta. Our hotel is an easy three-mile drive from Wyomia Tyus Olympic Park, where you can enjoy a nature hike, and only seven miles from the races at Atlanta Motor Speedway. We’re also near the University of Georgia Griffin Campus and businesses like Caterpillar and Norfolk Southern.After a day of traveling, unwind in the heated indoor pool or hot tub before you head to your room to recharge. In the morning, you can start your day with a fresh cup of coffee and a free, hot breakfast. We also offer a business center if you need to check in with the office before venturing downtown. Our 82 spacious hotel rooms and suites feature all the amenities you need to feel at home, including a microwave, a refrigerator, and a coffeemaker. Traveling with a group? Be sure to ask about our connecting rooms to make it easier to stick together. Looking for an event space to host a reunion, business function, or sports-team gathering? Our 1,728-square-foot meeting room accommodates up to 75 people. Let our experienced staff help you coordinate all the details from room setup to audiovisual equipment. Whether you’re on a family vacation or a business trip, there are plenty of things to do near our hotel. When you’re ready for fun, head to downtown Griffin where you can listen to live music, see a theatrical performance, or attend a seasonal festival. With Atlanta less than an hour away, you can also watch a rock concert at State Farm Arena or attend a special event at Centennial Olympic Park. Plan a trip to these exciting attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Helen, GA
description: Settle in at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Helen, GA, located across the street from the banks of the Chattahoochee River and picturesque downtown Helen. Peruse the Bavarian-themed stores and enjoy the unforgettable German cuisine at Bodensee Restaurant, located within walking distance of the hotel. Venture outdoors to explore the forested Blue Ridge Mountain range on foot, bicycle, or horseback.On a chilly mountain evening, warm up in the heated indoor pool or browse the internet from the comfort of your hotel room with free Wi-Fi. Relax after a day of exploring by soaking in the hot tub or snuggling up in front of the lobby fireplace. In the morning, join us for a free, hot breakfast featuring fresh homemade waffles, grits, fruit, and more. Leave the crisp mountain air outside and snuggle into a quiet, affordable room or suite just off South Main Street. In the morning, enjoy a steaming cup of coffee prepared in the comfort of your room or catch up on your email using free Wi-Fi. Host up to 170 guests in our hotel's flexible event space, offering free Wi-Fi, audiovisual equipment, customized web page service, and more. Your wedding, anniversary celebration, or corporate conference attendees can enjoy being close to popular attractions like Anna Ruby Falls and downtown Helen's unique shops. After your gathering, meet up with the group for a satisfying meal and a local brew at nearby Bigg Daddy’s restaurant. A Bavarian-themed village in the Appalachians, Helen is the perfect alpine getaway for couples and families. Outdoor activities like golfing, hiking, tubing, and horseback riding appeal to those who want to commune with nature, while carriage rides can make for a romantic weekend you’ll never forget. Nearby can't-miss attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Hinesville, GA
description: Whether you’re passing through Hinesville for work or for fun, allow the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Hinesville, GA to be your base of operations. Rest easy less than 10 minutes from Fort Stewart Army Base, one of the largest military installations in the United States. You can visit family members posted on the base and tour the grounds and museums, located less than three miles from our hotel. For an exciting day trip, check out the unique shops and restaurants in downtown Savannah, or head to the popular coastal destination of Tybee Island.When you check in, stop for free cookies and coffee in the lobby. Be sure to relax with a dip in our outdoor pool and a steam bath in our redwood sauna, or you can plan a workout in our fitness center. We offer free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel and a business center if you need office equipment. Join us each morning in our dining area for a free, hot breakfast. After a busy day in the Fort Stewart area, spend some downtime in your room or suite on a plush Serta® mattress. Kick back and stream your favorite shows using our free Wi-Fi as you heat up a snack in the microwave and sip a cold drink from the refrigerator. Suites offer additional space and extras like a separate living room, a sleeper sofa, or a whirlpool for two. If you need a location near Fort Stewart for a business seminar or personal celebration, our hotel offers a meeting room that serves up to 60 guests in a number of seating arrangements. Our dedicated staff is on hand to help with room setup, catering arrangements, and audiovisual equipment rental. Hinesville is a quiet little town offering entertainment in uncommon places. Head to nearby Bryant Commons for some fresh air and local events. Call on the National Telephone Museum for a quick lesson in telecommunications, and visit these favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Hiram, GA
description: Designed to exceed the expectations of both business and leisure travelers, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Hiram, GA provides a great home base just off Highway 6/278. You can reach downtown Atlanta businesses in about 30 minutes, and families appreciate saving time and money on getaway vacations to Six Flags Over Georgia, which is less than 20 miles from the hotel. You can walk to Silver Comet Trail to get out in nature and bring along your pet to make your trip more enjoyable ($25 per pet, per night).Our newly renovated hotel includes an upgraded Wi-Fi network, exterior renovations, a renovated breakfast room, and new mattresses in every room. After a busy day of sightseeing or meetings, take a dip in our heated indoor pool and hot tub, surf the web with free Wi-Fi, or just relax in our outdoor courtyard. At our pet-friendly hotel, you can curl up in one of 62 spacious hotel rooms or suites with new mattresses and an upgraded network with free Wi-Fi. Ready to explore downtown Atlanta? Don’t miss the beluga whales at the Georgia Aquarium or the sweet treats at World of Coca-Cola. Area favorites include the following:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Kennesaw, GA
description: Whether you're taking a family vacation to Six Flags Over Georgia or visiting friends and family in Cobb County, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Kennesaw, GA offers the perfect location to spend the night just off I-75. Enjoy our complimentary, hot breakfast in the morning so you're ready to explore Kennesaw's history-rich area during the day. Our four-story hotel offers 59 guest rooms and suites with free Wi-Fi so you can stay connected to friends and family or clients and colleagues. Upgrade your stay to a studio suite to enjoy an open floor plan and a sleeper sofa. We also offer romantic whirlpool suites for a relaxing getaway. name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lawrenceville, GA
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lawrenceville, GA provides a comfortable home base for visiting Gwinnett Medical Center, only a mile away from our hotel, and Mall of Georgia, only 10 miles away. You can shop at the mall’s more than 200 stores and then take in a live performance or a ghost tour led by professional storytellers at the Aurora Theatre downtown. Connect your laptop or tablet to the free Wi-Fi or tune in to your favorite cable TV channel in one of our spacious rooms or suites. After a restful night’s sleep, wake up to a fresh-brewed cup of coffee from the in-room coffeemaker, browse a free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper, and then head to our dining room for a complimentary, hot breakfast. name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Macon North, GA
description: Located just off I-75, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Macon North, GA offers hotel rooms and suites that make an ideal home base for exploring the “Heart of Georgia.” Visit family members attending nearby Mercer University, or tour the grounds for your own enjoyment. Don’t miss your chance to sing along with a Broadway show at the university’s performing arts center, The Grand Opera House. For a glimpse of Macon’s antebellum history, schedule a tour of The Cannonball House.Before venturing out in the morning, stop by the hotel’s inviting dining area to enjoy our complimentary, hot breakfast. After a day of shopping and visiting historic sites in the Macon area, heat up a snack in the microwave as you kick back in your room or suite to catch up on your favorite cable TV shows. If you need to, use free Wi-Fi to finish up some work. After a restful night’s sleep, wake up to a fresh-brewed cup of coffee from the in-room coffeemaker, and then head to our dining room for a free, hot breakfast, served daily. Hosting an event in the Macon area? Our hotel offers 900 square feet of meeting space with capacity for up to 30 guests. Give presentations with confidence using helpful amenities that include free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and an LCD projector. Our friendly staff is on hand to help with everything from event setup to catering assistance. During your stay in Georgia’s fourth-largest city, treat yourself with a trip to The Shoppes at River Crossing. Macon’s premier shopping center is home to Belk, Dillard’s, and other favorite stores. The Macon area is also home to important Civil War historical sites like The Cannonball House and fascinating cultural destinations like the Tubman Museum. Check out these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, McDonough, GA
description: Situated about 30 miles south of downtown Atlanta, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, McDonough, GA is an ideal place to take a break from interstate travel. After a few hours of cheering on your favorite car, return to the hotel and relax with a complimentary cup of coffee in the lobby. Planning a day in downtown Atlanta? Stock your room’s refrigerator with drinks so that you can enjoy refreshments as soon as you return to the hotel. name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Atlanta I-75 South, GA
description: Enjoy the best Atlanta metro attractions without all the traffic when you stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Atlanta I-75 South, GA. name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Newnan, GA
description: Located less than five minutes from I-85, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Newnan, GA invites you to take a break from the road in our peaceful, inviting city. You can explore the shops and restaurants of historic downtown Newnan, only four miles away from our hotel, or drive to Dunaway Gardens for a glimpse of nature. Here with your kids? Don’t miss the ChildrenConnect Newnan Children’s Museum.If you’re traveling for work, take advantage of our business center or unwind with cable TV in your comfortable room. After a busy day of meetings, take a dip in the indoor pool or log a few minutes of cardio in the fitness center. After a restful night’s sleep, wake up to a fresh-brewed cup of coffee from the in-room coffeemaker while you scan a free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper, and then head to our dining room for a complimentary, hot breakfast. For an exciting day trip, take I-85 into Atlanta to visit the Georgia Aquarium, the World of Coca-Cola, or Truist Park, home of the Braves. Newnan also has its own vibrant history and culture. Don’t miss seeing favorite local attractions like Dunaway Gardens or shopping in downtown Newnan.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Norcross, GA
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Norcross, GA is the ideal starting point to discover all that the metro Atlanta area has to offer leisure and business travelers. Whether you’re headed to the Georgia World Congress Center for a conference or meeting with clients in downtown Atlanta, the location of our hotel offers you easy access to I-85 for your commute into the city. Atlanta and the surrounding metro area offers a wealth of things to do from upscale shopping in Buckshead to attending professional sports events at venues like Mercedes-Benz Stadium or Infinite Energy Center.If you’re on a family vacation, don’t miss a visit to the world-class Georgia Aquarium and the thousands of sea creatures that call it home, or check out the giant tortoises at Zoo Atlanta. After a fun-filled day exploring Autrey Mill Nature Preserve & Heritage Center, return to our lobby for a free cookie before enjoying a swim in our seasonal outdoor pool or a workout in the fitness center.  We want you to feel at home while you’re traveling, which is why our rooms and suites have a convenient microwave, refrigerator, and well-lit work desk with an ergonomic chair. You’ll also love the free Wi-Fi and the complimentary, hot breakfast to start your day. If you’re traveling with colleagues, meeting with a small group, or huddling with your sports team, our breakfast area doubles as an informal meeting area that you can reserve. Traveling sports teams can take advantage of our special services designed just for them, which include group rates. Atlanta's top attractions, including Braves games at Truist Park and the civil rights exhibits at The King Center, are about a 30-minute drive via I-85 from our hotel. Whether you’re in town for a concert or game at Infinite Energy Center, or you plan to spend the day at Stone Mountain, there’s plenty to see and do near our hotel. name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Savannah I-95 North, GA
description: Downtown Savannah and the Atlantic coast are yours to experience when you stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Savannah I-95 North, GA. Meet a friend at Savannah International Airport (SAV), just six miles away, for a coastal vacation. Our hotel, conveniently located on I-95 in Port Wentworth, is an ideal home base for forays to Hilton Head and Tybee Island. Take a short drive to visit historic Savannah’s riverfront, shopping, and cultural sites.Relax in spacious, pet-friendly accommodations and chat by the lobby fireplace before sightseeing. A free, hot breakfast and free Wi-Fi help keep costs in check, and kids 18 and younger stay free with an adult. Spend time splashing in the indoor pool or burn off some energy with a workout in the fitness center. For a quick pick-me-up, look for free coffee, tea, and cookies in the lobby. Be sure to pack snacks; we have in-room refrigerators and microwaves to make your vacation run smoothly. Upgrade to a suite to enjoy amenities like extra space, a separate living room, a sleeper sofa, or a whirlpool. Our hotel’s Port Wentworth location, just off I-95 north of Savannah, is ideal for small group events of up to 20 guests. Enjoy free Wi-Fi, a dedicated web page for your event participants, and accommodations on site. Our hotel is just 10 miles northwest of downtown Savannah and 20 miles from the Atlantic coast. Hop in the car and make a day of it in the downtown area with shops, museums, restaurants, and cultural sites like the birthplace of Girl Scouts founder Juliette Gordon Low. You can also continue on to Georgia’s coastal attractions such as Fort Pulaski National Monument. Don’t miss these nearby sights:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rome, GA
description: For a quiet, relaxed setting and comfortable accommodations just 15 minutes from Berry College, stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rome, GA. Our hotel is located just off Highway 411, giving you easy access to I-75, I-59, and the area's best attractions. Whether you're in town for a weekend tournament at the Rome Tennis Center or a week-long retreat near the Rocky Mountain Recreation Area, we provide comfort and convenience from check-in to check-out.During your stay, take full advantage of our thoughtful services and amenities, such as a seasonal outdoor pool and a free, hot breakfast. When you’re ready for some “me time,” pour yourself a cup of complimentary coffee and curl up by the lobby fireplace. name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Savannah Airport, GA
description: On your next trip to Savannah, choose the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Savannah Airport, GA. We're conveniently located just off I-95, so you can be in downtown Savannah in 20 minutes, making it easy to stroll the cobblestone streets, explore the historic squares, or sample one of the many fine restaurants. You can also shop for amazing deals at the nearby Tanger Outlets.After your flight or drive into town, there's nothing better than a relaxing swim in our indoor pool or a nice soak in the hot tub. We invite you to start your day with a free to-go breakfast before you head out to explore the area. Our helpful and courteous staff is available 24 hours daily to assist you with directions and recommendations for things to do and places to enjoy a nice meal. Our rooms and suites give you more for your travel dollar: more space, more convenience with a microwave and refrigerator, and a free, hot breakfast every morning. All rooms and suites feature either a comfortable king bed or queen beds. Your meeting guests can enjoy an intimate boardroom and exceptional service from the professional staff at the Country Inn & Suites. Fly into Savannah/Hilton Head International Airport or get off I-95 and take advantage of ample parking for your next board meeting or committee luncheon at our hotel. Savannah's most popular attractions are minutes from the Country Inn & Suites. You can hunt bargains at the nearby Tanger Outlets or explore the exhibits of the National Museum of the Mighty Eighth Air Force. Downtown Savannah offers dozens of historic squares and museums along with award-winning cuisine and local shopping. And don’t forget Tybee Island. While you’re our guest, consider these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Savannah Gateway, GA
description: Whether Savannah is your destination or simply a stop along the way, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Savannah Gateway, GA helps you avoid the bustle of downtown traffic with a location off I-95. If you’re flying into or out of Savannah/Hilton Head International Airport (SAV), rest easy knowing the airport is only 15 minutes away from the hotel. Take a short drive to experience the Southern hospitality of Savannah’s historic district, or travel a little farther to marvel at the coastal beauty of Tybee Island.Large, inviting guest rooms help you relax during your stay, and welcoming amenities like free Wi-Fi and a complimentary, hot breakfast make your family getaway more affordable. You can work out in our fitness center and then relax with a leisurely swim in our indoor pool or with a dip in the hot tub. If you need to put the finishing touches on a presentation, our on-site business center offers enhanced productivity without requiring extra travel. Extra seating and kitchenette areas make extended stays feel more like home in our all-suite hotel. Stretch out on a comfortable bed and watch HBO, or surf the web with free high-speed internet access. Enjoy a restful stay close to the campuses of Georgia Southern University Armstrong, Savannah State University, and Savannah College of Art and Design. Our location off I-95 also serves as a gateway to unique Georgia sights like the UGA Aquarium and Tybee Island. Check out these other attractions and shopping opportunities during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Savannah Midtown, GA
description: Experience an affordable getaway in Savannah when you choose the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Savannah Midtown, GA. Our convenient location is only six miles southwest of downtown. Travel a short distance to the city’s grand Historic District, then stroll the well-preserved squares to view classic 18th- and 19th-century architecture and important historical sites from the Civil War. Visiting family or students? Our hotel is only two miles from Hunter Army Airfield and close to Savannah College of Art and Design (SCAD), Savannah State University, and Georgia Southern University Armstrong Campus.Upon your return to the hotel, help yourself to cookies and hot coffee as you pass through the lobby, or squeeze in a workout in the fitness center. You can also enjoy a relaxing dip in our heated indoor pool or hot tub. In the morning, fill up on a variety of delicious items at our free, hot breakfast. Free parking is also available.Pet policy: Pets are not allowed at this property. Please also note that it is illegal to represent a pet as a service animal. We aim to make your trip to Savannah easier by providing rooms and suites with convenient amenities like microwaves, refrigerators, and coffee and tea facilities. In the morning, you can use the free Wi-Fi to plan your day’s itinerary before you join us for our free, hot breakfast. The Country Inn & Suites, Savannah Midtown is a perfect place for social gatherings and business conferences for up to 30 guests. Traveling with a team? Take advantage of our Sports Approved Program and use the event space for a pre-game meeting or an award ceremony. Our welcoming and professional staff can help you plan a successful, stress-free event. Just 15 minutes outside of downtown Savannah, our hotel makes it easy for guests to shop at City Market or tour the Historic District. In town to visit colleges? We’re conveniently near Savannah College of Art and Design and Georgia Southern University Armstrong Campus. Hop in the car and take the short drive to visit these exciting cultural sites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Smyrna, GA
description: Situated just off I-285, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Smyrna, GA provides travelers with a quiet haven as little as 20 minutes from the heart of Atlanta. Our hotel’s convenient location makes it easy to sample Smyrna’s vibrant dining scene and explore family-friendly attractions like Six Flags Over Georgia, the Georgia Aquarium, and the World of Coca-Cola. Atlanta Braves fans appreciate the quick commute to the MLB action at Truist Park, just five miles from our hotel. Visiting the area on business? We’re close to local industrial and technical parks, conferences at the Cobb Galleria Centre, and The Home Depot’s corporate offices.For added convenience, we offer free parking during your stay. Let us welcome you to Smyrna with complimentary cookies and coffee in the hotel lobby. Whatever your visit has in store, take advantage of our complimentary, hot breakfast every morning. After an eventful day, unwind with a dip in our heated indoor pool or a stress-relieving workout in the fitness center. With standard amenities like premium cable TV channels and a work desk with a lamp, our spacious accommodations are designed to make your stay more relaxing and productive. Store your favorite beverages in the refrigerator and bring back leftovers to heat up in the microwave. You can brew yourself a cup of fresh coffee anytime using the in-room facilities. Our 550-square-foot meeting room is perfect for business events, training sessions, or social gatherings. Take advantage of free high-speed internet access and flexible room arrangements. Our experienced staff is happy to assist you with planning and catering recommendations. Take a stroll in Smyrna’s revitalized downtown to discover stylish dining options, from pan-Latin cuisine to gourmet pizza at the Market Village. It’s an easy drive via I-285 and I-20 to top family attractions like Six Flags Over Georgia or the shops, restaurants, and sights of downtown Atlanta. Visit the Martin Luther King, Jr. National Historical Park to tour the birth home of the legendary Civil Rights leader, learn about his legacy, and pay your respects at his tomb. Be sure to add some of these inspiring ideas to your itinerary:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Stone Mountain, GA
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Stone Mountain, GA welcomes families with our spacious rooms and suites, free Wi-Fi, and complimentary, hot breakfast. Located off Highway 78, we’re less than 10 minutes from Stone Mountain Park and about 30 minutes from Atlanta’s downtown attractions, including the Georgia Aquarium and World of Coca-Cola. You can print your event passes in our 24-hour business center.There’s plenty to do near the hotel too, from taking a dip in our indoor pool to watching cable TV in your room or catching a movie at the theater just across the street. Hosting a meeting or a family milestone? Check out our meeting venue to see the services we provide. After a day in Atlanta or at Stone Mountain Park, you can enjoy a good night’s rest in our comfortable hotel rooms and suites. Prepare an evening snack from the fridge, and before you turn in, unwind with HBO or ESPN programming. Plan a seamless and affordable wedding reception or other event for up to 30 guests at our hotel located 20 miles south of Atlanta. You can enhance your event with our audiovisual equipment and free Wi-Fi and use your free, personalized Country Inn & Suites web page to make organizing your event easier. From the Country Inn & Suites, Stone Mountain, GA, you can access a variety of nearby leisure attractions. Visit the famous stone monolith at Stone Mountain Park, or drive to nearby Atlanta for a day’s sightseeing. Have fun at these indoor and outdoor sites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tifton, GA
description: Located just off Interstate 75, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tifton, GA is convenient to many of the area’s best attractions. Learn more about the history of Southern Georgia at the nearby Georgia Museum of Agriculture and Historic Village, or have a relaxing picnic lunch in Fulwood Park, just eight minutes from our hotel. For fast-paced thrills at every turn, head to South Georgia Motorsports Park. You can also pick up tickets for a play at the legendary Tift Theatre for Performing Arts. After working up an appetite perusing downtown boutiques, visit Mi-Lady Bakery to sample old-fashioned breads made from scratch. In the evening, check out the Southern Georgia music scene at The Gin—a popular late-night spot.After a long day of exploring, reward yourself with complimentary cookies and our all-day coffee and tea service, best enjoyed in front of the lobby fireplace. Get an early morning workout in the fitness center or take a vigorous walk with your dog, and then reenergize at our free, hot breakfast, served daily. You can surf the web with free Wi-Fi while you enjoy waffles and fruit. Feel at home in our hotel rooms and suites, which offer comfortable king or queen beds and options for entertainment and refreshment. We also make packing easier by providing hair dryers, irons, and alarm clocks. Bringing your furry friend along? Ask about our pet-friendly options. Plan a golf weekend at one of three nearby courses or go antique hunting along Tifton’s charming Main Street. Our hotel is close to Southern Georgia’s best attractions, including outdoor festivals like the Rhythm & Ribs BBQ Festival and the Omega Pepper Festival. Hook a catfish at Paradise Public Fishing Area, or treat yourself to local, downhome cooking at Jackson’s Soul Food. Celebrate the holiday season at Pumpkin Patch & Crop Maze or Victorian Village by Candlelight. Enjoy these nearby attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Valdosta, GA
description: Shopping, dining, hiking, and family fun are at your fingertips when you stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Valdosta, GA just off I-75 and Route 133. Our hotel is about 15 minutes from the popular Wild Adventures Theme Park and right down the street from Valdosta Mall and Valdosta Cinemas, a 16-screen movie theater. Whether you're visiting Valdosta State University, seeing a race at South Georgia Motorsports Park, or attending the Sunbelt Ag Expo, we offer the ideal location for your trip's home base. Golf enthusiasts can spend the day at one of three nearby 18-hole courses. For outdoor lovers, Freedom Park provides 250 acres of green space.Check in early and settle into a warmly appointed, comfortable room. Splash to your heart’s content year-round in our heated indoor pool and hot tub, or schedule a workout in our fitness center. Planning an event? Whether it’s a cocktail reception or a family reunion, our meeting room fits the bill. Other special perks include a free, hot breakfast served fresh each morning and pet-friendly rooms so you won’t have to leave your furry friend behind. Drift off to sleep in one of our restful rooms or suites, a welcome oasis after a day of touring Valdosta State University or meeting with local clients. Stock the refrigerator with a cache of drinks, and use the microwave to heat leftovers or midnight snacks. You can always stay connected with our free Wi-Fi. Our hotel is convenient to local businesses, the James H. Rainwater Conference Center, and Valdosta Regional Airport (VLD). Ask our dedicated team to assist you in creating an event for up to 70 people. Our event amenities include audiovisual equipment, catering options, and free internet. Join the throngs of fans on game day at Valdosta State University’s Bazemore-Hyder Stadium, or get up early to tee off at Kinderlou Forest. You can take a long walk along Azalea City Trail or let the kids run wild in peaceful Freedom Park. Explore the comfort-food scene at local favorites like Steel Magnolia’s, which serves cool urban fare, and the finger-licking-good Smok’n Pig BBQ. Popular attractions nearby include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Warner Robins, GA
description: Ideally located in central Georgia, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Warner Robins, GA puts you close to many points of interest, including Robins Air Force Base and the Houston County Galleria. You can climb inside vintage aircraft at the Museum of Aviation or watch bull riding at a Georgia National Fairgrounds rodeo. These and many other area attractions are just minutes from the hotel.When it’s time to relax, we offer you a free, hot breakfast, a heated indoor pool, and a fitness center. Use free Wi-Fi to keep your social media profile full of vacation photos, and take advantage of the Did You Forget? Program if you run out of necessities like toothpaste. When you need a snack, stop by the lobby for complimentary coffee, cookies, and fresh fruit, served all day long. Get to know the local landscape as you buy gifts at Lane Southern Orchard or see the fully restored Hay House mansion, both located about 15 miles from the hotel. Can't-miss area attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Boise West, ID
description: If you’re looking for a place to recharge off I-84 near Boise, Idaho, make your way to the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Boise West, ID. Our hotel is perfectly situated in Meridian just 10 miles from Boise Airport (BOI) and downtown Boise, and seven miles from the ski slopes at Bogus Basin mountain. We provide you with a quiet place to rest that’s still within easy reach of the area’s most exciting attractions, from Roaring Springs Water Park to Zoo Boise. If you’re visiting the Treasure Valley region on business, you can head 15 minutes east into downtown Boise for corporate appointments.To ensure you start every day off right, we offer a free, hot breakfast daily with selections like waffles, muffins, and more. You can relax and have fun with our indoor pool, kids’ pool, and hot tub or keep yourself on track with your exercise routine using our fitness center. Offering small appliances like refrigerators, microwaves, and coffeemakers, our rooms and suites create a homey base for your next trip to Boise. Additionally, we ensure you have the essentials for a relaxing experience, including free high-speed internet access and premium TV channels. Traveling with children? Cribs are available on request, and children 18 and under stay free in the same room with an adult. Reserve our breakfast area and private function space for groups of up to 50 guests. Our friendly staff is happy to assist you with the behind-the-scenes organization of your event, from providing catering recommendations to setting up audiovisual equipment, chairs, and tables. Idaho’s capital city and the surrounding Treasure Valley hold gems for urbanites and outdoor lovers alike. Families looking for fun should not miss Roaring Springs Water Park and Zoo Boise, while enthusiastic shoppers will enjoy The Village at Meridian and Boise Towne Square. Be sure to check out the following attractions, located just 20 minutes or less from the hotel: By carFrom the airport’s parking lots, turn onto W Airport Way, drive until it intersects with W Wright Street, and turn left. In about a mile, turn right onto S Orchard Street, cross the overpass for US I-84, and turn left onto the ramp for exit 52, I-84 W. Drive six miles, take the exit 46 ramp, and turn right onto S Eagle Road. In about one mile, turn right onto E Pine Avenue. The hotel entrance is almost immediately on the right. By carTake exit 46. If you’re coming from I-84 W, turn right onto S Eagle Road. If you’re coming from I-84 E, turn left onto S Eagle Road. In about one mile, turn right onto E Pine Avenue. The hotel entrance is almost immediately on the right.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Chicago O'Hare South, IL
description: When you book a stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Chicago O’Hare South, IL, you can start relaxing the minute you step onto our free shuttle from O’Hare International Airport (ORD). No matter what time your flight arrives at O’Hare International Airport, the hotel’s free around-the-clock shuttle service makes your journey easier. Before you head out to explore Bensenville or Chicago-area attractions like Brookfield Zoo, take some time to enjoy the free, hot breakfast.Take advantage of the hotel’s free high-speed internet access to catch up on emails, or plunge into the heated indoor pool before retiring to your comfortable hotel room. You can also use the treadmills and stationary bikes in the on-site fitness center to stick to your workout regimen. Settle into one of our comfortable rooms or suites and feel right at home thanks to amenities like a flat-screen TV with HBO. Corporate travelers appreciate free high-speed internet access and a spacious work desk, perfect for catching up on business after a few hours of air travel. Our hotel’s flexible meeting space can make your next presentation a success with essential business tools like free high-speed internet access and audiovisual equipment. Ask our friendly staff for help with catering options, customized web pages, and more. The Chicago suburbs are bustling with terrific entertainment options, and our hotel puts you within minutes of several top destinations, including Allstate Arena. Explore a legendary American author’s origins with a 20-minute drive to Oak Park, where Ernest Hemingway’s Birthplace Museum awaits. Don’t miss these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bloomington-Normal Airport, IL
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bloomington-Normal Airport, IL provides a comfortable choice for family vacations or business trips. Situated next to Central Illinois Regional Airport (BMI), our hotel offers a prime location between downtown Bloomington and Normal. We are a convenient home base for guests visiting Illinois State University and Illinois Wesleyan University. Corporate guests can enjoy easy access to local businesses such as the State Farm headquarters.Take a relaxing swim in our heated indoor pool, and then use our free Wi-Fi to keep up with social media and email. After snagging a free cookie in the lobby, you can work off the calories with a visit to the hotel’s fitness center. When it’s time to leave, express checkout and our free airport shuttle make it easy to get to your flight on time. Each of our 82 guest rooms and suites offers home comforts, like a coffeemaker, a microwave, and a refrigerator. Sink in to your room’s Serta Elite 2000® pillowtop mattress and watch a little HBO before bedtime. There’s also free Wi-Fi if you prefer surfing the web over channel surfing. Our hotel’s meeting space accommodates 35 guests, making it the perfect spot to host your next gathering. Free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment rentals can help your presentation shine for business or party guests. Our hotel's location next to the Bloomington airport is convenient for incoming travelers. The neighboring towns of Bloomington and Normal double the possibilities for fun during your visit. For some interstellar entertainment just 11 minutes from the hotel, visit the Illinois State University Planetarium, which brings the galaxy to Earth through interactive multimedia exhibits. Other must-see attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bloomington-Normal West, IL
description: Pull off I-55 and settle into your spacious room or suite at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bloomington-Normal West, IL. Our convenient location near downtown Bloomington and uptown Normal places you close to great attractions in the region. Visit your favorite student at Illinois State University, or head to a concert at Grossinger Motors Arena, just minutes from the hotel. Kids love exploring exhibits at the Children’s Discovery Museum and checking out the animals at Miller Park Zoo. With our pet-friendly policy, you won’t have to worry about leaving your animals out of all the fun.After checking in, kick back by the fireplace in the spacious lobby or squeeze in a workout in our fitness center, open from 6 am to midnight. Prefer to swim or soak? Our heated indoor pool and hot tub are open from 6 am to midnight, too. If you’re traveling for work, take advantage of our free Wi-Fi and 24-hour business center to wrap up any loose ends. Before heading out for meetings or college tours, stop by our free, hot breakfast for a delicious start to the day. Our clean, comfortable rooms and suites feature sumptuous Serta® bedding and your choice of down or hypoallergenic pillows. Use your in-room refrigerator and microwave to store and heat refreshments, and brew a hot beverage each morning with the coffeemaker. Attend events at Illinois Wesleyan University, the Interstate Center, and Illinois State University, all conveniently located near the hotel. Fun awaits families at the Children’s Discovery Museum and Miller Park Zoo, too. Make time for these other Bloomington-area attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Champaign North, IL
description: Located near the main campus of the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Champaign North, IL is an ideal place to stay when you’re visiting students or attending a Fighting Illini sporting event. If you’re in the mood to shop, you can walk about a half mile to Market Place Shopping Center, where an abundance of retail outlets and some of Champaign’s most popular restaurants are located. We offer a free hotel shuttle that travels to and from nearby attractions like the Orpheum Children's Science Museum, Memorial Stadium, and the State Farm Center.Release some energy after an afternoon of museum tours by exercising in our on-site fitness center, which features top-notch Nautilus equipment. After you work out, unwind with a refreshing dip in the indoor pool or reward yourself with a free cookie from the lobby. You can fuel your next day’s adventures at our free, hot breakfast, which offers a variety of morning favorites.  You can count on a pleasant stay in our modern rooms and suites, which feature amenities like coffee and tea facilities, microwaves, and refrigerators. Update your status on social media using free Wi-Fi, or curl up with the kids in front of your room's flat-screen TV with more than 40 channels including HBO. When it’s time for bed, you can drift off to sleep on one of our plush beds equipped with a Serta 2000® pillowtop mattress. Just under three miles from the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign, our hotel places you near the college's intriguing culture-driven venues like the Krannert Art Museum and the Japan House. If you’re in town for a family vacation, treat the kids to a fun afternoon of apple picking at the Curtis Orchard & Pumpkin Patch. Interested in outdoor adventure? Embark on a hike in Lake of the Woods Forest Preserve, less than eight miles away. Couples on a romantic weekend or business travelers in search of trendy eateries will find the hotel’s proximity to downtown Champaign a big plus. Key destinations include:

name: Radisson Blu Aqua Hotel, Chicago
description: Dive into the rich culture of downtown Chicago from the striking Radisson Blu Aqua Hotel, Chicago, located minutes from the Magnificent Mile, Millennium Park, Grant Park, and Navy Pier. Designed by famed architect Jeanne Gang of Studio Gang Architects, our hotel places guests in the heart of the city with easy access to Financial District businesses. As the first Radisson Blu in the United States, the Aqua Hotel is the standard for upscale accommodation in Chicago. Our eco-friendly practices have also earned platinum-level status with TripAdvisor’s GreenLeaders Program.During your stay, you can enjoy amenities such as free Wi-Fi, indoor and outdoor pools, an outdoor terrace, and a state-of-the-art fitness center. Our tranquil lifestyle garden provides a welcome respite from the hustle and bustle of the day, and our modern rooms offer exquisite views of the city skyline. When you’re hungry, join us at the on-site FireLake Grill House for delicious Midwestern cuisine in an inviting atmosphere. Hosting a large event in Chicago? Our 28,000-square-foot meeting space, featuring more than a dozen configurable rooms, spans two floors and boasts modern décor and delightful catering options. The following certification shows our hotel's commitment to guests' safety. For more information, visit Safehotels Certification. Spanning two floors and more than 28,000 square feet, the 13 flexible meeting rooms at the Radisson Blu Aqua Hotel are a popular choice for events for up to 1,650 guests. Scenic views of downtown Chicago add a special touch to each event, and amenities such as audiovisual equipment and a dedicated staff help ensure that your gathering is an unforgettable success.                                 From a hearty breakfast buffet to a fine-dining dinner experience, FireLake Grill House & Cocktail Bar serves a variety of Midwestern dishes all day to satisfy every taste. Thanks to a prime location in downtown, our hotel gives you quick access to Chicago’s Financial District and famous North Michigan Avenue as well as Lakeshore East Park, Millennium Park, and Lake Michigan. Start a day of sightseeing at Navy Pier, and then tour the Art Institute of Chicago before heading downtown to soak up the nightlife. Check out these attractions during your stay: By airport shuttle:Book an Airport Express ride from Midway to the hotel doors.By train:Take the Orange Line to the State/Lake station, which is only 0.5 miles from the hotel.By car:Go north on Cicero Avenue to I-55 N/Stevenson Expressway, and continue for 6.6 miles.Use the left two lanes to take the US 41 N/Lake Shore Drive N exit, and continue for 0.5 miles.Merge onto US 41 N/S Lake Shore Drive.Exit onto Monroe Street.Turn right onto Michigan Avenue.Turn right onto Randolph Street.Stay right to go up the ramp to upper Randolph Street.Turn left onto Columbus Drive (this will be the first light after you come up the ramp).The hotel is on the right. By airport shuttle:Book an Airport Express ride from O’Hare to the hotel doors.By train:Take the Blue Line to the Washington station, which is only 0.5 miles from the hotel.By car:Take I-90/94.Follow the signs to Chicago for 12.4 miles.Exit at Ohio Street (Exit 50B) toward 600 N, and continue for 1.2 miles.Turn right on N Michigan Avenue.Turn left onto E South Water Street, and continue for 0.5 miles.Keep left at the fork to continue on E South Water Street.At the stop sign, stay straight to travel onto the middle section of E South Water Street. This is a ramp that will take you to the upper level.Turn right onto upper Columbus Drive.At the second median (by CVS) make a U-turn. The main entrance of the hotel is on the right. On foot:Walking to the hotel from Union Station will take about half an hour. While it’s a 1.5-mile walk, you’ll get to see major attractions along the way.By bus:There are several bus options:From the Union Station Transit Center, get on bus 151. Get off at the Michigan & Randolph stop, which is only 0.3 miles from the hotel.Head to the Canal & Adams stop to board bus 60. Get off at the Randolph & Field Boulevard stop for a quick 0.2-mile walk to the hotel.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Crystal Lake, IL
description: Stay in the greater Chicago metro, less than a mile from the Metra rail, at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Crystal Lake, IL. From our hotel near northwestern suburbs like Cary, you can explore popular attractions like Three Oaks Recreation Area, Raue Center for the Arts, Grand Victoria Casino Elgin, and more. Make the short drive to Algonquin Commons for a day of shopping, or hop aboard our complimentary shuttle to visit area attractions and businesses (shuttle must be reserved in advance).Before you tackle your busy itinerary, stop by the free, hot breakfast each morning for fuel. You can relax on site at the heated indoor pool or meet with friends in our lobby with a fireplace. The fitness center provides an ideal place to clear your mind on the treadmill before focusing on work in the business center with the free Wi-Fi. While you're traveling, feel more at home by booking our rooms that include a microwave, a refrigerator, and a coffeemaker. Catch up on social media with your room's free Wi-Fi, or watch your favorite shows and movies on one of 140 channels, including HBO and Cinemax. Families and groups love our spacious suites featuring a separate living room and a sleeper sofa. Plan an impactful business meeting or a memorable social gathering at the Country Inn & Suites, offering two flexible meeting rooms with free Wi-Fi and audiovisual rental options. The Grant Room can accommodate up to 50, and the Lincoln Room is perfect for groups of up to 80. Our professional staff can assist you in designing the perfect setup and partnering with the best local caterers. The nearby Metra rail takes the hassle out of commuting to Chicago, but you don't have to leave Crystal Lake to stay entertained. Walk across the street to Three Oaks Recreation Area to chill on the beach, go scuba diving, or boat along the water. Spend a beautiful day on the green at RedTail Golf Club or fishing at Moraine Hills State Park. Take your family shopping at Algonquin Commons, or let the kids go wild hopping around Pump It Up’s indoor inflatable bounce houses. We also offer a free shuttle to nearby attractions. Don’t miss these must-see local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Decatur, IL
description: Just five miles north of downtown Decatur, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Decatur, IL is conveniently situated in the peaceful village of Forsyth. From our hotel off I-72 and US-51, you can easily reach the area's top attractions, including Millikin University, about six miles away. After a meeting, take a break from work to visit Rock Springs Nature Center. For families, the Children's Museum of Illinois is about a 15-minute drive from the hotel.Use free Wi-Fi to upload the latest draft of a presentation, and then unwind in our inviting indoor pool. Our fitness center is a great place for a quick jog, and we offer a free, hot breakfast every morning to fuel the rest of your day. Rest easy with plush bedding in one of our spacious rooms or suites, which include amenities like free Wi-Fi, cable TV, and an iron with an ironing board to help you look your best. Host your next corporate event in our meeting space, which features free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment rental. Reserve a block of rooms for your guests and keep them informed about event details with a web page that we personalize for you. Once your meetings are done, have some fun in downtown Decatur. Get outside for an afternoon in the Decatur Park District or tour the Hieronymus Mueller Museum to learn more about one of America's most prolific inventors. Families enjoy watching the antics of ring-tailed lemurs and riding the Zooville Train at Scovill Zoo. Visit these other attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Effingham, IL
description: Conveniently located off I-57 and I-70, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Effingham, IL is just a block away from the Thelma Keller Convention Center, the site of many meetings, conventions, trade shows, weddings, and events. As a major junction in central Illinois, Effingham boasts a variety of restaurants, shops, and local attractions, such as The Cross and Sculptures on the Avenue, and many are within four miles of our hotel.Keep up with work in our business center, and then take some time to relax in our indoor pool. A free, hot breakfast each morning prepares you for the day, and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel keeps you connected. We also offer express check-in and check-out to efficiently get you on your way. Feel well rested before your day in Effingham when you stay in our comfortable guest rooms and suites. Connect with free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel, and enjoy amenities like coffee and tea facilities, a refrigerator, a microwave, and a free, hot breakfast served on classic diningware. Our suites include a separate living room, and some feature a whirlpool. Host your next event at our Effingham meeting room with free high-speed internet access. Take advantage of our staff’s planning expertise for your catering and beverage needs. Our hotel also offers group rates when you reserve at least 10 guest rooms, whether you’re meeting in our venue or at the nearby Thelma Keller Convention Center. From local wine to Herbie the Love Bug, there’s something for everyone to discover in Effingham. Sample sangria at the Tuscan Hills Winery, where you can tour the vineyard or join a dance class. Indulge your nostalgic side at MY Garage Museum, which displays rare and vintage Corvettes, famous VW Beetles, and a unique collection of prototype and racing cars. Visit these popular attractions in Effingham:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Elgin, IL
description: A fun hotel stay awaits you at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Elgin, IL, where you can try your luck at the Grand Victoria Casino or take your kids to tour the Elgin Public Museum. Our location off Interstate 90 places you an hour northwest of downtown Chicago and 30 minutes from O’Hare International Airport (ORD). Sports teams benefit from staying with us just seven miles from Elgin Sports Complex.Once your work is done in the business center, focus on relaxation with a visit to our indoor pool and hot tub. Bring a book to enjoy in the comfort of our fireplace-lit lobby or your hotel room. Check in on emails with the free Wi-Fi available throughout the hotel while you walk on the treadmill in the fitness center. Greet the morning with a cup of coffee after a great night's sleep on a Serta Perfect Sleeper® mattress. Each hotel room or suite features handy appliances like a microwave and a refrigerator, plus a flat-screen TV with premium channels. If you’re traveling in a group or with kids, upgrade to a spacious suite to enjoy a separate living room and a sleeper sofa. Lead a perfectly executed board meeting, business seminar, or social gathering at the Country Inn & Suites, featuring a boardroom for up to 10 guests and a meeting room for groups of up to 35. Audiovisual equipment is available for rent, and our professional staff can recommend excellent local catering. Use the free Wi-Fi to keep everyone connected during your event. Ask about discounts through our Sports Approved program if you're traveling with a sports team. Explore Elgin on two wheels along the Fox River Bike Trail, lined with artwork, restaurants, and picnic spots. You can also wander the city's 73 parks, which include an aquatic center, a 19th-century fire truck at a firehouse museum, and indoor batting cages. Take your kids to a hockey tournament at Canlan Ice Sports or see a thrilling show at Medieval Times Dinner & Tournament. The popular sites of Chicagoland are just an hour away down nearby I-90. Must-see attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Elk Grove Village/Itasca
description: Conveniently located off I-290 and connected to Belvedere Events & Banquets, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Elk Grove Village/Itasca welcomes you to our hotel. Take advantage of our convenient transportation services to O’Hare International Airport (fee applies), and then book our free local shuttle to visit attractions within a five-mile radius of the hotel. You can explore Millennium Park in downtown Chicago, or you can stay closer to the hotel with a concert at Allstate Arena or a wine tasting at Lynfred Winery.You can wake up with our free, hot breakfast and then relax with our heated indoor pool and hot tub. The nearby Real Time Sports restaurant provides delicious meals before you attend a big event at Belvedere. After hosting an important event or meeting in our boardroom, clear your mind with a workout in the fitness center. Feel at home in our hotel rooms featuring plush beds, microwaves, refrigerators, and free Wi-Fi. Room service is available throughout the day so that you can enjoy a quiet meal in your room while you watch a movie. Spacious suites with living areas, sleeper sofas, whirlpool tubs, and separate bedrooms are also available. Use our modern audiovisual equipment and free Wi-Fi to hold an important gathering in our boardroom with seating for up to 12 guests. Need more space? Our staff works closely with Belvedere Events & Banquets, the conference center and wedding venue connected to our hotel by a walkway. You can hold events for up to 1,000 guests in their elegant facilities. After a busy day, order room service from the adjacent Real Time Sports, which offers wings, sandwiches, burgers, and pizzas.Contact information Phone: +1 (847) 534-5000Opening hours 11 am–10 pm | Daily Cheer on the Chicago Sky WNBA basketball team at Wintrust Arena, or check out a Chicago Wolves AHL hockey game at Allstate Arena. Just 28 miles away, the Windy City offers plenty to explore, from Millennium Park and Brookfield Zoo to The Field Museum.
