Use your winnings from Grand Victoria Casino Elgin to treat yourself to a bottle of wine from Lynfred Winery or a special gift from the boutiques in Historic Downtown Long Grove. Don’t miss these nearby attractions: By car: Take Bessie Coleman Drive north to US-12 W, and then turn left onto US-45 N/Mannheim Road.Turn left onto IL-72 W.Follow IL-72 for about 3.5 miles, and then turn left onto S Elmhurst Road.Turn right onto E Devon Avenue. In about 4.6 miles, you’ll see the hotel on the right.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fairview Heights, IL
description: Located just off I-64 in the heart of St. Clair County’s largest shopping district, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fairview Heights, IL invites you to kick back and relax after a day of travel. Visiting St. Louis but don’t want to stay in the city’s hustle and bustle? You’ll appreciate our hotel’s location just an eight-minute drive from the closest MetroLink station and a 20-minute drive from downtown and Scott Air Force Base. If you’re in town for a sports tournament or camp, the O’Fallon Family Sports Park is less than five miles away. You and your team can celebrate a big win with go-kart rides and arcade games at Centerfield Park.After a day of shopping at St. Clair Square or a baseball game at Busch Stadium, return to the comfort of your room or suite to unwind with free high-speed Wi-Fi. You can keep up with your workout routine thanks to our fitness center and our indoor heated saltwater pool. Bringing a large group to Fairview Heights? We offer free parking, easy access to bus parking, a free, hot breakfast, and a business center that’s perfect for printing your group’s daily schedule. When you reserve one of our 62 hotel rooms and suites, you’ll enjoy a comfortable stay and amenities like a refrigerator and microwave. Start each day with a freshly brewed cup of coffee from the in-room coffeemaker, and wind down each night with your favorite show on the 55-inch 4K TV. Whether you’re in the mood for an exciting night in downtown St. Louis or a leisurely afternoon of dining and shopping in Fairview Heights, you’ll find plenty of ways to keep yourself entertained. You can explore 30 acres of hiking trails, gardens, and a working farmyard at Willoughby Heritage Farm. If you want to practice your golf swing, several courses are nearby, including Stonewolf Golf Club and Far Oaks Golf Club. Are you a proud member of Cardinal Nation? Then hop aboard the Redbird Express bus to see the St. Louis Cardinals play ball at Busch Stadium.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Freeport, IL
description: Just a six-minute drive from downtown attractions and businesses, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Freeport, IL provides convenient and welcoming hotel accommodations. You can easily picnic at Krape Park and wander the beautiful Jane Addams Trail. Hit the links at Park Hills Golf Course and see a scale-model of Wrigley Field at Little Cubs Field. Lovers of the arts don’t want to miss a tour of the Freeport Art Museum and a show at the Ferguson Fine Arts Center. Stay in contact with family and friends thanks to free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Spend a leisurely day splashing around our indoor pool, and stop by the lobby for complimentary cookies, coffee, and apples before heading back to your hotel room. Make sure you start each day at our free, hot breakfast and schedule workout time in the on-site fitness center.  With amenities like a microwave and refrigerator in each guest room and suite, it's easy to feel at home on the road. You can unwind at the end of the day in a comfortable bed while watching the flat-screen TV. Brew yourself a cup of coffee and connect to free Wi-Fi so you can review your day’s itinerary. We offer spacious suites with separate living rooms and sleeper sofas to accommodate groups and families. Whether you're in town for a college graduation or a seminar, be sure to explore the miles of scenic trails along the Jane Addams or at Oakdale Nature Preserve. If you're visiting during the summer, ask us about the Stephenson County Fair, a family-friendly event with food, rides, and entertainment. Guests young and old enjoy visiting Little Cubs Field to see the Wrigley Field model and hit a few balls. Check out these Freeport favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Galena, IL
description: Fun abounds year-round in Galena, where you can find ample opportunities to golf, hike, ski, horseback ride, and hot air balloon. Choose the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Galena, IL as your launching pad, and enjoy proximity to Galena’s historic Main Street, which boasts over 125 unique boutiques, art galleries, and restaurants. We’re also close to historic buildings like the Belvedere Mansion and Gardens and the former home of Ulysses S. Grant. If you want to escape into nature, kayak along the Galena River or ski at Chestnut Mountain Resort, both located within 25 minutes of the hotel.After a day exploring Galena’s charming downtown, grab a free weekday USA TODAY® or Telegraph Herald newspaper from the lobby and head to the indoor pool. In addition to an impressive 72-foot waterslide, the pool facilities include a 12-person hot tub and a kiddie pool with a miniature frog waterslide. Even more fun can be found in the hotel’s game room, which boasts over 20 games geared toward all ages, including air hockey, pinball, and multiple arcade games. After a day of kayaking or snowboarding, retire to the comfort of your guest room or suite, where you can unwind with your favorite show on the flat-screen TV. Planning an early morning golf outing? Connect to our free high-speed internet to book a tee time at one of Galena's many wonderful golf courses. Organizing a family reunion, a business seminar, or a baby shower in Galena? The Country Inn & Suites boasts 1,300 square feet of flexible event space that’s perfect for your upcoming meeting. In addition to free high-speed internet access and audiovisual equipment rentals, our skilled staff can help you organize catering services to help elevate your gathering. Travel back in time with a visit to the Belvedere Mansion and Gardens followed by a trip to the former home of President Ulysses S. Grant. For some outdoor fun, pack a picnic and head to Galena Grant Park or sip on a local vintage at one of the many nearby wineries. Don’t miss these and other Galena attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Galesburg, IL
description: Convenient to US-34 and I-74, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Galesburg, IL is a great home base for your visit to Knox College or downtown Galesburg. Our hotel guests also appreciate the short drive to Galesburg Municipal Airport (GBG). While you're in town, visit the birthplace of one of America's most acclaimed poets at the Carl Sandburg Historic Site. After your tour, let the kids play in the indoor pool while you relax in the hot tub back at the hotel.Our free internet access provides the perfect tool to help you plan your itinerary or your campus tour. Children 18 and under, including prospective students, stay free when rooming with an adult. Wind down in our guest rooms and suites after a busy day of exploring the local area. Each morning, you can wake up with a cup of coffee before heading to the hotel's free, hot breakfast. If you're hosting a small business gathering, our meeting room can hold up to 15 people and provides amenities like equipment rental and free Wi-Fi. The breakfast room is also available if you need extra space. Be sure to ask about our group discounts on guest rooms. For a slice of true Americana, learn how trains changed the prairie at the Galesburg Railroad Museum, or experience how nature and history meet at the Lake Storey Recreational Area. Once used as a water source for trains, Lake Storey is a great place to take your family for summertime fishing and hiking. Visit these attractions in Galesburg, IL:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Gurnee, IL
description: Situated just off I-94, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Gurnee, IL puts your family near all the fun Six Flags Great America has to offer. Stop by the hotel to grab some complimentary cookies during express check-in, and then drive just five minutes to the amusement park for a day of thrilling roller coaster rides. Not in the mood to drive? Our hotel is so close to Six Flags that you can walk there in just 15 minutes. When you’re not taking on the double corkscrew of the Demon coaster, stop by Gurnee Mills shopping mall or visit Naval Station Great Lakes to celebrate your loved one’s graduation.No matter how you spend your day, you can return to the hotel and use our free Wi-Fi to upload snapshots of your Gurnee adventures. Unwind with a workout in our fitness center or warm up in our indoor pool before turning in for the night. Whether you're in Gurnee to visit Naval Station Great Lakes or to shop at Gurnee Mills, you can relax each night in our rooms and suites with free Wi-Fi, microwaves, and refrigerators. We even offer special rates to guests planning a shopping trip or attending a Navy graduation. If you’re visiting Gurnee on a weekend getaway or for a family vacation, you won’t want to miss the terrific shopping at Gurnee Mills or the thrills and chills waiting for you at Six Flags Great America. Chicago attractions and the popular Lake Michigan shoreline are about a 45-minute drive from the hotel. While you’re in Gurnee, check out these popular destinations:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Hoffman Estates, IL
description: Offering a quiet location outside downtown Chicago, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Hoffman Estates, IL is perfect for hotel guests visiting the city or surrounding villages. Situated off I-90, we make it easy to reach renowned attractions in South Barrington and Schaumburg, including the Chicago Improv Comedy Club and Medieval Times. Shoppers won’t want to miss the chance to browse more than 300 stores at Woodfield Mall, one of the largest malls in the US. In nearby Rosemont, you’ll also find great picks at the Fashion Outlets of Chicago. Looking for more excitement? Check out the Sears Centre Arena for a concert or sporting event, or try your luck at Rivers Casino in Des Plaines.If you’re flying into O’Hare International Airport (ORD), take advantage of our free shuttle. Drop off your bags when you arrive, and then grab a drink in our lounge or wind down by the firepit on the patio before enjoying a good night’s sleep. In the morning, fuel your adventures with a free, hot breakfast featuring all-American and Japanese options. Guests love that we offer pet-friendly accommodations so they can travel with their whole family. Put your feet up in your hotel room and catch an HBO movie on your flat-screen HDTV. If you need to take care of business, brew a cup of coffee with your in-room coffeemaker before pulling up to the work desk. You can make a snack with the microwave and chill your favorite drinks in the fridge. We also offer spacious suites and connecting rooms for families and groups to travel easily. Capable of accommodating up to 50 guests, the Country Inn & Suites offers meeting space that's perfect for all occasions. Entertain larger groups in our main meeting room, or host a small gathering for 12 in our conference room. You can also enjoy a location near the area's top businesses, including CDK Global, Siemens, OMRON, Sensient, Tate & Lyle, and FANUC America. Traveling with a sports team? We are a Sports Approved hotel and offer a number of perks for you and your players. Our central location makes it easy to explore downtown Chicago, Schaumburg, and Rosemont. GameWorks features arcade games, 25 TVs, and a full-service restaurant and bar for year-round fun. Allstate Arena hosts countless concerts and events throughout the year, and the Rosemont Theatre is your local destination for Broadway-style productions. Bring your family for a thrill-filled day at Six Flags Great America and a show at Sears Centre Arena. Here are our recommendations:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Manteno, IL
description: Close to I-57, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Manteno, IL is an ideal spot to pull off the highway and recharge on your way to Chicago, located less than an hour away. Start the morning with our free, hot breakfast, and then head to Manteno Golf Club for a round of golf. For fun outdoor activities, go hiking, fishing, and canoeing at the Kankakee River State Park, or visit Haigh Quarry for a scuba diving excursion. Both attractions are less than 20 minutes from our hotel.Traveling for work? Take advantage of our business center before taking a dip in the heated indoor pool. You can check your email using free Wi-Fi before fitting in a workout with complimentary access to the nearby Fitness Premier health club. If you have a four-legged family member, use our exercise area and enjoy welcome treats for your pet. Kick back in your room or suite with a snack from the refrigerator while you watch TV or browse the latest headlines in a free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper. Business travelers can keep up with the office at the work desk, and family trips don't break the bank since kids under 18 stay free. With breakfast room seating for 24 and a boardroom with space for 10, our hotel offers a convenient meeting spot for both corporate and social gatherings. Our friendly staff is happy to help arrange catering from local restaurants, and we offer on-site amenities like free Wi-Fi to make your event easier. Are you planning a wedding? Be sure to ask about our group discount for the wedding party. Convenient to scenic nature spots and attractions like the B. Harley Bradley House, our hotel is a great home base for your trip to the Chicago area. Take your kids to the Kankakee County Speedway for a race, or treat yourself to some retail therapy at Northfield Square Mall. Don't miss these favorites during your visit:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Marion, IL
description: Whether you're traveling on I-57 or staying in southern Illinois on business, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Marion, IL provides a relaxing break from a busy schedule. During your trip, watch a Southern Illinois Miners baseball game at Rent One Park or play a round of golf at The Links at Kokopelli. Outdoors lovers can grab all the supplies they need from Dunn’s Sporting Goods before heading to Rend Lake for fishing. Crab Orchard, a national wildlife refuge, also offers excellent options for fishing and hiking. A pet-friendly policy and a location within 25 minutes of Southern Illinois University make our hotel ideal for families.Wake up each morning with our free, hot breakfast, which features delicious items like Belgian waffles, eggs, sausage, and pastries. Take advantage of convenient perks like free Wi-Fi to stay connected during your stay. Let your family pick up complimentary cookies from the lobby to enjoy in your room after a fun-filled afternoon in the heated indoor pool. We also offer an on-site fitness center for workouts and a 24-hour business center for getting work done. Feel at home while you kick back in a plush bed and update social media with the free Wi-Fi. A microwave and refrigerator allow for easy snack storage and preparation, while coffee facilities help you wake up each morning. Let the kids watch TV while you wrap up some work at the desk. Our spacious one-bedroom suites have a living room and sleeper sofa that give families plenty of room to stretch out. We also offer extended-stay suites. Whether you’re planning an important business meeting or social function, you’ll find the ideal space to gather at the Country Inn & Suites. Our flexible meeting room can be arranged to suit the needs of your group of up to 60 people. Use the 24-hour business center to prepare for your event, and take advantage of free Wi-Fi in the meeting space. We also work with sports groups to meet their unique needs through our Sports Approved Program. Looking for something to do while you're in Marion? Travel less than a mile to Rent One Park to see the Southern Illinois Miners play a baseball game, or do some shopping at Dunn’s Sporting Goods. Devote a sunny day to fishing or hiking at nearby Rend Lake or Crab Orchard. If you love to golf, hit up The Links at Kokopelli just half a mile away. The Country Inn & Suites is within an easy drive of top area attractions, including these favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Moline Airport, IL
description: At the newly renovated Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Moline Airport, IL, you can treat your family to a free, hot breakfast each morning of your stay. Free transportation to and from Quad City International Airport (MLI), located only three minutes away, makes travel easy.* While you're in town, make time to attend an event at the TaxSlayer® Center or spend the afternoon letting your kids explore tractors at the John Deere Pavilion. Want to experience the local nightlife? Downtown Moline is only 10 minutes from the hotel, or you can try your luck at Isle Casino Bettendorf, less than five miles away.If you’re traveling with the whole family, our indoor pool is the perfect spot to relax. Let the kids splash while you soak in the soothing hot tub. After a workout in the fitness center, you can focus on work at the business center with free Wi-Fi. Enjoy some downtime at the hotel by letting your kids pick a complimentary cookie and relax by the fireplace in the lobby.*Guests must notify the hotel 24 hours in advance if transportation service will be needed to or from the airport. After a busy day of travel, settle into your comfortable hotel room or suite for a movie marathon with snacks you've stored in the refrigerator. In the morning, you can brew a fresh cup of coffee before checking email with our free Wi-Fi. A work desk makes it easy to stay on top of office assignments while away. If you’re traveling with family, upgrade to a spacious suite with a separate living room and a sleeper sofa. We also offer whirlpool suites for relaxing getaways or romantic celebrations. Our convenient location in Moline lets you shop the latest fashions at SouthPark Mall, just a mile and a half away, or plan a girls' night out at the Isle Casino Bettendorf. You can also snap your fingers to jazz and blues beats at LeClaire Park, which hosts festivals only 20 minutes from the hotel. Take your family for a memorable visit to Niabi Zoo, where you can feed giraffes, or hike the trails of Black Hawk State Historic Site. Don't miss these other local favorites:

name: Radisson on John Deere Commons-Moline
description: Radisson on John Deere Commons-Moline boasts views of the neighboring Mississippi River as well as a convenient position within walking distance of downtown Moline and its more than 30 restaurants and bars. We are located right next door to the TaxSlayer® Center and provide easy access to concerts, sporting events, and conventions. Visit the popular John Deere Pavilion across the street from the hotel to learn about the company's history, or take in the area's surroundings with a stroll along the Mississippi River.Our hotel’s complimentary shuttle to and from Quad City International Airport (MLI) makes travel a breeze. Start your morning with a dip in the indoor pool and hot tub, or have a quick workout in our fitness center before joining us for our complimentary breakfast in the hotel's John Deere Room. Spend the night in a comfortable guest room with thoughtful amenities like a microwave, a fridge, and a flat-screen HDTV. Beds are layered with soft comforters and premium linens. Keep up with social media or work email using free Wi-Fi, and in the morning, join us in the dining area for a complimentary breakfast. Prefer to sleep in? Enjoy a cup of coffee brewed with the in-room coffeemaker and order your morning meal from room service. Organize your next social soiree with help from the expert staff at Radisson on John Deere Commons-Moline. Our hotel's convenient location, about five miles from Quad City International Airport, makes travel easy for out-of-towners. If you're planning a large wedding reception at a popular nearby venue such as the TaxSlayer® Center, we are happy to arrange a block of rooms at our hotel for your guests. The wedding couple can also take advantage of special perks like a free bottle of champagne on their wedding night and discounted suite rates. Fuel your Moline adventures with a free, deluxe breakfast of eggs, sausage, and waffles in our stylish John Deere Room. If you prefer a quiet meal to yourself, order off the room service menu. The Radisson hotel, nestled in the John Deere Commons, is within walking distance of the bustling downtown area and its many dining options. If you have kids in tow, spend an afternoon of fun enjoying the many exhibits at the Family Museum or picnicking at Black Hawk State Historic Site. Don't miss these local highlights:

name: Park Inn by Radisson Morton
description: Positioned in the heart of one of Illinois’ friendliest and fastest-growing communities, the Park Inn by Radisson Morton sits off I-74 for easy access to corporate offices, General Wayne A. Downing Peoria International Airport (PIA), and local sports complexes. Reach Caterpillar Headquarters and Quail Meadows Golf Course in less than 20 minutes from the hotel, and EastSide Centre, Louisville Slugger, and Avanti’s Dome sports venues within 25 minutes.After business meetings, golf outings, or baseball games, head back to the hotel to unwind in the fitness center, indoor pool, or our inviting fireplace lobby. Enjoy a bite to eat at the on-site pub, The Toasted Tavern Pub & Eatery, and use the on-site laundry facilities to freshen up your team’s uniforms. If you're traveling with a furry companion, we offer pet-friendly rooms to accommodate your entire group. The hotel features 96 rooms for business or leisure travelers, complete with free Wi-Fi and in-room small appliances like coffee and tea facilities, fridges, and microwaves. With approximately 10,000 square feet of meeting space capable of hosting up to 600 guests in our largest room and as many as seven in our basic meeting room, the Park Inn is perfect for board meetings, seminars, fundraisers, weddings, or gala events. Our event coordinator ensures your function unfolds smoothly, and our teleconferencing and videoconferencing services enable you to connect with anyone, anywhere, anytime so no one misses your important presentation. With easy access to I-74 and the Peoria airport, our hotel’s meeting space is convenient for both drive-in and fly-in attendees.                                 Visit our on-site restaurant, The Toasted Tavern Pub & Eatery, for classic American and Irish cooking. Enjoy the warm ambiance while you dine, sip a brew, and listen to music. For added convenience, indulge in a complimentary daily breakfast. Whether you're in Morton to meet with clients, attend the city's famous festivals, or take a break from your Indianapolis-to-Chicago drive, you'll appreciate our hotel's convenient spot right off I-74. While you're here, be sure to visit the area's best attractions, such as the Giant Screen Theater that plays larger-than-life 3D movies at the Peoria Riverfront Museum. You can try your hand at engineering your own Cat at the Caterpillar Visitors Center, and then catch a live concert on the banks of Peoria Lake at CEFCU Center Stage at the Landing. Need to entertain clients while in Morton? Book a tee time at Quail Meadows or Lick Creek, two of the best golf courses in central Illinois. By car:The airport is 35 miles from the hotel. Take Veterans Parkway to I-55 South to I-74 West. Take I-74 West to exit 102 toward Morton. Turn right onto North Morton Avenue, and then turn right onto East Ashland Street. The hotel will be on the left. By taxi:A taxi ride takes 15 minutes.By car:Take I-474 East to I-74 East into Morton. Take exit 102A to Morton Avenue. Follow North Morton Avenue, and then turn right onto East Ashland Street. The hotel will be on the left.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Peoria North, IL
description: Located near I-474 and Landens Way, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Peoria North, IL is a convenient and affordable home base that places you just across the highway from the popular Shoppes at Grand Prairie. If you’re traveling to the Peoria Civic Center or Peoria International Airport (PIA), take advantage of our free shuttle, which operates daily from 7 am to 11 pm. Our hotel is also within easy reach of family-friendly attractions like Peoria Zoo.Start each morning the right way by indulging in our free, hot breakfast, and then unwind after a full day with a dip in the indoor pool or a workout in the fitness center. For added convenience, our pet-friendly hotel offers extended-stay suites and meeting space for up to 50 guests. Connect your laptop or tablet to the free Wi-Fi or tune in to one your favorite cable TV channels in one of our spacious rooms or suites, each of which includes a refrigerator and a microwave. After a restful night’s sleep, wake up to a fresh-brewed cup of coffee from the in-room coffeemaker, browse a free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper, and then head to our dining room for a free, hot breakfast, served daily. Whether you’re planning an intimate wedding or need to impress important clients with a great presentation, our flexible meeting room is a great choice for up to 50 of your guests. To help your event go off without a hitch, we offer catering recommendations, professional event planning, and a customized event website. During your stay in Peoria, you can ride a safari bus through Wildlife Prairie Park to see animal species indigenous to the Midwest, including black bears, bison, and elk. You can also explore the Illinois and Mississippi rivers via steamboat, just like they did in the old days. Families appreciate quick access to Bradley University, located about nine miles away. Don’t miss these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rock Falls, IL
description: Situated just off I-88, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rock Falls, IL offers an ideal home base for outdoor adventurers with many scenic areas to explore and business travelers with meetings in nearby Sterling. Start your day with a free, hot breakfast in the hotel dining room and then discover nearby attractions like the Ronald Reagan Birthplace and Rock River. Go hiking with your family at White Pines Forest State Park or hop aboard a riverboat casino for a fun night out.After a full day of activities, relax in the hotel’s dry sauna, hot tub, or indoor pool. Feeling hungry? Snack on complimentary cookies, coffee, and candy in the lobby, or warm leftovers in your in-room microwave. Our rooms and suites feature plush bedding for a restful night's sleep as well as a coffeemaker for a morning energy boost. Use free Wi-Fi to check your email at the work desk before watching your favorite show on HBO. You can also heat up a tasty snack in the microwave and grab a cold beverage from the fridge. An ideal venue for meetings and wedding receptions, our Rock Falls hotel provides event space for up to 50 people. Take advantage of free Wi-Fi and a 54-inch TV to enhance your presentation. Our friendly staff can also offer catering recommendations and create a personalized web page for your event.                                     Order room service from the Candlelight Inn restaurant, located next door. Do your kids have a lot of energy to burn? Head to Westwood Fitness & Sports Center for a basketball game with your family or a jog around the indoor track. If you're in the area for a wedding at The Barn at Allen Acres, stop by Northland Mall to pick up a last-minute gift. Be sure to check out these other favorites:

name: Radisson Hotel & Conference Center Rockford
description: From the granite floors beneath your feet to the custom-made Waterford chandeliers suspended from the ceiling, Radisson Hotel & Conference Center Rockford welcomes you in grand style. Thanks to our location near I-90, day trips to Chicago, Madison, and Milwaukee are easy, as all three are approximately one and a half hours away. Chicago Rockford International Airport (RFD) is a 20-minute drive from the hotel, and families appreciate being five minutes from Six Flags Hurricane Harbor, the state’s largest water park.If your flight didn’t include a meal, you can easily find a delicious entrée at the on-site Forest City Pub. Jump-start your morning with an invigorating swim in the indoor pool, or end the day by relaxing in the hot tub. You can stay on track with your workouts when you visit our on-site fitness center. At the Radisson in Rockford, we've recently renovated each of our 114 hotel rooms and suites to bring even more comfort and convenience to your stay. Enjoy amenities you can’t pack in your suitcase, like a microwave and a refrigerator, and easily plan your itinerary with free Wi-Fi. You can skip a morning coffee run thanks to an in-room coffeemaker and room service. With six meeting rooms and two conference rooms, the Radisson in Rockford offers ample space for a variety of events. Free Wi-Fi keeps everyone connected during business gatherings, and audiovisual equipment helps you present your message effectively. Hosting a social event? Dazzle your guests with the unexpected elegance of Waterford chandeliers in our 7,200-square-foot Waterford Ballroom. Ask our professional staff for help with customizing the decor for your wedding or gala banquet.                                     If you prefer to dine and drink in your room, room service is available.                                 Enjoy salad, pizza, pasta, or seafood without ever leaving the hotel. Forest City Pub, our on-site restaurant, serves a delicious breakfast to help you fill up before morning meetings and features lunch and dinner options to satisfy your hunger later in the day. In addition to the full-service restaurant, Forest City Pub offers a welcoming bar where you can stop for a drink after dinner. Hop on I-90 for an excursion to Chicago or Milwaukee, or stick around Rockford to discover an assortment of attractions ranging from museums to theme parks. If you’re traveling with your family, your kids can have fun while learning about space, electricity, and more at the Discovery Center Museum. Check out these popular sights: By car:Get on US-20 E from Airport Drive. Continue on US-20 E and then take I-39 N to US-20 BUS W/E State Street. Take the US-20 BUS/State Street exit from 1-39 N/I-90 W. Continue on US-20 BUS W/E State Street and then turn left onto S Bell School Road. Turn left onto Walton Street, and the hotel will be on your right.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Romeoville, IL
description: Relish a quiet getaway in a quaint village at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Romeoville, IL. Our hotel is centrally located off Exit 263 on I-55, 30 miles southwest of Chicago. Spend a day in downtown Chicago visiting famous attractions like Wrigley Field and Navy Pier. Looking for a place to impress corporate clients? Hit the greens at nearby Bolingbrook Golf Club or The Links at Carillon.After a day of fun, return to the hotel and catch up on email using free Wi-Fi. We’re a family-friendly property, so you can splash around with the kids in the heated indoor pool and take your four-legged friend for a walk after a free, hot breakfast in the hotel’s dining room. Plan out your itinerary using free Wi-Fi in one of our modern rooms and suites. You can store drinks in the fridge, heat leftovers in the microwave, and make a hot beverage in the coffeemaker each morning. Indulge in a free, hot breakfast before heading out for a day of meetings or sightseeing in Chicago. Groups and families can upgrade their stay to a one-bedroom suite to enjoy a separate living room and a sleeper sofa. The Country Inn & Suites, Romeoville offers flexible event space for up to 35 people. Host small meetings, training sessions, and social events in a central location that your guests will love. Our audiovisual equipment ensures you can give an inspirational presentation, and our free Wi-Fi and catering options are sure to satisfy your guests. Afterward, celebrate a successful meeting or social event with a group trip to Harrah's Joliet casino. The Country Inn & Suites is conveniently located in Romeoville near Bolingbrook and Chicago. Explore nearby attractions like the Illinois Aviation Museum, Naper Settlement, and The Promenade Bolingbrook. If you have time for a day trip, drive into downtown Chicago to tour Millennium Park and Navy Pier. Area attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Schaumburg, IL
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Schaumburg, IL is a short drive away from numerous adventures for the entire family. Step into the past and feast like a king at Medieval Times Dinner and Tournament or visit the iconic Navy Pier and catch skyline views on the Centennial Ferris wheel. Shop till you drop at Woodfield Mall and attend professional sporting events at Allstate Arena and Schaumburg Boomers Stadium. Our hotel is also close to O'Hare International Airport (ORD), located just 15 miles east on I-90.After a day of exploring, unwind with comforting hotel amenities like goose-down bedding, 42-inch flat-screen TVs, free Wi-Fi, a heated indoor pool, and complimentary coffee, tea, and cookies. After a great night’s rest, enjoy a free, hot breakfast each morning. Traveling for work? Take advantage of the 24-hour business center, fitness center, and room service. Whether you’re here for a family vacation or a romantic getaway, you’ll appreciate the added comforts in our hotel rooms and suites. Watch a movie on the 42-inch flat-screen TV or catch up with family using free Wi-Fi. You can also enjoy snacks from the microwave, cold drinks from the fridge, or room service at the intimate table for two. Get a great night’s rest with comfy goose-down bedding. Visit the International Sculpture Park and Spring Valley Nature Sanctuary, only four miles away, for outdoor fun, or take a family day trip to Adler Planetarium, located only 30 miles away in the heart of Chicago. For the young and young at heart, be sure to check out these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Springfield, IL
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Springfield, IL is located off I-55, close to the Abraham Lincoln Capital Airport (SPI) and minutes from the capital's historical downtown. Adults and children alike can enjoy exploring nearby attractions, such as the Dana-Thomas House, Henson Robinson Zoo, and the Lincoln Tomb, all less than 20 minutes from the hotel.Business guests appreciate our proximity to major companies like Bunn-O-Matic Corporation, Corporation Service Company, and H. D. Smith. We also offer a business center to help you prepare for meetings, whether on-site or nearby. Keep up your exercise routine while on the road at our fitness center, or enjoy a few laps in the indoor pool. When you’re finished for the day, you can grab some complimentary cookies in our lobby and head to your comfortable room or suite for a restful evening. Our guest rooms and suites offer the perfect home base for exploring Springfield. Stay connected with free Wi-Fi, or lounge on a comfortable bed with a hot drink from the in-room coffeemaker. Stock the fridge or pop popcorn in the microwave, and then enjoy a movie with your family on the HDTV. Our 575-square-foot event room accommodates up to 25 people and provides a wall-mounted TV, conference tables, and free Wi-Fi. You can keep your guests refreshed with our coffee/beverage service. No trip to the Illinois capital would be complete without brushing up on your American history, and with sites like the Abraham Lincoln Presidential Library and Museum and the Lincoln Tomb, you’ll find it’s easy to do. If you're in the area to attend an event at the Bank of Springfield (BOS) Center, located just six miles from the hotel, be sure to find time to check out these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Stockton, IL
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Stockton, IL is the perfect home base for nature lovers and outdoor enthusiasts. Hunting, fishing, skiing, snowmobiling, and golfing are all available close to our location off Highway 20. Families can enjoy fresh-air fun near the hotel at Apple River Canyon State Park, while couples seeking a peaceful getaway will find the family-owned Massbach Ridge Winery irresistible.After visiting the top attractions in Jo Daviess County, you can relax with a dip in the hotel’s indoor pool and connect with family via free Wi-Fi. Our pet-friendly hotel offers specific rooms for guests traveling with a four-legged friend, and our free, hot breakfast is included daily with your stay. Reward yourself with a complimentary cookie from the lobby after a rejuvenating workout in the fitness center. Whether you're in Stockton to ski the wintry slopes, find the perfect fishing spot, or embark on a beautiful hike, you need a relaxing home base. Unwind in our hotel rooms and suites with a freshly brewed cup of coffee, stock the fridge for late-night snacks, and catch your favorite shows in the evening. Check in with friends via the free Wi-Fi before heading out to see the sights with your pet. Deliver a professional presentation or host a family gathering for up to 35 attendees in our versatile meeting space. Your guests can easily connect to convenient, free Wi-Fi, and we offer complimentary coffee and water service to keep everyone comfortable. Pack your gear, leash up the dog ,and head out to Illinois' scenic surroundings with a hike at Apple River Canyon State Park. For those that love the snow, Chestnut Mountain lets you enjoy a scenic drive on the way to its powdery slopes. While you’re in the birthplace of Kraft Corporation, look for historic signage commemorating the company’s first cheese factory. And for the perfect pairing experience, stop by Massbach Ridge Winery for a bottle of wine. Don't miss these favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Sycamore, IL
description: Whether you’re attending a family event, traveling for business, or just exploring picturesque DeKalb County, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Sycamore, IL is the perfect home base. From our hotel, it’s just a five minute-drive to historic downtown Sycamore, and about 10 minutes to Northern Illinois University, home of the Huskies sports teams. Keen to get outdoors? Stride out on the Great Western Trail or play a round at the Sycamore Park District Golf Club.Whatever your itinerary, get a great start each morning with our free, hot breakfast. You can boost your energy levels in our light-filled fitness center and keep up with your work duties in the 24-hour business center. After a busy day, decompress with a swim in the indoor pool, followed by a leisurely soak in the hot tub. Our fireside lobby is a welcoming spot to relax and enjoy free cookies any time. Feel at home when you stay in one of our comfortable standard rooms, open-concept studios, or two-room suites. All accommodations feature thoughtful amenities like a coffeemaker, a refrigerator, and a microwave. You can connect to free Wi-Fi to stream music or watch your favorite cable channels on the flat-screen TV. Host an event for up to 10 people in our hotel’s meeting room. Take advantage of free high-speed internet access and audiovisual equipment, including a flat-screen TV, a DVD player, and a projection screen. We’re also happy to provide coffee and water service by request. Even if time is tight, you can browse downtown boutiques and specialty shops on charming West State Street or take a stroll around Sycamore’s well-preserved historic district. Unique DeKalb County attractions include the late 19th-century Ellwood House Museum, once home to a barbed-wire baron. See a college football game at NIU’s Huskies Stadium, or stretch your legs along the Great Western Trail, which passes surviving sections of native prairie. Check out these local activities:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tinley Park, IL
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tinley Park, IL is conveniently located off I-80 in the suburbs of Chicago. We’re just minutes away from numerous restaurants and shopping options, and nearby attractions like Odyssey Fun World and Hollywood Casino Amphitheatre offer plenty of family fun. For business travelers, Tinley Park Convention Center is 3.5 miles from the hotel. Exploring the Windy City? A quick Metra rail ride to downtown Chicago allows you to spend the day sightseeing.Kick off each morning at the hotel with a free, hot breakfast, and enjoy complimentary cookies and coffee in the lobby any time of day. You can keep up with your workouts in our on-site fitness center. After a long day of meetings or sightseeing, relax in our indoor pool or catch up on email with free Wi-Fi. Book one of our comfortable hotel rooms or suites with homelike amenities such as a microwave and a fridge. You can recharge watching the 32-inch flat-screen TV or sit down at the desk and use free Wi-Fi to connect with work or friends. In the mornings, don’t miss our free, hot breakfast, available to all guests. The Chicago suburb of Tinley Park is brimming with fun entertainment options. Enjoy mini golf, laser tag, and seasonal zip-lining at Odyssey Fun World, just 10 minutes away. You can also head to Chicago for a day of exploring the Windy City’s best attractions. Check out these popular sights while you’re in the area: By car: Take Exit 145 and turn right (from I-80 W) or left (from I-80 E) onto US-45 N/S Lagrange Road. Drive for 0.7 miles and turn right onto 183rd Street. In about 430 feet, take the first right onto White Eagle Drive. The hotel entrance will be on the right. By car:Exit the airport, turn right onto Bessie Coleman Drive, and drive until you cross the overpass for I-90. Take the ramp on the right to merge onto I-190 E. After 0.7 miles, take Exit 1D to merge onto I-294 S. Continue on for 8.7 miles and then take Exit 31A for I-88 W. After seven miles, use Exit 131A to merge onto I-355 S. Drive another 21.9 miles. Take Exit 0A (on the left) and merge onto I-80 E. After about five miles, take Exit 145 and turn left onto US-45 N/S Lagrange Road. Drive for 0.7 miles and turn right onto 183rd Street. In about 430 feet, take the first right onto White Eagle Drive. The hotel entrance will be on the right.Note: This route requires tolls. By car: Exit the airport and turn right onto S Cicero Avenue. Drive for about two miles and take the ramp on the left to merge onto I-55 S. In seven miles, take Exit 279A to merge onto US-45 S/South La Grange Road. Drive 14.9 miles, and then turn left onto 183rd Street. In about 430 feet, take the first right onto White Eagle Drive. The hotel entrance will be on the right.

name: Radisson Hotel & Conference Center Champaign-Urbana
description: Welcome to Radisson Hotel & Conference Center Champaign-Urbana, which is conveniently located near Carle and OSF hospitals as well as area businesses such as Kraft, Super Value, Plastipak, and UPS. Both downtown Champaign and Urbana are less than two miles away, so you’re just a short drive from Virginia Theatre, Market Place Shopping Center, and Lake of the Woods Forest Preserve.Clear your mind each morning with a workout in the fitness center or the indoor pool before getting to work in the business center. After a busy day of meetings in our versatile ballroom, enjoy a casual meal in our restaurant, Garden Café, and drinks at the lobby bar. Room service is also available. Each of our 198 hotel rooms provides a quiet escape in Champaign, complete with a TV and free Wi-Fi. Keep drinks cold in the fridge to enjoy while you work at the desk. Romantic whirlpool suites are available as well as spacious studio suites with sleeper sofas. Corporate travelers should take advantage of a Business Class room for additional perks. Our hotel offers the perfect event space between both downtown Champaign and Urbana. You can hold a grand reception or conference for up to 1,100 attendees in the ballroom, or you can reserve one of our meeting rooms for a smaller reception or training session. Free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment are available to enhance your gathering. Fans of the Fighting Illini love our hotel’s location just two miles from the University of Illinois and campus sites like Memorial Stadium. You can attend concerts at State Farm Center and explore the fine arts at Krannert Art Museum and Kinkead Pavilion. Nearby Parkland College also offers unique attractions like the William M. Staerkel Planetarium. Don’t miss these popular destinations:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Zion, IL
description: Located between Chicago and Milwaukee, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Zion, IL places you just a mile from Illinois Beach State Park, where you can enjoy the beauty of Lake Michigan. Here with your family? Take on the exciting roller coasters and water rides at Six Flags Great America, less than a 15-minute drive away. If you’re in the area for a medical visit, our hotel offers easy access to the Cancer Treatment Centers of America at Midwestern Regional Medical Center.After a day of hiking or sunbathing, return to the hotel to relax in our heated indoor pool and hot tub. You can stream your favorite music with free Wi-Fi as you work out in the fitness center. Stop by the lobby for a snack from our Inn Case Market and enjoy it while you work in the business center. Make sure your itinerary includes the free, hot breakfast every morning. Unpack your bags and unwind in one of our comfortable hotel rooms or suites, where you can easily prep snacks for your kids thanks to a microwave and a refrigerator. Before bed, plan your next day’s adventure using free Wi-Fi or catch your favorite show on the 32-inch flat-screen TV. Whirlpool suites provide you a memorable upgrade for a romantic getaway, while spacious studio and one-bedroom suites are perfect for families and groups visiting North Point Marina. Need a space for a small reunion, a corporate function, or a celebration for a graduate from Recruit Training Command Great Lakes? Our hotel offers a convenient boardroom that can accommodate up to 12 attendees. Take advantage of free Wi-Fi, audiovisual equipment, and beverage services to make your event shine. If your guests are from out of town, you can request a group lodging discount. Spend a beautiful day playing the links at ThunderHawk Golf Club or fishing on a boat from North Point Marina. You can drive south to shop the outlet stores at Gurnee Mills or explore the unique offerings at the Zion Antique Mall & Toy Mart. Families love the thrilling roller coasters and games at Six Flags Great America, just 15 minutes away. To explore beyond the city limits, you can board a train at the Zion Metra Station, about a mile from the hotel. Check out these popular attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Louisville North
description: Conveniently located in Clarksville, Radisson Hotel Louisville North offers a convenient home away from home just off I-65 and close to the Kentucky-Indiana border. Our lakeside hotel sits only one mile from the Ohio River, and downtown Louisville is about two miles from our front door. Corporate travelers appreciate our central location near the Kentucky International Convention Center (KICC), the KFC Yum! Center, and Louisville International Airport (SDF), which is less than 15 minutes away. In town for fun? Drive to downtown Louisville to eat, drink, and play in the Fourth Street Live! entertainment district, or head about five miles south to watch the Kentucky Derby at Churchill Downs.Whether you’re here to see the sights or to attend a meeting at our conference center—the largest in southern Indiana—we offer amenities like free Wi-Fi and a business center to help you feel at ease. Go for a swim in our indoor and outdoor pools, or enjoy family bonding time with a free game of mini golf. If you need to clear your head, visit our round-the-clock fitness center. After your on-site conference, retreat to one of our 353 hotel rooms and suites. Surf the web with free Wi-Fi, or catch an HBO show on the flat-screen HDTV. You can wake up every morning to a hot drink from your in-room coffeemaker. With 15,694 square feet of professional meeting space, Radisson Hotel Louisville North is the largest hotel conference center in southern Indiana. Book one of our rooms or suites for easy access to on-site events, or contact our friendly staff to host your own get-together. Our meeting amenities include free Wi-Fi and full-service catering, perfect for wedding parties, family reunions, and corporate events. Offering the convenience of on-site dining, Champions Grille serves traditional American cuisine in a warm and casual environment. Relish some family time at the breakfast or lunch buffet, or share a beer with business colleagues at dinner. For light bites and a great selection of spirits, stop by our hotel’s Quarter Pole Lounge. Stay at the Radisson to be within easy reach of the Kentucky International Convention Center, the KFC Yum! Center, the Kentucky Exposition Center, and home games at Cardinal Stadium. You can walk along the Ohio River waterfront to admire the Louisville skyline from afar, or you can make the two-minute drive to visit the Bourbon Trail and Museum Row in downtown Louisville. When you want to spend quality time with the kids, take a trip to the impressive Louisville Zoo. Don’t miss these popular attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Elkhart North, IN
description: Situated just off I-80, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Elkhart North, IN places you close to the University of Notre Dame, just a 25-minute drive away, and to the quaint farms and shops of Northern Indiana’s Amish country. Our hotel is located just minutes from the Heritage Trail, one of the most scenic drives in America according to publications such as USA TODAY® and a terrific opportunity to explore classic backroads, quaint main streets, and the scenic north Indiana countryside.After the big game or a drive down the Heritage Trail, return to the hotel to immerse yourself in the hot tub for a soothing soak, lounge by the heated indoor pool, or log a few miles of cardio in the hotel’s fitness center. Then head to your room to catch your favorite TV show before settling down for a good night’s sleep. Each morning, you can brew an in-room cup of coffee and peruse the free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper before heading down to the main dining room to enjoy our complimentary, hot breakfast.Please note that the pool and hot tub are currently closed for maintenance. Unwind from a day on the road or touring campus in one of our inviting rooms or suites, which feature comfortable bedding, a microwave for heating leftovers, and a refrigerator for stowing your favorite beverages. Catch up on the news with our free weekday newspaper while you enjoy a fresh cup of coffee, made right in your room each morning, before heading out to tackle your day. We provide a flexible meeting space with free Wi-Fi and equipment rental, and our staff can recommend catering options. We can also help you communicate the details of your event to each guest with a personalized web page. If you love RV camping, visit the RV/MH Hall of Fame & Museum, six miles from the hotel, to see its unique collection of vintage camping vehicles. Shoppers can drive 15 miles south, via South Main Street, to the Old Bag Factory, a 19th-century building converted into a space for artists, antique sellers, and other local merchants. And, of course, the hallowed campus of the Notre Dame Fighting Irish is approximately 15 miles west. Check out these other attractions in Elkhart, IN:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Evansville, IN
description: Located at the corner of I-69 and Lloyd Expressway, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Evansville, IN offers a convenient stay near the University of Evansville. Our hotel is less than 12 miles from Evansville Regional Airport (EVV) and the headquarters of companies such as Shoe Carnival and Berry Global, making it a top choice for business travelers. For those in town on vacation, the hotel provides easy access to top-rated family-friendly attractions like the USS LST 325 Ship Memorial, Mesker Park Zoo & Botanic Garden, and the Children’s Museum of Evansville, all less than 20 minutes away.After an invigorating morning workout in our fitness center, slow down long enough to enjoy the tasty selections offered at our complimentary, hot breakfast. Each of our 69 rooms and suites is designed to help you feel at home thanks to conveniences like tea and coffee facilities, a microwave, and a refrigerator. Kick back and relax while you stream music with free Wi-Fi or watch your favorite shows on the flat-screen TV with premium cable channels. Host corporate events and training seminars in our hotel's 350-square-foot meeting room designed for a variety of presentations and include features like an LCD TV and a whiteboard. To make your event more inclusive, ask our staff to help you with setting up teleconferencing equipment to connect with off-site colleagues or clients. Those attending from out of town will appreciate our convenient location roughly 10 miles from the EVV airport. Whether you're in town for work or play, there are plenty of interesting things to do in Evansville, like rocking out at a live concert at the Ford Center or trying one’s luck at the Tropicana Evansville Casino. Check out these popular attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Greenfield, IN
description: Enjoy direct access to Indianapolis from the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Greenfield, IN, located just off I-70. Our hotel is only 30 minutes from downtown Indy, where you can cheer on the Indianapolis Colts at Lucas Oil Stadium or watch a NASCAR race at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. If you're traveling with kids, plan a day exploring Indianapolis Zoo & White River Gardens.Before you call it a night, relax in our heated indoor pool. Our fitness center is open 24 hours for your convenience, and free Wi-Fi allows you to share vacation pictures throughout your visit. Start each morning with a delicious meal from the free, hot breakfast and relax by the fire in our lobby while you go over your day’s itinerary. After a day of travel, rest easy in your guest room or suite with a cup of freshly brewed coffee and a free weekday newspaper. Bring your kids’ favorite snacks and use the microwave and fridge to prep a treat before starting a movie night on the flat-screen TV. If you need additional space for your family or group, upgrade to a suite with a sleeper sofa. Free Wi-Fi is available in all accommodations so you can stay in touch with home via social media. Invite your colleagues or friends to a gathering at the Country Inn & Suites, offering a flexible meeting room with free Wi-Fi. Start preparing for the gathering in our business center with a computer and fax, copy, and print services. Give a presentation in our naturally lit event space before sending your attendees off to their relaxing hotel rooms. During your stay in the Indianapolis area, take some time to enjoy Greenfield attractions like Riley Park and Hawk's Tail Golf Club, both located just three miles away. Whether you're in town for a meeting at businesses like Keihin and Precoat Metals or a Colts game at Lucas Oil Stadium, our hotel provides a convenient home base. Devote a fun-filled afternoon to seeing animals at Indianapolis Zoo & White River Gardens or learning about outer space at the Children’s Museum Indianapolis. Check out these nearby attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Indianapolis Airport South, IN
description: Let the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Indianapolis Airport South, IN welcome you to Circle City with a convenient location off I-465, just 10 minutes from Indiana International Airport (IND). The excitement of downtown Indianapolis, home to top attractions like Lucas Oil Stadium and the Indianapolis Zoo & White River Gardens, lies about 20 minutes from the hotel. For some fun outside of the city, sharpen your putting skills at Southern Dunes Golf Course or enjoy the adrenaline-pumping action at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway.After you’ve unpacked your bags, you can take a dip in our indoor pool and hot tub or jump straight into your work in our on-site business center. Here for an athletic tournament? We cater to visiting sports teams with special rates and travel arrangements to your venue. Your team is sure to love our on-site fitness center as well as the laundry facilities to keep uniforms looking fresh after the big game. After cheering on the Colts at Lucas Oil Stadium, relax in one of our comfortable hotel rooms with free Wi-Fi. You can warm up a snack in the microwave to enjoy while you watch the game highlights on an HDTV. For an upgraded stay, book a suite with a romantic whirlpool. Whether you’re hosting a business meeting or exchanging vows, we offer flexible space for up to 80 guests. Amenities like audiovisual equipment and catering services are available to help enhance your gathering. Ask our helpful event staff about special packages for parties, weddings, and sports teams to help ensure your group has an exceptional time. Explore exciting attractions like the Children’s Museum of Indianapolis and Circle Centre Mall in downtown Indianapolis, about 20 minutes from the hotel. You can shop for Colts game-day gear at Greenwood Park Mall or challenge your friends to 18 holes at The Links at Heartland Crossing. Popular nearby attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Indianapolis East, IN
description: At the junction of US Route 40 and I-465 rests the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Indianapolis East, IN. Nestled in the tranquil city of Cumberland, our hotel lies less than seven miles from Children's Museum Indianapolis, the largest children's museum in the world. We're also close to other family-friendly attractions like the Indianapolis Zoo and Greatimes Family Fun Park. Traveling for work? You can attend a conference at the Indiana Convention Center, just 20 minutes away, and impress clients afterward with tickets to heart-pounding games at Lucas Oil Stadium or Bankers Life Fieldhouse.Fuel up for a day of racing fun at Indianapolis Motor Speedway with our free, hot breakfast. Convenient amenities like complimentary parking help you cut down on travel costs, and our scenic outdoor pool beckons you to relax after a long road trip. Corporate guests appreciate our well-appointed business center, perfect for sending emails or putting the finishing touches on presentations. Reserve one of our 93 hotel rooms at the Country Inn & Suites for a restful night's stay just outside of downtown Indy. Each accommodation is equipped with a mini fridge, a microwave, and coffee facilities so you can enjoy your favorite snacks and beverages any time of day. If you're in town on official business, sit down at the in-room work desk and connect to free Wi-Fi. We also have whirlpool suites to make your romantic getaway extra special. Lead a business seminar, host a luncheon, or celebrate a sports victory in our professional event venue. Capable of accommodating up to 70 guests, our meeting space comes with plenty of tables and chairs as well as free Wi-Fi. We also offer a 24-hour business center with a computer and a printer. If you're not sure how to start planning, our staff is always willing to help. Families can find all-day fun at the Indiana State Fairgrounds & Event Center or steer southward on I-465 to explore Greatimes Family Fun Park, a kid-friendly favorite. Plan a trip downtown to catch a Pacers game at Bankers Life Fieldhouse, pet the animals at Indianapolis Zoo, and attend a concert at the Indiana Convention Center. Other attractions in the heart of the city include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Indianapolis South, IN
description: Situated off Interstate 65, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Indianapolis South, IN provides easy access to downtown destinations without the noise of the city. Hop on I-65 to quickly reach the Indiana Convention Center and Lucas Oil Stadium, both less than 15 minutes from the hotel, or to drive your family to the Indianapolis Zoo, just 20 minutes away from our Southport location. If you’re here for the Indy 500, the Speedway is just a 20-minute drive away, and those flying in or out of Indianapolis International Airport (IND) can make the trip in 20–25 minutes.Upon arrival at the hotel, you can grab a free cookie and coffee in our lobby as you check in. Thanks to free Wi-Fi, it’s easy to finalize your plans and stay connected with friends or colleagues. If you want to relax at the hotel, enjoy a swim in our indoor pool. Here for work? Our business center lets you make last-minute changes to presentations or handouts. There’s no need to worry if you get face paint or nacho cheese on your Colts jersey. Simply take advantage of our same-day valet laundry service. Kick your shoes off and relax in one of our guest rooms or suites, which offer free internet access and cable TV with premium channels. You can greet each morning with a cup of coffee and our free, hot breakfast before you head out to your next Indianapolis adventure. If you need to work, we’ve got you covered with in-room work desks. Thanks to our hotel on the south side of Indianapolis, you can enjoy downtown attractions without the hassle of staying in the middle of the city. Explore the vendors at an expo or trade show at the Indiana Convention Center, or take your kids to a dolphin show at the Indianapolis Zoo, both located about 10 miles away. Check out these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Merrillville, IN
description: Located near the junction of I-65 and US Route 30, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Merrillville, IN is the perfect place to discover Lake County’s top attractions, including Brauer Museum of Art and Albanese Candy Factory and Outlet Store. Walk along the shores of Lake Michigan, or take a day trip to Chicago, which is about an hour away. Our hotel puts you minutes from the classical dance performances at the Indiana Ballet Theatre. To watch your favorite players in action, head to Indiana Wesleyan University’s Wildcat Stadium, 15 miles away.Make your own waffles at our free, hot breakfast, and don’t forget to stop by the lobby for complimentary cookies, coffee, and tea, available 24/7. Maintain your routine at the fitness center equipped with ellipticals, treadmills, and weight machines, or take a refreshing dip in the indoor pool. Traveling for business? You can stop by the convenient business center near the lobby where you can check your email or print documents. Return from a Valparaiso University campus tour or a morning jog on the trails of Gabis Arboretum to unwind in one of our modern rooms with a flat-screen TV and a coffeemaker. Connect with folks at home using our free Wi-Fi, and make a snack using the in-room microwave and fridge. Every member of the family is welcome thanks to our pet-friendly rooms. Organize a memorable celebration or successful business function for up to 25 people at our versatile meeting room, conveniently located 20 minutes from the city of Gary and about an hour from downtown Chicago. Facilities and amenities include complimentary coffee and water, free Wi-Fi, and on-site parking. Want to make sure your guests stay informed down to the last detail? Our event team can help you create a web page for the event. It’s easy to explore popular destinations in Greater Chicago’s Lake County when you stay at our hotel in Merrillville, which is just two blocks from the retailers, restaurants, and cinema complex at Southlake Mall. Want to venture out on a day trip to the Windy City or spend a few hours boating on Lake Michigan? Both are about an hour away. If you’re looking to get some fresh air, you can spend time on the lush fairways of Turkey Creek Golf Course or take your canine companion on a hike along Gabis Arboretum’s Bluebird Trail. Be sure to check out these great attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Michigan City, IN
description: Conveniently located off I-94, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Michigan City, IN places you near attractions like Blue Chip Casino and Lighthouse Place Premium Outlets. Just 20 minutes from the hotel, the Indiana Dunes National Park of Lake Michigan draws millions of visitors each year to its world-class beaches. Too cold for swimming at the lake? Let the kids make a splash in our heated indoor pool while you soak in the hot tub.Check the forecast with our free Wi-Fi, and then fuel up with the free, hot breakfast before you head to a University of Notre Dame football game. Keep up with your workout routine in the fitness center so you can treat yourself to complimentary cookies and coffee in the lobby. If you must do work while traveling, visit the on-site business center. Let the kids run wild at Indiana Dunes National Park before crashing on your hotel suite’s sleeper sofa. Every room includes ESPN and HBO for entertainment, and you can stay in touch with friends via the free Wi-Fi. You can keep snacks and drinks for the kids in the refrigerator, and an in-room coffeemaker will help perk you up after a night at Blue Chip Casino. We also offer whirlpool suites for the perfect romantic getaway. Gather with your clients for a business meeting or host a family gathering at the Country Inn & Suites, Michigan City. Our event space can host up to 50 guests, and we offer free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment to enhance your gathering. Our dedicated events team can assist you in aligning all the important details, and we’re happy to offer delicious catering recommendations. When you're not on the sandy beaches of Lake Michigan, visit The Old Lighthouse Museum, home of the oldest lighthouse in Indiana. Afterward, walk next door to the Washington Park Zoo. Both attractions are located just five miles from our hotel. You can also do some bargain hunting at Lighthouse Place Premium Outlets, which boasts more than 120 shops. If you're here for a Notre Dame game, South Bend is 40 miles away. Take time to explore these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Mishawaka, IN
description: Conveniently located off I-80/I-90, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Mishawaka, IN is just east of South Bend and less than five miles from the University of Notre Dame. When you're in town to root for the Fighting Irish, our hotel helps you relax during your downtime with free Wi-Fi. We also offer a free, hot breakfast that fuels your adventures at Potawatomi Zoo and University Park Mall. After a busy day, our heated indoor pool is a great place to take the kids to have some fun, and our fitness center provides an area where you can work out. End your evening by taking your pet for a leisurely stroll around the property, then sink into a Serta Elite® pillowtop mattress for a restful night’s sleep. Prepare snacks and store drinks for the upcoming Fighting Irish football game with a microwave and refrigerator, which are included in each of our guest rooms. After the game, refresh yourself with a free cup of coffee made with your in-room coffeemaker and settle down for a movie on the flat-screen TV. Choose one of our two meeting rooms to host a business or social event. The rooms, which can be combined to offer 1,200 square feet of space, include free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment to ensure presentations are a success. We can also help you with catering recommendations and planning so you can focus on your guest list. Discover a wealth of family-oriented activities within minutes of our hotel, from Fighting Irish athletic events at the University of Notre Dame to biking along the Mishawaka Riverwalk. If you love admiring antique autos, stop by the Studebaker National Museum, about five miles from the hotel, to glimpse presidential carriages and military vehicles. Explore these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Portage, IN
description: Whether you're planning a family vacation on the South Shore of Lake Michigan or visiting local steel mills for business, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Portage, IN offers you a warm welcome. Our location, just off I-94 and less than two miles from Lake Michigan, puts Indiana Dunes state and national parks within easy reach. Planning to fish the lake? Bring your gear to the hotel or visit the nearby Bass Pro Shops before strolling down to Portage Lakefront and Riverwalk’s fishing pier.Start your day with a delicious and complimentary, hot breakfast before you meet with local clients or head into Chicago, less than an hour away. After a busy day, you can unwind with a workout in our fitness center or enjoy the hot tub and indoor pool while the kids splash down the kiddie pool’s waterslide. Grab complimentary cookies and coffee to enjoy while you unwind in the fireside lobby. Recharge for another busy day of fun or business in Portage, Indiana when you choose our modern guest rooms and suites. Drift off to sleep on a comfortable bed after catching the latest HBO movie on a flat-screen TV. Then start your day with a cup of coffee or tea in your room. Traveling with a group? Adjoining rooms will keep you close without compromising your privacy. The Country Inn & Suites, Portage, IN offers a professional meeting space for guests arriving via I-94. Our two event spaces are suitable for groups of 10 to 40 people. And you can count on the free Wi-Fi for your presentation. Our staff is happy to help with setup and can recommend catering options for working meals or snacks between sessions. Set sail from nearby Portage Public Marina on the crystal blue waters of Lake Michigan. Head northwest on I-94 to spend the day exploring all Chicago offers, from Navy Pier to the must-haves of the Magnificent Mile. Or discover the South Shore’s breweries, wineries, and distilleries to taste the best of the Midwest. Families, couples, and solo travelers will enjoy exploring these and other local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Valparaiso, IN
description: At the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Valparaiso, IN, you can make the easy walk across the street to Valparaiso University for Crusaders sporting events, graduations, and more. Be sure to stop by downtown Valpo to shop boutiques or dine at excellent restaurants like Main+Lincoln. Later in the day, make a point of seeing a live show at the Memorial Opera House or the Chicago Street Theatre. If you’re visiting Indiana during warmer weather, don’t miss the beautiful trails at Gabis Arboretum and the thrilling rides at Deep River Waterpark, all a short drive from our hotel. Use the free Wi-Fi to upload photos of your campus visit before relaxing in the indoor pool or hot tub. Maintain your exercise regimen with the help of the fitness center, and start each day with a healthy, energizing meal from the free, hot breakfast. After an exciting day exploring attractions, let your kids enjoy a special cookie from the lobby while you get a cup of coffee or tea. Kick back in a comfortable guest room or suite and watch pre-game coverage on TV or connect to social media with free Wi-Fi. You can store drinks in the fridge and make snacks with the microwave to enjoy while you picnic in downtown Valparaiso’s Central Park. Spacious suites are available with a separate living room and sleeper sofa if you need more space. We also offer extended-stay suites with a dining area, ideal for guests on a long vacation or traveling for business. About a mile from the hotel, downtown Valpo gives you plenty of choices for shopping, dining, and entertainment. Enjoy a cup of coffee while you relax in Central Park and watch the bustle of the city before heading to seasonal events like the Valparaiso Popcorn Festival. You can cheer on the Crusaders at Valparaiso University, across the street, and explore the mesmerizing works at Brauer Museum of Art. Attend a show at Chicago Street Theatre or the Memorial Opera House. Check out these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Ames, IA
description: Whether you’re visiting the campus at Iowa State University (ISU), heading to business meetings, or attending an event or sports tournament, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Ames, IA offers you accommodations within easy reach of I-35 and your daily destinations. Families can visit students at ISU, three miles away, while corporate and leisure travelers appreciate great shopping and dinner options in the Main Street Cultural District, just a 10-minute drive away. You can also explore area attractions like Reiman Gardens, Jack Trice Stadium, and the Octagon Center for the Arts—all just 10 minutes away from the hotel.Our pet-friendly hotel encourages you to relax, thanks to an indoor pool and an inviting outdoor patio. In the mornings, take advantage of our free, hot breakfast. After a day of fun, you can connect to free Wi-Fi to upload photos of your adventures and keep in touch with friends. If work brings you to Ames, take advantage of the business center and on-site event space. Finish up a day of touring ISU by sinking into a Serta Elite® pillowtop mattress in your spacious hotel room or suite. Entertainment and refreshment are always within arm’s reach thanks to free Wi-Fi, premium cable channels, a microwave, and a fridge. Families and groups prefer our spacious suites, which offer amenities like separate living areas, sleeper sofas, dining areas, and whirlpools. Plan a productive business meeting or a beautiful wedding reception at the Country Inn & Suites in Ames. In our flexible meeting room, you can take advantage of audiovisual equipment and free Wi-Fi to ensure the success of your event. We also offer affordable, easy-to-book group accommodations and a customized website to keep your attendees updated on the important details. In addition to all of the entertainment offered at ISU, Ames offers attractions like the Octagon Center for the Arts and more than 50 stores at North Grand Mall. You can spend a day entertaining your kids at Adventureland Park or riding the Boone & Scenic Valley Railroad. The Main Street Cultural District is the ideal spot for an afternoon of shopping and dining. Be sure to check out these area favorites during your stay: By car:From the airport, take Fleur Drive and continue straight for four and a half miles. (The road name will change to Martin Luther King Jr Parkway and then 19th Place). Turn right onto the I-235 E ramp. Drive about six miles and then follow the signs to merge onto I-35 N. Drive about 24 miles and then take Exit 111A. Keep left when the ramp forks and merge onto US-30 W. Almost immediately, take Exit 150 and turn right off the ramp onto S Dayton Avenue. Take the first right onto SE 16th Street. The hotel will be on your left in a little less than a mile. By car:From I-35 N, take Exit 111A. Keep left when the ramp forks and merge onto US-30 W. Almost immediately, take Exit 150 and turn right off the ramp onto S Dayton Avenue. Take the first right onto SE 16th Street. The hotel will be on your left in a little less than a mile.From I-35 S, take Exit 111B and merge onto US-30 W. Almost immediately, take Exit 150 and turn right off the ramp onto S Dayton Avenue. Take the first right onto SE 16th Street. The hotel will be on your left in a little less than a mile. By car:From US-30 E, take Exit 150 and turn left off the ramp onto S Dayton Avenue. Cross the overpass and take the first right onto SE 16th Street. The hotel will be on your left in a little less than a mile.From US-30 W, take Exit 150 and turn right off the ramp onto S Dayton Avenue. Take the first right onto SE 16th Street. The hotel will be on your left in a little less than a mile.

name: Radisson Hotel Ames Conference Center at ISU
description: For a convenient stay near Iowa State University, select Radisson Hotel Ames Conference Center at ISU. South of Highway 30, our hotel is two miles from campus, less than a mile from the ISU Research Park, and only five miles west of I-35. During your stay, you can borrow a complimentary bicycle, helmet, and bicycle lock through the CyBike program to reach the nearby campus or research park. If you’re traveling for work, we offer easy access to dozens of local businesses and world-class research facilities like the National Animal Disease Center and Ames Laboratory. Complete your visit by cheering on the Cyclones at Jack Trice Stadium or experiencing a touring Broadway production at the Iowa State Center.After a campus tour or a research conference, return to the hotel to enjoy dinner on site at Bistro 1864 Restaurant and Bar or relax in our indoor pool. Families can have fun together at the kiddie pool, and the well-equipped fitness center makes it easy to keep up with your workout routine. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout the hotel, and a business center is available. We offer 75 spacious, up-to-date rooms and suites that include a microwave, a refrigerator, and a Keurig® coffeemaker. To enhance your experience with free breakfast and drink vouchers, book a Business Class room. Upgrade to a suite for extra space and enjoy a separate living room and sleeper sofa. Ideal for business meetings, social gatherings, or wedding receptions, our venue can accommodate up to 325 people. Reserve one of four flexible meeting rooms, which include free Wi-Fi and built-in screens. We can set up tables and chairs and coordinate linens and catering services for you.                                     Enjoy a delicious meal delivered to your door with our convenient room service, available during breakfast and dinner hours. Bistro 1864 Restaurant and Bar serves fresh, made-to-order dishes for breakfast and dinner. Choose from a full menu of appetizers, salads, entrées, sides, and desserts, and then complete your meal with a local craft beer from our large selection.If you’re craving a late-night or a mid-afternoon snack, stop by the 24-hour Market next to the front desk. We offer a variety of beverages, including sodas, bottled and sparkling water, sports drinks, iced coffee and tea, as well as packaged meals and sweet or salty treats to take back to your room. We're only two miles from all the attractions at Iowa State University and less than three miles from downtown Ames. Attend a basketball game at Hilton Coliseum, or cheer on your soccer player at Hunziker Youth Sports Complex. The Iowa State Center hosts concerts and theatrical productions, and Reiman Gardens provides a relaxing spot to go for a stroll. Explore these attractions: By car:Turn left onto Airport Road. At the roundabout, exit onto Oakwood Road. Take the first right, and the hotel will be on your left.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Ankeny, IA
description: Whether you’re visiting the Des Moines metro area to tour a college, catch a concert at Wells Fargo Arena, or attend a business conference, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Ankeny, IA provides an ideal home away from home near the Iowa capital.
