In a quiet waterside setting just off I-35, our family-friendly hotel is within a 10-mile drive of thrilling roller coasters at Adventureland Park and the stunning geodesic-domed conservatory at the Greater Des Moines Botanical Garden.On arrival at the hotel, enjoy a warm welcome with free juice and a free bottle of water or beer. After a busy day of sightseeing or meetings, you can recharge with a dip in the indoor pool or a soak in the hot tub. Get your mornings off to a great start with our free, hot breakfast, and be sure to stop by our evening reception, which is held three nights a week. Traveling with a tour group or sports team? Ask about our special group rates. Decorated in soothing neutral tones, our large rooms and suites are equipped with everything you need for a convenient and relaxing stay. On arrival, stock the fridge with drinks and snacks to enjoy while you’re here. You can check your email with free Wi-Fi before stretching out on a plush bed to watch your favorite shows on the 42-inch flat-screen TV. Looking for a venue for a small business meeting, social gathering, or training seminar in the Greater Des Moines area? Book our event space at the Country Inn & Suites and take advantage of audiovisual equipment rental, discount packages for groups, and the help of our knowledgeable staff. We can even create a customized website for your event to keep your guests informed about all the details. A short drive from top family attractions like summertime fun zone Adventureland Park, our vibrant city offers plenty of nearby shopping and dining and a growing number of craft breweries. Check out the local art scene at the Ankeny Art Center or explore independent boutiques and buzzing eateries in the recently developed District at Prairie Trail. Looking to stretch your legs after meetings? Play a round at the 18-hole Otter Creek Golf Course, or take a walk on the extensive network of local hiking and biking trails. Be sure to check out these nearby attractions while you’re in the area:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Omaha Airport, IA
description: Located just two miles from Eppley Airfield (OMA), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Omaha Airport, IA allows travelers quick access to downtown Omaha. If you're on the road with family, check out the Omaha Zoo for a day of excitement or hike the famous Lewis & Clark Trail—both are situated just a couple of miles from our hotel.After a busy day of exploring Carter Lake, rejuvenate with a workout in the fitness center or a dip in the heated indoor pool. Corporate guests can make free copies in our business center and enjoy unlimited coffee 24 hours a day for late-night projects. Feel at home in one of our spacious guest rooms and suites with free Wi-Fi, premium cable TV, and plush bedding. Cribs and rollaway beds are also available if you need them. For a convenient meeting space by the OMA airport, reserve our 600-square-foot conference room. Enhance your gathering with audiovisual equipment and catering services, and ask about special group rates. Situated on the Iowa/Nebraska border, our hotel provides an ideal starting point for enjoying events by the Missouri River. Catch a baseball game at TD Ameritrade Stadium, or attend concerts at the CenturyLink Center, both a mile away. Other popular attractions include the 130-acre Omaha’s Henry Doorly Zoo and Aquarium, the Ameristar Council Bluffs casino, and Lauritzen Gardens, a beautiful botanical oasis. While you're in the area, be sure to visit these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Cedar Falls, IA
description: Whether you're touring the University of Northern Iowa (UNI) as a prospective student or attending a business conference at John Deere in Waterloo, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Cedar Falls, IA is an ideal home base. Choose one of our comfortable hotel rooms or suites to be within walking distance of UNI, home of the Panthers, McLeod Center, and the UNI-Dome. We're also located just minutes from beautiful downtown Cedar Falls, where you can shop, browse museums, and find great restaurants.At the hotel, you can enjoy a stress-free stay thanks to our free, hot breakfast, refreshing indoor pool, free Wi-Fi, and rejuvenating fitness center. Help yourself to our complimentary coffee and cookies in the lobby, or lounge in front of the fireplace lobby. With coin-operated laundry facilities on site, you can return home with a suitcase full of fresh, clean clothes. From vacationing families to business travelers, our rooms and suites provide a welcome retreat for all guests. You can snuggle in your bed and watch a movie on the 32-inch flat-screen HDTV or brew a cup of coffee and peruse the free weekday newspaper. An in-room microwave and a refrigerator ensure that warm snacks and cold beverages are always within reach. From sporting events and theatrical performances to hikes in the great outdoors, Cedar Falls has something for everyone. Find your perfect activity when you stay at the Country Inn & Suites, located just minutes from George Wyth State Park, the Hearst Center, and the Gallagher Bluedorn Performing Arts Center. Check out these exciting attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Clinton, IA
description: Ideally situated just off US 30, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Clinton, Iowa offers everything you need for a productive stay near companies like Purina and Archer Daniels Midland. Take your entire family to local attractions like the Clinton Area Showboat Theatre and The Sawmill Museum, spend the afternoon watching boats sail down the Mississippi River at Lock & Dam 13, or enjoy an afternoon at our hotel soaking in the heated indoor pool and hot tub.Equipped with amenities like free Wi-Fi and a fitness center, our hotel is also proud to welcome your four-legged friend for a small fee. Before you head out every morning, be sure to fuel up at our complimentary, hot breakfast. Wind down after a full day of exploration or business meetings in one of our comfortable rooms or suites. Sip a cup of coffee from the coffeemaker, pop a snack in the microwave, and relax in front of the TV with HBO. Families with children love Clinton's wide variety of historical attractions, like the George M. Curtis Mansion and The Sawmill Museum. After a meeting, take advantage of our convenient location to explore outdoor activities at spots like Valley Oaks Golf Course. Be sure to check out these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Des Moines West, IA
description: Kick back and relax at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Des Moines West, IA, and enjoy modern, comfortable hotel rooms and suites with microwaves and refrigerators for your added convenience. Our suburban Clive location, right off interstates 35 and 80 and just west of downtown Des Moines, provides easy access to UnityPoint Health, MercyOne hospital, Drake University, and the Wells Fargo Arena. Find shopping, dining, and entertainment at Jordan Creek Town Center, located just minutes away.Fuel up with a free, hot breakfast each morning and research top local attractions using free Wi-Fi. After a fun day in the city, enjoy a refreshing dip in the indoor pool or a soothing soak in the hot tub. Reserve a beautifully appointed room or suite at the Country Inn & Suites. Unwind after a day of business meetings or sightseeing with your favorite show on our 32-inch TV, a snack warmed up in the microwave, and a cold beverage from the fridge. Sleep like a baby on a Serta Elite® pillowtop mattress and wake up to freshly brewed coffee from the in-room coffeemaker. The Country Inn & Suites, Des Moines West offers 1,000 square feet of event space capable of accommodating up to 100 guests. Choose from four seating arrangements to optimize your event and take advantage of modern amenities that include an LCD projector and free Wi-Fi. We’ll assist with your catering needs or audiovisual equipment rentals. Clive offers a peaceful suburban atmosphere and easy access to downtown Des Moines. Golf enthusiasts can take in the gorgeous fairways and play 18 challenging holes at Des Moines Country Club. If you're visiting with family, take the kids to see lions, giraffes, and red pandas at Blank Park Zoo. Other local favorites include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Coralville, IA
description: Centrally located off I-80 near downtown Iowa City and the University of Iowa, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Coralville, IA is the perfect gateway to popular local attractions. Catch University of Iowa games at Carver-Hawkeye Arena or Kinnick Stadium. You can also enjoy easy access to Coral Ridge Mall and The Iowa Children's Museum, both about a mile from the hotel.After a full day of activities or business meetings, relax in the hotel’s indoor pool and hot tub or get a great workout in the fitness center. Be sure to stop by the lobby anytime for free cookies, tea, or coffee, and relax by the fire pit. Our pet-friendly hotel rooms and suites offer convenient amenities to help you unwind and rejuvenate. After a fun day of activities in Iowa City, kick back and relax in your comfortable bed while watching an HBO movie on the 32-inch flat-screen TV. Hungry for a snack? Pop some popcorn in the handy microwave and grab a cold beverage from the fridge. After a great night’s rest, enjoy a hot cup of coffee from the in-room coffeemaker before heading out for the day. Host a variety of events for up to 80 guests in our meeting space. Make your celebration extra special with audiovisual tools and free Wi-Fi. If you're visiting with a sports team, take advantage of the exceptional benefits we offer as a Radisson Sports Approved hotel. Shop for deals at Coral Ridge Mall, less than five minutes away or venture a little farther to the Tanger Outlets for name brands at affordable prices. For an exciting night out, make your way to Iowa City's inviting downtown. You can also check out these local attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel & Conference Center Coralville - Iowa City
description: Radisson Hotel & Conference Center Coralville - Iowa City is conveniently located for business and vacation travel as well as trips to the University of Iowa. Our hotel just off I-80 places you 10 minutes from downtown and close to attractions such as Iowa River Landing, Coral Ridge Mall, and the Iowa Children’s Museum. For no-stress transportation, take our free shuttle to destinations within a five-mile radius. If you’re traveling for work, our business center is open 24 hours a day.Our contemporary rooms and suites provide comfort and space to relax. A complimentary breakfast is included in your room rate, so you can fuel up for the day ahead. After a session in our meeting venue, you can swim in our indoor pool, soak in the hot tub, or dine at Twelve01 Kitchen and Tap, the on-site restaurant and bar. Room service is available during breakfast and dinner. Visit our snack shop for cold drinks, microwavable meals, chips, candy, and more. Get a good night’s rest when you settle into our comfortable beds in contemporary rooms and suites. Free Wi-Fi will keep you connected to work or family and friends. Use the convenient microwave, mini fridge, and in-room coffeemaker to feel at home. When you need more space, choose a suite with a separate living room. We also offer accessible options. With 6,500 square feet of event space, Radisson Hotel & Conference Center Coralville - Iowa City is well suited for wedding receptions and business meetings for up to 400 people, small gatherings for a dozen or fewer, and everything in between. Ideal for corporate functions, our six venues can make your presentation more engaging with features such as free Wi-Fi, a stage with a podium and a microphone, a sound system, and a projector screen.If you’re planning a grand wedding reception, look no further than the elegant Kinnick Ballroom. Our event coordinators can help arrange every detail, from tables and chairs to linens, china, catering, and decorations.                                     Want to enjoy a relaxing morning or a quiet night on your own? Order room service for breakfast or dinner.                                 Hotel guests and members of the public can enjoy classic Midwestern American cooking for breakfast, lunch, or dinner at Twelve01 Kitchen and Tap. Treat a colleague to one of our happy hour specials. From the signature Twelve01 burger to the New York strip, delicious food makes this casual steakhouse a great hangout for friends and families. Our hotel is 10 minutes from downtown Iowa City and close to some of the area’s best shopping, entertainment, and sports venues. Check out the arts-and-crafts style clubhouse after golfing at Brown Deer Golf Club. Ride our complimentary shuttle to attractions within five miles of the hotel:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Council Bluffs, IA
description: Conveniently connected to the Mid-America Center, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Council Bluffs, IA provides you with direct access to world-class concerts and conventions. If you’re feeling lucky, head across the street to Horseshoe Council Bluffs casino or venture to the Harrah’s and Ameristar casinos, both situated less than five minutes from the hotel. For family-friendly fun, don’t miss Omaha’s Old Market, Lauritzen Gardens, and Henry Doorly Zoo and Aquarium. Our hotel is also within walking distance of great restaurants and shops, including Bass Pro Shops.Whether you’re traveling for business or pleasure, you can enjoy an array of amenities for a more relaxing stay. Take advantage of free Wi-Fi to buy concert tickets or browse the internet. After a day of fun, unwind with a dip in the indoor pool. Wake up to a free, hot breakfast daily, and enjoy complimentary cookies, coffee, and tea in the lobby whenever you pass through. Relax in a spacious room or suite, equipped with thoughtful amenities like a coffeemaker, a fridge, and a microwave. After catching up on current events with a free weekday newspaper or free Wi-Fi, settle in for a good night’s sleep on a Serta Elite® pillowtop mattress. The Country Inn & Suites offers two versatile event rooms: a boardroom that can accommodate eight people and a larger room for up to 50 guests. Both spaces are equipped with audiovisual technology and free Wi-Fi to ensure presentations are a success. Take advantage of our catering services and direct connection to the Mid-America Center as you plan a conference, corporate retreat, or social event. Ready to try your luck at the slots or on the game tables? Council Bluffs is home to some of the country’s best casinos, and our hotel is within minutes of several of them. After hitting the jackpot at Harrah’s or Ameristar, treat yourself to a round of golf at a nearby course, and then take a behind-the-scenes tour of your favorite animal exhibits at Omaha’s Henry Doorly Zoo and Aquarium. Check out these Council Bluffs attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Davenport, IA
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Davenport, IA is well positioned off I-80 and places you in the Quad Cities metropolitan area near popular destinations like Bettendorf and Rock Island. You can see top acts perform or attend graduation ceremonies at the TaxSlayer® Center, about 15 minutes away, or purchase a new outfit at NorthPark Mall, just five minutes from the hotel. If you’re in the area scouting out schools, we are within 10 miles of several top-notch universities like Augustana College, St. Ambrose University, and Palmer College of Chiropractic.We make you feel welcome the moment you arrive by offering free cookies and coffee in the lobby. Once you’ve unpacked, go for a refreshing swim in our heated indoor pool or lounge by the fireplace while touching base with loved ones using free Wi-Fi. As long as our hotel is your home, you have complimentary access to the nearby YMCA so you can keep up with your fitness routine. No matter what brings you to the Quad Cities area, you’ll feel at home in our rooms and suites equipped with high-quality bedding, microwaves, refrigerators, and premium cable channels like CNN, ESPN, and HBO. Traveling with your pet? We also welcome your four-legged friends. Whether your ideal downtime includes go-karting at Michael’s Fun World, window shopping at NorthPark Mall, or stopping to smell the roses at Vander Veer Botanical Park, the Country Inn & Suites places you close to many of the top destinations around the Quad Cities area. Highlights near our hotel include:

name: Radisson Quad City Plaza
description: Book your next stay at Radisson Quad City Plaza in Davenport, Iowa. Our hotel is centrally located near the riverfront area, within easy reach of top downtown attractions. Take our convenient skywalk to the historic Adler Theatre and the expansive RiverCenter to catch concerts, shows, and trade conventions. If you have some time, walk a couple of blocks to see the impressive collection at the Figge Art Museum. You can also stroll the nearby Riverfront Trail to reach green spaces beside the Mississippi River or catch a baseball game at Modern Woodmen Park. If you need to catch a flight, Quad City International Airport (MLI) is less than 20 minutes away.After a day of sightseeing or business meetings, head to the hotel’s six-story tropical atrium for dinner and drinks at our on-site restaurant and lounge. If you need to unwind while you’re here, our heated indoor pool is the perfect spot, and our fitness center enables you to maintain your workout routine while you’re in town. Free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel lets you keep up with family or with work while you travel. Reserve one of our 221 rooms and suites with thoughtful amenities including work desks and free Wi-Fi. Relax with down pillows and down-filled comforters as you watch TV or play music from your phone on the iHome docking station. Some of our rooms also offer views of the spectacular Mississippi River. Make your corporate meeting, social gala, or wedding one to remember in our elegant event facilities. We offer 12,000 square feet of space with a variety of options and amenities to meet your specific needs. Take advantage of comprehensive meeting packages as well as full-service catering and professional planning assistance.Our hotel is an ideal setting for wedding receptions and rehearsal dinners. Delight your guests with cocktails and hors d’oeuvres in our stunning atrium before sitting down to an expertly prepared banquet in the Quad City Ballroom. Head to Café One Eleven in the atrium for breakfast, lunch, or dinner, and enjoy tasty appetizers, specialty sandwiches and burgers, or pizzas cooked in our 500-degree brick oven. After dinner, you can visit the Café One Eleven Lounge to savor fine wines and specialty cocktails as you chat with colleagues or relax to the gentle sounds of the indoor waterfall. If you’d rather enjoy a private meal or need to make an early start, you can conveniently order a meal from our in-room dining menu. The largest of the Quad Cities, Davenport is known for its vibrant downtown and inspiring views of the Mississippi River. From our hotel, you can take the scenic Riverfront Trail and walk to LeClaire Park or to Modern Woodmen Park, where the Quad Cities River Bandits play baseball. Notable attractions include: By car:From the airport exit, turn left onto Airport Road, and drive for 2.5 miles. Turn left to take the ramp onto I-280 W, and drive for 3.4 miles until Exit 11B. Take the exit and merge onto IL-92 E. Drive 4.2 miles and turn right onto 16th Street. Immediately take the ramp on the right to merge onto 15th Street and cross Centennial Bridge. Then turn right onto W 2nd Street. The hotel will be on your right in less than half a mile.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Decorah, IA
description: Ideally situated just off US Highway 52 and Iowa Highway 9, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Decorah, IA offers business and leisure travelers a comfortable home base and easy access to the area's best attractions. You can visit your student at Luther College, take your kids to the Laura Ingalls Wilder Park & Museum, or marvel at the vast cavern at Decorah Ice Cave State Preserve. Start your day with a meal at our complimentary, hot breakfast, served on real diningware, and then end each evening with a walk on the serene Trout Run Trail, which passes right in front of our hotel.In addition to offering free Wi-Fi, we are proud to have the area's largest heated indoor pool and hot tub to help you and your family relax after a busy day. If you’re visiting for work, you can use our business center to print out notes for your next meeting. Craving a quick pick-me-up? Stop by our lobby for complimentary cookies and coffee, available 24 hours a day. We also offer complimentary passes to Anytime Fitness, status match with competitor rewards programs, and complimentary beverages and snacks for Radisson Rewards members. Each of our spacious rooms and suites includes a microwave and a refrigerator, making it easy to enjoy your favorite snacks and drinks whenever you want. A 42-inch flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi, and a free weekday newspaper keep everyone in your crew entertained, and an in-room coffeemaker enables you to enjoy a cup of coffee anytime you crave a caffeine boost. Give your kids entertainment and education all at once with visits to area museums like the Laura Ingalls Wilder Park & Museum and Vesterheim, which features exhibits on local history and Norwegian-American life. Want to get outdoors? Plan a canoe trip on the beautiful Upper Iowa River or go golfing. You can see the river from nearly every hole at Oneota Golf & Country Club, located about four miles from our hotel. Be sure to visit these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dubuque, IA
description: Located off Highway 20, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dubuque, IA is just five miles from downtown businesses, entertainment venues, and museums. You can browse Iowa’s oldest farmers market, catch a concert at the Five Flags Center, or learn about the region’s history and wildlife at the National Mississippi River Museum & Aquarium. Out-of-state guests appreciate our hotel’s proximity to Dubuque Regional Airport (DBQ), about 20 minutes away via main highways. Visiting John Deere Dubuque Works? Our hotel is less than seven miles away.In the morning, hit our well-equipped fitness center to work up an appetite for our complimentary, hot breakfast. When you return from a busy day of appointments or sightseeing, enjoy a refreshing swim in the indoor pool. From free high-speed internet access and off-street parking to complimentary coffee and cookies, everything at the Country Inn & Suites has been designed to make your stay convenient and comfortable. Whether you’re on a family getaway or a business trip, each of our 69 large rooms and suites helps you relax and work during your travels with convenient amenities like coffeemakers and free Wi-Fi. You can keep up with your favorite TV shows on 70 cable channels, including HBO, and stock the in-room refrigerator with drinks and snacks. Bringing along a furry friend? Request one of our pet-friendly rooms. If you’re looking for a convenient meeting venue close to the DBQ airport and downtown Dubuque, our 780-square-foot conference room is the perfect solution. Host up to 25 attendees in our versatile space, which includes free Wi-Fi and the option to reserve audiovisual equipment. From summer concerts at Dubuque Arboretum and Botanical Gardens to skiing at Sundown Mountain Resort, there are plenty of activities near our hotel to keep your family entertained year-round. Just a 10-minute drive away, downtown Dubuque is home to top-notch museums, craft breweries, and Bluff Street specialty shops. Take a riverboat cruise along the Mississippi, or admire a view spanning three states at riverside Eagle Point Park. Be sure to check out these local highlights during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fort Dodge, IA
description: Conveniently located on Business Highway 20 near Fort Dodge Regional Airport (FOD), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fort Dodge, IA is the perfect starting point for your Mineral City adventures. Learn more about the history of the region at The Fort Museum and Frontier Village, or enjoy a fall afternoon at the hotel after apple-picking at The Community Orchard. Business travelers appreciate being within minutes of corporate offices for companies like Georgia-Pacific, CertainTeed, and Land O’Lakes. Visiting with a sports group? Attend tournaments and practices at the Rogers Sports Complex or catch a college game at Dodger Stadium. Both are less than a 10-minute drive from the hotel.During your stay, take some time to unwind in our indoor pool and hot tub, or grab a workout in our fitness center. You can stay connected with free Wi-Fi and keep your whole crew fed with our free, hot breakfast. Traveling sports teams enjoy convenient amenities like our on-site laundry facilities, which make it easy to freshen up uniforms between games. Our large and inviting guest rooms and suites offer plenty of space to lounge with your family or finish up important work presentations. Make yourself at home during your trip with amenities like free Wi-Fi and coffeemakers. You can keep your favorite beverages chilled in the refrigerator and warm up restaurant leftovers using the microwave. For a convenient meeting space less than 15 minutes from Fort Dodge Regional Airport, reserve our well-appointed conference room at the Country Inn & Suites. Be sure to ask our knowledgeable staff for information on audiovisual equipment rental and catering recommendations to ensure your event goes off without a hitch. Get a primer on the city’s roots as a military post at The Fort Museum and Frontier Village, and then take a stroll around the elegant homes of the Oak Hills Historic District. Nearby, you can sample locally brewed beer in downtown tap rooms and see work by Iowa artists at the Blanden Art Museum. Kids love the bumper boats, go-karts, and miniature golf at the Fort Frenzy family entertainment center, just a 10-minute walk from the hotel. Check out these area attractions and activities:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Grinnell, IA
description: The "Jewel of the Prairie," Grinnell offers guests both a quiet Midwestern getaway in Iowa and the culturally elevated experiences of a college town. Book your stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Grinnell, IA for quick access to Interstate 80, downtown restaurants, and local businesses. Start your mornings with our free, hot breakfast and a workout in the hotel fitness center. Then, visit Grinnell College, a gem just three miles away that helped MSN.com name our town one of North America's Top Ten Best College Towns.We welcome traveling sports teams and groups, too. During your stay, enjoy our heated indoor pool and take advantage of our convenient laundry facilities. Our guests also appreciate free Wi-Fi, weekday USA TODAY® newspapers, and unlimited coffee. After you’ve spent a day exploring historic Grinnell or visiting the local college, you can rest comfortably in large, well-appointed rooms and suites. We provide comfortable bedding, workstations, and handy appliances, so don’t forget your snacks. Our guests also appreciate daily housekeeping service and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. For a convenient meeting space across from Grinnell Regional Airport (GGI), reserve our hotel conference room. Host up to 40 guests and allow us to assist with catering and audiovisual enhancements to support your gathering. A small, thriving town in central Iowa, Grinnell combines Midwestern charm with metropolitan culture. Comprising a compact 5.6 square miles, Grinnell is small enough to explore easily, but there’s so much to do, from touring Grinnell College to exploring the city’s surprisingly chic art scene. While you’re visiting, make sure to include these attractions on your itinerary:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Indianola, IA
description: Located off Highway 65 just 30 minutes south of Iowa’s capital, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Indianola, IA provides a comfortable getaway in Greater Des Moines. In the area for the annual National Balloon Classic? Our hotel is minutes from the action at Memorial Balloon Field and the National Balloon Museum. You can plan a day trip to Des Moines to see the cute animals at Blank Park Zoo, the inspiring works at the Des Moines Art Center, and the races at Prairie Meadows.Start your day with a workout in the fitness center and a hearty meal from our free, hot breakfast before you tour the campus of Simpson College. Unwind in the indoor pool and hot tub, and then gather with friends around our patio’s fire pit. For your convenience, we offer an on-site business center, free Wi-Fi, and event facilities. You can make yourself at home in a spacious room that features a flat-screen TV with HBO. Use free Wi-Fi to upload your pics of beautiful Buxton Park to social media. Afterward, treat yourself to a cold drink from the fridge or warm up a snack in the microwave. You can upgrade to a suite to enjoy extra space and a sleeper sofa. Need space for a business seminar, team huddle, or family reunion? We offer a versatile meeting room with necessities such as free Wi-Fi and a wall-mounted TV with laptop connectivity. Off-site catering options are available if you need a working lunch or refreshments for your guests. Our staff stands ready to assist you with the details—all you have to do is ask. From the tree-lined path of Summerset Trail to the vineyards of Summerset Winery, outdoor attractions in Indianola abound. You can take on the 18-hole course at The Legacy Golf Club before seeing a show at Des Moines Metro Opera or attending an event at Blake Fieldhouse. Prospective college students appreciate being just a five-minute drive from Simpson College. Nearby attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Mason City, IA
description: Halfway between Des Moines and Minneapolis, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Mason City, IA is a great home base for visiting attractions like Clear Lake, The Music Man Square, and Stockman House. We’re also the closest hotel to the North Iowa Events Center, making it easy to visit the North Iowa Fair, catch a hockey game, or watch a roller derby bout.Start your mornings with an energizing meal from the free, hot breakfast before taking the kids to splash around in the heated indoor pool. After a busy day exploring local attractions, you can upload vacation photos with the free Wi-Fi in your room and unwind with a book. If workouts are part of your daily routine, visit our on-site fitness center to stay on track. Need a snack or a caffeine boost? Stop by the fireplace lobby for a free cup of coffee and a cookie any time of the day or night. Wake up with a fresh cup of coffee in your room or suite while you peruse the free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper. A work desk provides you an easy place to focus on your itinerary or browse online using free Wi-Fi. Families enjoy our variety of suites, which may include extra space to stretch out, a separate bedroom, and a sleeper sofa. Whirlpool suites are also available for a memorable weekend getaway with a loved one. Reserve the flexible meeting facilities at the Country Inn & Suites for your next special occasion or business function. Audiovisual equipment and catering options are available to make your gathering a standout affair. Take advantage of our location within walking distance of the North Iowa Events Center as well as our 24-hour business center and free Wi-Fi. Plan an exciting vacation to the “River City” and stay at the Country Inn & Suites, Mason City near the Winnebago River. Visit the 57-acre East Park to enjoy river access, picnic areas, and the wooden train and maze at Prairie Playground. You can explore the city’s artistic heritage with a visit to Music Man Square, Clear Lake Arts Center, and Frank Lloyd Wright’s Stockman House. Nearby attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Northwood, IA
description: Located at the top of the state just 10 miles south of the Minnesota border, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Northwood, IA offers you direct access to the area’s prime entertainment destination: Diamond Jo Casino. Whether you’re planning to test Lady Luck in the gaming area or attending a concert, you’ll appreciate being able to enter the casino without going outside our hotel’s front doors. Our location just off I-35 offers you easy access to wherever your travels take you; Minneapolis is two hours north and Des Moines is two hours south of the hotel.If you have a successful run at the tables, you can secure your winnings in one of our safe-deposit boxes. Need to unwind? Our fitness center and indoor pool are ready to help you de-stress. You’ll feel good about saving your dollars by enjoying the free, hot breakfast, fresh cookies in the lobby, ample free parking, and a free weekday newspaper. Business travelers appreciate our complimentary coffee and a business center for last-minute projects. Our sizable guest rooms and suites provide plenty of space for road warriors or the entire family, including your pets under 20 pounds. We’re pleased to provide cribs or rollaway beds if you request them. Thoughtful amenities, such as an iron, a hair dryer, and a full-length mirror, help ensure you’re always looking your best. If you need a meeting room for 40 guests, ask us about our 696-square-foot event space. It’s a smart choice for business and social gatherings. Our free parking and easy access to I-35 will be appreciated by your guests. In between your meeting sessions, Diamond Jo Casino offers thrilling entertainment. Our staff can help you arrange catering services for meeting breaks or working luncheons and dinners. Many of our visitors plan to hit the casino when visiting Northwood, but there’s more to do than just playing poker. Our gentle rolling hills make outdoor activities like golf at Northwood Country Club, hiking in Ochee Yahola Park, or hunting at Pheasant Links a must-do. And don’t miss these attractions while you're in town:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Pella, IA
description: Experience “a touch of Holland” when you stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Pella, IA. You can find Pella’s charming town square just a mile from the hotel. Admire the Old World architecture and see the Molengracht plaza, which was built as a replica of authentic Dutch canals. Stop by Vermeer Windmill to see the tallest working windmill in the United States, or visit your favorite student at Central College, just four minutes from the hotel. Racing fans can enjoy visits to the nearby Knoxville Raceway and Iowa Speedway.After a day of swimming at Lake Red Rock, unwind with a relaxing session in the sauna or a soak in the hot tub. If you’re trying to stay on top of work while traveling, make a trip to our well-equipped business center. Known for forgetting to pack the basics? We will happily provide you with a supply of items through our Did You Forget? Program. Make the most of your stay in Pella in one of our spacious rooms and suites. Take advantage of an in-room microwave and refrigerator to enjoy snacks and beverages while catching your favorite shows on the flat-screen TV. In the morning, sip on a fresh cup of coffee while you peruse the free weekday newspaper. Reserve our flexible meeting room to host your next bridal shower, birthday party, or business seminar. Our dedicated meeting coordinator is happy to assist you with details like catering and creating a personalized web page for your event. Whether you’re in town to tour Central College or coast down the waterslides at Pella Aquatic Center, you won’t run out of fun things to do during your stay. Hit the links for a leisurely round of golf at Bos Landen Golf Club and then head to the Iowa Speedway for an unforgettable race. If you’re a history buff, there are plenty of things to see at Molengracht and the Vermeer Windmill. Don’t miss out on these area attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Waterloo, IA
description: Located off Highway 20, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Waterloo, IA provides guests with a convenient location near Waterloo Regional Airport (ALO) and downtown Cedar Falls. Business travelers can attend seminars and events at Five Sullivan Brothers Convention Center, just three miles away, and families can make a splash at Lost Island Waterpark, just four minutes from the hotel. For a fun night out with friends or colleagues, pick out a new outfit from Crossroads Mall and then try your luck on the slots and tables at nearby Isle Casino.Keep your group fueled each morning at our free, hot breakfast with a selection of fluffy scrambled eggs and homemade golden waffles. Get your daily workout in at our on-site fitness center or heated indoor pool. Visiting for work? Corporate travelers appreciate our 24-hour business center, perfect for putting the finishing touches on a presentation. Rest comfortably in our spacious hotel rooms and suites, each furnished with a Serta Elite® pillowtop mattress and an HDTV with cable channels. You can cut down on travel costs by packing your favorite snacks to store or heat in the refrigerator and microwave. Hosting a family gathering, a team strategy session, or an important celebration in Waterloo? The Country Inn & Suites offers a convenient meeting venue for up to 40 guests just minutes from the ALO airport. Allow our friendly staff to set up the room according to your specifications, and ask about audiovisual equipment rentals to enhance your gathering. Our hotel is situated just two miles south of downtown Waterloo, where you can catch a Black Hawks hockey game at Young Arena. Take the kids for a picnic at George Wyth State Park or to a rodeo at the National Cattle Congress. You can also visit renowned cultural sites like the Snowden House, one of five sites that make up the Grout Museum District. Don't miss these other local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Kansas City at Village West, KS
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Kansas City at Village West, KS is the perfect home base for your visit to the 1,500-acre dining and entertainment complex of Village West. At this popular destination, you can find shopping and recreational venues like Kansas Speedway, Hollywood Casino, Legends Outlets, and T-Bones Stadium. If you’re more of an art or history buff, you can hop on nearby I-70 and head over to visit downtown attractions such as The Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art or the National WWI Museum and Memorial, about 20 minutes away. Take advantage of our complimentary shuttle to enjoy stress-free travel to attractions within a five-mile radius of the hotel.Start every morning with our free, hot breakfast, which features items like homemade waffles and scrambled eggs. After some retail therapy or a day at the races, you can unwind in the hotel’s hot tub or heated indoor pool. If you’re here on business, take advantage of the on-site meeting room, computer, and copier services.Free Shuttle Service Hours:Mon-Fri (Morning): 6:00-9:00 AMMon-Fri (Afternoon): 4:00-8:00 PMSat: 4:00-8:00 PMThere is no shuttle service on Sunday.  Hang out in one of our spacious rooms or suites after a day of exploring Kansas City. An in-room microwave and refrigerator allow you to enjoy your favorite snacks and beverages while you’re away from home. In the mornings, you can catch the news on the flat-screen TV while you brew a fresh cup of coffee right in your room. Host your next business seminar or personal celebration in our convenient and flexible meeting room. Allow our professional staff to provide you with access to audiovisual equipment, catering recommendations, and a personalized web page for your event, and be sure to ask about our accommodations if you have guests from out of town. Our convenient location off I-70 puts you a little over 15 miles from downtown Kansas City and just steps away from main attractions in Village West. Whether you’re here on business or vacation, make time for these popular destinations during your visit: By car: Exit the airport using Cookingham Drive, which turns into NW 120th Street. After about 2.5 miles, take the ramp on the right to merge onto I-29 S. Drive almost six miles and then take Exit 98. Merge onto MO-152 W and drive for five miles. Turn right onto the ramp to I-435 S and take the interstate until Exit 14B (about 12 miles). Turn right off the ramp onto Parallel Parkway. In about 0.5 miles, turn left onto Village West Parkway, and shortly afterward, take the first right onto Stadium Drive. The hotel entrance will be on your left, right after you pass T-Bones Ballpark. By car:Take Exit 410 and turn right (from I-70 W) or left (from I-70 E) onto N 110th Street toward Kansas Speedway. Drive 1.5 miles and turn right onto State Avenue. After one mile, turn left onto N 110th Street, and take the first right onto Stadium Drive (in 0.2 miles). The hotel entrance will be on your right in 350 feet.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lawrence, KS
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lawrence, KS offers easy access to colleges, event venues, and shopping destinations. From our hotel, you can easily tour the University of Kansas or Haskell Indian Nations University, attend the Douglas County Fair, and then do some shopping in historic downtown Lawrence. After a day of exploring Lawrence, you can relax in our indoor pool or enjoy a snack in the comfort of your room. Each of our rooms provides a microwave and a refrigerator as well as free Wi-Fi.If you’re traveling for work, take care of assignments in our business center while sipping a complimentary cup of coffee and nibbling a free cookie. We also offer a well-equipped fitness center, free parking, and coin-operated laundry facilities. The Country Inn & Suites features 89 rooms and suites, each equipped with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV to help you unwind after a day of touring nearby colleges. If you’re hungry in between meals, grab a cold drink from the refrigerator and heat up a snack in the microwave. Conveniently located near the Douglas County Fairgrounds, East Hills Business Park, and Lawrence VenturePark, our hotel’s 775-square-foot meeting room can accommodate up to 70 guests for conferences or social events. Arrange the tables and chairs to best meet your needs, bring in your own food and drinks to set up in the designated area, and rent a projector and a screen for a smooth, efficient meeting. If you love sports, catch a basketball game at Allen Fieldhouse, a football game at Memorial Stadium, or a track meet at Rock Chalk Park. The Country Inn & Suites also lies less than two miles from Haskell Indian Nations University, a tribal university dedicated to serving Native American students. Other attractions include:

name: Radisson Hotel Lenexa Overland Park
description: Ideally positioned off 95th Street and I-35, Radisson Hotel Lenexa Overland Park offers expansive conference facilities just 20 minutes from Kansas City attractions and corporations. It’s easy to access businesses like Amazon, Sprint, and Farmers Insurance. After a board meeting or training seminar, explore the vibrant nightlife throughout the Kansas City Power & Light District. Take some time off to catch the big game at Sprint Center or catch a 3D movie on the Extreme Screen at historic Union Station.A business center and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel make it easy to stay on top of work. Squeeze in a workout in our fitness center, and then relax in our hot tub or heated indoor pool. Our on-site RBG Bar & Grill offers breakfast and dinner, or you can order room service in the evening. Each of our 297 contemporary hotel rooms and suites offers premium bedding, a mini refrigerator, and a microwave, perfect for relaxing with a snack after attending meetings or cheering on the Kansas City Royals. Reserve a Business Class room for a comfortable workspace with a desk and additional perks like complimentary breakfast and drink vouchers. Boasting almost 18,000 square feet of meeting facilities, our hotel is ideal for hosting events with Kansas City businesses. Reserve the elegant ballroom and beautiful indoor atrium for a special banquet or wedding reception. You and your event attendees can enjoy free Wi-Fi access and a great location in Overland Park.                                     If you’d prefer to eat in the privacy of your comfortable room, order room service for dinner.                                 Located on site at the Radisson, RBG Bar & Grill serves fresh American cuisine made to order. Stop by in the morning to browse the expansive breakfast buffet, and then return for dinner to enjoy classic dishes paired with expertly mixed cocktails from the restaurant’s bar. Our hotel lies within walking distance of Oak Park Mall and only a short drive from local attractions like the Legler Barn Museum, the Nerman Museum of Contemporary Art, and Overland Park Convention Center. You can explore the Kansas City metro area, a 20-minute drive away, and these popular destinations:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Salina, KS
description: Located off I-135 a few miles south of I-70, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Salina, KS offers a comfortable retreat for guests visiting the heartland. The bustling college town of Salina is home to Kansas Wesleyan University and Kansas State Polytechnic, both within three miles of the hotel. We're also less than an eight-minute drive from Salina Regional Airport (SLN) and corporations like Signify, PKM Steel Service, and Salina Vortex CorporationGet a strong start to every day with a workout in the fitness center and a filling meal from the free, hot breakfast. After working hard in the business center, stop by the lobby for free cookies and coffee. Don’t forget to pack your swimsuit so you and your family can splash around the indoor pool and hot tub. Feel at home in our spacious hotel rooms and suites, which include a workstation and free Wi-Fi. After a long drive on I-135, you can unwind with your favorite TV show while you heat up a snack in the microwave. Brew yourself a cup of hot coffee and keep drinks for your whole family chilled in the fridge. Our spacious suites include a separate living room and sleeper sofa, perfect for guests traveling with kids or friends. For a versatile meeting room just two miles from the SLN airport, host your event of up to 60 guests at the Country Inn & Suites. You can enhance your gathering with audiovisual equipment, local catering, a free personalized web page, and the help of our professional staff. The Country Inn & Suites offers an unbeatable location, whether you're in the area to visit companies like Exide Technologies or attend a concert at Tony‘s Pizza Events Center. Your kids will love seeing the kangaroos at Rolling Hills Zoo and racing go-karts at Jumpin’ Joe’s Family Fun Center. Explore local history at the Smoky Hill Museum before touring the kid-friendly Salina Art Center. Must-see local attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Topeka West, KS
description: Situated at the intersection of I-470 and I-70, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Topeka West, KS is five miles from Washburn University, Old Town, and the Stormont Vail Event Center. If you're traveling with kids, make the two-mile trek to Gage Park for family-friendly stops like the Topeka Zoo and Kansas Children's Discovery Center. NASCAR fans appreciate the quick 11-mile drive to Heartland Park Topeka, which is also right beside Topeka Regional Airport (FOE). On a work trip? Our hotel is just minutes from nearly 30 area businesses and several major medical facilities.During your stay, allow us to help you feel at home with amenities like free Wi-Fi, free cookies in the lobby, and a pet-friendly policy that ensures no family members have to stay behind. When you need to unwind, take advantage of our fitness center and heated indoor pool with waterfalls. We also offer free on-site parking, and every guest is treated to our free, hot breakfast each morning. There's plenty of space for the entire family in our large guest rooms and suites, and you can request cribs and rollaway beds for your little ones. Put a show on the LCD TV for the kids to enjoy while you check in with friends via the free Wi-Fi. A microwave and fridge make snack time easy to execute, and an in-room coffeemaker puts caffeine in your hands when you need it most. Reserve a one-bedroom suite to enjoy a separate living room with a sleeper sofa. For convenient meeting space just 10 miles from Topeka Regional Airport, reserve our flexible meeting room accommodating up to 50 guests. Allow our professional staff to enhance your gathering with customized catering recommendations and a personalized web page designed specifically for your event. You can use our on-site business center and free Wi-Fi to help you prepare for your meeting. Located just four miles from downtown Topeka, the Country Inn & Suites is an ideal home base for visiting the Kansas State Capitol and major businesses like BNSF Railway and Blue Cross and Blue Shield of Kansas. Take your kids on an educational visit to the Topeka Zoo or a tour of the Mulvane Art Museum, located at Washburn University. You can go shopping at West Ridge Mall and enjoy the rides at Gage Park before seeing a Topeka Symphony Orchestra performance. Notable attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Wichita East, KS
description: Situated near the junction of I-35 and US 400/54, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Wichita East, KS positions you for easy commutes to the FlightSafety International Learning Center and major aircraft manufacturers like Beechcraft/Textron Aviation. Attend Shocker sporting events at Wichita State University, enjoy upscale shopping and dining downtown, or catch a flight at Wichita Dwight D. Eisenhower National Airport (ICT), all within 15 minutes of our hotel. In town for a concert at INTRUST Bank Arena or an expo at the Century II Performing Arts & Convention? Both attractions are only six miles away.When you’re ready to move, head to the fitness center for an exhilarating workout or to the outdoor pool for a refreshing swim. If you prefer a low-key activity, unwind in front of the veranda’s fire pit. Each of our 99 hotel rooms and suites includes free Wi-Fi and DIRECTV DRE for a home-away-from-home viewing experience. Microwaves and refrigerators let you prepare and store snacks for late-night cravings. Visit the scenic waterfront less than two miles away or hit the walking trail behind the hotel. Need to do some shopping? Towne East Square mall is just a mile away, or you can head six miles into downtown to browse the trendy boutiques. Put these attractions on your radar during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bowling Green, KY
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bowling Green, KY features a convenient location off I-65, I-165, and Highway 231, only two miles from Bowling Green-Warren County Regional Airport (BWG). You can easily reach popular destinations like Beech Bend, the Lost River Cave, and the National Corvette Museum—all within seven miles of our hotel. If you're a history buff, explore the grounds of Riverview at Hobson Grove, a historical property that serves as a site along the Civil War Discovery Trail. In town to tour college campuses? Western Kentucky University and Daymar College are less than five miles away.To accompany our great location, we offer affordable and family-friendly amenities like a fitness center and free Wi-Fi. Visit our welcoming lobby for complimentary cookies and candy, or take advantage of the snack shop for a quick bite before heading out to see the sights. After a day trip up to Mammoth Cave National Park, kick back by the indoor pool. After a day spent riding roller coasters at Beech Bend, relax in your room or suite with a movie on the LCD TV. You can use free Wi-Fi to check your email or upload photos of your day’s adventures. Before you head out, enjoy our free, hot breakfast and prepare snacks for the day using the in-room microwave and fridge. Hosting a social or corporate event? Our versatile meeting room accommodates up to 75 guests and is conveniently located just two miles from the BWG airport. Our meeting room is equipped with free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment. For refreshments during your event, ask our friendly staff about catering recommendations. Located a few miles south of the city center, our hotel places you in an ideal location for exploring shops, restaurants, and museums. Enjoy local restaurants like Double Dogs and Montana Grille or grab a quick bite from a variety of fast food chains within a mile of our hotel. Plan a trip to Beech Bend amusement park for fun activities the whole family will enjoy. On your way back, cool down with an ice cream at Chaney's Dairy Barn. Other nearby attractions include:

name: Radisson Hotel Cincinnati Riverfront
description: From our convenient location in Covington, Radisson Hotel Cincinnati Riverfront offers an impressive view of the Cincinnati skyline. Take a five-minute trip over the river and into downtown Cincinnati to cheer on the Reds at Great American Ball Park or marvel at the masterpieces at Cincinnati Art Museum. Traveling with kids? Be sure to visit Newport Aquarium or the Cincinnati Zoo & Botanical Garden to see thousands of animals, both near our hotel. You’ll also love that we’re only 15 minutes from Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International Airport (CVG). After your adventures, return for a romantic dinner at our hotel’s award-winning revolving restaurant, Eighteen at the Radisson, where you won’t be able to decide which is better—the food or the view. Maintain your workout routine by visiting the fitness center, and then splash around the indoor pool with your kids. We also provide guest laundry facilities and free indoor and outdoor parking to make your stay as easy and enjoyable as possible. Offering 220 rooms and suites with balcony views, our hotel provides you with a relaxing atmosphere during your stay. Feel at home with convenient amenities like free Wi-Fi, microwaves, and refrigerators. In the morning, brew a fresh cup of coffee and order room service for a complete breakfast. Located minutes from downtown Cincinnati, Radisson Hotel Cincinnati Riverfront is an excellent gathering place for both business and social events. We offer 10,000 square feet of conference facilities and ballrooms that wrap around our cylindrical hotel and feature impressive river views. For weddings, reserve the Bluegrass Ballroom, which accommodates up to 500 guests. Complete your special day with custom catering, candlelit centerpieces on tables with floor-length linens, and overnight accommodations for guests. For a casual lunch or dinner, stop by The Fifth Lounge. Our on-site bar offers daily drink specials on the hotel’s first floor. We also provide daily room service if your kids want to wind down with a snack after a trip to the zoo.For a more upscale dining experience, visit the 18th floor and discover our revolving restaurant, Eighteen at the Radisson. Bask in panoramic views of downtown Cincinnati as you enjoy a succulent steak or prime rib followed by a slice of our delectable cheesecake. If you’re visiting on the weekend, don’t miss our Sunday brunch. Radisson Hotel Cincinnati Riverfront serves as an ideal home base for exploring the Covington and Cincinnati areas. Browse world-famous artwork at the Contemporary Arts Center or attend a football game at Paul Brown Stadium, both less than two miles from our hotel. Visit the unique MainStrasse Village for a taste of German food and shopping. For a quiet excursion on a beautiful day, you can take a cruise on the Ohio River with BB Riverboats. Add these attractions to your itinerary:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Erlanger, KY
description: Located less than six miles from Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International Airport, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Erlanger, KY offers easy access to the many attractions of Cincinnati. For an underwater adventure, drive about 15 minutes from the hotel to reach the Newport Aquarium, home to stingrays, penguins, sharks, and seahorses. If you’re traveling with kids, you can plan a trip to Kings Island for a day filled with roller coasters and waterslides. Enjoy ARCA and NASCAR races at the Kentucky Speedway, or catch a Bengals game at Paul Brown Stadium.When you return to the hotel, lounge by the outdoor pool, or loosen up your muscles with a workout in the fitness center. You can use our free Wi-Fi to buy tickets to Kings Island while you enjoy complimentary coffee in the lobby. Perfect for business travelers and families alike, our 135 spacious hotel rooms and suites feature free Wi-Fi and coffee and tea facilities. Store cold drinks in the refrigerator and make a quick snack in the microwave before settling down to watch your favorite TV show. The Country Inn & Suites is about 10 minutes from Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International Airport (CVG) and only eight miles from the heart of Cincinnati. If you want an adrenaline rush, you can drive about 30 minutes to the Kentucky Speedway. Plan a trip to these exciting attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Georgetown, KY
description: Conveniently located off I-75, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Georgetown, KY is about two miles from Georgetown College and the historic downtown district and is less than eight miles from Kentucky Horse Park. You can easily take your family to a University of Kentucky Wildcats basketball game at Rupp Arena or visit the popular Thoroughbred racing and auctioning facility of Keeneland. Interested in touring America's largest Toyota plant? Our hotel is only about three miles away. Our great location also puts you near many dining options, some within walking distance.When you’re not out enjoying the nearby attractions, take advantage of amenities like our free, hot breakfast and a heated indoor pool. Our pet-friendly policy allows you to bring a canine companion for a small fee, and we offer free Wi-Fi if you want to upload pictures of your Georgetown adventures. Need to stretch your muscles after a long flight? Work out your tension in our on-site fitness center. If you’re here on business, send a quick fax or make copies at our convenient business center to prepare for your meetings. Request cribs or rent rollaways for your little ones, and enjoy lots of space for the whole family in our rooms and suites. We offer goose-down pillows for a great night's sleep, and you can ask for hypoallergenic options if you prefer. Our options for your four-legged friends ensure the whole family can enjoy Georgetown. For a convenient meeting space right off I-75, consult our professional hotel staff. Our boardroom is perfect for small gatherings of up to 10 guests, and we can assist with room blocks or catering suggestions to suit your needs. Local restaurants make Georgetown an unexpected treat for foodies. Try Formaggio Italiano for tasty Italian dishes, and treat someone special to a dinner at Rodney's on Broadway for a memorable night out. Explore the beautiful horse country surrounding the Country Inn & Suites, and be sure to visit historic downtown Georgetown to see delightful Victorian architecture. If you’re a history buff, don’t miss a tour of the Mary Todd Lincoln House. Look into these sites while you're in town:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Cincinnati Airport, KY
description: Situated off I-275, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Cincinnati Airport, KY offers comfortable accommodations and a free airport shuttle. Our hotel location near the Cincinnati/Northern Kentucky International Airport (CVG) places you between two of the area’s largest attractions, the Creation Museum and Ark Encounter. We’re also beside the Ohio River, where couples can enjoy romantic riverboat tours. You can also take a ferry across the state border to downtown Cincinnati.Between activities, squeeze in a cardio workout in our fitness center or bring your kids to play in the heated indoor pool. We offer a business center, free Wi-Fi, and 24-hour complimentary coffee for late-night projects. If you left any items at home in the rush of packing, we provide complimentary travel items through our Did You Forget? Program. We also offer conveniences such as valet laundry service and free, hot breakfast. Our large guest rooms and suites provide plenty of space for you and your family, and you’ll sleep well on premium Serta bedding. A refrigerator and a microwave make your visit easy. Upgrade to a suite to enjoy additional amenities, such as a separate living room with a sleeper sofa, a kitchenette, or a whirlpool tub. When you stay at the Country Inn & Suites in Hebron, you’re just eight miles from downtown Cincinnati, where you can see the sharks and penguins at Newport Aquarium or visit the University of Cincinnati. For an unusual excursion, take a ride down the Ohio River on a replica riverboat. Don’t miss these nearby attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lexington, KY
description: Conveniently located off I-75 and 11 miles from Blue Grass Airport (LEX), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lexington, KY offers you a central location for your next visit. Prospective students and Wildcats basketball fans are about five miles from Rupp Arena and the urban campus. Our hotel is near the area’s top equine attractions, including the Kentucky Horse Park with its museums, working horse farm, and Hall of Champions.In addition to being located in the heart of the Bluegrass region, our hotel invites guests to relax in our heated indoor pool or keep up their healthy routines in our fitness center. You can start your day with a hearty complimentary, hot breakfast. And after a day of meetings or cheering the Wildcats to victory, share your experiences using our free Wi-Fi before drifting off to sleep on goose-down pillows in a spacious room. Treat yourself or your family to an upgrade by booking our rooms and suites. Everyone enjoys having free Wi-Fi, a microwave, and a refrigerator. You can also request cribs or rollaways for your little ones. Goose-down pillows offer extra comfort for a stress-free stay. While visiting the “horse capital of the world,” you'll want to visit the museums at Kentucky Horse Park and maybe catch a race at Keeneland or Red Mile. But there’s more to see here, including historic homes, bourbon distilleries, and UK Wildcats basketball at Rupp Arena. And don’t miss these favorite attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, London, KY
description: Whether you’re passing through on I-75 or looking for an outdoor adventure, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, London, KY welcomes you. Our hotel is close to gas stations, restaurants, shopping, and many attractions focused on nature. Bring your bike, because London is Kentucky’s official cycling capital, offering scenic and challenging routes. You can hike, rock climb, and explore caverns at nearby Daniel Boone National Forest.When you check in, grab complimentary coffee and cookies in the lobby, and then access our free Wi-Fi throughout the building. Take a swim in the heated indoor pool, or make time for a workout in the fitness center. If you need a work space, you can use our business center. We provide a free, hot breakfast in our hotel dining area each morning. Each of our rooms and suites is equipped with comfortable beds and modern amenities like a refrigerator, a microwave, and free Wi-Fi. Upgrade to a suite to have extras such as a separate living room, a sleeper sofa, a wet bar, or a whirlpool tub. If you travel with your dog, ask about our pet-friendly rooms. For successful meetings and events, plan your gathering at our hotel meeting room. Our convenient location off I-75 provides easy access to your party for up to 50 guests. The meeting room rental includes catering recommendations and a personalized web page for event attendees. Take time to enjoy the great outdoors in London, starting at the Daniel Boone National Forest with hiking, rock climbing, and water sports on three lakes. You can get an aerial view from zip lines and suspended tunnels at Tree Top Adventure at Levi Jackson Wilderness Road State Park. For a different sort of adventure, Wildcat Off-Road Adventure Park offers family-friendly trails for both beginners and experts. Don’t miss these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Louisville East, KY
description: When you choose our hotel in Louisville, you’re choosing the convenience of a location just off I-64 and only a short commute to downtown. The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Louisville East, KY provides a perfect home base for leisure travelers visiting the Louisville Slugger Museum & Factory or Historic Locust Grove. If you’re here on business, we’re about one mile from the Bluegrass Industrial Park. Charlie Vettiner Golf Course is a great choice for a round with colleagues. The shops at Oxmoor Center and E.P. “Tom” Sawyer State Park are about 10 miles from the hotel.After a busy day of travel or meetings, head to our indoor pool and hot tub to unwind. Our fitness center makes it simple to keep up your healthy workout routine. You can use the free Wi-Fi to map your next adventure. And the free, hot breakfast gives you a tasty way to start each day as our guest. After a busy day, unwind and de-stress in a spacious room with all the amenities of home. You can surf the web, watch a flat-screen TV, and enjoy a warm snack from the microwave or a chilled drink from the in-room refrigerator. Choose our 1,080-square-foot meeting room to host a business seminar or team banquet for up to 70 guests. Our professional staff can provide a custom web page for your event, audiovisual equipment, and local catering options. Planning a wedding shower or a training session? Ask us about group discounts and our business package. Louisville offers an array of attractions ranging from the thoroughbreds of Churchill Downs to the thrills of underground zip lining through a limestone mine. You can spend the day hiking in E.P. “Tom” Sawyer State Park or shopping at Oxmoor Center and Derby City Antique Mall. From baseball bats to verdant golf courses, you won’t want to miss these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Paducah, KY
description: Convenient to I-24, Kentucky Oaks Mall, and a host of local restaurants, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Paducah, KY offers a comfortable home away from home in western Kentucky. Our hotel is located less than two miles from The Carson Center and a little more than five miles from The National Quilt Museum, toured annually by more than 115,000 visitors.Start your day with the free, hot breakfast so you have plenty of fuel while you tour the various murals and public art displays around downtown Paducah. Return to the hotel to relax in the indoor pool or retreat to your hotel room to upload photos via the free Wi-Fi. We also offer a fitness center and business center for your convenience. Prop up your feet, pop a snack in the microwave, and watch a movie on HBO in your room or suite. After a good night's sleep, wake up to fresh coffee in the room and a free weekday newspaper delivered to your door. You can keep your favorite drinks chilled in the fridge to enjoy while you work at the desk. If you’re traveling with family, reserve a suite for extra space and a sleeper sofa. Our affordable meeting room features seating for up to 40 guests, audiovisual equipment, and free Wi-Fi. Ask for planning assistance to make your next seminar, meeting, or family reunion a memorable success. Use the on-site business center offering fax and copy services to help you prepare for your event. Located off I-24 between St. Louis and Nashville, Paducah is a UNESCO Creative City and home to The National Quilt Museum and the “Wall to Wall” murals along the Ohio River. Take a stroll along the Paducah Riverwalk to take in beautiful artwork and dine at riverside restaurants. You can go shopping at Kentucky Oaks Mall and host a family picnic at Bob Noble Park. Don't miss these nearby attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Louisville South, KY
description: Pull off I-65 and into comfortable accommodations at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Louisville South, KY. Conference attendees can stay right next to the Paroquet Springs Conference Centre, and families will appreciate staying less than two miles from the fun of Kart Kountry. You can learn about horse racing at the Kentucky Derby Museum at Churchill Downs, less than half an hour from the hotel, or take an educational tour of the General George Patton Museum of Leadership at Fort Knox.Touring the area in your RV? We offer complimentary parking for larger vehicles such as buses, trucks, and RVs. Unwind from a long drive with a splash in the pool, a vigorous workout in the fitness center, or a chat with friends using free Wi-Fi. Need to print documents before a meeting? Use our business center to prepare before giving a presentation in our event space. After a good night’s sleep and a cup of coffee in your room, join us for a plate of biscuits and gravy at our free, hot breakfast. After a day on the road, kick off your shoes in one of our spacious rooms or suites. You can relax in front of the TV or post pictures of your road trip online using free Wi-Fi. Host your seminar or social gathering in our meeting space equipped with free Wi-Fi and audiovisual tools such as a dry-erase board, a speakerphone, and a dataport. For larger functions, stay with us and reserve event space at the adjacent Paroquet Springs Conference Centre, which can host up to 1,500 guests. Less than 30 minutes from downtown Louisville, Shepherdsville makes an ideal base for exploring Kentucky's famous bourbon distilleries, horse racing tracks, and baseball stadium. Tour the Louisville Slugger Museum, the Louisville Zoo, or Fort Knox, all within easy driving distance of the hotel. Our convenient location just off I-65 puts you near these can't-miss attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Somerset, KY
description: Book an affordable, quiet stay off US 27 at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Somerset, KY. Outdoor enthusiasts love our central location with easy access to hiking and boating adventures at Daniel Boone National Forest and Lake Cumberland. For a more relaxed outing, snap photos of the rushing waters at Cumberland Falls or pack a picnic lunch and sunbathe at General Burnside Island State Park. History buffs won’t want to miss a visit to Mills Spring Battlefield Visitor Center & Museum, just 15 minutes from the hotel.Our friendly staff is delighted to welcome you to Somerset with delicious cookies and fresh coffee in the lobby. The heated indoor pool may be just what you need after a day of tubing on Lake Cumberland, and free Wi-Fi lets you post your favorite vacation memories to social media. After toweling off, toss your wet swimsuits or hiking clothes into the guest laundry facilities so your wardrobe stays fresh throughout your visit. Adventure seekers will find a quiet retreat in our hotel rooms and suites, equipped with homelike comforts including free Wi-Fi, individual room climate control, and a flat-screen TV. Thanks to an in-room microwave and refrigerator, it’s easy to pack your favorite snacks and beverages for outings to Daniel Boone National Forest. Situated on the shores of Lake Cumberland, Somerset offers ample opportunities to fish, swim, and boat. Somerset is also an easy drive from popular spots like Cumberland Falls, nicknamed the “Niagara of the South,” and General Burnside Island State Park, home to great hiking trails and an 18-hole golf course. Don't miss these popular attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Covington, LA
description: Stay near hiking trails, wildlife reserves, and Lake Pontchartrain at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Covington, LA, located just off I-12 and 35 minutes north of New Orleans. After taking in the diverse flair of the French Quarter, you can come back to the hotel and relax on one of our plush Serta Elite 2000® beds with a cold drink from your in-room refrigerator. Fill up before your next day’s adventures with waffles, buttery grits, oatmeal, fruit, and more at our hotel’s free, hot breakfast.If you want to relax, lounge by the outdoor pool, or for a more active way to spend your day, fit in a vigorous workout in the fitness center. You can wash your exercise clothes in the convenient guest laundry facilities. Check your email with free Wi-Fi or watch your favorite HBO show in your modern room or suite. When you’re ready for bed, draw the blackout curtains, and curl up on the Serta Elite 2000® mattress. Host up to 40 people in our hotel’s meeting room for a reception, seminar, or business event. After delivering a powerful presentation using free Wi-Fi and a projector screen, invite your overnight guests to explore area attractions around New Orleans, less than an hour away. You can also use our hotel’s business center to print extra schedules or worksheets. Covington sits just off the north shore of Lake Pontchartrain and is less than an hour’s drive from New Orleans. Outdoor enthusiasts will appreciate being near Fontainebleau State Park and the Global Wildlife Center, and kids will remember their trip to InstaGator Ranch & Hatchery. You can find unique pieces of Southern history at the Abita Mystery House, or plan a day trip to NOLA’s famous French Quarter. Don’t miss these other nearby attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel New Orleans Airport
description: Fly into Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport (MSY) and ride our free 24-hour shuttle to Radisson Hotel New Orleans Airport, located just five minutes away. Conveniently situated off I-10 in Kenner, we’re 12 minutes from downtown New Orleans. Take time to explore iconic favorites like Bourbon Street and the French Quarter, and experience popular New Orleans events like Mardi Gras. We’re located near the area’s top corporate hub and just minutes away from the trade shows at the Pontchartrain Convention & Civic Center and New Orleans Ernest N. Morial Convention Center. Our environmentally conscious hotel has earned the highest rating in the Green Key program. If your plans include a New Orleans cruise, consult with our concierge to arrange service to the port for a nominal fee. With an outdoor pool and a fitness center, our full-service hotel is the perfect place to recharge after a day in the city. If you’re hungry, stop by 4Corners Bistro for a delicious meal or an after-work drink with colleagues.  Our 100 contemporary rooms and suites offer Serta Elite pillowtop mattresses and blackout curtains. Enjoy colorful local artwork, steel accents, and furniture with a hint of southern flair. Upgrade to Business Class for perks like a free breakfast and complimentary drinks. A studio or one-bedroom suite provides extra space when you need it. Situated less than five minutes from the MSY airport, the Radisson offers an ideal location for corporate and social events. For business meetings, let us provide thoughtful office necessities like pens, notepads, and free Wi-Fi. We offer full-service catering for up to 100 guests.                                     Order a room service meal when you wish to dine in private or you don’t want to interrupt your work.                                 4Corners Bistro has the authentic Creole-inspired food you would expect in Louisiana, along with American cuisine and international dishes. The soft lighting, music, and chic style at 4Corners create an appealing atmosphere that invites you to linger with dessert, drinks, and good company. Before heading out for a stroll, live entertainment, or a riverboat ride, talk with our concierge to figure out the attractions right for you. If you’re staying in Kenner during major New Orleans events like the Bayou Classic in November or Mardi Gras in February or March, you’re sure to have a fun Big Easy experience. You can check out these nearby year-round attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Metairie (New Orleans), LA
description: Whether you’re driving in from the Causeway or flying in from Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport (MSY), you’ll appreciate the convenience offered by the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Metairie (New Orleans), LA. After collecting your bags at the airport, you can reach our Metairie hotel in just 15 minutes and take advantage of free parking. Ready for a fun day in downtown NOLA? We’re less than 20 minutes from the sights and sounds of the Big Easy. Each morning, fuel up at our hotel’s complimentary, hot breakfast before heading out to nearby attractions like the French Quarter, the Superdome, or the Port of New Orleans.At the hotel, you can enjoy some R & R in our outdoor saltwater pool or just chill out by the fire pit in the attractive courtyard area. If you’re in Metairie for business, you can check your work email using our Wi-Fi or print meeting notes in our business center. After a day of adventure in the Big Easy, relax in one of our 138 comfortable rooms or suites. You can stash your pralines in the refrigerator to munch on later when you watch your favorite cable channels. Connect your laptop or tablet to the free Wi-Fi so you can keep your social accounts updated. After a restful night’s sleep, wake up to a fresh-brewed cup of coffee from the in-room coffeemaker and then head to our dining room for a complimentary, hot breakfast. With event space for up to 50 people, our hotel offers three modern meeting rooms: the Jefferson Room, the Bayou Room, and the Pelican Room. Event attendees have access to our free Wi-Fi, conference-calling capability, projector rentals, and more. Our hotel is just a few blocks from Lake Pontchartrain, mere minutes from the Metairie parade routes for Mardi Gras, and less than a 20-minute drive from the cruise ships at the Port of New Orleans. We’re also inside of 10 miles from Audubon Zoo, Riverwalk, and the MSY airport. Don’t miss these nearby attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, New Orleans I-10 East, LA
description: Whether you're visiting New Orleans for business, a family trip, or a well-deserved break, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, New Orleans I-10 East, LA has you covered. Travel just 15 minutes to reach world-famous attractions like the French Quarter, Bourbon Street, and the Port of New Orleans. Revel in one of NOLA’s quintessential seasonal celebrations: Mardi Gras, the Essence Festival, the New Orleans Jazz & Heritage Festival, or the French Quarter Festival. On vacation? Enjoy proximity to the Audubon Aquarium of the Americas and the Mercedes-Benz Superdome. If you’re in town on business, Textron Systems, Folgers, and NASA’s Michoud Assembly Facility are a quick commute from our hotel.After a day of work or sightseeing, enjoy a dip in our outdoor pool and an energizing workout in our fitness center. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property, so you can easily read an e-book in the comfort of our fireside lobby or in the dining room during the free, hot breakfast. We also offer free parking to help you save while you road-trip or rent a car to explore downtown New Orleans.
