Our rooms and suites offer free Wi-Fi, premium bedding, and a 49-inch flat-screen LED TV with HBO included. Each room is also equipped with a mini fridge and a microwave, perfect for storing and reheating food from local restaurants. Open-concept studio suites give business travelers space to spread out, while one-bedroom suites are ideal for families and groups needing a separate living area and a sleeper sofa. For business meetings, training sessions, or birthday parties of up to 30 guests, book our 528-square-foot meeting room near downtown New Orleans. The space offers flexible seating arrangements and can be split into two boardroom-style rooms for breakout sessions. Use free Wi-Fi to stream a presentation or print handouts in our business center. Our hotel is centrally located near I-10, I-510, and I-610, just minutes away from all that New Orleans has to offer. Get your tickets to a thrilling NBA Pelicans basketball game at the Smoothie King Center, less than nine miles away. You can walk to Airboat Swamp Tours to explore the bayou's cypress swamps or visit the Audubon Louisiana Nature Center to meander along trails dotted with wildlife. Hop in the car for an easy ride to these must-see attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Pineville, LA
description: A 20-minute ride from Alexandria International Airport (AEX) brings you to the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Pineville, LA, located adjacent to the Pineville Convention Center. Check into a spacious hotel room equipped with free high-speed internet access and a flat-screen TV. When you’re ready to explore, our Pineville hotel is less than 10 minutes from Camp Beauregard and less than 15 minutes from popular attractions like Kent Plantation House and the Alexandria Zoo.After a long flight or a day of meetings in Pineville, go for a dip in our outdoor pool, open year-round. For a more vigorous workout, get your steps in at the fitness center and then take a soothing soak in the hot tub. Take advantage of our valet laundry service to have clean clothes ready to pack when it’s time to head home. Families appreciate spacious rooms and suites where everyone can spread out and sleep comfortably. If you’re traveling for work, each room comes equipped with free internet so you can connect to the office anytime. When you finish your assignments, grab a drink from the refrigerator, heat up a snack in the microwave, and then relax in front of a free movie on HBO. Hosting an event in Pineville? Our hotel offers convenient, affordable rooms and suites adjacent to the Pineville Convention Center. Ask for help from our professional event coordinator to start planning your next business meeting or gathering with up to 600 guests. Learn more about the Civil War at Forts Randolph & Buhlow State Historic Site, or go hiking at Kisatchie National Forest. Corporate travelers can stay near the production plants for Procter & Gamble and General Electric and host an informal meeting on the links at the OakWing Golf Club. Don't miss these nearby attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Ruston, LA
description: Thanks to our convenient location just off I-20 at Exit 86, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Ruston, LA provides easy access to football games and graduation ceremonies at Louisiana Tech and Grambling State universities. Nestled in the city’s quaint historic district, our hotel makes it easy to browse shops for souvenirs, accessories, and college game-day apparel. You can take in the picturesque surroundings with a bike ride through Lincoln Parish Park or attend your student's performance at the Howard Center for the Performing Arts, located on the Louisiana Tech University campus.After a relaxed stroll through the 18-block historic district, unwind with a refreshing swim in our hotel’s outdoor pool or with stretches in our fitness center, equipped with an all-in-one weight machine, a treadmill, and a bike. If you need to prepare for a meeting, head to the 24-hour business center to complete your presentation and print handouts. You can get your family’s clothes game-day ready using our on-site laundry facilities and then head to the stadium on a full stomach thanks to our free, hot breakfast. Traveling with a pet? We welcome your four-legged friends (for a fee) so you can bring them along. Settle into one of our spacious hotel rooms or suites, each offering a peaceful forest view with home comforts like a microwave and refrigerator. You can keep loved ones updated on your travels using free Wi-Fi or surf through 70 channels on the TV. With an in-room coffeemaker, you can enjoy a fresh cup of coffee at anytime. Business meetings, receptions, and corporate events shine in our flexible meeting space, conveniently located in Ruston’s historic district. We proudly offer two meeting rooms—a larger space for up to 50 participants and an intimate boardroom for up to 12 attendees. Ask our friendly staff to assist you with amenities like a projector screen so you can display important presentations with ease. Ruston lies just off I-20 between Shreveport and Monroe. Every year, the town welcomes more than 17,000 students to the beautiful campuses of Louisiana Tech University and Grambling State University. The two universities also welcome visitors for campus tours, sporting events and parents' weekends. Feel like a local as you stroll through the town's 18-block historic district, filled with a variety of quaint boutiques and restaurants, and don't miss these other attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Shreveport-Airport, LA
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Shreveport-Airport, LA offers a prime location just off I-20 and about half a mile from Shreveport Regional Airport (SHV). Attend a trade show or a concert at the Shreveport Convention Center, or go for a shopping spree at the Louisiana Boardwalk Outlets. Both attractions are located just 10 minutes from our family-friendly hotel.Whether you’ve been touring the Gardens of the American Rose Center or spotting alligators at Gators & Friends, you can look forward to a relaxing soak in our hotel’s outdoor pool. Grab a cookie and a cup of coffee in our lobby, and use free Wi-Fi to stay on top of work or chat with family and friends. If you accidentally left something at home, ask our friendly front desk staff about our Did You Forget? Program. In addition to conveniences like coffeemakers, microwaves, and refrigerators, our rooms and suites include free Wi-Fi to keep you connected to life outside your accommodations. If you’re traveling with a group, our connecting rooms offer the perfect way to stay close while maintaining your own space and privacy. With easy access to interstates 20 and 49, you have every reason to get out and explore the top attractions in Shreveport. Check the calendar to see which festivals are happening during your visit, or make plans to attend blowout events like the Independence Bowl and the State Fair of Louisiana. Explore these points of interest during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Annapolis, MD
description: Located in a quiet neighborhood close to downtown, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Annapolis, MD is near top bay-area attractions like the United States Naval Academy, only 15 minutes away. Downtown beckons you to explore picturesque 18th-century sites like the Maryland State House, just four miles from the hotel. For some fun on the water, you can take a short drive to Chesapeake Bay for a boating excursion or to Sandy Point State Park for a day at the beach.Log in to our free Wi-Fi to plan your day, and then use our free weekend and evening shuttle service to explore the area. After a full day of tours and shopping, you can relax with a dip in the recently renovated indoor pool or work out in our fitness center. When you crave a snack, stop by the lobby for complimentary cookies and hot coffee or tea. Our 100 rooms and suites are perfect for relaxing after a day of sightseeing around the harbor. Brew a cup of coffee or tea, and then settle in to watch your favorite TV show or to upload photos to social media using free Wi-Fi. As an added perk, children 18 and under stay free with an adult, and pets are welcome! Host your next conference or personal event at our hotel. Choose from two flexible meeting rooms, with the largest able to accommodate up to 90 guests. Our dedicated staff can assist you with the details, taking the stress out of organizing a seminar or a family reunion. We’re happy to provide catering and audiovisual equipment by request. Catch a USNA home football game at the Navy-Marine Corps Memorial Stadium, which is just five miles from our hotel. For a more leisurely afternoon, head downtown to explore historical buildings like St. Anne’s Episcopal Church as well as charming shops and restaurants. Nearby attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Baltimore North, MD
description: Avoid rush-hour traffic and downtown hotel rates during your trip to Baltimore by staying with us at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Baltimore North, MD. Positioned in the White Marsh area, our location provides easy access to I-95 and US 40. Explore the great outdoors with hiking trails and waterfalls at Gunpowder Falls State Park or enjoy water activities at Ultimate Watersports, both less than twenty minutes from our hotel. Spend the afternoon at Boordy Vineyards before seeing an event at Royal Farms Arena, one of Baltimore’s largest event venues. Before you leave, browse the shops at White Marsh Mall and THE AVENUE at White Marsh.Relax after a busy day with a visit to the indoor pool and hot tub. Our fitness center helps you keep up with your workout routine, and free parking helps save you money during your stay. In the morning, enjoy our free, hot breakfast before exploring White Marsh’s best attractions. After a long day of hiking at Gunpowder Falls State Park, relax in our spacious hotel rooms and suites. Unwind while you watch your favorite HBO shows on the HDTV or browse your social media using free Wi-Fi. If you’re traveling with kids, all of our rooms and suites feature a microwave and refrigerator to make snack time easy. With 625 square feet of meeting space, the Country Inn & Suites provides an ideal place to host your next social or corporate event for up to 40 guests. Choose from six room configurations and enjoy added perks like audiovisual equipment, catering options, and free Wi-Fi. While staying at our hotel, make the short nine-mile trek to Baltimore's Inner Harbor, the center for downtown happenings. Gunpowder Falls State Park, where you can follow hiking trails to beautiful waterfalls, is also nearby. Head to Rockaway, Island View, or Miami Beach to dig your toes in the sand, or pack a picnic and soak in the sun at Rocky Point Beach and Park. Be sure to check out these other local attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Baltimore Downtown-Inner Harbor
description: Located in the heart of downtown and just a half mile from Inner Harbor, Radisson Hotel Baltimore Downtown-Inner Harbor gives you easy access to area hospitals as well as the most captivating places in Charm City. The arts and entertainment district is packed with attractions within an easy walk of the hotel. Take the kids to Oriole Park at Camden Yards and the National Aquarium, or see shows and expos at the Baltimore Convention Center and Royal Farms Arena. Interested in visiting Washington, DC? Penn Station is about 1.5 miles away, and the BWI Airport Rail Station is just over 10 miles from the hotel. Both stations are serviced by Amtrak with direct service into Washington’s historic Union Station.After a fun-filled day exploring the city, head to the rooftop pool to soak up the sun before meeting friends or colleagues for drinks at Harbor Sports Bar and Grill, located on site. Our spacious fitness center has floor-to-ceiling windows so you can take in city views when you hit the treadmill. If you’re here for work, our 24-hour business center and Avis Car Rental desk make your stay more convenient. Stop by our E-Concierge kiosk for travel tips and information. Whether you’re traveling with family, colleagues, or a four-legged friend, our pet-friendly hotel has 323 rooms and suites that accommodate any crowd. For easy snacking, request a microwave or a refrigerator for your room. In the morning, brew a cup of coffee with your in-room coffeemaker and relax on a plush bed or catch up with emails at the work desk with an ergonomic chair. Offering 23,000 square feet of flexible meeting space, our hotel’s conference rooms, ballrooms, and boardrooms are adaptable to any event. Our 24 meeting spaces can be arranged for a variety of unforgettable functions, and our dedicated staff is always on hand to help with the details.                                     From breakfast in bed to dinner at your desk, treat yourself to room service for a delicious meal in the comfort of your hotel room or suite.                                 Make Harbor Sports Bar and Grill your go-to destination for happy-hour deals on draft beers, premium wines, and cocktails. You can also order a hearty entrée, such as a crab cake sandwich or a Cajun turkey burger. Looking for a tasty way to start your day? Stop by for breakfast and choose from morning favorites like waffles, eggs, bagels, and fresh fruit. Our convenient location in downtown Baltimore makes it easy to explore the city. Take a leisurely stroll to Inner Harbor, where you can wander along the waterfront promenade and check out family-friendly attractions like the National Aquarium. The area also offers top-notch dining and nightlife. Here to see the O’s in action? Oriole Park at Camden Yards is less than 15 minutes away on foot. If you want to experience even more of Charm City, check out these attractions: By car:From the airport, drive southeast on Friendship Road to I-195 W. After a mile, take exit 2A to MD-295 N. Drive about six miles and then continue on Baltimore’s Russell Street. Bear right to continue on S Paca Street, and then take a right onto W Baltimore Street. Turn left at N Hanover Street and then left again on W Fayette Street. The hotel will be on your left.By Light RailLink:The BWI airport’s light rail station is just outside the lower level of the terminal building, adjacent to Concourse E. The journey time is 30 minutes to Baltimore Street Light Rail Station, which is two blocks from the hotel.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Frederick, MD
description: Whether you’re on vacation with your family or riding solo for a business trip, make the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Frederick, MD your home away from home. description: Travelers of every kind will find consistent high quality and value at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Hagerstown, MD. Scott Fitzgerald Theatre or tour the works on display at the Glenview Mansion Art Gallery.Back at the hotel you can grab a bite to eat at Atrium Bistro & Lounge or run through an important presentation in our 24-hour business center. name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dearborn, MI
description: Choose the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dearborn, MI to be close to exciting attractions like The Henry Ford and Greenfield Village, both less than five minutes from the hotel. description: Make the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dundee, MI your base for exploring all that the area has to offer, from shopping for outdoor gear at Cabela’s and sampling vintages at St. Julian Winery to riding slides at Splash Universe water park or golfing at Dundee Golf Club. name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Grand Rapids Airport, MI
description: Situated just four miles from Gerald R. Ford International Airport (GRR), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Grand Rapids Airport, MI offers a convenient location to rest and recharge. For educational entertainment, visit any of the four museums located within 10 miles, or for outdoor fun, hit the nearby Deer Run golf course. Top attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Grand Rapids East, MI
description: Enjoy a peaceful vacation at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Grand Rapids East, MI. Our hotel is conveniently located less than 10 minutes from downtown Grand Rapids and close to some of Michigan's most popular attractions, including Frederik Meijer Gardens & Sculpture Park and the DeVos Place convention center. You can also explore the city’s most popular indoor attractions, including craft breweries and eclectic restaurants.Traveling with a sports team? Take advantage of our proximity to Van Andel Arena, plus top-tier amenities like a spacious breakfast room and three meeting rooms to make your stay more enjoyable. Our hotel rooms and suites offer modern amenities like free Wi-Fi, microwaves, and fridges for your convenience. Swim in the indoor pool or soak in the hot tub after a day of exploring. After attending a wedding at Frederik Meijer Gardens or taking a tour of the Beer City Ale Trail, relax in your spacious guest room or suite with premium bedding and conveniences like free Wi-Fi, a microwave, and a fridge. Traveling with a group or sports team? Reserve a block of rooms for added convenience. Organize your next business conference or social gathering in one of three well-equipped meeting rooms at the Country Inn & Suites in Grand Rapids. We offer block accommodations for sports teams and groups attending events at our hotel or at DeVos Place. Located just 10 minutes from the hotel, Thousand Oaks Country Club also hosts weddings and other special occasions. Choose our hotel as your home base if you need a place to prepare for the big day, host overnight guests, or plan a reception. The Country Inn & Suites, Grand Rapids East is the perfect spot for your next getaway thanks to our proximity to downtown Grand Rapids, diverse restaurants, and popular attractions like the Grand Rapids Public Museum. Cheer on the Grand Rapids Griffins or attend a thrilling concert at nearby Van Andel Arena. If you're in town for a conference, enjoy a quick commute to DeVos Place convention center, only five miles from the hotel. Explore these attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Holland, MI
description: Stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Holland, MI to enjoy comfortable hotel rooms that are less than 10 minutes from the site of the annual Tulip Time festival. Within five miles of the hotel, you can find popular attractions related to Dutch culture, including Windmill Island Gardens and Veldheer Tulip Garden. At the DeKlomp Wooden Shoe & Delft Factory, learn how Dutch pottery is made and pick up a pair of wooden shoes as a souvenir. If you’re here to visit a student, our hotel is located less than two miles from Hope College.After a day of adventuring, return to your hotel room to prop your feet up in front of the flat-screen TV. If you’d rather keep moving, enjoy a swim in the heated indoor pool or a workout in the fitness center. Need to send a quick fax or print your itinerary? Our on-site business center provides fax, copy, and printing services. Sleep well in one of our comfortable hotel rooms with Serta Elite® mattresses. In the morning, watch the news as you sip a cup of freshly brewed coffee from your in-room coffeemaker. Immerse yourself in the area's vibrant Dutch heritage when you stay at our hotel, located less than a mile from Nelis' Dutch Village and other cultural attractions. Take the family to shop for souvenirs at the nearby Holland Town Center and the Wooden Shoe Antique Mall, or spend a day biking at scenic Holland State Park. Don't miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Houghton, MI
description: Choose the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Houghton, MI for smart, up-to-date accommodations in Michigan’s beautiful Upper Peninsula. Located less than two miles from Michigan Technological University, our hotel makes it easy to visit students and cheer on the Huskies. At nearby Quincy Mine, your family can step back in time and tour real copper mines. Learn more about the area’s mining history and see a vast collection of minerals from the Great Lakes region at the A. E. Seaman Mineral Museum. During the winter months, get a pass to ski and snowboard at nearby Mont Ripley Ski Area.Discover what makes our hotel special with perks like a free, hot breakfast daily and complimentary cookies and coffee 24 hours a day. Visit the indoor pool area if your children want to splash in the kids’ pool while you enjoy a soothing soak in the hot tub. Traveling with a canine companion? Make yourself at home in one of our designated dog-friendly guest rooms. We also offer ample free parking, including bus and RV parking. Featuring Serta 5000® pillowtop mattresses, our hotel rooms and suites offer a relaxing retreat. After a busy day, you can put your feet up and watch your favorite shows on the 43-inch TV before drifting off to sleep. Choose the meeting room at the Country Inn & Suites if you need to host an event in Houghton with up to 40 people. You can rent our audiovisual equipment for digital slideshows or use the DVD player to enhance your event with video presentations. Take it easy as you cast a line at Portage Lake or tee off at Portage Lake Golf Course. For more of Michigan’s scenic beauty, visit Isle Royale National Park by seaplane or aboard the Ranger III, which sails from Houghton during the summer months. Don’t miss these other favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Kalamazoo, MI
description: Book a comfortable stay about five miles from Western Michigan University at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Kalamazoo, MI. Just off I-94, our hotel is the perfect stopping place for business and leisure travelers flying into Kalamazoo/Battle Creek International Airport (AZO), about three minutes away. If you're in town for a trade show or want to catch a hockey game, the Wings Event Center is less than two miles away. Immerse yourself in the local culture with a tour of the Kalamazoo Institute of Arts' latest exhibit and a show at the Kalamazoo State Theatre.Grab a free cookie and coffee in the lobby after a day of playing golf at Kalamazoo Country Club. We offer free Wi-Fi throughout the property so you can easily complete work in the business center or connect to social media in your hotel room or suite. Stay active during your travels with a trip to the fitness center and laps around our indoor pool. Free on-site parking helps you save even more during your visit. Whether you're passing through or staying for a multi-day conference, you can find practical amenities in each of our hotel rooms and suites. Use free Wi-Fi to plan the next day's schedule, and then kick back to watch your favorite TV program. Make yourself some popcorn in the microwave and store your favorite drinks in the fridge. Our spacious suites with a separate living room and a sleeper sofa are ideal for families and groups exploring Kalamazoo. The Country Inn & Suites offers practical, well-equipped meeting rooms for your business meeting or personal celebration with up to 60 guests. Less than a mile from the AZO airport and just off I-94, our hotel is an ideal meeting spot for out-of-town guests. Ask our friendly, knowledgeable staff for help with audiovisual equipment rentals and catering recommendations. When you plan a gathering, we also offer a customized event web page to ensure your guests have all of the important details at their fingertips. Close to outdoor fun at nearby Echo Valley and Timber Ridge, our hotel is a great home base for skiers, hikers, and others wanting to explore the local terrain. But you’ll also find plenty of indoor entertainment nearby, such as at the Air Zoo, a multi-sensory science attraction with flight simulators. Take your kids to the planetarium at Kalamazoo Valley Museum and see a show at Kalamazoo State Theatre. We’re also located near Western Michigan University and Kalamazoo College. Don't miss these must-see attractions:

name: Radisson Plaza Hotel at Kalamazoo Center
description: When you stay at Radisson Plaza Hotel at Kalamazoo Center, our complimentary shuttle service to and from Kalamazoo/Battle Creek International Airport (AZO) makes getting here stress free. Once you’ve checked in, you can easily walk to many downtown attractions, restaurants, boutiques, and craft breweries. Kalamazoo State Theatre is little more than a five-minute walk away, and you can attend a sports event or touring Broadway show at nearby Western Michigan University, just two miles from the hotel. Here for business? Major medical, pharmaceutical, and biotech companies including Stryker, Thermo Fisher Scientific, Zoetis, and Pfizer are headquartered in the city.Whether you’re planning a wedding or a national conference, our meeting facilities offer 44,000 square feet of space across 22 venues. If you want to impress your guests, ask our concierge to assist you by providing the perfect gift basket to accompany your event. To ensure you’re relaxed and looking your best on the day, indulge in a treatment at our full-service salon and spa, or unwind after your busy schedule with a workout in our 11,000-square-foot, state-of-the-art Kalamazoo Athletic Club. If you need to renew your focus, ask about yoga, Power Hour, or Hard Core classes, or take a refreshing swim in our indoor heated pool. An on-site gift shop, Rio: Regionally Inspired Offerings, offers unique, Michigan-made items, wines, and sweet treats for an indulgence after a meal in one of our four restaurants. Whatever your day has in store, be sure to stop by our Starbucks® for your favorite coffee. Each of our 340 spacious rooms and suites provides superb comfort with upgraded bedding on plush beds. You can prepare for meetings at the well-lit work desks, respond to your work email using free Wi-Fi, and enjoy the convenience of room service from early morning until late at night. The extensive meeting facilities at the Radisson can be easily customized to fit your event specifications. Take your pick from 22 exceptional spaces, including the Arcadia Ballroom with its impressive 20-foot ceilings and space for up to 1,280 guests. The Stone Theater’s amphitheater-style seating lends itself to high-tech training sessions.Planning a wedding? Our professional event planners and the team at The Wedding Studio can help make your dream day a reality, from the rehearsal dinner and your catered reception to a farewell breakfast before everyone checks out.Whether you’re booking one of our event spaces for a banquet or hosting a family reunion off site, our world-class chefs and professional service team can create a delicious custom menu. Leave all of the details to us so you can relax and enjoy yourself. Ensuring the success of your event is our passion! Start your day at The Morning Dish, where you can fuel up at the expansive breakfast buffet featuring dishes made from fresh, local ingredients. At Webster’s Prime, step into the tasting room to sample an extensive variety of fine wines before indulging in a perfectly cooked steak.For a casual meal, head to Old Burdick’s bar and grill to watch sports with a pint and a plate of chicken wings or mozzarella sticks. Try something different at Zazios, which features eclectic fare with bold entrées inspired by flavors from around the world.If you want to explore the local restaurant scene, you can check out several top-rated eateries within walking distance of the hotel. Ask the concierge for recommendations. The Radisson places you within walking distance of the best of downtown Kalamazoo. Just step outside our door to browse locally owned boutiques and specialty shops along the Kalamazoo Mall, or take the kids to the planetarium at the Kalamazoo Valley Museum. You can sip Kalamazoo-brewed beer at one of several nearby taprooms before taking a leisurely stroll to catch a major headliner at the Kalamazoo State Theatre. Don’t miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lansing, MI
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lansing, MI makes a convenient home base for your central Michigan adventures. We are located in west Lansing on I-496 near I-69, less than 15 minutes from both the East Lansing Amtrak station and Capital Region International Airport (LAN). Join more than 75,000 fans to cheer on the Spartans at Michigan State University, just 10 minutes from our hotel.After a day exploring the state capital, grab a cookie and a cup of coffee and relax by the lobby fireplace. Families can cut down on travel costs by taking advantage of a free, hot breakfast and on-site parking. Lounge by our indoor pool while the kids swim, or get in a workout after a day of business meetings. Free Wi-Fi, early check-in, and express check-out make your stay easy. Each of our 87 hotel rooms and suites features thoughtful amenities like comfortable beds and free Wi-Fi. We have seven room types, so you can pick the one that meets your needs perfectly, including many accessible choices. Upgrade to a suite for extra space and additions like a separate living room, a sleeper sofa, and a kitchenette. Planning a graduation celebration, family gathering, or business meeting in Lansing? Host up to 80 attendees in our spacious meeting facilities, and take advantage of audiovisual equipment and free Wi-Fi for multimedia presentations. Our professional staff is happy to arrange food and beverage services, and a list of off-site caterers is available. If you’re in town to visit Michigan State University or explore the capital city, you’re in the right spot at the Country Inn & Suites in Lansing. Our hotel is a short drive from popular destinations like the Michigan State Capitol building and the quaint boutiques and restaurants that make up the city’s Old Town. Don’t miss these local favorites during your stay:

name: Radisson Hotel Lansing at the Capitol
description: For a hassle-free start to your stay, ride our complimentary shuttle from Capital Region International Airport (LAN) to Radisson Hotel Lansing at the Capitol, the only hotel in downtown Lansing. The State Capitol and Lansing Community College are within walking distance. You can cross the connected pedway to attend a business conference at the Lansing Center or host your own event in our 10,000-square-foot meeting facilities. When you’re done with work, canoe or kayak with River Town Adventures or explore the exhibits at Impression 5 Science Center.Scan, copy, print, or fax important documents in our 24-hour business center. Free Wi-Fi is available in all public areas so you can easily check your email between meetings. Unwind with a dip in the indoor pool and hot tub, or burn off some energy in our fitness center. Our on-site restaurant and lounge offer dining and drinks. Book our hotel and see views of downtown Lansing, the State Capitol, or the Grand River from your room or suite. Business Class guests enjoy free breakfast and complimentary drink vouchers. You can upgrade to a suite for more space and extras like a whirlpool. Select our venue with five versatile meeting rooms and a total of 10,000 square feet of usable space for your gathering. Choose from a light-filled boardroom with ergonomic chairs for an intimate meeting, or set up high-quality audiovisual equipment for a powerful presentation in one of two state rooms. For a memorable wedding or reception, reserve our elegant Capitol Ballroom and ask our professional wedding and event coordinator for help arranging the details for your big day. Our extensive packages ensure everything goes perfectly when you say, “I do!” Capitol City Grille serves fresh, flavorful steaks and seafood. In addition to breakfast and lunch buffets, an à la carte menu is offered from 6:30 am to 10 pm. Meet colleagues for a nightcap at Capitol City Grille Lounge, where you can enjoy a cold beer, a glass of wine, or a specialty cocktail in a relaxed atmosphere. Hotel guests may order room service. Visit R.E. Olds Transportation Museum to see the first-ever Oldsmobile, or take in a show at Abrams Planetarium. If you’re traveling with family, see more than a hundred species of animals at Potter Park Zoo or attend a Lansing Lugnuts baseball game at Cooley Law School Stadium. Don’t miss these top spots:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Marquette, MI
description: Located less than three miles from the campus of Northern Michigan University, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Marquette, MI is just minutes from downtown and UP Health System - Marquette. You’ll find it’s easy to explore our area's beautiful surroundings. You can hike the Noquemanon Trail Network in the summer or strap on a pair of snowshoes or cross-country skis in the winter. Our hotel is situated near the Westwood Mall and within walking distance of several restaurants.After a day of business meetings or touring, you can relax with a swim in our heated indoor pool. And don’t forget to stop by our lobby for a free cookie as a quick snack at any time of the day or night. It’s a sweet treat to enjoy before retiring to a guest room with all the comforts of home. Spacious and affordable, our 84 hotel rooms and suites feature comfortable beds and modern decor. After a day of travel, watch your favorite DirecTV channel or check in with the office and friends via free Wi-Fi. Organizing a birthday party or hosting a training seminar in Marquette? Choose our attractive event space for up to 30 guests at the Country Inn & Suites. If you need to show a presentation, ask about using our complimentary flat-screen HDTV or a flip chart to brainstorm ideas. If you're meeting through lunch, our staff is happy to offer recommendations for local caterers. Discover a wealth of attractions near the Country Inn & Suites. Golfers can book a tee time at the Marquette Golf Club, and your kids are sure to love exploring the Upper Peninsula Children's Museum. Don't miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Novi, MI
description: Located just off I-275, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Novi, MI places guests near the area's top attractions for an enjoyable Midwest getaway. Our hotel is close to major corporations like Tata Technologies, Magna, and ITC Holdings Corp., ideal for business travelers attending training sessions or important meetings, and just five miles away from events at Suburban Collection Showplace. Make the drive into Detroit to see the Lions go head-to-head with their opponents at Ford Field or attend a local concert at the Detroit Institute of Arts. For a slower-paced day, stroll through downtown Ann Arbor where you can explore charming shops, restaurants, and spas.Swim laps in the indoor pool or soak quietly in the bubbling hot tub and let life’s stresses float away. After a restful night’s sleep, catch up on the morning headlines with a free weekday newspaper from the lobby and head to the dining room for a free, hot breakfast with freshly brewed coffee. After a day of business meetings, grab a cold beverage from the refrigerator, reheat a snack in the microwave, and relax while you flip through premium channels on the 43-inch TV. Our rooms also offer modern conveniences like free Wi-Fi and a spacious work desk. Located about 30 minutes from the downtown areas of Ann Arbor and Detroit, Novi provides a quiet escape near a variety of attractions, including shopping centers, sports arenas, and casinos. Don’t miss these local favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Saginaw, MI
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Saginaw, MI is conveniently located off I-675 near the Tittabawassee Road shopping strip, with Fashion Square Mall just six minutes away. Our location also makes it easy to visit the Dow Event Center and Japanese Cultural Center, both within five miles of the hotel. We're less than 10 minutes from Saginaw Valley State University, where you can attend Cardinals games. If you need directions, our friendly staff is happy to help you find nearby restaurants and attractions.Enjoy a comfortable stay at our Saginaw hotel thanks to amenities like a heated outdoor pool and a fitness center. If you prefer to relax in your room, unwind with your four-legged friend while browsing the headlines of a free weekday newspaper or catching a movie on the flat-screen TV. Here for work? Our 24-hour business center has you covered, and amenities like early check-in and dry-cleaning services help enhance your stay. After a busy day, head to one of our hotel rooms and suites to sink into a pillowtop bed. You can watch your favorite show on the 32-inch LG LCD TV or prepare a snack in the microwave. In the morning, make yourself a fresh cup of coffee to sip while you browse the free weekday newspaper. The Country Inn & Suites, Saginaw offers a well-located meeting space just off I-675 for both professional and social occasions. Take advantage of free high-speed internet for easy presentations, and set up a room block to get discounted room rates for your group. Make the Country Inn & Suites your home base for exploring central Michigan, and you’ll find a relaxing retreat near local highlights. Drive just six miles to scenic Ojibway Island for biking and fishing, or catch a hockey game at the Dow Event Center. Traveling with the kids? Make sure to visit the Saginaw Children's Zoo to see penguins up close. Don't miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Traverse City, MI
description: Nestled between the east and west branches of Grand Traverse Bay, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Traverse City, MI places you minutes from gorgeous beaches, lakes, ski slopes, and hiking trails. If the great indoors is calling your name instead, check out the City Opera House, Great Lakes Children’s Museum, or the numerous downtown restaurants. For those staying at the hotel in early July, don't miss the world-famous National Cherry Festival!Once you’ve had your fill of food or adrenaline, retreat to your hotel room and use free Wi-Fi to upload photos of your day. Bursting with “up north” charm, our hotel embodies the spirit of Traverse City through our friendly staff and thoughtful amenities, like an indoor pool and a relaxing hot tub. Enjoy a free, hot breakfast each morning with favorites like French toast and waffles before starting your next adventure in our enchanting beach town. Minutes from downtown Traverse City, our hotel rooms are the perfect oasis with pillowtop bedding, HDTVs, and free WI-Fi. While our hotel puts you just 10 minutes away from five beaches, Traverse City has more to offer than fun along the coast. Enjoy great golf, wineries, hiking, skiing, and cultural charm—all just a short drive away. Popular nearby attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Albert Lea, MN
description: Whether you’re staying for several days or just passing through, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Albert Lea, MN offers pet-friendly hotel rooms near the intersection of I-35 and I-90. If you crave outdoor activities, you can find Greenlea Golf Course, Edgewater Park, and Myre-Big Island State Park less than five miles away. You can also arrange to take a chartered excursion on Albert Lea Lake on the Pelican Breeze II cruise boat. Interested in exploring Albert Lea? Downtown is just over a mile from the hotel, less than a five-minute drive away.Start your mornings with a healthy workout in our fitness center or a tranquil swim in our indoor pool. Afterward, enjoy the free, hot breakfast in our dining room. You can keep up with social media thanks to free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. If you left one of your essential toiletries at home, we offer the Did You Forget? Program to help out. Enjoy the comforts of home, such as free Wi-Fi, when you stay with us in Albert Lea. All accommodations feature a microwave and fridge so you can easily create a snack for movie night. If you need to prepare for a meeting, set up your laptop on the spacious work desk. Our pet-friendly rooms allow you to travel with your favorite furry friend. Host up to 60 people in our meeting room and keep everyone refreshed with our complimentary coffee and water service. If you need to give presentations or show videos, reserve our audiovisual equipment and connect to the free Wi-Fi. Contact our staff today and let them help you start planning your next seminar, business function, or social reception. Escape to the beautiful outdoors of southern Minnesota by exploring Albert Lea Lake or reserving a tee time at Wedgewood Cove Golf Club. For some indoor fun, try your luck at Diamond Jo Casino. You can take a tour of the unique SPAM® Museum before seeing a spirited show at the Marion Ross Performing Arts Center. Don’t miss these favorites during your stay: By car:From I-35 N: Take Exit 11 and turn left off the ramp onto E Main Street. Drive for about a mile and turn left onto Prospect Avenue. Almost immediately, turn right onto E Main Frontage Road. The hotel will be on your left soon after.From I-35 S: Shortly after passing the interchange for I-90, take Exit 12 for US-65 toward Albert Lea. Continue on for a mile and a half (the road name will become E Main Street) until Prospect Avenue intersects. Turn left onto Prospect Avenue, and almost immediately turn right onto E Main Frontage Road. The hotel will be on your left soon after. By car: Take Exit 159A to merge onto I-35 S. In less than a mile, take Exit 12 for US-65 toward Albert Lea. Continue on for a mile and a half (the road name will become E Main Street) until Prospect Avenue intersects. Turn left onto Prospect Avenue, and almost immediately turn right onto E Main Frontage Road. The hotel will be on your left soon after.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Albertville, MN
description: Whether you're passing through from I-94 or settling in for a weekend of shopping and dining, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Albertville, MN provides a convenient stay. Our location next to the Albertville Premium Outlets and just 35 miles northwest of Minneapolis is an ideal home base for families seeking bargains and business travelers attending meetings. If you’re looking for some excitement, you can hit the hiking trails at Beebe Lake Regional Park or slide behind the wheel of a go-kart for an adrenaline rush at ProKART. If golf is your recreation of choice, don’t miss a tee time at the Cedar Creek Golf Course, less than three miles away from the hotel.After a day at the outlets or on the links, return to the hotel and unwind by the lobby fireplace. Traveling with kids? Head to the indoor pool, which features a separate children’s wading pool with a fountain. Other thoughtful amenities include our free, hot breakfast, free Wi-Fi, and complimentary coffee and cookies. Each of our hotel rooms and suites is equipped with amenities like a coffeemaker, a microwave, and a refrigerator to help you feel at home. If you need to work, a desk and free Wi-Fi make it easy to stay productive. Heading to the outlets to shop? Fuel up each morning with our free, hot breakfast. Planning a gathering in Albertville? Host up to 40 guests in our 525-square-foot meeting space. Our facilities feature free high-speed internet access and a projector screen so you can show videos and display digital presentations that impress. If you want to offer refreshments, we can provide coffee and baked goods for a small fee or recommend local caterers. Thanks to our convenient location off I-94, you can travel less than 30 minutes away to hike at Lake Maria State Park or pick apples at Deer Lake Orchard. If you prefer an indoor activity, head to ProKART Indoor Racing to zip around the track in a go-kart or walk next door to shop at Albertville Premium Outlets. Don't miss these popular attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Baxter, MN
description: Discover convenient access to Mount Ski Gull, Northland Arboretum, and other sites near Brainerd Lakes when you stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Baxter, MN. Our hotel is only five minutes from the Brainerd International Raceway, as well as just one mile from the closest Paul Bunyan Trail access point for walking and biking enthusiasts. Our location off highways 210 and 371 makes it easy to visit family favorites like Paul Bunyan Land and Crow Wing State Park.Start every morning with our free, hot breakfast and an invigorating workout in the fitness center. You can check on your itinerary details in the business center with free Wi-Fi before taking a relaxing swim in the heated indoor pool. Snuggle up with your dog each night in the comfort of our pet-friendly accommodations. After boating on White Sand Lake or golfing on one of Brainerd's famous courses, put your feet up in one of our pet-friendly hotel rooms or suites. You can connect to social media with the free Wi-Fi or take a break and watch an HBO movie. Chill a drink in the refrigerator and warm up leftovers in the microwave for a quiet night in. Our one-bedroom suites feature a separate living area and a sleeper sofa so your family can stretch out. Usher up to 70 guests into our flexible meeting space for your next event. We make event planning easy with the help of a customized website, and we offer event necessities like free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment. Treat your attendees to beverage service as they gather in the space to watch a presentation on the 32-inch TV with a DVD player. Listen to the call of the great outdoors and head out to explore central Minnesota's beautiful lakes, forests, and trails, such as the extensive Paul Bunyan Trail. After a day of skiing at Mount Ski Gull or playing with your kids at Crow Wing State Park, return to Baxter for great shopping at Westgate Mall. Learn about legendary anglers at the Minnesota Fishing Museum and Hall of Fame, and take in local history at the Crow Wing County Historical Society Museum & Library. Consider these local activities for your itinerary:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bemidji, MN
description: Look out over the south shore of Lake Bemidji and soak up the serenity when you stay at the pet-friendly Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bemidji, MN. Connected to the Sanford Center by an indoor walkway, our hotel is perfect for guests attending conferences or a BSU hockey game. Our location offers easy access to Bemidji State University, local nature trails, shopping centers, and restaurants. Are you hoping to catch walleye or bass on one of our many local lakes? Check out the local fishing guide service and remember that our ample free parking has plenty of room for vehicles towing boats.Bemidji is an ideal family vacation choice, and we welcome your four-legged family members to spacious lakeside rooms offering free Wi-Fi. You can enjoy lake breezes on our outdoor patio with a lake view or a long swim in our indoor pool. And if you need to catch up on work or a presentation, we offer guests a 24-hour business center. Overlooking the crystalline waters of Lake Bemidji, our hotel offers spacious rooms and suites equipped with free Wi-Fi. You can store treats for your pet in the in-room refrigerator and heat your own snack in the microwave. Located adjacent to the Sanford Center and George W. Neilson Convention Center, our lakefront hotel offers a 625-square-foot meeting room. Ideal for team meetings to debrief after the hockey game or small breakout sessions, our room can seat 20 guests or accommodate 40 for standing-room receptions. Located in Minnesota's north woods and overlooking the southern shore of Lake Bemidji, our city is home to outdoor recreation opportunities, a vibrant arts scene, hockey matches, festivals, and picturesque golf courses. Our lakeside hotel is connected to the Sanford Center and two miles from Bemidji State University. Consider adding these local attractions to your itinerary:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bloomington at Mall of America, MN
description: Ideally located off I-494 and Highway 77, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bloomington at Mall of America, MN sits directly across from America's largest shopping complex and is just three miles from Minneapolis–St. Paul International Airport (MSP). During your stay, you can enjoy proximity to the light rail, offering easy access to downtown attractions like Target Field and U.S. Bank Stadium. Corporate travelers appreciate being close to local businesses such as ADP and Ceridian, both about a mile from the hotel.After a busy day of shopping, retreat to one of our indoor pools or hot tubs for a relaxing soak, or indulge in freebies like 24-hour coffee, cookies, and candy. Your morning is sure to be enjoyable with our free, hot breakfast. Made lots of purchases at Mall of America®? You can take a hassle-free ride back to the hotel on our complimentary shuttle, which runs to and from Mall of America® and the MSP airport. We also offer free parking for overnight guests. The following certification shows our hotel's commitment to guests' safety. For more information, visit Safehotels Certification. Our spacious guest rooms and suites offer modern conveniences like free Wi-Fi, coffee and tea facilities, and a flat-screen HDTV. When you’re ready to relax, you can heat up a snack in the microwave and grab a cold drink from the refrigerator. Need some extra space for the family? Book one of our suites and spread out in the separate living room. If you’re hosting a family reunion or business conference, our meeting rooms provide helpful amenities like free Wi-Fi, catering options, and audiovisual equipment rental. The Radisson Room accommodates up to 50 guests in a theater setup and features a visual work center with a whiteboard and a projector screen. For smaller gatherings, our five Hospitality Boardroom Suites seat up to eight guests each. Shop to your heart’s content at IKEA Twin Cities and Mall of America®, both less than a mile’s walk from the hotel. If you’re interested in sightseeing, a quick drive on Interstate 494 or Highway 77 takes you to attractions like Historic Fort Snelling, the Science Museum of Minnesota, and the Minnesota Zoo. Be sure to check out these Twin Cities attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Brooklyn Center
description: Discover charm and convenience at Radisson Hotel Brooklyn Center, located off I-694 and less than 10 miles north of Minneapolis and St. Paul. We’re positioned along the scenic Mississippi River, which gives you access to more than 500 acres of parks and walking paths. Great for business travelers, our location places you a short distance from companies like Global Northwest, Roberts-Hamilton Company, SIS Enterprises Inc., the Federal Bureau of Investigation, and Medtronic. Ready to explore the Twin Cities? Spend the afternoon shopping at Mall of America® or cheer on the Minnesota Twins at Target Field.After a busy day, stretch your legs with a complimentary bike rental or sunbathe by the hotel’s glass-enclosed pool while you check email with free Wi-Fi. Getting hungry? You can grab a seat at the on-site Serrano’s Cocina, which offers tasty American classics for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Room service is available when you want a quiet meal in the privacy of your suite. Each of our 174 hotel rooms and suites offers plush bedding and premium TV channels so you can kick back and watch Minnesota Vikings game highlights with ease. Order room service to stay focused on meeting prep while connected to free Wi-Fi. Pet-friendly rooms and spacious suites with sleeper sofas are also available if you’re traveling with the whole family. Looking for event space to host your upcoming business seminar or family reunion? The Radisson offers a conference center with 13,276 square feet of meeting space spread across 10 rooms. Work with our knowledgeable event coordinator to plan the wedding reception of your dreams in our 3,600-square-foot Grand Ballroom, or hold a board meeting for 12 in our Executive Boardroom.                                     When you’d prefer a quiet meal on your own, room service is available.                                 Need a hearty meal before heading to the big game at Target Field? Grab a seat at Serrano’s Cocina, which offers tasty American classics for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. When you return to the hotel, relax during happy hour at the bar or head to the restaurant’s game area for some friendly competition. Radisson Hotel Brooklyn Center places you within easy reach of conferences at Earle Brown Heritage Center and Xcel Energy Center. Use your downtime to travel less than 20 minutes to St. Paul and Minneapolis, where you can see a show at Ordway Center for the Performing Arts or treat your family to a tour of the Minnesota Children’s Museum. Check out these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Buffalo, MN
description: Located just off Highway 55 northwest of Minneapolis, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Buffalo, MN is only a mile from charming downtown Buffalo. Bring your whole family to see exhibitions at the nearby Buffalo Rodeo Grounds, or pack your golf clubs to enjoy a round at Wild Marsh Golf Club, about three miles away from our hotel. After a busy day of meetings at nearby companies, relax in a spacious hotel room or suite with free high-speed internet access and HBO. In the morning, you can stop by our complimentary, hot breakfast to fuel a day of lakeside fun or shopping at Albertville Premium Outlets.Traveling with kids? Let them burn off energy in our heated indoor pool while you soak in the soothing hot tub. When you’re hungry for a snack, pop into the lobby for complimentary coffee, cookies, and candy. We even offer the Did You Forget? Program in case you leave your toothbrush behind. Warm up a snack in the microwave, open a drink you’ve chilled in the refrigerator, and turn on a comedy special on TV in one of our rooms or suites. After a good night’s sleep, you can brew coffee and answer email in the comfort of your room thanks to free internet access. Situated less than an hour northwest of the Twin Cities, Buffalo is home to the natural beauty and outdoor recreational opportunities that make Minnesota famous. Pristine lakes, fabulous golf courses, and local orchards keep outdoorsy folks happy, while shopping, eclectic dining options, and a local history museum offer rainy-day entertainment. Don’t miss these top attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Chanhassen, MN
description: Plan a memorable getaway to the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Chanhassen, MN, just minutes from Eden Prairie and US 212. You can walk next door to experience an exhilarating show at Chanhassen Dinner Theatres, or you can tour Paisley Park, the estate and recording studio of the late musical artist Prince, just five minutes from the hotel. Downtown Minneapolis is about a 30-minute drive away as well as exciting attractions such as Mall of America®, one of the world’s largest malls. Both corporate and leisure travelers appreciate our free shuttle, which runs to businesses up to 10 miles away.Looking for entertainment at the hotel? Keep the whole family happy with our heated pool and free Wi-Fi or with a visit to the adjacent cinema complex. When you need to unwind at day’s end, you can visit our High Timber Lounge to relax over a drink or kick back by our lobby fireplace to enjoy a complimentary cookie and hot coffee or tea. In the mornings, start the day with a tasty waffle at our free, hot breakfast. You can easily keep your family entertained in our comfortable hotel rooms and suites, which offer 32-inch HDTVs and free Wi-Fi. Chill drinks in your room’s fridge or heat snacks in the microwave to enjoy while you kick back and watch a show. In the morning, an aromatic cup of coffee made in your room will have you ready for another adventure in the Twin Cities area. Close to Minneapolis suburbs like Eden Prairie, our High Timber conference facilities provide more than 1,600 square feet of space for up to 120 guests. We offer amenities like free Wi-Fi, catering, and audiovisual equipment to help events run smoothly. The on-site High Timber Lounge is available for post-conference conversation and drinks.                                 Visit our on-site High Timber Lounge to chat with clients and colleagues over a drink after meetings. Or if you’re tired from a long day of sightseeing, drop by to round out your day with a cold beer. Explore the sights near the Country Inn & Suites with our free area shuttle. You can book a cruise on Lake Minnetonka and catch a movie at the Chanhassen Cinema nearby. For big-city attractions, make the easy drive 20 miles northeast to downtown Minneapolis, home to well-known attractions like Target Field, Guthrie Theater, and U.S. Bank Stadium. We especially recommend these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Coon Rapids, MN
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Coon Rapids, MN offers a convenient location outside the bustle of Minneapolis. Spend a day on the links at Bunker Hills Golf Club, take an afternoon to explore Mall of America, or see the Twins play at Target Field. Our hotel is also less than five miles from the National Sports Center if your team needs to visit the Super Rink, the Velodrome, or Victory Links Golf Course.Each morning before heading out to practice or for a day of adventure, enjoy our complimentary, hot breakfast. Keep your team’s uniforms fresh for the field with on-site laundry facilities, or use free Wi-Fi to scope out the next day’s game schedule. In the evenings, unwind in the hot tub and heated indoor pool or get in some stretching in the fitness center. Need to print your team roster? Stop by our business center on your way out the door. End a day of work or play in the Twin Cities with a great night’s rest in our rooms and suites. Fire up your laptop and enjoy free Wi-Fi, or settle back with a snack and click through the cable TV channels. To feel extra snug, consider upgrading to a room with a fireplace. Featuring 3,300 square feet of space, our meeting facilities are an ideal choice for events in northern Minneapolis. We offer amenities like free Wi-Fi, an LCD projector, and catering assistance. If you’re traveling with a team, use our event space for strategy sessions before you head to the National Sports Center, just a 10-minute drive away. Planning a wedding? Inquire about our shuttle service for guests who book 15 or more rooms. One of Minneapolis’s northern suburbs, Coon Rapids is just minutes from businesses like Medtronic, Cummins, and Thermo Fisher Scientific. Stay a short drive from the top attractions in the Twin Cities, including Target Field, Mall of America, and Como Park Zoo & Conservatory. Make time to visit all of these can’t-miss attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Cottage Grove, MN
description: Conveniently situated just off Highway 10 on the south side of St. Paul, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Cottage Grove, MN is a great place to stay for business and leisure travelers visiting the Twin Cities. Step into our welcoming lobby, grab a complimentary cookie, or relax in front of the fireplace with a good book from home. If you're traveling for work, our hotel is within five miles of businesses like 3M and Werner Electric, and we offer on-site conveniences like free Wi-Fi and a business center.Let the kids sleep in while you start the day with an invigorating plunge into our heated indoor pool or a workout in our fitness center. Afterward, stop by our free, hot breakfast for waffles and other morning treats. After seeing the sights or attending a meeting on site, slip into your comfortable room or suite to surf the web with free Wi-Fi. You can microwave a snack in your room and then catch up on your favorite show on the flat-screen TV. Reserve our 700-square-foot meeting room for your reception, conference, or social event with up to 40 attendees. We offer free Wi-Fi, audiovisual equipment, and a portable screen to help your presentation stand out. For assistance with catering or to reserve a block of rooms for your out-of-town guests, just ask our friendly, knowledgeable staff. If you're traveling with your whole family, the Minnesota Zoo and Hamlet Park offer a full day of can't-miss entertainment. Located within minutes of area companies like 3M, Up North Plastics, and Northern Tier Energy, our Cottage Grove hotel is also close to great corporate-outing options like golf at River Oaks Golf Course. Be sure to check out these outstanding local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Detroit Lakes, MN
description: Featuring a convenient location just off Highway 10, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Detroit Lakes, MN provides a quiet retreat within driving distance of a variety of local attractions and recreational areas. Home to sparkling Minnesota lakes and abundant hiking and skiing trails, the Detroit Lakes region is an ideal destination for outdoor enthusiasts. Soak up the sun at Detroit Lakes City Beach, two miles from the hotel, or hit the links at Detroit Country Club, seven miles away. If you're visiting over the summer, don't miss fun events like the WE Fest country music festival at Soo Pass Ranch or the family-friendly Northwest Water Carnival.Unwind after a day of boating or hiking in your modern hotel room or suite. You can catch up on your favorite show on the cable TV or brew yourself a soothing cup of coffee or tea with the in-room coffeemaker. Our fitness center allows you to keep up with your exercise routine. Afterward, take a dip in our indoor pool or visit our on-site hot tub. Our Country Inn & Suites offers 45 modern hotel rooms and suites with free Wi-Fi. You can enjoy your favorite snacks from the in-room refrigerator and microwave or fuel up for a day of fishing, hiking, or swimming with a fresh cup of coffee brewed with your room's coffeemaker. Hosting a birthday party, bridal shower, or family reunion in Detroit Lakes? Our hotel offers 500 square feet of event space perfect for your upcoming social gathering. Our flexible facilities can accommodate up to 49 guests and include perks like free Wi-Fi and tables and chairs that can be arranged in a variety of configurations. From swimming and sunbathing to fishing, hiking, and biking, the Detroit Lakes region offers abundant activities to enjoy. Pack a picnic for an afternoon of fun at Dunton Locks County Park, or discover a variety of local art vendors at the Arts & Crafts in the Park festival each July. Local favorites include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Duluth North, MN
description: Situated conveniently near Duluth International Airport (DLH), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Duluth North, MN offers pet-friendly hotel accommodations with complimentary airport shuttle service and free Wi-Fi. If you’re an outdoor enthusiast, you’ll appreciate easy access to Canal Park and Park Point Beach, home of the world's largest freshwater sandbar on Lake Superior. In the mood to shop? Nearby Miller Hill Mall boasts over 100 stores for you to browse. After a day of excitement, head to the fitness center to work out or make your way to the hot tub to unwind. Each morning, we'll help you start the day right with a full array of hearty favorites at our free, hot breakfast. In town with the family? Bring your kids to our indoor pool and let them zoom down the waterslide. If you’re visiting on corporate duties, our 24-hour business center provides an ideal place to catch up with work. When the day is over, sink into plush bedding in one of our spacious rooms or suites. Our accommodations are equipped with a microwave and a refrigerator for easy snack preparation, along with coffee and tea facilities for a fresh start to your day. Our 900-square-foot conference room is a great place to host business gatherings and special events in Duluth for up to 100 guests. Meeting planners can enjoy helpful amenities like free Wi-Fi, audiovisual equipment, and complimentary water and coffee upon request. Our knowledgeable staff is also happy to assist with catering recommendations and planning so you can focus on the details of your event. Set sail on the largest freshwater lake in the world or explore the historic 39-room Glensheen mansion during your stay in Duluth. Just minutes from Canal Park and Miller Hill Mall, our hotel offers easy access to unbeatable shopping, golfing, and skiing. Don't miss these highly recommended attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Duluth-Harborview
description: A local landmark just steps from Canal Park and the Skywalk, Radisson Hotel Duluth-Harborview is Minnesota’s only circular hotel. You can use the Skywalk to reach shops, restaurants, and museums that are scattered along the waterfront or hop aboard our complimentary shuttle to get to the airport and other nearby attractions. After meetings at nearby government offices or at corporations such as Essentia Health, you can enjoy breathtaking views of Lake Superior while dining on innovative American cuisine at JJ Astor.On a weekend getaway from the Twin Cities? Indulge in complete relaxation with our indoor pool, hot tub, and sauna. Thanks to our pet-friendly policy, you can bring a four-legged friend to keep you company. We also offer free Wi-Fi, a fitness center, and free parking to make your stay more convenient.  Our 268 distinctively shaped rooms and suites deliver picture-perfect views of downtown Duluth and Lake Superior. Stretch out in a spacious standard room or upgrade to a one-bedroom suite for added space. Room amenities include free Wi-Fi, coffee and tea facilities, a microwave, and a refrigerator. Our well-equipped meeting rooms at Radisson Hotel Duluth-Harborview offer nearly 9,000 square feet of event space for family reunions, wedding receptions, and corporate conferences. Out-of-town guests appreciate being just a 15-minute drive from Duluth International Airport (DLH). Meeting amenities such as free Wi‑Fi and on-site catering help keep everyone engaged throughout your event. Located on the 16th floor of the hotel, our revolving restaurant, JJ Astor, overlooks downtown Duluth and Lake Superior and serves sophisticated American cuisine. Savor creative dishes prepared with locally sourced ingredients for breakfast, lunch, or dinner every day of the week. For a setting that’s more casual, drop by Bowery Bros. Pub and fill up on your favorite bar foods and local craft beers. You can also enjoy a quiet meal in your room when you order from our room service menu. With a location in the heart of downtown Duluth, our hotel makes it easy to find fun things to do right outside our doors. Take your kids to the Great Lakes Aquarium or Hawk Ridge Observatory, and then spend time exploring Canal Park and Park Point Beach. If you're interested in entertainment, the hotel is within walking distance of AMSOIL Arena, Duluth Entertainment Convention Center, and Bayfront Festival Park. Check out these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Eagan, MN
description: Located less than seven miles from Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport (MSP), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Eagan, MN is the perfect place to rest outside the Twin Cities. Hotel guests can enjoy easy access to top attractions like Mall of America®, Minnesota Children's Museum, and Minnesota Zoo. When it's time to relax, enjoy a dip in our heated indoor pool or a soak in our hot tub.Gear up each morning with a free, hot breakfast and enjoy easy access to nearby attractions thanks to our complimentary shuttle service. Relax in your room or suite with a cold drink stashed in your fridge and cap off the evening with a good movie on HBO. Children under 18 stay free in the same room with an adult. Located only eight minutes from the MSP airport, our hotel is ideal for your business conference in Eagan. We offer meeting space capable of seating up to 30 guests, and our friendly staff is on hand to assist with everything from event setup to catering arrangements. Our location in Eagan keeps you close to the fun and excitement of the Twin Cities. Catch a few innings with the Twins at Target Field or watch the Timberwolves play at the Target Center. If shopping is on your agenda, check out Twin Cities Premium Outlets for great bargains on name-brand merchandise or visit Mall of America®, where you’ll find 500 stores, a theme park, mini golf, and an aquarium.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Elk River, MN
description: Located 40 minutes from the bustle of Minneapolis, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Elk River, MN is the perfect retreat away from the busy city. Spend the day exploring the best galleries, museums, and restaurants in the Twin Cities and then head back to your serene hotel room to stretch out on plush bedding while watching HBO. If you’re not up for a big-city excursion, stay in Elk River, a town "Powered by Nature," and treat yourself to a family picnic on the shores of Lake Orono or a shopping spree at Albertville Premium Outlets.Whether you’re in town for the excitement of Minneapolis or for small-city charm, you can wake up each morning with our free, hot breakfast to help you stay energized throughout the day. If you need to unwind, enjoy a soak in our indoor pool or hot tub. After a day of meetings, hiking, or outlet shopping, relax in your room or suite by streaming your favorite shows with free high-speed internet or catching a movie on HBO. Traveling with family? Little ones appreciate having their own space in our cribs or rollaway beds. Looking to host an afternoon or evening event in Elk River? We offer 970 square feet of meeting space capable of seating up to 50 guests. Enjoy access to free high-speed internet and our business center, as well as a projector and screen. Our friendly staff is on hand to help with everything from event setup to catering arrangements. Be sure to pack your hiking boots for your stay at the Country Inn & Suites, Elk River, MN, which puts you minutes away from outdoor recreation like Sand Dunes State Forest and Lake Orono. If the shops are calling your name, drive just 40 minutes out to downtown Minneapolis. Popular nearby attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fergus Falls, MN
description: At the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fergus Falls, MN, you’re just steps away from conferences, weddings, and seminars at the Bigwood Event Center, situated next door. After your event, get outdoors to hike, bike, or photograph our gorgeous city and state parks, or wander along the picturesque Central Lakes Trail. Our hotel also puts you within easy reach of the Prairie Wetlands Learning Center, Red Horse Ranch Arena, and the I-94 Speedway.After taking in scenic views at a nearby lake, return to the hotel to unwind with a soak in our hot tub or a relaxing dip in the heated indoor pool. You can stay on track with your health goals by making a trip to our on-site fitness center, which features free weights, a treadmill, and other cardio equipment. In the morning, stop by the front desk for a Grab and Go breakfast. Let our friendly staff check you into one of our generously sized rooms or suites. Families appreciate the convenience of an in-room refrigerator and a microwave, and business travelers enjoy having amenities like a free weekday newspaper and free Wi-Fi. We also offer balcony rooms with a view of the pool. Let us be your home away from home while you attend or host a conference, wedding, or trade show at the Bigwood Event Center, connected to our hotel. You can find the perfect space for your gathering in one of eight meeting rooms, each equipped with convenient services like free high-speed internet access, on-site catering, and planning assistance from our knowledgeable staff.                                     Take advantage of room service to enjoy a meal in the privacy of your room or suite.                                 When you’re hungry for dinner, check out the Grey Duck Grill, our on-site, full-service restaurant. Indulge in American cuisine featuring sandwiches, salads, steaks, and more. If you love the outdoors, don’t miss out on the countless hiking, fishing, and biking opportunities located just minutes from our hotel. You can also catch a hockey game at Fergus Falls Community Arena, stroll along the beautiful River Walk in downtown Fergus Falls, or take a scenic drive around Otter Tail Lake. Check out these top attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Forest Lake, MN
description: Situated just off I-35, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Forest Lake, MN is the perfect place to take a break from traveling and enjoy some downtime. From our conveniently located hotel, you can explore the great outdoors at Eko Backen, with snow tubing in the winter and miniature golf in the summer. You can also cruise the St. Croix River on Taylors Falls Scenic Boat Tours.Not up for an outdoor adventure? Relax in our indoor pool and melt away any travel fatigue with a soak in our hot tub. Start each morning with our free, hot breakfast while you read the headlines in the free weekday newspaper. To stay energized, stop by our lobby for free coffee and cookies throughout the day. After a day of outdoor adventure, kick back in your room or suite where you can browse the internet using our free Wi-Fi or watch a movie on HBO. Each of our rooms also offers convenient amenities like a refrigerator and a microwave. Ask about connecting rooms if you’re traveling with extended family. Our on-site meeting room is ideal for hosting business meetings, family reunions, and other social gatherings. Enhance your get-together with convenient amenities such as free Wi-Fi, a business center, and audiovisual equipment. Our friendly staff is available to assist with everything from event setup to catering arrangements. Head into St. Paul to explore the capital of Minnesota or hit the fairways at one of the golf courses near our hotel. To learn about the area’s Swedish heritage, visit the Gammelgården Museum. Feel like shopping? Browse for vintage finds at the nearby Lindstrom Antique Mall. Check out these nearby favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Grand Rapids, MN
description: Conveniently located off US Route 169, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Grand Rapids, MN lets you experience all the city's unique charms. Head next door to Judy Garland's childhood home, and enjoy a trip back to Oz. Get to know the local area with a tour of the Forest History Center and the Historic Central School. Families won’t want to miss the Children’s Discovery Museum, within walking distance of our hotel, or a day trip to Chippewa National Forest for beautiful hiking trails, swimming holes, and more.Need to relax after some time on the road? We offer a heated indoor pool and a hot tub. After a refreshing swim, stop by the lobby for a complimentary cookie to enjoy while you kick back in one of our spacious rooms with your canine traveling companion. Start every day with the free, hot breakfast, and use free Wi-Fi to upload vacation photos for friends and family to enjoy. After your arrival, decompress in a modern hotel room or suite by brewing a fresh cup of coffee and surfing the web with our free Wi-Fi. Our pet-friendly accommodations make it easy to travel with your entire family. You can store your favorite snacks in the fridge and heat them up in the microwave. Cap off the evening with a good movie on HBO before bedtime. Shop the latest trends at nearby Central Square Mall before attending an inspiring show at the Reif Performing Arts Center. Pack up your family for an exciting day trip to Chippewa National Park, where you can hike, fish, swim, ski, and more. Wizard of Oz fans won’t want to miss touring the Judy Garland Museum, filled with movie memorabilia. You can also experience the rich history and culture of Grand Rapids at these favorite sites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Little Falls, MN
description: Located near Highway 10, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Little Falls, MN is a quiet escape near many area attractions. Visit Pine Grove Zoo to see stunning animals like Siberian tigers, or stop by the boyhood home of famous aviator Charles Lindbergh and walk the grounds that inspired him to fly. If Camp Ripley is your destination, our hotel is located just a few miles from the military base.After a long flight or a day exploring Little Falls, relax with a dip in our indoor pool or a soothing soak in our hot tub. Begin each morning with a free, hot breakfast, and flip the pages of a free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper while you sip coffee by our newly renovated lobby fireplace. If you need a quick workout, you can take your four-legged friend for a walk in Maple Island Park, or visit our on-site fitness center. Need to send a fax to the office? Our business center is open 24 hours. Make yourself at home in your room or suite by warming up leftovers in the microwave before streaming your favorite shows using free Wi-Fi. Grab some chilled drinks from the refrigerator before a day of nearby hiking, and then sleep peacefully in a plush bed. With our pet-friendly options, the whole family can enjoy the trip. Make the most out of your time in Little Falls by exploring the great outdoors. Maple Island Park is filled with walking trails, waterfalls, and gazebos, making it a perfect spot for a family picnic. For a chance to see sandhill cranes and other wetland wildlife, visit Crane Meadows National Wildlife Refuge. Other local favorites include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Mankato Hotel and Conference Center, MN
description: Nestled in a charming college town, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Mankato Hotel and Conference Center, MN offers guests a comfortable retreat just 14 minutes from the Minnesota State University, Mankato campus. After you’ve visited your favorite student or explored the exhibits on display at the Carnegie Art Center, find time to unwind at one of the many local breweries or wineries. Outdoor enthusiasts also appreciate our proximity to the Minnesota River, chock-full of opportunities to kayak and tube.Once you’ve settled in, take a relaxing dip in the indoor pool and hot tub or recline in an Adirondack chair by the firepit. If you need to kick up your energy, head to the fitness center for a quick workout. Corporate guests appreciate our expansive on-site meeting facilities and well-equipped business center with a computer and a printer. As you relax in your room or suite, catch up on your favorite HBO series or research local attractions using free Wi-Fi. You can store your purchases from local wineries in the refrigerator and heat up leftovers from lunch in the microwave. Whether you’re planning a romantic getaway or a family vacation, upgrade to a suite for additional space and features like a whirlpool or a separate living room. With more than 8,000 square feet of flexible meeting space that can accommodate more than 400 guests, the Country Inn & Suites is sure to have the perfect space for your business seminar, family reunion, or gala. Reserve the elegant ballroom for a beautiful wedding reception and request a personalized booking web page for your guests. Corporate gatherings benefit from free Wi-Fi, audiovisual equipment, and business center access. While you’re visiting our bustling college town, don’t miss the lively Minnesota State University, Mankato campus, home to the Earley Center for Performing Arts.
