To take advantage of the scenery, reserve a tee time at Terrace View Golf Course or book an outdoor tasting at one of the many wineries nearby, such as Chankaska Creek Ranch & Winery. Must-see local attractions include:

name: Radisson Blu Minneapolis Downtown
description: A landmark of the Twin Cities skyline, the upper upscale Radisson Blu Minneapolis Downtown welcomes you to our city center location. Walk to Target Field, the theaters of Hennepin Avenue, Target Center, and U.S. Bank Stadium. Our convenient hotel also has direct access to the Minneapolis Skyway System, so you can stroll to downtown sites like the Minneapolis Convention Center and Hennepin County Government Center in comfort whatever the weather. For breakfast, lunch, and dinner, head to the on-site FireLake Grill House & Cocktail Bar, a popular downtown restaurant serving farm-to-table cuisine with a Midwestern flair. If you need suggestions for after-dinner entertainment, our concierge team is happy to provide advice and tips. In Minneapolis for work? Host a meeting with clients in one of our three boardrooms or four meeting rooms. Reserve the modern ballroom for a grand wedding ceremony and reception, or select one of the smaller rooms for a productive business meeting. The following certification shows our hotel's commitment to guests' safety. For more information, visit Safehotels Certification. Each of the 360 rooms and suites at the Radisson Blu Minneapolis Downtown features calming decor with a light, neutral color palette and sleek furnishings. After settling in, you can use free Wi-Fi to respond to emails or check the forecast before heading to a Twins game. A refrigerator makes it easy to store your favorite drinks and snacks, and the coffee and tea facilities ensure you’re awake and ready to tackle the day. With access to the Skyway System and a location in the commercial and business district, our hotel is a convenient choice for business and social events. Reserve the modern ballroom for your next company conference, or select one of the smaller meeting spaces for an intimate wedding. Creative catering menus, audiovisual equipment, and free Wi-Fi ensure your gathering is remembered for all the right reasons. Whether you want to indulge in a leisurely brunch in your pajamas or need to refuel at your desk, you can enjoy the fresh local flavors of FireLake Grill House & Cocktail Bar delivered straight to your door.Contact informationPhone: +1 (612) 216-3473 Savor Midwestern-inspired cuisine in a sophisticated setting at our on-site restaurant, FireLake Grill House & Cocktail Bar. Executive Chef Robert Foster uses local ingredients like sustainable beef and small-batch artisan cheeses to create hearty dishes bursting with fresh flavors. Want to relax with colleagues after meetings or catch up with friends before a concert? Head to the bar for a craft beer or a cocktail made with locally distilled spirits. Our central location places you within easy walking distance of top venues like Target Center and Target Field, Nicollet shopping, the theaters of Hennepin Avenue, and the city’s best restaurants. The hotel is a stop on the enclosed Skyway System, allowing you to navigate downtown in comfort during the frigid Minnesota winters. We’re just seven blocks from the Minneapolis Convention Center and a quick light rail ride from Mall of America®. Be sure to add these unmissable attractions to your Minneapolis itinerary: By train:From Terminal 1-Lindbergh station, take the Blue light rail line to Nicollet Mall station, which is roughly two blocks from the hotel.By car: Traveling by car via MN-62 W and I-35W N is typically the fastest route. It’s only about 13 miles from the airport to the hotel. On foot:The Nicollet Mall light rail station is roughly two blocks (0.3 miles) from the hotel. Head down Nicollet Avenue, take a right on S 7th Street, and you’ll see the hotel on your left. On foot:The Warehouse District/Hennepin light rail station is roughly two blocks (0.3 miles) from the hotel. Walk down Hennepin Avenue and take a left onto S 7th Street.

name: Radisson RED Minneapolis Downtown
description: At Radisson RED Minneapolis Downtown, we’re well connected—to the Skywalk for winter strolls, to blazing-fast free Wi-Fi, and to the vibrant arts scene that makes the city more than just Minnesota Nice. Fall Sundays, we dream in purple because the Vikings score their touchdowns at U.S. Bank Stadium, about a block from our hotel. Looking for the city’s top art museums, rock clubs, or ethnic eateries? Minneapolis is known for all three, and we’re here to help. Just say the word.It’s a truth universally acknowledged that meetings are more fun with a ping-pong table. That’s kind of our thing. After you’re done crunching the numbers or crushing your opponents, head to our on-site restaurant for some of the city’s top nosh or fit in a workout at our fitness center. The following certification shows our hotel's commitment to guests' safety. For more information, visit Safehotels Certification. Bright, bold, and beautiful, our studios and corner studios mirror Minneapolis’s artsy vibe with wall-sized graphic designs. You can shut the blackout shades to catch a nap or crank up the Love-Yourself Lighting to get ready for a night out. For a night in, stash drinks in the fridge and use free Wi-Fi and in-room pairing technology to stream your own content on the large TV. Our Boston Terrier, Baxter, insists that dogs are invited to the party at Radisson RED. Check out our pet policy and pack their suitcases because your four-legged friends are always welcome.Only domestic pets (dogs/cats) are allowed.No more than two (2) domestic pets are allowed per room.Guests must sign a pet policy agreement.If a dog weighs more than 40 pounds, guests should contact the hotel directly to discuss a waiver.The pet program at RED includes a bandana, a bed, and a water and food dish. We love efficiency, and we hate boring. That’s what drives us to make meetings easy and fun, with the latest in A/V technology and seamless catering from our very own OUIBar + KTCHN. At 1,000 square feet, our 74-person Events & Games Studio is modern, flexible, and designed to take the blasé out of business. Start with free Wi-Fi and an LED projector, and end with board games and a ping-pong table. Or flip the script—it’s your call. It’s simple. At OUIBar + KTCHN, we celebrate the city’s craft food and drink scene. Our food is always fresh, locally sourced, and inspired by local street fare.We replaced room service with the flexibility to grab your order to go via the Radisson RED app. Our OUIBar + KTCHN team is full of local enthusiasts who will let you in on the city’s secret hot spots and tell you what to order. From Gold Medal Park to the Guthrie Theater, Radisson RED puts you near some of the best attractions in Minneapolis. Get a feel for the city’s unique love affair with art at the Walker Art Center, or dive into its musical roots at First Avenue, where Prince recorded a live version of “Purple Rain.” No matter the weather, Minneapolis is a hub of effortless creativity and a bustling business destination all year long. By light rail:From Terminal 1-Lindbergh station, take the Blue line northbound to Mpls-Target Field and get off at U.S. Bank Stadium station.By car:Drive approximately 10 miles via Highway 55 W/Hiawatha Avenue.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Northfield, MN
description: Reserve your hotel stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Northfield, MN to be near both the shops of historic downtown and the natural beauty of Nerstrand Big Woods State Park. Prospective students and their families enjoy our convenient location less than a mile from Carleton College and St. Olaf College. After a campus tour, you can head downtown to shop or learn about our town’s history, including how the Northfield citizens thwarted a robbery by Jesse James.Unwind after a busy day exploring with a dip in our heated indoor pool, or sit out by our fire pit and roast marshmallows. If you still have a sweet tooth, stop by the lobby for some complimentary cookies. Need to check in at the office? Use our 24-hour business center to send a fax, or check your email using free Wi-Fi in the privacy of your room. Enjoy the comforts of home in your room or suite by storing your favorite drink in the fridge, making a snack in the microwave, and streaming your favorite shows using free Wi-Fi. Looking to host a small event in Northfield? Our breakfast area provides a warm environment for business meetings and intimate social functions. We offer you and up to 20 guests access to free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour business center. For an exciting day trip, pack up the family and drive into Minneapolis for a shopping spree at Mall of America®. If you want to stay closer to home, take an afternoon to wander through Northfield’s historic downtown, or explore the campuses of nearby colleges. You can also play 18 holes at Northfield Golf Club or take pictures of rare wildlife at Nerstrand Big Woods State Park. Other area favorites include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Owatonna, MN
description: At the family-friendly Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Owatonna, MN, our spacious hotel rooms provide a convenient home base for exploring the great outdoors and local shopping alike. Take I-35 for a day trip into the Twin Cities, or meet with clients at nearby businesses like the Owatonna Hospital and Mayo Clinic Health System - Owatonna. You can also treat your kids to a morning at the Reptile & Amphibian Discovery (RAD) Zoo before treating yourself to an afternoon at Cabela’s or the Ultra Outlets of Medford. Set aside some time to discover the area’s natural beauty at spots like Rice Lake State Park, or take your family to splash at River Springs Water Park.Free Wi-Fi and a business center featuring fax and copy services help you get work done while you’re traveling. Before a meeting, start your morning at our free, hot breakfast. No matter what brings you to town, you can end every day with a dip in our heated indoor pool. Want to stay in shape? Visit our fitness center, and then soothe tired muscles with a soak in our hot tub. Get some much-needed rest and relaxation by stretching out in one of our spacious rooms or suites. Curl up on your room’s pillowtop mattress and use free Wi-Fi to upload pictures of your ski vacation or family reunion. You can also channel surf on the 32-inch flat-screen TV while you enjoy a snack from the in-room microwave and refrigerator. The conveniently located Country Inn & Suites provides an ideal event venue off I-35 for business meetings, reunions, and rehearsal dinners with up to 25 people. Use high-quality audiovisual equipment for presentations, and have your attendees follow along with free Wi-Fi. Take advantage of amenities like a personalized event web page and catering suggestions from our knowledgeable staff to make your get-together even more memorable. Enjoy a variety of seasonal activities when you visit Owatonna, such as cross-country skiing at some of Owatonna's many parks and trails during winter or browsing vendors at the Steele County Free Fair each summer. Any time of year is perfect for visiting the amphibians at RAD Zoo or touring exhibits at the Owatonna Arts Center. Make time in your itinerary to visit the Twin Cities, directly north of the hotel, and tour popular sites like Mall of America. Nearby attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Minneapolis West, MN
description: For a relaxing stay just 10 miles west of downtown Minneapolis, book a room or suite at the conveniently located Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Minneapolis West, MN. Corporate travelers appreciate our on-site business center and our location in Carlson Center, the city’s largest business park and home to companies like Wells Fargo, Siemens, and General Mills. Take the kids to catch a Minnesota Twins game at Target Field downtown, or ride the coasters and shop at the mammoth Mall of America. Both attractions are less than 15 miles away from our hotel.Our quiet hotel near Minnetonka offers weekday business travelers and weekend vacationers a free, hot breakfast, two indoor pools, and beautiful, contemporary hotel rooms. We also offer other thoughtful amenities like a hot tub, a fitness center, and free weekday shuttle service to businesses within a five-mile radius. Our rooms and suites exude a modern, natural style and feature conveniences like room service and a free weekday newspaper. Sleep deeply with premium down bedding, and look your best with amenities such as an iron, an ironing board, and a hair dryer. Whether you’re planning a sports team trip or a breakout session during a day of meetings, the Country Inn & Suites, Minneapolis West offers several convenient options. Reserve a block of guest rooms for attendees, and plan an event for up to 12 people. We can set up a private web page that allows guests to book their rooms and find out details of the event. In the mood to enjoy dinner in your room? Located adjacent to the Country Inn & Suites, Grizzly’s can deliver menu selections straight to your door.Contact information Phone: +1 (414) 837-2121 After your meetings, head out with coworkers to enjoy all that Minneapolis has to offer. Since downtown is only about 10 miles from our hotel, guests have plenty of shopping and dining options nearby. The Target Center is home court for the NBA’s Minnesota Timberwolves, and Major League Baseball’s Minnesota Twins have the home field advantage at Target Field. Families can experience up-close encounters with a variety of animals at the Minnesota Zoo, about a 20-mile drive from the hotel. Check out these attractions near Plymouth:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Red Wing, MN
description: You're never far from the area's top attractions and companies when you stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Red Wing, MN. Our hotel is just off US-61, providing you with easy access to the Treasure Island Casino and Welch Village ski and snowboard area. If your plans include the Twin Cities, Eau Claire, or Rochester, our central location is within an hour of all three.If leisure brings you to Red Wing, you won’t want to miss a visit to Falconer Vineyards or the Pottery Museum of Red Wing. After a day of fun on the Cannon Valley Trail, soothe tired muscles in the heated indoor pool. Or you can visit the hotel’s fitness center to keep up your healthy routine while traveling. Our free Wi-Fi keeps you connected to the office and family in the comfort of our rooms and suites. Each of our hotel's 61 rooms and suites offers comfortable bedding and essential amenities, including free Wi-Fi. You’ll feel at home thanks to an in-room refrigerator and microwave for your snacks and beverages. And after a busy day of meetings or travel, you can relax with an HBO movie before drifting off to sleep on a king or queen bed. Let us help make your next family gathering or business meeting a success when you host it at our hotel. Our meeting space can accommodate 40 attendees. Essential tools like free Wi-Fi and a business center ensure you’re ready for your presentation. And with our ample parking and location with direct access to US-61, your guests will find it easy to attend your event. Our friendly staff is on hand to help you with catering recommendations. Red Wing is perched along the upper Mississippi River and an hour from the Twin Cities. Well known for its local pottery, Red Wing offers visitors plenty of reasons to explore our vibrant small town. From winter fun on nearby slopes to summer hiking and biking along the Cannon Valley Trail, check out these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rochester South, MN
description: Located less than 15 minutes from the heart of downtown Rochester, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rochester South, MN provides guests with a convenient home base near I-90 and the Mayo Clinic. Free Wi-Fi keeps you connected from the privacy of your room so you can let friends and family know how much you loved a concert at the Mayo Civic Center or a tasting at Four Daughters Vineyard & Winery. Athletic groups also benefit from staying at our comfortable hotel near the Graham Arena Complex and Rochester Regional Stadium & Bubble. When it’s time to head home, we’re less than a 10-minute drive from Rochester International Airport (RST).You can ride our complimentary shuttle to clinic appointments and then return to the hotel for a relaxing swim in the indoor pool and good conversation around our patio’s fire pit. If you’re traveling with a sports group, keep everyone well-fed at our free, hot breakfast and squeeze in a last-minute team workout in our fitness center. Between games, you can visit our laundry facilities to freshen up everyone’s uniforms. Find a convenient home base in our rooms and suites, where you can chill a bottle of wine from Salem Glen Winery in the fridge to enjoy while you watch a movie on the flat-screen HDTV. Free Wi-Fi makes it easy to stay connected to loved ones back home, and a free, hot breakfast keeps you fueled for Rochester adventures. Plan convenient gatherings in our naturally lit event space, which is perfect for family reunions, team meetings, and business functions. We can work in advance of your event to create a personalized web page so everyone has up-to-date information. Amenities like free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment are available to take the experience up a notch. Whether you’re in Rochester for an appointment at the Mayo Clinic or a sports tournament at the Graham Arena Complex, carve out an afternoon to see what this expansive city has to offer. You can shop for souvenirs at Shoppes on Maine or Apache Mall. Rochester Art Center displays a large collection of contemporary art pieces, and Four Daughters Vineyard & Winery offers delightful wine tastings. Don’t miss these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rochester, MN
description: After touching down at Rochester International Airport (RST), make the short ride to the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rochester, MN—your ideal home base while visiting the city. Our centrally located hotel is just off US Highway 52, giving our guests easy access to downtown shopping and dining destinations. Thanks to our free shuttle, you can easily reach local businesses like IBM or visit loved ones at the Mayo Clinic, which is located about four miles from the hotel. If you’re looking for fun things to do, use our free Wi-Fi to find the shopping center, golf course, or movie theater that appeals to you.Get a smart start to your day with a workout in the fitness center and a satisfying meal at our free, hot breakfast. You can get straight to work in the 24-hour business center or focus on relaxing at the heated indoor pool and hot tub. Grab a free cookie and enjoy chatting with your family by the fireplace in our lobby. Our free shuttle service visits local businesses and runs Monday through Friday from 6 am to 5:30 pm. Make snacks and drinks whenever you get a craving with the refrigerator, microwave, coffeemaker, and minibar in each of our guest rooms and suites. You can use free Wi-Fi to check flight times at the RST airport before you relax in bed and watch another episode of your favorite TV show. Plan a day trip to the Twin Cities area, about an hour from the hotel, or stay local and tour the exhibits at Rochester Art Center, just 10 minutes away. Before heading to a concert at the Graham Arena Complex, upgrade your wardrobe with a visit to one of the local shopping centers. Families love exploring the trails around Quarry Hill Nature Center and learning about local history at Soldiers Field Veteran Memorial. Check out these local attractions: Stop by our front desk to ask about our free shuttle service to local businesses and to the Mayo Clinic, located about 10 minutes south of the hotel. The shuttle operates Monday through Friday from 6 am to 5:30 pm.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Roseville, MN
description: When you stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Roseville, MN, you can treat yourself to the suburban comfort of Roseville while keeping the bustling Twin Cities less than 20 minutes away. Use the free Wi-Fi in your hotel room to plan your day’s events, whether you’re touring the University of Minnesota, attending a concert at Xcel Energy Center, or cheering on the Minnesota Vikings at U.S. Bank Stadium.It’s easy to relax when you have our indoor pool and our quiet patio with a firepit at your disposal. You can start each day with a satisfying meal at our free, hot breakfast and stop by the lobby any time for freshly brewed coffee. Head to the fitness center for an energizing workout before catching up with email in the business center, open 24 hours. A perfect home base between the Twin Cities, our hotel offers family-friendly hotel rooms and suites that include a refrigerator and a microwave to make snack time more convenient. You can focus on work at the desk and connect to free Wi-Fi when you need to check your email. Stretch out in bed at night and fall asleep to your favorite movie on the flat-screen HDTV. Plan a presentation or strategy session in our meeting space for up to 25 attendees. This modern space includes free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment, and our helpful staff is happy to provide off-site catering recommendations. If you’re a state government employee, ask about our special rates when you host an event at the hotel or stay overnight. Whether you’re a student visiting the University of Minnesota or a parent planning a family vacation near Lake Johanna, you’re sure to love our hotel’s convenient location. From the Guthrie Theater in Minneapolis to the Minnesota Children’s Museum in St. Paul, most of the Twin Cities’ top attractions are less than 20 minutes away. You can spend an entire day at the famous Mall of America®, home to a theme park, an aquarium, mini golf, and much more. Don’t miss these area attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Minneapolis/Shakopee, MN
description: The award-winning Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Minneapolis/Shakopee, MN is in the heart of Minnesota's favorite entertainment destination. Try your luck at Mystic Lake Casino or make bets on a horse race at Canterbury Park. Families can spend the day taking on the rides at Valleyfair amusement park or splashing around SandVenture Aquatic Park. If you'd prefer to spend your time shopping the latest fashions, Mall of America® and Twin Cities Premium Outlets are both less than 20 miles from the hotel. When you're ready to unwind, grab a cup of coffee and a cookie from the lobby before you head to your room to connect to the free Wi-Fi. Catch one of your favorite shows on HBO, then swim a few laps in the heated indoor pool, open from noon to 8 pm. You can start your days with an invigorating workout in the fitness center and a delicious meal from the free, hot breakfast. If you need to print notes for a meeting, visit the 24-hour business center. After an exciting night of entertainment and games at Mystic Lake Casino, retire to the comfort of our affordable guest rooms and suites. You can unwind in front of the TV before bed and wake up the next morning with a fresh cup of gourmet coffee. Each room also features a microwave and fridge for convenient snacking when the kids are hungry. Use the free Wi-Fi to upload photos to social media or connect to the office while you work at the desk. With a location near Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport (MSP) and area businesses like Seagate Technology, Bayer Crop Science, and Shutterfly, our hotel is an ideal choice for your next corporate or social event. Keep guests engaged with free Wi-Fi in our modern meeting space, and allow our professional staff to help you plan every detail for the perfect gathering. We offer various audiovisual equipment so you can give a powerful presentation. Whether you want to explore Shakopee's vibrant downtown or plan a day trip to Minneapolis, you'll find plenty to do near the Country Inn & Suites. The kids can spend an afternoon splashing around at SandVenture Aquatic Park, and the whole family can set out to find something special to take home at Twin Cities Premium Outlets. If you’re feeling lucky, visit Canterbury Park for horse races or Mystic Lake Casino. Take your day’s winnings to Chanhassen Dinner Theatres for a memorable meal and exciting show. Check out these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Shoreview, MN
description: Situated off I-35W, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Shoreview, MN provides well-equipped rooms and suites just 15 miles north of Minneapolis. Our location lets you experience the best Twin Cities attractions like Mall of America® without the big-city hassle. Ideal for guests visiting with traveling teams, our hotel is near the National Sports Center, the world’s largest amateur sports venue. We’re also just a 30-minute drive from Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport (MSP).After a day of athletic events, head to the indoor pool for some waterslide fun, grab a board game from our lobby, or borrow a bicycle to explore the area. The next morning, you can fill up with our free, hot breakfast. If you’re in Shoreview for a corporate trip, our business center helps you prepare for meetings, and our corporate guests enjoy the privacy of an entire floor exclusively dedicated to business travelers. In need of a snack? Head to the Inn Case Market, located on the main floor.We are a dog welcoming property! Owners can enjoy a walk with their four-legged friends on the grass walking trails located just steps from the hotel. There is a fee of $30 per dog per night with no restrictions to weight or breed. Whether you’re looking for a desk to finish your presentation or a place to crash after your tournament, our hotel rooms and suites have what you need. A microwave and refrigerator let you store and prepare snacks, while a coffeemaker offers an energy boost when you need it. You can also use free Wi-Fi to plan your itinerary. Plan a training session or a post-game party in our meeting space, which boasts free Wi-Fi, audiovisual equipment, and the service of our friendly staff. We also offer free water and coffee throughout your meeting and are happy to help with catering recommendations. If you need a pair of soccer shorts or just want to spend the day shopping, you can head to the nearby Rosedale Center or make the half-hour commute to Mall of America®. Looking for fun attractions for the kids? Spend the day exploring the zoo and amusement park or the science museum, or take in a professional sports game. Check out these area attractions: By car:From Terminal 1: Exit the airport onto Highway 5, turning right. Drive until the highway forks to enter I-494. Keep left at the fork to merge onto I-494. Drive less than half a mile and take exit 2B to merge onto MN-77/Cedar Avenue. Drive about three miles, and then take the ramp on the right to merge onto MN-62 West. After 1.5 miles, keep right at the fork to merge onto I-35 West North. Stay on I-35 until exit 31A. Take the exit and turn right onto County Road J W. Take the first right onto Naples Street NE. The entrance to the hotel parking area will be almost immediately to your right.From Terminal 2: Exit the airport on 34th Avenue S, keeping right at the fork to merge onto I-494. Almost immediately, take exit 2B on the right to merge onto MN-77/Cedar Avenue. Drive about three miles, and then merge onto MN-62 West using the ramp on the right. After 1.5 miles, keep right at the fork to merge onto I-35 West North. Stay on I-35 until exit 31A. Take the exit and turn right onto County Road J W. Take the first right onto Naples Street NE. The entrance to the hotel parking area will be almost immediately to your right. By car:From I-35 W N: Take exit 31A and turn right onto County Road J W. Take the first right onto Naples Street NE. The entrance to the hotel parking area will be almost immediately to your right.From I-35 W S: Take exit 33 and turn left onto Lexington Avenue NE. Drive almost three miles and turn right onto Lake Drive. After a little over a mile, turn left onto Naples Street NE. Drive until you cross County Road J W. The entrance to the hotel parking area will be on your right in about 250 feet.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, St. Cloud East, MN
description: Situated off US Highway 10, about five miles from St. Cloud Regional Airport (STC), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, St. Cloud East, MN places you near all the happenings in downtown St. Cloud. You can attend an expo at the St. Cloud River’s Edge Convention Center, tour St. Cloud State University, and shop at Crossroads Center. Our hotel is also located about a mile away from the beautiful Munsinger and Clemens Gardens.To relax, sit by the fire in our lobby, work out in our fitness center, or go for a swim in our indoor pool. We also offer free Wi-Fi so you can log into your favorite apps or check your work email. Attending a tournament at St. Cloud Municipal Athletic Complex? Athletics teams can take advantage of our special rates and amenities through the Sports Approved Program. Whether you’re in St. Cloud for a baseball tournament, a graduation ceremony, or a trade show, you can enjoy a quiet stay in our rooms with free Wi-Fi and free weekday newspapers. Store drinks in the fridge, make popcorn with the microwave, and watch a movie with your family thanks to the cable TV channels. Spacious suites with separate living rooms, dining rooms, sleeper sofas, or whirlpools are also available. Host a team meeting or planning session with up to 50 guests in our bright and cheery event space. You can engage your attendees with free Wi-Fi and a presentation using the up-to-date audiovisual equipment. Choose from our meeting packages and special rates, and let our staff assist you with every planning detail. Discover a variety of fun, seasonal activities nearby, from wintertime skiing and snow tubing at Powder Ridge to marveling at what’s in bloom at the Munsinger and Clemens Gardens. You can play a round at Territory Golf Club or wander the St. Cloud River Walk before wrapping up your day with a performance at Paramount Center for the Arts. When it’s time to head home, your flight from St. Cloud Regional Airport (STC) is only five miles away. Check out these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, St. Cloud West, MN
description: Situated three miles from downtown at the corner of highways 15 and 23, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, St. Cloud West, MN offers a convenient location near St. Cloud State University, River’s Edge Convention Center, and St. Cloud Hospital. Our hotel is also situated mere minutes off I-94 and about two miles from St. Cloud VA Health Care System. Spend a day skiing at Powder Ridge or playing at Municipal Athletic Complex before relaxing in our indoor pool.Our outdoor patio and fire pit provide the perfect place to gather with family. Start your mornings quietly reading the free weekday newspaper or turn up the volume on your headphones for an energizing workout in the fitness center. You can check your email with free Wi-Fi while you enjoy our free, hot breakfast. If you’re in town for business, ask about our weekday discount for corporate travelers. Rest easy in one of our guest rooms or suites, which include flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi to help you wind down. Families and groups love our one-bedroom and studio suite options, which provide additional space and sleeper sofas. We also offer whirlpool suites for a memorable weekend getaway. With space for up to 143 guests, our flexible meeting room is perfect for business events, receptions, seminars, and family reunions. We also offer audiovisual equipment and free Wi-Fi to make your presentations easier. Traveling with a group? Ask about our Sports Approved program for special rates and amenities. Cheer on the Huskies at St. Cloud State University, or rent a kayak for a ride down the Mississippi River, which flows alongside the campus. If you need a break from a work conference, venture over to River’s Edge Park and play a round of disc golf. Munsinger and Clemens Gardens provide a quiet retreat with idyllic walking paths, or you can choose a day of thrills with seasonal skiing or biking at Quarry Park and Nature Preserve. Check out these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, St. Paul Northeast, MN
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, St. Paul Northeast, MN in Vadnais Heights gives our guests easy access to the Twin Cities as well as I-35E and I-694. Our hotel guests are just nine miles from the State Capitol, Xcel Energy Center, and the Roy Wilkins Auditorium. Families can easily get to Target Field to see the Twins play ball or the Science Museum of Minnesota to see a real Triceratops skeleton, one of only four in the world. And Vadnais Heights is known for its beautiful lakes, trails, and woodlands.If you’re in town for business, downtown St. Paul is a 15-minute drive. The Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport (MSP) is about a 30-minute drive from the hotel. After a busy day, unwind in our fitness center, open 24 hours, or swim laps in the indoor pool. On the weekend, your kids will love the pool’s 90-foot waterslide (open on Friday from 5 to 10 pm, on Saturday from 9 am to 10 pm, and on Sunday from 9 to 11:30 am). And don’t forget our complimentary, hot breakfast to start your day. Leisure and business travelers appreciate our spacious rooms and suites, which are furnished with easy chairs and work desks. Enjoy a cup of coffee in the comfort of your room as you read a free weekday newspaper or catch the news. And you can stay connected to family and friends thanks to our free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. We invite you to host your meeting, seminars, or family events in our versatile conference room, which can accommodate up to 60 guests. Your guests will appreciate the ease of arrival via I-35E, and you’ll appreciate our professional staff who can assist with catering suggestions and audiovisual needs. If you’re hosting a small group, ask us about using one of our event-friendly suites. While staying at the Country Inn & Suites in northeast St. Paul, you’ll find it easy to enjoy the world-famous Winter Carnival or relive life in an 1827 military outpost at Fort Snelling. Keep your camera handy as you stroll down Summit Avenue with its grand Victorian mansions. You can spend the day at a local lake or enjoying these favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Willmar, MN
description: Located off I-71 and Highway 23, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Willmar, MN offers a convenient base in the heart of Kandiyohi County, home to hundreds of lakes. Recreation areas like Robbins Island Regional Park are just minutes away from the hotel, and it’s a straight shot up I-71 to the prairies, woodland, and lakes of Sibley State Park. Business travelers appreciate our proximity to the MinnWest Technology Campus, an innovation hub that’s home to more than 30 companies. If you’re visiting for medical services, Rice Memorial Hospital is just two miles away.Regardless of your plans in Willmar, make time for our complimentary, hot breakfast. You can research local attractions using free Wi-Fi, and print out information in our business center. Families love our indoor pool, which has a hot tub and a waterslide for splashy fun—the slide is open Friday from 5 to 10 pm, Saturday from 8 to 11 am and 3 to 10 pm, and Sunday from 8 to 11 am. You can keep up your fitness regimen in our well-equipped fitness center. Feel free to socialize around the fireplace in our lobby and enjoy complimentary coffee and cookies, or if the weather’s fine, relax on our patio. Enjoy plenty of space for the whole family in our large rooms and suites, and feel free to request cribs and rollaways for your little ones. To make you feel at home, all of our accommodations come with microwaves, refrigerators, and free Wi-Fi. Each room also includes a spacious work desk with an ergonomic chair for your comfort. For a convenient venue off I-71 and Highway 23, book our meeting room, which includes a TV screen and free high-speed internet access. For gatherings like a children’s party, you can reserve the pool and waterslide as well. Ask our professional staff if you need help with planning or catering or you’d like us to create a customized web page unique to your event. Home to more than 360 lakes, Kandiyohi County is a great destination for swimming, boating, and water sports. Featuring a sandy beach, hiking trails, and disc golf, Robbins Island Regional Park is less than 10 minutes from our hotel. A slightly longer drive north, Sibley State Park is popular for birdwatching, canoeing, and sweeping countryside views from Mount Tom. In the winter, you can hit the cross-country ski trails in nearby Prairie Woods or Sibley State Park. Check out these other local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Woodbury, MN
description: Located just off I-94, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Woodbury, MN places you in a tranquil setting minutes from downtown St. Paul. From our hotel, you can easily venture into the Twin Cities and check out all the exciting attractions there, or you can relax after a long drive with a soak in our hot tub. Complete your evening with a burger or a slice of pizza from the on-site Green Mill Restaurant & Bar.After a busy day of shopping at Woodbury Lakes, take advantage of the hotel’s free Wi-Fi to look up who’s performing at the nearby Xcel Energy Center. If you’re ready to unwind after a day of meetings at nearby 3M, you can treat yourself to a swim in our heated indoor pool or simply grab some complimentary cookies and a cup of coffee from the lobby and head up to your room to catch a movie. Cheer the Minnesota Wild on to victory, and then kick back in the comfort of your guest room or suite. You can order room service from Green Mill Restaurant & Bar and catch up on your favorite HBO series before drifting off to sleep. Each morning, you can brew a cup of coffee in your room before heading to our dining room for a free, hot breakfast of waffles and fresh fruit. Organize a reception or a seminar for up to 100 people at the Country Inn & Suites. We offer four meeting rooms with free internet and audiovisual technology, and you can take the stress out of arranging meals by using the on-site catering from Green Mill Restaurant & Bar. We’ll even create a web page with the details of your event to keep your guests fully informed.                                 When hunger strikes, Green Mill Restaurant & Bar serves savory options for lunch and dinner. Get a little messy with Green Mill’s award-winning deep-dish pizza, which you can order with cheese-stuffed crust. Whether you’re in the area for a conference, meetings just across the highway at 3M, or a family vacation, our hotel puts you close to the area’s top things to do. Explore the major attractions of the Twin Cities, like the historical Cathedral of Saint Paul or the massive Mall of America, while enjoying the small-town feel of Woodbury. Popular attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Byram/Jackson South, MS
description: Settle into a quiet hotel room or suite near I-55 at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Byram/Jackson South, MS. Nestled in the suburbs of Byram, our hotel provides a peaceful sanctuary only 17 minutes from Jackson and near popular spots like the Mississippi State Capitol and the Old Capitol Museum. Prefer more action-packed adventures? Catch a race at Jackson Motor Speedway or cheer on the Jackson State Tigers at Mississippi Veterans Memorial Stadium. If you’re here on business, our convenient location offers proximity to the Jackson Convention Complex and local businesses like Blue Bell Creameries and International Paper.After an educational tour of the State Capitol, unwind with a dip in our hotel’s indoor pool or a workout in out fitness center, open 24 hours. You can grab a cookie or an energizing cup of coffee from the lobby before heading back to your room to update loved ones on your travels using free Wi-Fi. Need to stay on top of work? Put the finishing touches on important presentations in our well-equipped business center, also open 24 hours. Each of our 54 hotel rooms and suites offers modern conveniences like free Wi-Fi and a TV with more than 100 satellite channels, including HBO and ESPN. You can brew a fresh cup of coffee any time of day using the in-room machine or keep your appetite in check with a snack from the mini fridge. Our pet-friendly options ensure the whole family can enjoy a trip to Byram. Situated just 17 minutes outside of the capital city, our hotel places guests a short car ride away from events at the Jackson Convention Complex and family visits to The Jackson Zoo. In town visiting a student? Travel just about nine miles to reach the Jackson State University campus. Don’t miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Biloxi-Ocean Springs, MS
description: Conveniently located off I-10, the family-friendly Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Biloxi-Ocean Springs, MS is just eight miles from the Gulf Coast's top beaches. Destinations like Keesler Air Force Base, MGM Park, and the Mississippi Coast Coliseum & Convention Center are about 12 miles from our hotel, and government travelers appreciate special rates through the FedRooms Program. Looking for Biloxi's famed nightlife? Our hotel lies less than 15 minutes from the Beau Rivage, Scarlet Pearl, Boomtown, and Hard Rock casinos, as well as Margaritaville Resort.We provide you a stress-free stay, starting with the free, hot breakfast each morning. Keep up with your workout routine in the fitness center and take a relaxing swim in the outdoor pool. If you need to do work, use the free Wi-Fi in your hotel room or visit the 24-hour business center. Whether you’re taking a beach vacation with family or visiting casinos with friends, you’ll find your ideal hotel room or suite at the Country Inn & Suites. Connect to free Wi-Fi and snack at your leisure with the help of a microwave and fridge. You can brew a cup of coffee to savor while you work at the desk. Spacious suites with a separate living room and sleeper sofa are available for families. If you’re planning a special getaway with a loved one, upgrade to a romantic whirlpool suite. Whether you want to play golf or go deep-sea fishing, our hotel is just minutes from all the enchantment of the Mississippi Gulf Coast. You can visit the Biloxi Lighthouse and learn about the coastal ecosystem at the Marine Education Center. Take on the slots at Boomtown Casino Biloxi or Beau Rivage Casino before attending a festival at the Mississippi Coast Coliseum and Convention Center. Don't miss these favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Jackson-Airport, MS
description: Just off Exit 48 on I-20, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Jackson-Airport, MS is perfectly situated in the city of Pearl. We're just five miles east of Jackson and seven miles west of Jackson-Evers International Airport (JAN). Our free shuttle simplifies travel to and from the airport as well as from the hotel to the Outlets of Mississippi and Trustmark Park, home of the Mississippi Braves.Alongside this prime location, our hotel in Pearl, MS offers welcoming amenities like a relaxing indoor pool. Corporate travelers can complete projects in our business center or work comfortably from their rooms using free Wi-Fi. Gather the family to grill out on the back patio with a covered gazebo, or just enjoy the lake view during sunset. And don’t forget to stop by the lobby for free coffee 24 hours a day. There's plenty of space in our guest rooms and suites, and you're welcome to request cribs and rollaway beds for your little ones. In-room amenities like fridges, microwaves, and coffeemakers make everyone feel more at home. For a convenient venue near the JAN airport and I-20, reserve our meeting space complete with audiovisual equipment and high-speed internet access. The room accommodates up to 50 guests, and our professional staff can assist with overnight room blocks. Our hotel is located just six miles from downtown Jackson, where you can take a historic walking tour by day and listen to live music at night. If you're looking for a great place for dinner, local and chain restaurants offering everything from a quick bite to sit-down southern food are conveniently located within one mile of our hotel. You'll also find great entertainment just around the corner. Watch the movie you’ve been so excited about at Cinemark Pearl and XD, take your kids to play mini-golf at Mac & Bones Mini Golf or to jump around at Launch Trampoline Park, or invite your friends to experience Paradox Challenge Rooms. Want to enjoy the great outdoors? Spend the day at nearby Barnett Reservoir. Additional hot spots include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Columbia, MO
description: With the University of Missouri and two other colleges nearby, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Columbia, MO is perfect for guests looking for sports games, art exhibits, and concerts in an exciting college town. Our hotel off I-70 is within five miles of Mizzou, Stephens College, Columbia College, University Hospital, and a number of other medical centers. Visit downtown Columbia, home to shops, restaurants, and music venues, just a five-minute drive from the hotel.Breeze through check-in so you can indulge in a relaxing swim in the heated indoor pool or a soothing soak in our hot tub. You’ll also appreciate our free Wi-Fi and a free, hot breakfast each morning. Grab a complimentary cookie and coffee from the lobby and catch up on work in the business center. Make the most of your stay at our hotel in Columbia in one of our spacious rooms and suites, each equipped with a comfortable bed and a reading chair. Standard amenities include free Wi-Fi, HBO, a microwave, and a mini fridge. Upgrade to one of our spacious suites to enjoy a seating area, a separate living room with a sleeper sofa, or a whirlpool tub. The meeting room at the Country Inn & Suites offers space for up to 40 guests and is ideal for business conferences or family gatherings. Free high-speed internet, a DVD player, and other audiovisual equipment can help make your presentation effective and engaging. Catering recommendations are available. Stay within five minutes of downtown Columbia—a hub for arts and culture. You can spend a day exploring The District’s 50 blocks of shops, galleries, restaurants, and bars. Outdoor enthusiasts can find places to hike, bike, and picnic on the Katy Trail. Don’t miss these stand-out attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Nevada, MO
description: Located just off I-49, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Nevada, MO is the perfect place to take a break from your interstate drive. Traveling with students for a sports tournament? Our hotel is close to Cottey College, home of the Comets, and the Champion Diamonds baseball complex. You can watch dirt track races at Nevada Speedway, sample wines at DeLaney Vineyard & Winery, and learn about the Civil War's impact on Missouri at the Bushwhacker Museum.After an eventful day, unwind in the indoor pool and hot tub and then grab a free cookie in the lobby. Our business center and fitness center are both open 24 hours for your convenience. If you’re traveling with your four-legged friend, our pet-friendly policy lets you bring them along on your Nevada adventure. After a long day on the road, relax in one of our comfortable rooms or suites. You can prepare snacks and enjoy a cold drink thanks to a microwave and refrigerator in every room and suite. Traveling for business? Set up your laptop on the work desk and check your email using free Wi-Fi. In the morning, enjoy our complimentary, hot breakfast before spending the day at Nevada Speedway. Host a graduation party, team meeting, or corporate event at the Country Inn & Suites, which features a meeting room for up to 20 guests. We can provide drinks and snacks for your group as well as catering recommendations. If you're in the area for a sporting event, take advantage of our Sports Approved Program, which offers perks and discounted rates for teams. Before you head to your event at the Vernon County Fairgrounds, take a tour of the city's Victorian-era neighborhoods along Nevada Square. If you're attending graduation or visiting students at Cottey College, we're just three miles from the campus and its 33-acre recreation area. Other popular attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, St. Charles, MO
description: Located on Main Street’s quaint brick road, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, St. Charles, MO lies in the heart of the city’s historic district. Experience the area’s old-world charm as you explore dozens of nearby restaurants and specialty shops, many housed in 19th-century buildings. You can also drive just five minutes to The Family Arena to catch a hockey game or a concert or stroll to the Ameristar St. Charles casino to play the slots. If you love hiking and biking, you can easily access Katy Trail, which runs behind the hotel.Make it your priority to relax in the heated indoor pool. If you prefer a good stretch, head to the fitness center. Later, you can treat yourself to complimentary coffee and cookies while you check your email using our free Wi-Fi. Need to prepare for a meeting? Stop by our 24-hour business center with computer, printing, and copying services. In the morning, stop by the complimentary, hot breakfast before heading out to shop, and leave your car parked for free at the hotel while you explore on foot. Browse 10 blocks of antique shops and art galleries in St. Charles’ historic Main Street district along the Missouri River. When you get hungry, you’ll find everything from mouthwatering barbecue to gooey butter milkshakes within walking distance. If you love running or biking, the scenic Katy Trail passes just behind our hotel. Key attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, St. Peters, MO
description: Located at exit 225 just off I-70, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, St. Peters, MO offers easy access to the St. Louis airport and to historic St. Charles. Our free, hot breakfast prepares you for a day of shopping at St. Louis Outlet Mall, hiking at Frontier Park, or touring the Lewis & Clark Boat House and Museum. Six Flags St. Louis, just 40 minutes away, makes a great day trip, and you can swim, run, or ice skate at the Rec-Plex, only two miles away from the hotel.After a busy day, return to the hotel and squeeze in a workout in the fitness center, then reward yourself with free coffee and cookies in the lobby. Our heated indoor pool and hot tub provide a perfect place to melt away stress. A business center with free Wi-Fi is available if you need to catch up at the office.  Curl up on your comfortable bed for a night of relaxation with an HBO movie on the flat-screen TV. With a microwave and a mini fridge at your disposal, you can easily enjoy a late-night snack and cold beverage while you use the free Wi-Fi to surf the web. Traveling with a sports team, a tour group, or business colleagues? Enjoy group rates and room blocks at our hotel, conveniently located just 20 minutes from St. Louis Lambert International Airport (STL). You can also reserve our breakfast area for group meetings. With a stay at our hotel in St. Peters, you can easily embark on fun things to do like ghost tours of St. Charles and swimming at the St. Peters Rec-Plex. In the mood for shopping? Drive just five minutes to Bass Pro Shops or browse the stores at Mid Rivers Mall. Thrill seekers only have to travel 40 minutes to tame the roller coasters of Six Flags St. Louis. For more fun, visit these nearby attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Billings, MT
description: Located near I-90 and within three miles of Billings Logan International Airport (BIL), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Billings, MT is ideally positioned for exploring Montana’s largest city. If you’re in the area for a trade show or a concert at MetraPark, our hotel is just a 10-minute walk away. Traveling for business or a college tour? You’ll find downtown offices, the city’s booming Medical Corridor, and Montana State University Billings less than three miles from our location.After a Yellowjackets baseball game at Dehler Park or dinner at one of the city’s many restaurants, head back to the hotel to upload photos of your night out using free Wi-Fi. In the morning, a free, hot breakfast makes it easier to start the day. If you need a space for a team meeting or a social gathering, you can reserve our event room for up to 40 guests. Our hotel rooms and suites are equipped with comfortable beds and blackout drapes to help you get a great night’s sleep. Before you head out for meetings downtown or a day trip to Yellowstone National Park, brew a fresh cup of coffee and check your itinerary using free Wi-Fi. At the Country Inn & Suites, your business is our pleasure, whether you’re planning a baby shower for 16 or a team meeting for 40. You can show presentations using free Wi-Fi and keep your guests refreshed with a variety of bakery items and drinks. From the beautifully curated exhibits at the Yellowstone Art Museum to the playful river otters at ZooMontana, you’ll find plenty to keep you and your family entertained in Billings. If you plan to explore Yellowstone National Park, the park’s headquarters is about three hours away by car. Don’t miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bozeman, MT
description: Choose the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bozeman, MT to enjoy beautiful scenery and comfortable hotel rooms. If you’re in the area to visit a student or attend a Bobcats game, the Montana State University campus is less than 15 minutes away. Traveling to Yellowstone National Park? Our location near I-90 makes it less than a two-hour trip to the West Entrance. Business travelers appreciate our proximity to downtown Bozeman, just three miles away, while outdoor enthusiasts can enjoy activities from hiking to skiing within 20 miles of the hotel.Our free airport shuttle service* can take you to and from Bozeman Yellowstone International Airport (BZN), less than 15 minutes away. Upon arrival at the hotel, treat yourself to complimentary coffee and cookies in the lobby and sit down at the outdoor fire pit to enjoy stunning views. If you need to decompress, stop by our indoor pool for a swim or enjoy a workout in our fitness center.*All shuttle reservations should be made 24 hours in advance. After a day of outdoor adventure, our well-appointed rooms and suites welcome you with comfortable beds and flat-screen TVs. In the morning, you can enjoy a cup of coffee in your room while you research the day’s activities via free Wi-Fi. The Country Inn & Suites in Bozeman offers a charming 841-square-foot meeting room for family gatherings and business meetings. If you have a slideshow presentation, simply connect your laptop to the wall-mounted TV. Our professional staff can also help you arrange every detail, from off-site catering to room setup. Situated at the base of the Bridger Mountain Range, our hotel is less than 30 miles from the Bridger Bowl Ski Area and Palisades Falls. For a trip back in time, drive three miles to the Gallatin History Museum and get a glimpse of life in the 1800s. Don’t miss these favorites during your stay: By our complimentary airport shuttle* The hotel shuttle is located right outside baggage claim in the third lane. Use the crosswalk to cross the first two lanes, and then head down the sidewalk to the first shuttle hut.*Note: The hotel airport shuttle must be booked 24 hours prior to guest arrival. It is not an on-call shuttle.By carExit the airport parking lot using Wings Way and turn left onto Airway Boulevard. When the road intersects with Frontage Road shortly, turn left onto it and drive a little over four miles. Then turn right onto East Valley Center Road to cross under I-90. When the road splits almost immediately afterward, turn left. Drive a mile and a half, and the hotel entrance will be on your left. From I-90 EastTake exit 305 and turn right off the ramp onto North 19th Avenue. Take the first right onto East Valley Center Road, and then drive for a little less than half a mile. The hotel’s entrance will be on the right.From I-90 WestTake exit 305 and turn left off the ramp onto North 19th Avenue. Use the overpass to cross I-90, and then take the first right onto East Valley Center Road. Drive for a little less than half a mile. The hotel’s entrance will be on the right.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Kalispell, MT - Glacier Lodge
description: Book a view with your room at the beautiful Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Kalispell, MT - Glacier Lodge. Enjoy spectacular views of Glacier National Park and the majestic Rocky Mountains from our second-floor patio area and from your guest room. Our smoke-free hotel is conveniently located just two minutes from Glacier Park International Airport (FCA) and only 23 miles from the beautiful Crown of the Continent: Glacier National Park.When you’re ready to relax, make yourself at home in our second-floor indoor/outdoor lounge with awe-inspiring views of the mountains and Glacier National Park. Sip a cup of coffee in front of the two-story stone fireplace in our lobby, or watch the sun rise over the mountains as you enjoy our free, hot breakfast. After a day of sightseeing at Glacier National Park or a game of golf at one of the area’s nine championship courses, you can return to the hotel to enjoy our indoor pool and waterslide. Revel in stunning views of Glacier National Park, the Whitefish Ski Resort, and the Flathead Valley from one of our 100 rooms and suites. Curl up on a plush bed after a day of hiking or skiing and enjoy the rustic ambiance of our custom-built furniture, made here in Montana. You can stock your fridge with sodas, snacks, and other treats from our gift shop before settling back for a movie or your favorite show streamed through Chromecast on the 50-inch UHD TV. Host your next sports team banquet, wedding reception, corporate meeting, or training seminar at our hotel. Our event space, Heaven's Peak, can accommodate up to 72 guests in a classroom-style setup, and the patio area is available for intimate outdoor gatherings with breathtaking scenery. If you have a presentation planned, the conference room features free Wi-Fi, a microphone, and an LCD projector with a 10-foot screen. If you love the outdoors, Kalispell is the perfect destination because of its convenient location in the Flathead Valley, putting you minutes from Glacier National Park and Flathead Lake. Surrounded by mountains, parks, and lakes, Kalispell offers a plethora of exciting activities. Stay minutes from downtown Whitefish, Columbia Falls, and Bigfork, where you can enjoy shops, restaurants, breweries, fairs, and festivals. Visit these top attractions all year-round:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Kearney, NE
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Kearney, NE near I-80 is the perfect place to take a break after a long interstate drive. While you're here, you can visit Kearney's iconic Archway and catch a concert at the Viaero Center. Our hotel is less than three miles from the University of Nebraska at Kearney, where you can tour the campus and watch the Lopers play. Looking for an outdoor adventure? Hike the lovely trail just outside the hotel's entrance. If you're in town from March to mid-April, be sure to visit nearby Rowe Sanctuary for the famous sandhill crane migration. Those staying with us on weeknights are invited to stop by our Manager's Reception, which offers hot items, snacks, wine, beer, and soda every Monday through Thursday from 5 to 7 pm.After a day of travel, relax in our lobby with a cup of hot coffee or tea and a free cookie while connecting with family and friends using free Wi-Fi. Before heading to your room, take a relaxing dip in our indoor pool and hot tub or enjoy a workout in our fitness center.  Our rooms and suites provide comfortable beds and flat-screen TVs to help you have a restful stay. You can use free Wi-Fi to plan the day's activities or catch up on email. Host a team meeting, reception, or intimate social event in the breakfast room at the Country Inn & Suites, Kearney, NE. The hotel’s charming dining area can be reserved any time after breakfast and arranged to your specifications. Our professional staff can help you arrange every detail—from setup to off-site catering—to ensure that you have a flawless event. If you're planning a wedding reception, be sure to ask about available discounts. Known as the annual destination for thousands of sandhill cranes, Kearney is also home to popular sites like the Museum of Nebraska Art and Fort Kearny State Historical Park. Don't miss these attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lincoln Airport, NE
description: Situated off I-80, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lincoln Airport, NE is ideal for exploring eastern Nebraska. Conveniently located less than one mile from Lincoln Airport (LNK), our hotel offers complimentary airport shuttle service to make traveling a breeze. And since we’re less than 15 minutes from downtown Lincoln, you can easily attend a musical performance at the Pinnacle Bank Arena or head over to Canopy Street to check out the local shops and the city’s restaurant scene. In the area for a sporting event? Our hotel is close to the Doris Bair Softball Complex, the Abbott Sports Complex, and Speedway Village.Unwind after a day of travel with a refreshing swim in the heated outdoor pool, or squeeze in a workout in our well-equipped fitness center. Free Wi-Fi lets you keep up with family or work, and you can print your boarding passes in our 24-hour business center. Traveling with a four-legged friend? Ask about our pet-friendly options. And be sure to take advantage of our free, hot breakfast, available to all our guests. Kick back to watch your favorite show on the flat-screen TV in one of our well-appointed rooms or suites. You can use the fridge to chill beverages or the microwave to heat up snacks or leftovers. Need to finalize sightseeing plans or check in for your flight? Simply connect using free Wi-Fi. Conveniently located near Lincoln Airport, our Country Inn & Suites offers 1,300 square feet of flexible event space for your next get-together. Whether you’re hosting a business meeting, a wedding reception, or a personal celebration, our professional staff can help you arrange every detail. Plus, we offer free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment to ensure your event runs smoothly. If you’re in town for a sporting event, you can’t go wrong with our Country Inn & Suites near Lincoln Airport. We’re less than five miles away from top venues like Memorial Stadium and Speedway Village. Traveling with your family? You won’t want to miss area attractions like the Lincoln Children’s Zoo. Visit these local favorites while you’re here:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lincoln North Hotel and Conference Center, NE
description: Welcome to the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lincoln North Hotel and Conference Center, NE! Our pet-friendly hotel is conveniently situated off I-80, just nine minutes from Lincoln Airport (LNK). Attend major concerts and conferences at Pinnacle Bank Arena or cheer on the Cornhuskers at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln, both less than 10 minutes away. Learn more about the history of the region with an educational tour of the grand halls of the Nebraska State Capitol, and find hours of entertainment at the nearby Lincoln Children's Zoo.After stepping off our convenient airport shuttle, ease into the hotel’s heated indoor pool and let relaxation wash over you. You can keep your entire party fueled with our free, hot breakfast and make sure no member of the family gets left behind thanks to our pet-friendly policy.Please note that guests must be at least 21 years of age or older to check in to the hotel. Our pet-friendly rooms and suites feature comfortable beds and modern conveniences like microwaves and refrigerators to help you feel at home. You can plan your travel itinerary or check your conference schedule using free Wi-Fi, and then kick back while sipping on a fresh cup of coffee made right in the room. Planning a business seminar, graduation celebration, or wedding in Lincoln? Our on-site conference center with over 8,000-square-feet of flexible meeting space can host up to 250 guests. Allow our friendly staff to assist you in arranging every detail, from catering and setup to renting audiovisual equipment. Our dedicated wedding and event coordinator has you covered to make sure you have everything you need for a successful event. Learn more about the region's past with a trip to the Nebraska History Museum, or for a fun family outing, stroll hand-in-hand through the exhibits at the Lincoln Children's Zoo. Join other Cornhuskers fans at a tailgate party before the big game at Memorial Stadium, or peruse the galleries at Great Plains Art Museum located on the UNL campus. Don't miss these and other local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Sidney, NE
description: Enjoy a quiet hotel room or suite near I-80 at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Sidney, NE. Whether you're staying for a single night or an entire week, you can enjoy comfortable, pet-friendly accommodations with free Wi-Fi. We're located less than one mile from Cabela's World Headquarters and retail store, so you can easily attend meetings or purchase outdoor gear. Need a place to use your new equipment? Both the Deadwood Walking/Biking Trail and the Sidney Shooting Park are less than 10 minutes from our hotel.After a day on the road, treat yourself to a free cookie, coffee, or tea in our lobby or take a refreshing dip in our indoor pool. If you need to prep for a client meeting, feel free to use the copy services in the business center. Enjoy a restful sleep in our quiet rooms and suites with comfortable beds. Before you drift off, watch your favorite show on TV or catch up on email with free Wi-Fi. Whether you're planning a business meeting or a wedding reception, you can host events of up to 350 people at the Country Inn & Suites. We provide a professional meeting space with an LCD projector, a DVD player, and free Wi-Fi. Our skilled staff can help you arrange every detail, from catering to room setup. Find a wealth of outdoor activities when you stay in Sidney, including golf at Hillside Golf Course and archery at Sidney Shooting Park. Be sure to visit the Living Memorial Gardens to see the famous Angel of Hope statue. Don't miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Treasure Island - TI Hotel & Casino, a Radisson Hotel
description: Welcome to Treasure Island - TI Hotel & Casino, a Radisson Hotel, where you’ll find award-winning services to complement your getaway to the Las Vegas Strip. Our hotel is home to Mystère™ by Cirque du Soleil® and the Marvel Avengers S.T.A.T.I.O.N. exhibit, and our brilliant location connects you to the Fashion Show mall and the luxe Grand Canal Shoppes. For a break from the glitz and glamor of Nevada’s largest city, head to Red Rock Canyon to take in gorgeous desert vistas.After a day at the tables in our 95,000-square-foot casino, you can dine and unwind at one of our 18 restaurants, bars, and lounges. Or enjoy dinner in the privacy of your chic room or suite thanks to 24-hour room service. With amenities like high-speed Wi-Fi, an indulgent spa and salon, and poolside cocktails and cabanas, you may never want to leave our oasis on the Strip. Planning a corporate event or a destination wedding? We offer expansive meeting venues, a romantic chapel, and a full range of catering options. Each of our 2,884 hotel rooms and suites is outfitted with everything you need for a great stay, including floor-to-ceiling windows, high-speed Wi-Fi (included with resort fee), a mini fridge, and a bathtub that’s perfect for a late-night soak with a glass of champagne. You can upgrade to a room with a view of the Strip or a suite with a separate living room. From intimate weddings with 50 guests to grand affairs for 1,200 attendees, the event facilities at Treasure Island can accommodate a wide range of gatherings. Our staff can create a memorable event for you and your guests thanks to an array of catering menus, audiovisual setup and tech support, poolside spaces, and both private and semi-private areas in our restaurants.                                 For acclaimed dining options without leaving the resort, choose from one of our on-site restaurants and bars, which are conveniently located throughout the hotel and on the Strip. Thanks to our variety, you can plan a date night at Phil’s Italian Steak House, bet on a game and enjoy a burger at the Golden Circle Sports Bars, or try your hand at line dancing at Gilley’s. And you’re never too far away from a cold cocktail or beer at the casino’s 24-hour Breeze Bar. Follow the neon lights of the Las Vegas Strip to find world-famous attractions like the Fountains of Bellagio, the Volcano at The Mirage, Cirque du Soleil shows, and dozens of casinos, all within walking distance of Treasure Island. If you’d rather ride than walk, hop aboard the Las Vegas Monorail or the free tram that runs between our hotel and The Mirage. In the area for a conference? Our resort is less than two miles from the Las Vegas Convention Center and just across the street from the Sands Expo Center. Explore these popular points of interest during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Manchester Airport, NH
description: Ideally located off I-293 in Bedford, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Manchester Airport, NH offers an ideal location near Manchester-Boston Regional Airport (MHT). We provide a free hotel shuttle to and from the airport, an indoor saline pool, pet-friendly rooms, and attentive, personalized service. While you’re with us, check out our game room, stocked with retro arcade games, and start your day right with our complimentary, hot breakfast.Staying for a while? Make sure to take in a concert at the historic Palace Theatre, just 10 minutes away from our Bedford hotel. Nearby, you’ll also find the Currier Museum of Art, which features a permanent collection of 13,000 works and manages tours of Frank Lloyd Wright’s Zimmerman House. Our rooms and suites provide microwaves, refrigerators, and 32-inch HDTVs. Take advantage of free Wi-Fi to stay in touch with work and home. Choose from standard rooms with two queen beds, or consider a whirlpool suite for extra space. If you’re bringing your furry friend along on your trip, our first floor offers pet-friendly rooms. Convenient to both I-293 and the MHT airport, the Country Inn & Suites provides 2,500 square feet of space for your next event. We offer free Wi-Fi and modern audiovisual equipment for presentations. We also provide planning assistance. Less than six miles south of downtown Manchester, NH, our hotel is a great home base for those attending concerts at SNHU Arena or baseball games at Northeast Delta Dental Stadium. LaBelle Winery is nearby, as is the Palace Theatre and the renowned Currier Museum of Art. Don’t miss these favorites during your stay: By car:Head east on Airport Road, and then take a slight right onto Raymond Wieczorek Drive. At the traffic circle, take the second exit and stay on Raymond Wieczorek Drive. Take the US-3 exit toward Merrimack, and then turn right onto US-3 N. After 1.8 miles, turn left, and the hotel will be on your right.

name: Radisson Hotel Nashua
description: The grand exterior of Radisson Hotel Nashua draws inspiration from medieval European castles, creating an ideal venue for fairy-tale weddings, memorable business conferences, and peaceful vacations in Nashua, NH. Our pet-friendly hotel's convenient location near Highway 3 places guests just 22 minutes from Manchester-Boston Regional Airport (MHT) and close to several electronics and technology companies. Families can explore nearby entertainment venues like SkyVenture New Hampshire and the Nashoba Valley Ski Area, while all guests appreciate our proximity to downtown Nashua and access to tax-free shopping at Merrimack Premium Outlets.Work your way through an entertaining book in our sophisticated lobby, or stay on top of office work in the 24-hour business center, which features comfortable seating and free Wi-Fi. Take a break to soak up some poolside sun or relax in the sauna and hot tub. Atlantis® Sports Club Nashua, our state-of-the-art fitness center, provides massage services and an impressive array of workout equipment. Our 336 spacious rooms and suites offer free Wi-Fi and large desks to make it easy to keep up with work assignments. At the end of the evening, curl up with your furry friend and catch your favorite show on cable TV. Business-focused rooms provide a complimentary breakfast for busy corporate travelers. We also offer suites with a separate living room for your family to spread out. Boasting 25,000 square feet of meeting space in a castle-inspired venue, the Radisson is ideal for hosting conferences, conventions, and weddings in Nashua. We offer an elegant ballroom that can accommodate up to 1,000 attendees as well as pre-function space, several smaller rooms, and a dedicated boardroom. Take advantage of additional services such as audiovisual equipment rental, customized catering, and professional planning assistance to ensure your event is a success.                                 For a quiet meal in the privacy of your room, order from our room service menu.                                 Shade Bar & Grill, located on site, offers guests a lively dining environment that features large-screen TVs. Enjoy an energizing breakfast in the morning, and return later in the day to dig into hearty comfort food like juicy steaks and half-pound burgers. You can also check out our assortment of craft beers, wines, and signature drinks. The Radisson hotel sits on the southern side of Nashua, within commuting range of Boston. In winter, you can drive to the Nashoba Valley Ski Area to ski, snowboard, and tube in fresh powder. Throughout the year, treat your family to a thrilling day at SkyVenture New Hampshire or Fun World. You can pick up sweet treats in downtown Nashua before seeing a concert at Tsongas Center. Don't miss these nearby attractions:

name: The Claridge - A Radisson Hotel
description: Dubbed the “Skyscraper by the Sea” during its construction in 1929, The Claridge - A Radisson Hotel is an architectural masterpiece with a prime oceanfront location just off the famed Atlantic City Boardwalk. Join the likes of Marilyn Monroe, Frank Sinatra, and Princess Grace of Monaco with an unforgettable stay at our hotel, located just steps from Brighton Park and the city’s legendary casinos, shops, and restaurants. Other nearby highlights include the Atlantic City Aquarium, the Atlantic City Convention Center, and Boardwalk Hall, home of the Miss America Pageant.Experience our exceptional location and service for yourself in our rooftop bar and lounge, our indoor pool, and our magnificent ballrooms. The Atlantic City Comedy Club provides hours of entertainment steps from your room, and multiple on-site restaurants and bars provide delicious meals and tasty cocktails throughout your stay. Additional amenities include room service, limousine service, bell service, and valet parking. Our 480 rooms and suites feature vintage style and elegance with modern comforts such as room service, Keurig coffee machines, and free Wi-Fi. Celebrating a special occasion at the shore? Upgrade your stay in our Boardwalk Empire King Suite, which features a welcoming living room, two large bathrooms, and a romantic whirlpool for two. Boasting a 15,000-square-foot conference center, several unique meeting rooms, and the magnificent oceanfront Grand Ballroom, The Claridge - A Radisson Hotel is one of Atlantic City’s top venues for wedding receptions, leadership summits, and family celebrations. In addition to the hotel’s historic grandeur, top-notch touches like state-of-the-art audiovisual equipment and catering service ensure your event will shine.The Art Gallery, located on the first floor, and VUE Roof Top Bar and Lounge, located on the 23rd floor, are also available for private events. Whether you envision your gathering backdropped by contemporary artworks or the sunset over the Atlantic Ocean, these alternative spaces are perfect for upscale business meetings and trendy social gatherings. Originally a speakeasy during the Prohibition era, The Twenties restaurant has entertained celebrities such as Marilyn Monroe and President John F. Kennedy. Head to the sixth floor to experience the allure of the Roaring Twenties for yourself with lavish drinks and mouthwatering American and Italian cuisine.Located on the 23rd floor, VUE Roof Top Bar and Lounge boasts stunning views overlooking Atlantic City Beach. You can dine indoors in upscale comfort or have a seat on the outdoor patio to enjoy alfresco dining.Open seasonally, Malcolm’s Lounge, our first-floor bar, features a wide array of alcoholic beverages to start your getaway. The Claridge - A Radisson Hotel is located in the heart of Atlantic City, just steps from the famous Boardwalk and the many shopping and entertainment venues that line it. After a day at the beach, try your luck on the slots at the local casinos. Can’t-miss attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Newark Airport, NJ
description: Just two miles from Newark Liberty International Airport (EWR) and a half-hour train ride from NYC, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Newark Airport, NJ offers a comfortable and convenient home away from home. Whether you're stopping by for a break on your way to the Big Apple or want to explore the local area around Elizabeth, NJ, our family-friendly hotel makes vacations a breeze with a free, hot breakfast and complimentary shuttle service to and from the airport.When you’re not exploring New York City, take advantage of on-site recreation with a heated indoor pool, a hot tub, and a fitness center. We offer free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel to make planning your itinerary easy.  Choose from 210 rooms and suites that offer all the comforts of home, including plush bedding, a microwave, and a refrigerator. During your stay, you can freshen up with free Pantene Pro-V Nature Fusion® toiletries and prepare hot beverages with the coffeemaker day or night. If you need extra space, connecting rooms or suites with sleeper sofas are convenient solutions for family trips or a getaway with friends. Our hotel is the perfect home base for visits to NYC, which is just a 40-minute drive from the hotel or a 30-minute train ride from the airport station. Outside the big city, the metropolitan area of Elizabeth offers a lot of activities for the whole family. Attend a performance at the Prudential Center, the Ritz Theatre, or the New Jersey Performing Arts Center—all within six miles of the hotel. Get in some quality retail therapy at prime shopping outlets like The Mills, or take a cooking class from the experts at Carlo's Bake Shop. While you're in town, check out these nearby attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Freehold
