description: Located about 15 minutes from Six Flags Great Adventure & Safari, Radisson Hotel Freehold makes a great home base your vacation. Attend the races at Freehold Raceway or shop for an outfit at Freehold Raceway Mall, both just 5 minutes from the hotel. You can drive the kids 10 minutes to Monmouth Battlefield State Park to learn more about the Revolutionary War or head over to iPlay America to enjoy arcade games, bumper cars, laser tag, and more. Interested in a day trip? Beautiful Jersey Shore summer spots like Long Branch Beach are about 35 minutes away by car.No matter what brings you to Freehold, take advantage of on-site amenities like free Wi-Fi. You can keep up your exercise routine with a visit to our fitness center, open 24 hours a day. Need to relax? Drop by our seasonal outdoor pool to spend time in the sun. Our hotel is also a popular venue for wedding celebrations. With sparkling chandeliers, modern details, and indoor and outdoor ceremony options, our Crystal Ballroom creates an unforgettable setting for your special day. After a day with your kids at Six Flags Great Adventure & Safari, head back to your room to relax with a drink chilled in the mini fridge or a hot cup of tea made using the in-room facilities. You can watch your favorite cable show on the LCD TV while you snack on popcorn made in the microwave. When you’re ready to sleep, settle under the down comforter and rest your head on the feather pillows. With six meeting and event spaces, our Radisson hotel offers the perfect setting for your corporate function, wedding, or holiday party. The elegant Emerald Ballroom and the Crystal Ballroom feature expansive, flexible room setups and stunning details to make every event sparkle. Three private salons are also available for more intimate functions. Professional planning assistance, on-site catering, and convenient amenities like free Wi-Fi elevate your event.                                     If you prefer to dine in the privacy of your hotel room or suite, you can check out the room service menu to have a meal delivered directly to your door.                                 Enjoy delicious meals without having to leave the hotel at Winner’s Circle Restaurant and Lounge, which offers classic American cuisine for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. You can savor a juicy Angus burger, flavorful pasta, or a crisp salad in this casual eatery or from the comfort of your own room. Located near iPlay America, our Radisson hotel in Freehold also offers access to exciting activities from horse racing to hiking and shopping. If you’re in the mood to lounge on the beach, you can drive about half an hour to the Jersey Shore. Be sure to check out these nearby attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Absecon (Atlantic City) Galloway, NJ
description: Turn off Garden State Parkway and into the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Absecon (Atlantic City) Galloway, NJ and let your vacation begin. If you fly in, our hotel is less than 15 minutes from Atlantic City International Airport (ACY). Our location is near the famous Atlantic City Boardwalk, just a 15-minute drive away. Whether you plan to golf, gamble, or explore the beaches, book our hotel for an affordable base for your Jersey Shore getaway.When you check in, indulge in coffee and cookies in the lobby and log on to free Wi-Fi throughout the building. Stretch out your vacation days with a swim in our heated indoor pool and spa, or you can get a workout in our fitness center. If you need to catch up with the office, we offer a business center. A free, hot breakfast is served each morning in our hotel dining area. Unpack your luggage and rest comfortably in one of our 68 suites, each equipped with a flat-screen TV, more than 90 cable channels, and free Wi-Fi. If you plan a longer visit, upgrade to an extended-stay suite and enjoy a kitchenette to make meals and a whirlpool to relax. Located near the ACY airport and just a 15-minute drive from the Boardwalk, our hotel’s flexible 900-square-foot meeting room is ideal for up to 75 event guests. We provide tea, coffee, and cookies for breaks and can help you arrange catering. Your presenters have access to our audiovisual equipment, and everyone can enjoy free high-speed internet. Whether you’re here to play poker in the casinos, build sand castles on the beach, or stroll hand-in-hand along the pier, our hotel puts you near the top attractions of America’s Playground. Add these can’t-miss sites to your itinerary:

name: Radisson Hotel Piscataway-Somerset
description: Situated just off Piscataway’s Centennial Avenue, Radisson Hotel Piscataway-Somerset is close to many of New Jersey’s top corporate offices, including Fortune 500 companies like Johnson & Johnson, Colgate Palmolive, and many pharmaceutical companies. Use our free shuttle service to commute within a five-mile radius of the hotel.* Our location off I-287 is about half an hour from Newark Liberty International Airport (EWR). If you’re looking for excitement in New York or Philadelphia, you can drive about an hour or take the train. The closest train station is just 10 minutes away. For nearby fun, the Scarlet Knights play football at Rutgers University, just five minutes from the hotel.After a day of meetings or sightseeing, return to the Radisson for a meal at our on-site restaurant or a nightcap in the lounge. Grab a snack from our 24-hour Corner Store or order from our light room service menu. Our indoor pool and fitness center offer ways to exercise. Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the hotel, and a business center is available.*Complimentary van transportation service is available to and from companies or events up to five miles away from the hotel. The shuttle operates weekdays from 8 am to 5:30 pm, and you must book it at least 24 hours in advance. Based on availability. Restrictions apply. Each of our 206 rooms and suites offers free Wi-Fi to help you stay connected and a comfortable work desk. Make coffee using a Keurig® machine and order room service throughout the day. Business Class guests receive vouchers for a free breakfast and drinks each evening. Upgrade to a suite for extra space thanks to a separate living room with a sleeper sofa. Our 12,000 square feet of versatile meeting space allows you to host events for up to 1,000 guests. Whether you’re holding an intimate dinner or a large gathering, you can choose from boardrooms, conference rooms, or ballrooms such as the elegant Miracle Room. Our professional staff can help you plan the details, while our expert chef can prepare the perfect menu for a banquet or reception. Chef Ash Helal at Fusions Restaurant ensures a creative take on delicious cuisine. Order mouthwatering dishes, from traditional entrées to vegan and gluten-free choices. You can enjoy breakfast, lunch, or dinner indoors or outdoors in the courtyard on site. Hotel guests may order from the light room service menu.After a busy day of meetings, visit the lounge to negotiate over drinks or mingle with new friends as you sip a martini or your favorite beer. Our hotel’s central location offers easy access to top regional destinations including New York City, less than an hour away by car or 40 minutes by train. Sports fans can catch a game at Rutgers University, while beach lovers enjoy day trips to Point Pleasant Beach. You can visit a petting zoo with the kids, play golf nearby, or shop at three major malls only minutes away. If you have free time, check out these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Hobbs, NM
description: Set up your office or home away from home at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Hobbs, NM, located less than a mile from Zia Park Casino and just three minutes from the University of the Southwest. Situated on NM-18, our hotel is the perfect base for all your Southwest travels, including day trips to Carlsbad Caverns or El Paso, TX. Before heading out in the morning to explore local attractions, start with our free, hot breakfast, which features choices like waffles with syrup and bagels with cream cheese.If you exercise daily, stay on track with a workout in our fitness center, or go for a swim in the heated indoor pool. Our on-site business center helps you focus on work, and free Wi-Fi keeps you connected while you’re on the road. A day of work or play in Hobbs can end with a great night's sleep in one of our comfortable rooms or suites. Pop a treat in the microwave, snag a cold drink from the fridge, and have a movie night in your room with cable TV. When you wake up, you can prepare a hot cup of coffee with the in-room coffeemaker. Located directly across from the Lea County Event Center and near Zia Park Casino and Racetrack, our hotel is ideal for groups traveling together to Hobbs. Contact us for room blocks or information about booking our dining room for small gatherings. Home to numerous corporate offices, Hobbs is located on the New Mexico and Texas border, less than 100 miles from Carlsbad Caverns. Whether you're here to work, vacation, or visit one of our local colleges, you can experience great Southwest entertainment including live shows, horse races, and sporting events. Create memories at these popular nearby attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Corning
description: Positioned in the heart of the Gaffer District, Radisson Hotel Corning offers stylish rooms near shopping and dining on Market Street. Take a 15-minute walk from our hotel to the world-famous Corning Museum of Glass, which displays inspiring glassworks and offers daily glassblowing demonstrations. Known as the gateway to the Southern Finger Lakes, Corning is less than an hour from more than 100 Finger Lakes-region wineries. Our location just off Exit 47 on I-86 also provides an easy drive to popular nearby cities like Big Flats, Hammondsport, and Watkins Glen.Situated only 12 miles from Elmira Corning Regional Airport (ELM), our convenient hotel helps business travelers stay productive with amenities like express check-out and free Wi-Fi. When you’re ready to unwind, soak in the outdoor hot tub or work out in the fitness center. You can also grab a delicious meal easily at our on-site restaurants. After spending the day at the Corning Museum of Glass, enjoy a restful night’s sleep in one of our modern rooms and suites. Unwind on comfortable beds with plush pillows and down comforters while you watch an HBO movie on the flat-screen TV. In the morning, grab a cold drink from the mini fridge on your way out for a day of shopping on Market Street, right by the hotel. Radisson Hotel Corning offers more than 10,000 square feet of flexible event space that’s perfectly suited for meetings and conferences. Use our complimentary audiovisual equipment to make your presentation stand out, and take advantage of seven conference rooms that are ideal for breakout sessions.Planning a wedding or social event? The Finger Lakes Ballroom provides an elegant setting for receptions of up to 650 guests. Our staff can work with you to arrange delicious, customized hors d’oeuvres or a sit-down dinner menu. For a delicious breakfast, lunch, or dinner, dine at our on-site restaurant, Grill 1-2-5. You can enjoy classic American cuisine like steaks and seafood in our beautiful, naturally lit dining room. Kids 12 and under eat free from our children’s menu with the purchase of an adult meal. Interested in lighter options? The Steuben Bar offers an all-day dining menu including a selection of appetizers, burgers, and sandwiches. You can also order a local craft beer or a glass of wine from our extensive selection of Finger Lakes Wine Country vintages.Our hotel is also within walking distance of more than 40 restaurants, which offer a wide variety of options including pizza, seafood, curry, and sushi. Our location right off the city’s main street lets you walk to the many nearby theaters, boutique shops, and eating establishments. You can also spend the day exploring the National Soaring Museum’s collections of military and competitive motorless aircraft or visiting the Corning Museum of Glass to see centuries of glass art. Don’t miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Cortland, NY
description: Whether you’re in town for your SUNY Cortland student’s senior graduation or you’re on a family trip to the Finger Lakes, you can find comfortable hotel accommodations at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Cortland, NY. Our convenient location near I-81 is just a walk away from the campus of SUNY Cortland and close to area restaurants, shopping opportunities, and businesses like Gutchess Lumber and Pall.Each morning, our free, hot breakfast features a variety of items to fill you up for your busy day. When you return to the hotel, you can grab a complimentary cookie in the lobby or swim some laps in the indoor pool. If you’re here for work, laundry facilities help keep you looking your best and a 24-hour business center provides a place for you to catch up on office duties. For guests who want to keep up with their workout routine, our on-site fitness center is open 24 hours. Before you head out for the day, use the free Wi-Fi to research area attractions or view a virtual map of the SUNY Cortland campus. Each room and suite also features a refrigerator and a microwave so you can store and prepare your family's favorite snacks. Equipped with amenities like free high-speed internet access and an LCD projector, our 1,100-square-foot meeting room is perfect for wedding receptions, conferences, and seminars. In addition to excellent group rates, we offer a personalized web page to enhance your event. Situated about 35 minutes south of Syracuse and 20 minutes northeast of Ithaca, Cortland is located in the famous Finger Lakes region, an area known for its wide array of vineyards and wineries. Outdoor recreation opportunities are also abundant, with skiing, snowboarding, fishing, and golfing all within an easy drive of the hotel. Don't miss these family favorites:

name: Radisson Hotel Niagara Falls-Grand Island
description: Located on the banks of the upper Niagara River, Radisson Hotel Niagara Falls-Grand Island offers comfortable rooms and suites with walk-out balconies commanding countryside or river views. Stay just a 20-minute drive from the spectacular cascades of Niagara Falls State Park. If you have business in Buffalo, NY, you can be at the convention center or downtown offices in just 20 minutes. Closer to our quiet hotel are family-friendly attractions like Fantasy Island amusement park and Beaver Island’s beach and kayak launches.Our extensive event spaces and waterside gazebo provide the perfect setting for a conference or wedding. Before or after a busy day, take a dip in the indoor or outdoor pool, both of which overlook the river, or use the well-equipped fitness center. You also can admire the view over cocktails or a meal at our on-site restaurant, and then capture all the highlights of your stay by using free Wi-Fi to upload your photos. Each of our hotel’s 263 spacious rooms and suites includes a walk-out balcony facing the island’s countryside or the upper Niagara River. Upgrade to Business Class to enjoy extras like a complimentary breakfast and drink vouchers. Our suites offer extra space to sleep and relax during your visit to the Niagara Falls area as well as perks like a whirlpool or a second TV. Plan a waterside wedding in our gazebo or a business function in one of the 12 meeting rooms at the Radisson. Our 28,000-square-foot meeting space accommodates up to 750 guests, and our helpful staff is available to assist you with on-site catering. For meetings, take advantage of free Wi-Fi, audiovisual rentals, and water service to keep your guests refreshed.                                 Let the Niagara River be the backdrop for your meal at our hotel’s on-site restaurant and lounge. Offering a seasonal breakfast buffet and casual American-style dinners, Currents Restaurant is a great place to begin and end your day. Visit the lounge for our weekday happy hour specials, and if you’re staying for the weekend, be sure to try the restaurant’s Friday fish fry. The immense cascades at Niagara Falls State Park, less than 12 miles from our hotel, are the area’s biggest attraction, but you don’t have to leave Grand Island for family fun. Fantasy Island has classic rides and a water park, and Beaver Island State Park offers swimming, kayaking, and golf. The Buffalo Zoo and city museums are also nearby. Add these favorites to your itinerary:

name: Radisson Hotel Hauppauge-Long Island
description: Conveniently situated near Long Island Innovation Park at Hauppauge, Radisson Hotel Hauppauge-Long Island offers guests easy access to the Long Island Expressway (I-495) and is less than 20 minutes from Brentwood Train Station (LIRR) and Long Island MacArthur Airport (ISP). If you’re arriving from John F. Kennedy International Airport (JFK) or LaGuardia Airport (LGA), you can reach the hotel in about 40 minutes. During your stay, take the train into New York City to enjoy the best of the Big Apple. After a busy day, return to the hotel for a relaxing soak in the indoor pool or for a drink at the on-site Spiritz Lounge. Amenities like complimentary parking, plush bedding, and free Wi-Fi allow you to feel at home. You can keep up with work and emails at our business center and stick to your exercise routine at the on-site fitness center. Our hotel’s 209 rooms and suites offer amenities to help make your trip more convenient, such as free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and comfortable bedding. Brew a fresh cup of coffee with the in-room coffeemaker before sitting down at the L-shaped work desk to finish a big project. Located near the North Shore of Long Island and about 10 miles from the MacArthur airport, the Radisson is a premier location for business meetings and corporate functions. Our 18,500-square-foot venue provides plenty of space for special occasions like weddings, anniversaries, and holiday celebrations. Meeting planners can take advantage of catering services, on-site floral services, and audiovisual equipment. Enjoy a casual breakfast, lunch, or dinner next to the atrium’s waterfall when you visit Fountain Grille. If you need a quick bite to eat before a meeting, you can stop by Café Pronto, which serves Starbucks® coffee, freshly baked pastries, sandwiches, and other snacks. When you’re ready to wrap up the end of your week, join us for an after-dinner cocktail at Spiritz Lounge. Interested in outdoor adventure? Conveniently located near our hotel, attractions like Smith Point, Jones Beach, and Sunken Meadow State Park make for an exciting day of exploration. New York City, just a short train or car ride away, is home to an array of cultural attractions, entertainment destinations, and restaurants. Make time to visit these points of interest:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Big Flats (Elmira), NY
description: Plan a relaxing getaway with family or friends at the newly renovated Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Big Flats (Elmira), NY, conveniently located in the heart of Finger Lakes Wine Country. Elmira Corning Regional Airport (ELM) and I-86 provide easy access to our hotel. You can fill your itinerary with stops at the Corning Museum of Glass, Arnot Mall, and the National Soaring Museum. Start each day with our free, hot breakfast and treat yourself to complimentary coffee and cookies each time you pass through the lobby. We offer a 24-hour business center and a fitness center for guests. Stretch out your vacation days with a swim in the heated indoor pool, and connect to free Wi-Fi throughout the building to post pictures to social media and plan your next adventure. Feel at home in our modern hotel rooms, which offer free Wi-Fi and 32-inch flat-screen TVs. Keep your favorite new wines chilled in the fridge, make snacks using the microwave, and stay caffeinated with the in-room coffeemaker. We offer a variety of suites with additional bedrooms, living areas, or sleeper sofas to accommodate groups and families. Need a small gathering space for family or associates? Our flexible meeting room near the ELM airport can comfortably accommodate 10 guests. If you need something larger, we can help you find an appropriate venue and reserve a special room block for your group. Take in the beauty of rolling hills and manicured vineyards characteristic of the scenic Finger Lakes region. Our hotel in Horseheads is an ideal home base for vacationing groups visiting the Mark Twain Study and Exhibit and the Chemung County Historical Society. While you’re here, be sure to visit Watkins Glen, known for its gorgeous state park and world-famous racetrack. Consider these attractions for your itinerary:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Ithaca, NY
description: Whether you’re visiting for business, taking a family vacation, or touring one of the nearby schools, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Ithaca, NY offers you a convenient location just off State Route 96B. When you book a room at our hotel, you can explore downtown attractions, hike the trails of nearby Buttermilk Falls State Park, or arrange for a waterfall tour with Experience! The Finger Lakes. We offer complimentary shuttle service to local businesses and attractions in case you want a convenient way to catch a Cornell University or Ithaca College game. Ithaca is one end of the Cayuga Lake Wine Trail, a perfect way to spend the day traveling to 16 wineries dotted along the lake.After exploring the area’s natural wonders, stop by our lobby for complimentary coffee, cookies, and candy for a quick snack. You can head to the accessible indoor pool to unwind or visit our fitness center for a cardio workout. Our friendly staff is happy to offer directions to local attractions, or you can use the free Wi-Fi to map out your travels. If you’re traveling with a pet, ask us about our pet-friendly suites. Choose one of our rooms or suites as your base of operations for your next vacation or business trip to Ithaca. You can use the free Wi-Fi to map out your travels, heat snacks in a microwave, or chill your drinks in a refrigerator. If you’re planning a wedding reception, graduation party, or business seminar, our hotel has a 1,600-square-foot meeting room that can accommodate up to 100 guests. You can count on professional sound and light services, free parking for your guests, and free Wi-Fi for your presentations. We offer a private web page for your event, and you can request a block of room reservations for your guests. One of the nation's premier college towns, Ithaca is home to Cornell University and Ithaca College. Ithaca brims with innovative and creative attractions, from the vitality of Ithaca Commons to the engaging exhibits at Sciencenter. Cayuga Lake, endless waterfalls, and dramatic gorges offer countless reasons to enjoy the wonders of nature. Don’t miss these local favorite attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel JFK Airport
description: Located 15 miles southeast of Times Square in Jamaica, Queens, Radisson Hotel JFK Airport is the ideal nearby stopover for guests flying into New York through America's fifth-busiest airport. Take a five-minute ride to the hotel on our free 24-hour airport shuttle, and then head out to explore world-famous attractions like One World Trade Center and the Statue of Liberty.New York has a lot to offer, and we help you navigate your options with a concierge, on-site car rental services, and our tour and airline desks. Whether you’re here for vacation, business, or a long layover, you can stay productive and connected with free Wi-Fi. You can even keep up with your workouts in our fitness center after a day full of meetings in our on-site venue. If you’d like to unwind with a bite to eat or a refreshing cocktail, stop by our on-site restaurant and lounge, Connections.  Each of our 385 rooms and suites provides comfort and convenience, whether you're relaxing with a pay-per-view movie or preparing for a meeting at the in-room work desk. Upgrade to our premium options to enjoy extra space and amenities such as an in-room microwave and refrigerator. Situated about five minutes from the JFK airport and close to Midtown Manhattan, the Radisson offers a convenient location for business meetings, corporate functions, or personal events. Our 5,000 square feet of event space includes meeting rooms, a boardroom, and a ballroom. Host up to 300 guests, and impress them with superb catering and thought-provoking audiovisual presentations.                                 Satisfy your appetite in the Big Apple when you stop by Connections, our on-site restaurant and lounge. Enjoy munching on tasty American cuisine for breakfast, lunch, or dinner in a casual atmosphere. In the evening, visit our lounge to sip happy hour specials before dinner or share late-night beers and cocktails with colleagues. Our Radisson hotel, located just 15 miles from Midtown Manhattan, places you within driving distance of most of NYC’s iconic sights. Don’t have a car? We can help you locate and secure transportation options. Be sure to check out these popular destinations:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Syracuse North Airport, NY
description: For a quiet and comfortable place to stay outside the bustle of downtown Syracuse, book a room at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Syracuse North Airport, NY. Located at the intersection of I-81 and I-90 in Liverpool, our hotel puts you less than two miles from name-brand retailers at Destiny USA and only three miles from Syracuse Hancock International Airport (SYR). Business guests appreciate our proximity to the trade shows at Empire Expo Center, and families love being near the festivals at Onondaga Lake and the diverse animals at Rosamond Gifford Zoo.After a day of meetings or exploring central New York, return to the hotel and recharge with free cookies and coffee in the lobby. You can work out in our on-site fitness center or put the finishing touches on a presentation in the business center before hosting a meeting in our event venue. Our 76 hotel rooms include microwaves and refrigerators so you can bring your favorite snacks and drinks on your trip to New York. Stream music or video chat with friends using free Wi-Fi, and catch a movie on HBO while enjoying a cup of coffee from the in-room coffeemaker. Host small training sessions, birthday celebrations, or presentations for up to 36 people in our 340-square-foot meeting room, conveniently situated off I-81 and three miles from the SYR airport. Support your event with free Wi-Fi and other audiovisual aids, and ask our team to arrange the room in a configuration that meets your needs. Cheer on the Syracuse Chiefs at NBT Bank Stadium, or browse the 250 stores at Destiny USA, home to numerous restaurants, an antique carousel, and the WonderWorks amusement park. Travel a short distance to enjoy these additional attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Mount Morris, NY
description: Come explore the natural beauty of Letchworth State Park, less than five minutes from the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Mount Morris, NY. Located near I-390, our hotel provides easy access to the park's stunning views as well as the charming Mt. Morris area. Spend an afternoon visiting the Jell-O Gallery or National Warplane Museum before heading to a wine tasting at Deer Run Winery. For guests traveling with family, be sure to make a trip to Hidden Valley Animal Adventure for a guided safari tour.Wake up each morning with a free, hot breakfast, and treat yourself to an invigorating workout in our fitness center. After a day of adventure, you can relax at the hotel with free Wi-Fi and enjoy a soak in our hot tub. After hiking in Letchworth State Park, unwind in one of our comfortable rooms or suites with free Wi-Fi and an in-room microwave and refrigerator. In the morning, wake up with a fresh cup of coffee before enjoying our free, hot breakfast. For those traveling with pets, a limited number of pet-friendly rooms are available. Host your business meeting or social event in our 420-square-foot meeting space, featuring free Wi-Fi, audiovisual equipment, and refreshments. For larger events, the adjacent Genesee River Restaurant and Reception Center offers space for up to 1,000 guests. Take a day trip to Hidden Valley Animal Adventure for a guided trolley tour through 60 acres packed with different exotic and domestic animals or drive about 40 miles to see Niagara Falls firsthand. Mt. Morris offers its own blend of attractions best experienced at these local favorites:

name: Radisson Hotel New Rochelle
description: For access to NYC without the hassle of staying in the city, reserve a comfortable room or suite at Radisson Hotel New Rochelle, situated off I-95 just north of New York City. Commuting is a breeze thanks to the hotel’s location near the Metro-North Railroad and Amtrak station, only a 10-minute walk away, and LaGuardia Airport (LGA), about a 20-minute drive away. You can also walk about eight minutes to find fun activities at New Roc City, an entertainment and shopping complex. Other New Rochelle attractions are within a 15-minute drive of the hotel.Whether you’re flying into the LGA airport or John F. Kennedy International Airport (JFK), we can help you arrange a Red Dot Airport Shuttle to the hotel. Once you’re here, use free Wi-Fi to check in with the office or home. Afterward, unwind with a workout in the fitness center or a dip in the outdoor pool. If you need a meal, be sure to check out our room service and our on-site restaurant, NoMa Social. Our comfortable rooms and suites feature sleek styling and convenient amenities like free Wi-Fi and fridges. If you need to work, you can get comfortable in an ergonomic chair and pull up to the large desk. Special options like a microwave and a view of the Long Island Sound are available upon request. To fuel up for your day, take advantage of our breakfast-for-a-buck offer when you reserve a room. Take advantage of our 6,400-square-foot meeting facilities to host events for up to 250 guests. Our professional staff can help you plan the details of your event and choose the right space, such as our Social Room, which makes an elegant venue for large gatherings. Let our expert chef prepare the perfect menu for your banquet or reception.                                     Dreaming of breakfast in bed or need to work through lunch? Order something delicious from the light room service menu.                                 Located on site, NoMa Social serves Mediterranean-inspired dishes and tapas in a chic dining room. Pair your meal with a selection from the restaurant’s extensive wine and beer menu, or opt for a signature sangria and a few small-plate appetizers. Later, unwind at the NoMa Social Lounge with music and late-night drinks. With a location close to I-95 and New Rochelle Station, the Radisson makes it easy to venture into NYC to experience the sights and sounds of the Big Apple. You can also explore the coast at Glen Island Park and City Island, both within five miles of the hotel. Don’t miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Radisson Hotel New York Midtown-Fifth Avenue
description: A stay at Radisson Hotel New York Midtown-Fifth Avenue places you in the heart of Manhattan and an easy walk from NYC's top attractions, including Radio City Music Hall, Rockefeller Center, the Museum of Modern Art, Times Square, and Central Park. Start each morning with an exhilarating workout on a Peloton Bike in our fitness center, and then walk to the famed shops on Fifth Avenue. If you're here for work, our hotel is convenient to NBCUniversal, Deloitte, UBS, and Morgan Stanley. The nearby Fifth Avenue–53rd Street subway station is served by the E and M trains, and the 47–50th Street Rockefeller Center Station is served by the B, D, F, and M trains, making it easy to explore the rest of the city. When you reserve one of our 230 hotel rooms and suites, you’ll enjoy complimentary amenities like a Keurig® brewing machine, bottled water and one GB of Wi-Fi. For a longer stay, opt for a studio suite featuring a well-equipped kitchenette with a microwave, a refrigerator and dishware. From breakfast in bed to dinner at your desk, any meal can be enjoyed in the comfort of your guest room or suite with our convenient room service.                                 For a bird’s-eye view of some of Midtown’s most popular streets, head to our seventh-floor restaurant, Terrace Club, where you can take in the cityscape along with a delicious American-style breakfast and a Tex-Mex favorite for lunch and dinner. Want to relax with friends after a busy day? Order a round of drinks from the bar to enjoy as you chat outside on the terrace. From the bright lights of Times Square to the magical skyline view at the Top of the Rock observation deck, New York’s most popular borough has something for everyone. Visit the Museum of Modern Art, stroll past the elaborate store windows on 5th Avenue, take in the majestic spires of St. Patrick’s Cathedral and pose for selfies in front of Rockefeller Center. End your day with a hit Broadway show or a concert at Radio City Music Hall. Don’t miss out on these world-famous attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel New York Times Square
description: Located just two blocks from Madison Square Garden and Penn Station, Radisson Hotel New York Times Square is ideal for travelers craving easy access to businesses and tourist destinations. Walk to Hudson Yards for a day of shopping or Times Square for a Broadway show. Our hotel also puts you near great restaurants where you can treat yourself to a slice of pizza, a bagel or a formal sit-down dinner. The nearby subway station makes it easy to explore Chelsea, Hell’s Kitchen and Lincoln Center before wrapping up your day at our hotel’s rooftop bar, which overlooks the Empire State Building and the Hudson River. With thoughtful touches like free Wi-Fi and mini fridges, our 320 rooms provide a welcoming retreat. Order room service for a late-night snack before climbing into your plush bed for a good night’s sleep. In the morning, enjoy a cup of coffee in your pajamas thanks to an in-room coffeemaker. Traveling for work? Book our Business Class room for perks like complimentary breakfast and additional Radisson Rewards points. Prepare your team for trade shows and corporate events at the nearby Jacob K. Javits Convention Center with a brainstorming session in our 375-square-foot boardroom. Our meeting space can accommodate up to 12 guests, and you can use high-speed Internet to check in with the office. For sky-high views of NYC, head to our rooftop bar and lounge to enjoy gorgeous views of the Empire State Building and Hudson Yards. Want to stay grounded? Our lobby-level restaurant serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner to satisfy your palate anytime. Room service is also available so you can enjoy a meal in the comfort of your guest room. You can discover a multitude of exciting things to do around the clock in Midtown New York, from snapping selfies in the neon glow of Times Square to shopping or dining at the dynamic Hudson Yards. Head to the Empire State Building for panoramic views of the city, or enjoy a leisurely stroll along the Hudson River. You can also catch a basketball game or concert at Madison Square Garden, just two blocks away, or take a short walk to the subway to explore Lower and Upper Manhattan and Brooklyn attractions.

name: Radisson Hotel New York Wall Street
description: Stay at Radisson Hotel New York Wall Street to experience the commerce, entertainment, and history of Lower Manhattan, one of New York City’s oldest neighborhoods. Situated in the heart of the bustling Financial District, the Radisson provides 289 modern hotel rooms and suites within walking distance of attractions like One World Trade Center, the New York Stock Exchange, and the National September 11 Memorial. Participate in an on-demand exercise class on a Peloton Bike in our fitness center, and then reward yourself with breakfast at The Bailey, our on-site restaurant. Need to head to a corporate meeting in a different neighborhood? City-wide travel is a breeze thanks to our hotel’s prime location just minutes from the Wall Street subway station, served by the 2 and 3 trains, and the Broad Street subway station, served by the J and Z trains. Escape the city bustle and find a quiet oasis in one of our 289 hotel rooms. Unwind with thoughtful amenities like premium bedding, a smart TV and a versatile work station. You can also brew a hot cup of coffee or tea using the in-room Keurig® brewing machine and set the room to a comfortable temperature thanks to individual climate control. Company meetings, business seminars and social soirees come to life in our event facilities, which provide 2,975 square feet of space in the heart of New York’s Financial District. Our dedicated staff can help you arrange catering for up to 100 guests, and our audiovisual facilities make it easy to display presentations.                                 Wind down at the end of the day with a cold drink and a hearty meal at The Bailey Pub & Brasserie, our on-site dining venue. Each morning, enjoy a plate of delicious French toast, and in the evening, order favorites like fish and chips to go with your happy hour special. Whether you prefer to explore the energy and history of the Financial District or the tranquil serenity of Central Park, the Radisson places you within easy reach of the area’s top attractions. Take a stroll along Broadway, where you can take a selfie with the Charging Bull and Fearless Girl statues, and head to the New York Stock Exchange on Wall Street to see America's financial nerve center.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lake George (Queensbury), NY
description: Located off I-87, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lake George (Queensbury), NY offers exceptional hotel rooms and suites with quick access to crystalline waters, picturesque mountains, and thrilling roller coasters. Here with kids? Walk to The Great Escape & Hurricane Harbor for thrill rides and live entertainment from May to October. The Lake George area also provides hiking, horseback riding, and craft brewery tours all year round. Our hotel is conveniently located near a Lake George Trolley stop, so you can even explore some of the area's top attractions without your car.After a day of adventure, take a dip in our indoor or outdoor pools, relax at the family picnic area, and let your kids burn off some energy at our on-site playground. Fuel up for your day with a free, hot breakfast, and cap off each evening with a soak in our hot tub. Our hotel also offers four complimentary electric car-charging stations. Unwind in your room or suite with a fresh cup of complimentary coffee, and stream your favorite shows using free high-speed Internet access. Each of our rooms includes a flat-screen TV, plus handy amenities like a hair dryer, a fridge, and a microwave. Our 624-square-foot meeting room can comfortably accommodate up to 30 guests for gatherings near Lake George. Enjoy free high-speed internet access, a 24-hour business center, and complimentary coffee and water service throughout your event. Experience the stunning scenery of the Adirondack region by hiking or biking along several mountain trails just minutes from our door. If you’re a thrill-seeker, head just next door for high-octane rides at The Great Escape & Hurricane Harbor. For indoor excitement, head to Adventure Family Fun Center to enjoy an afternoon of go-kart racing, laser tag, and arcade games. Other area favorites include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rochester-Pittsford/Brighton, NY
description: Whether you’re driving along Interstate 390, 490, or 590, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rochester-Pittsford/Brighton, NY is the perfect place for your entire family to recharge. In town for a graduation? Our hotel is just minutes from the University of Rochester and three other colleges, including St. John Fisher College. When you’re hungry, make your way to nearby downtown Rochester for a great meal.Grab a free weekday newspaper and fuel up for a busy day at our free, hot breakfast, served every morning. You can choose from delicious options like Belgian waffles, eggs, yogurts, and fruit. We also offer a fitness center, a 24-hour business center, and three Tesla charging stations to make your stay more convenient. Each of our 67 spacious rooms and suites makes Rochester feel more like home with amenities like free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and an in-room refrigerator. Brew a cup of coffee right in your room, and then wind down with your favorite cable shows in HD. Experience all the fun and excitement of the Finger Lakes when you stay at our Country Inn & Suites in Rochester. Catch a minor league baseball game at Frontier Field, or check out The Strong National Museum of Play for a family-friendly afternoon of toys, games, and fun. Fashion-lovers unite at the Pittsford Plaza, The Marketplace Mall, or Eastview Mall—all great places to shop till you drop. Favorite area attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rochester-University Area, NY
description: Just off Interstate 390 near Greater Rochester International Airport, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rochester-University Area, NY, offers quick access to the city's top attractions, including The Strong National Museum of Play. Several colleges, such as the University of Rochester, Rochester Institute of Technology, Monroe Community College, St. John Fisher College, and Nazareth College, are within three miles of the hotel, making us a well-suited accommodation for students and families.If you’re in town tending to loved ones at a nearby medical center, take advantage of our warm hospitality and convenient amenities like free parking and Wi-Fi to make travel easier. Our business center has a printer so you can print out medical forms or corporate documents, and our heated indoor pool is the perfect place to relax after a busy day. Feel rested and ready for your business meeting after you recharge in one of our 89 rooms and suites, each equipped with free Wi-Fi. Every room also includes a 32-inch flat-screen TV with HBO to help you unwind. Whether you're on a weeklong family vacation or have a free night during a business trip, take some time to enjoy sightseeing spots like the George Eastman Museum. If you have kids with you, don't miss the only African elephants in the state at Seneca Park Zoo or the Rochester Museum & Science Center, where they can learn to harness the power of the wind, build cars, and fire catapults.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Buffalo South I-90, NY
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Buffalo South I-90 in West Seneca, NY places you near the exciting bustle of Buffalo, the Queen City of the Great Lakes. In town for a Buffalo Bills game? Our hotel is less than six miles from Bills Stadium, giving you easy access to tailgating and other game-day festivities. If you’re in the mood to shop, visit Walden Galleria and McKinley Mall, both located less than 15 minutes from the hotel. Visiting with family? Take your kids to the Buffalo Zoo or the Hamburg Fairgrounds. Don’t miss other nearby attractions like the gorgeous Our Lady of Victory National Shrine & Basilica, the scenic Buffalo Botanical Gardens, and the majestic Niagara Falls.Keep up with your workout regimen by taking a jog in our hotel’s fitness center or swimming laps in the heated indoor saltwater pool. Our fireplace lobby is the perfect spot to curl up with a book while savoring an evening snack with a complimentary cup of coffee or tea. If you’re in Buffalo for work, prepare for a meeting with free Wi-Fi in our well-equipped business center. Settle into one of our modern rooms or suites and rest up for the big Buffalo Bills game at Bills Stadium. After a peaceful night on our plush beds, you can brew fresh coffee before heading down to our free, hot breakfast with fresh fruit and waffles. Visiting Buffalo with a group? The flexible event space at the Country Inn & Suites can accommodate up to 10 guests for business meetings, social gatherings, or sports team celebrations. Enhance your presentation with our audiovisual equipment, and keep your guests connected with free Wi-Fi. Ask our friendly staff about catering options as well as our corporate and group rates. West Seneca is a great home base for exploring the Buffalo area, which offers something for everyone, including gorgeous botanical gardens, the Buffalo Zoo, and the Kissing Bridge ski resort. Our hotel’s location off I-90 also puts you near a variety of shopping and dining options. Check out these nearby favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Asheville at Asheville Outlet Mall, NC
description: Located off I-26 and about two miles from I-40, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Asheville at Asheville Outlet Mall, NC offers a smart location for those searching for bargains or Blue Ridge Mountain vistas. We invite you to enjoy our free, hot breakfast before you shop the outlet mall across the street or explore the wonders of the Biltmore Estate. Asheville Regional Airport (AVL) is about nine miles south, and the local boutiques in downtown Asheville are about a 15-minute drive from the hotel. Don’t miss the events and offerings at the WNC Farmers Market, or spend a quiet afternoon at the nearby NC Arboretum.After a day of viewing local art, dining at farm-to-table restaurants, or sampling the local brews, return to the hotel to unwind or work out in our fitness center. In the warmer months, the outdoor pool is a great way to relax. Help yourself to the free cookies and coffee in our lobby to enjoy as you use our free Wi-Fi to plan tomorrow’s hiking trail. From a free weekday newspaper to free parking, this hotel is the smart choice. Each of our rooms and suites welcomes you home with an in-room refrigerator and microwave in addition to a comfortable bed, spacious floor plan, and flat-screen TV. We think you’ll want to stay longer once you experience our warm Southern hospitality. Proud of its bohemian flavor, mountain charm, and friendly locals, Asheville offers a wealth of things to do at your fingertips. You can explore the magnificent Biltmore Estate, sample its wine, or shop the local offerings in Biltmore Village. There are waterfalls, hikes, and gardens waiting for you, as well as these area favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Asheville Downtown Tunnel Road, NC
description: Situated just three miles from the largest privately owned house in the US, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Asheville Downtown Tunnel Road, NC offers you welcoming amenities near the area's best attractions. Start off with our free, hot breakfast in the hotel dining room, and then spend the day touring the massive 250-room Biltmore Estate. On your way back, stop at the Grove Arcade downtown for a bite to eat and some shopping.When you return to the hotel, unwind with a jog in our fitness center or a few laps in the indoor saltwater pool. Cap off your evening with a relaxing soak in our hot tub and be sure to grab a free cookie in the lobby before heading to bed. After a day of touring the Biltmore Estate or exploring downtown Asheville, kick back in your room or suite with a cold drink from the in-room mini fridge. You can also stream your favorite shows and upload photos of your adventures using free Wi-Fi. Asheville is a vibrant city full of fresh food, live entertainment, and natural beauty. Tour one of the area's microbreweries, or paddle down the French Broad River with a guide from the Asheville Outdoor Center. To learn about the city's paranormal past, enjoy a fun walking tour with Haunted Asheville. Don't miss out on these other local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Asheville West, NC
description: Get away from it all in the stunning Blue Ridge Mountains at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Asheville West, NC. Conveniently situated near I-26 and I-40, our hotel makes it easy to explore must-see attractions like the U.S. Cellular Center and Chimney Rock State Park. Spending the day at the nearby Biltmore Estate? Take a tour of the 250-room mansion and enjoy horseback riding and wine tastings. End your evening in the heart of downtown Asheville, where you can check out live musical entertainment and an array of eclectic restaurants.During your stay, be sure to unwind at our hotel’s scenic seasonal outdoor pool and in our inviting lobby area in front of the fireplace. Enjoy complimentary cookies, tea, or coffee. Plan your itinerary using free Wi-Fi or catch up on the news with a free weekday newspaper. In the morning, cut down on travel costs with our free, hot breakfast featuring homemade waffles, crispy bacon, and more. Make your mountain trip unforgettable in one of our comfortable hotel rooms or suites. After an active day of hiking, settle in for a movie night on the 49-inch LCD TV or catch up on email with free Wi-Fi. Heat up snacks in the microwave and grab your favorite beverage from the fridge. Host up to eight guests in our versatile meeting space, ideal for intimate social gatherings and business seminars. Present engaging slideshows with the use of audiovisual equipment and keep your guests connected using free Wi-Fi. Looking to feed a crowd? Ask our friendly staff for top local catering recommendations. A vibrant city with lots to do, Asheville boasts year-round entertainment at the U.S. Cellular Center and an impressive array of works by local artists at the Asheville Art Museum. Hike the nearby mountains, tour the grounds of the sprawling Biltmore Estate, and don't miss out on these other local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Asheville Westgate, NC
description: Situated off I-26 and 240, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Asheville Westgate, NC is the perfect base of operations during your time in Asheville. Our shuttle service offers transportation to specific drop-off points around the vibrant downtown area, which features a delightful variety of local shops and restaurants. Looking for a glimpse of the good life? The Biltmore Estate is only nine minutes from the hotel and offers guided tours and spectacular scenery.Back at the hotel, you can relax with a dip in the indoor pool or lounge on the veranda with a fire pit. Treat yourself to complimentary cookies or a cup of tea in the lobby before retiring to your room or suite and wake up to the tantalizing aroma of our free, hot breakfast served in the hotel’s dining room. Whether you stay for a night or a weekend, your room or suite provides everything you need, from free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV to a microwave and a refrigerator. Rooms feature either a bathtub with a curved shower rod for more elbow room or a shower outfitted with a rainfall showerhead. Our meeting room in Asheville is an ideal venue for team meetings, business seminars, and social gatherings. Conduct a successful function with the help of our friendly staff, and enjoy access to free Wi-Fi, an LED projector, and more than 750 square feet of flexible space. Stroll along the sidewalks of historic downtown Asheville to shop in the charming boutiques, marvel at the urban sculptures, and listen to the tunes of lively street musicians. Browse unique galleries at the Asheville Art Museum or treat yourself to an ice cream cone at French Broad Chocolate Lounge. A leisurely drive down the gorgeous Blue Ridge Parkway is a must-do. Other local favorites include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Boone, NC
description: Make your summer getaway, ski vacation, or business trip even more fun and affordable when you stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Boone, NC. From our hotel, it’s just a three-minute drive to Appalachian State University and shops in downtown Boone, and you can walk to a variety of great restaurants. Go for an exhilarating hike at Grandfather Mountain State Park, or zip-line at Hawksnest. Kids love riding the train at Tweetsie Railroad, and you’ll love the relaxed pace of our serene setting. Additionally, our location off Highway 421 offers easy access to major highways connecting Greensboro, Charlotte, and neighboring towns in both Tennessee and Virginia.After a scenic drive through the Blue Ridge Mountains, we’ll check you in promptly while you sample complimentary coffee and cookies in our welcoming lobby. Take a dip in the heated indoor pool, or boost your energy level with a workout in our fitness room. Each morning, be sure to fuel up with our free, hot breakfast. Our 68 rooms and suites offer a variety of layouts suitable for couples, families, or groups. You can make yourself at home with amenities like a fridge and a microwave. A free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper, free Wi-Fi, and a TV with cable and HBO channels help to keep you informed and entertained during your stay. In the area for a family gathering or a group tour? Our spacious lobby is a comfortable place to get together and go over any last-minute details. If you need to plan a business meeting during your trip, we’re happy to work with our sister hotel next door to choose the right event room and setup to meet your needs. Hike the ridgeline trails at Grandfather Mountain State Park for spectacular mountain views, or take in the scenery on a drive along the Blue Ridge Parkway. If you prefer browsing art galleries and antiques shops, downtown Boone is just minutes from our hotel. Many guests visit us during local events, such as the Boone Heritage Festival, which celebrates Appalachian crafts and traditions, or the long-running summer show, Horn in the West. Consider adding these ideas to your itinerary:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Burlington (Elon), NC
description: Our recently renovated all-suite Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Burlington (Elon), NC is tucked within a residential area adjacent to I-85/40, making it easy to get to some of Alamance County’s most popular destinations, including Elon University, Glen Raven, Inc., LabCorp, Inc, several championship golf courses, two full-service shopping centers and many quaint local restaurants. You can even try your hand at fishing or sailing at Lake Mackintosh Park & Marina, just a few minutes from the hotel, or for the more adventurous, take a kayak or canoe out on the Haw River in nearby Saxapahaw.Quiet suites, comfortable beds, and a free, hot breakfast with generous selections await you every day. A peaceful atmosphere leads to restful sleep and more energy to enjoy our outdoor pool along with the area’s wineries and family attractions. Upon your return, you can pick up a free cookie and a complimentary cup of coffee as you breeze through the lobby. Our on-site fitness center is another option to help you decompress after a day on the go. Your inviting hotel room with premium bedding will be waiting to provide you with a night of relaxation. We appoint all our suites with practical furnishings like work desks and extras such as flat-panel TVs and works by local artists. Each suite features a mini fridge, a microwave, and free Wi-Fi. Comfortable beds and sleeper sofas ensure everyone gets good rest during your visit. Hold your next big event in our 1,400-square-foot dividable space equipped with free Wi-Fi. You can enjoy beautiful weather as you watch the Burlington Royals play baseball and savor a picnic at Haw River wineries or Lake Mackintosh Park & Marina, all within 15 minutes of our hotel. Set aside time to visit these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Charlotte I-85 Airport, NC
description: Welcome to the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Charlotte I-85 Airport, NC, where you can enjoy free parking and a free 24-hour shuttle to the airport. Our I-85 location, eight minutes from Charlotte Douglas International Airport (CLT) and 15 minutes from Charlotte, is an ideal home base for a stopover stay or for trips to Carowinds or downtown Charlotte attractions. Our cheerful staff as well as complimentary cookies and fresh coffee in the lobby make our hotel a welcoming place to stay.After your flight, get some fresh air at our outdoor pool and lounge area, or stretch your muscles in the fitness center. Need to meet with clients or colleagues? Check out our meeting rooms. When you need to leave, you can check your flight schedule using free Wi-Fi and get to the airport with ease aboard our complimentary shuttle. And don’t forget to take advantage of our free, hot breakfast, available every day to all guests. Our rooms and suites provide space to stretch and a relaxing atmosphere. Make yourself at home with a freshly brewed cup of coffee while you make plans for your trip using free Wi-Fi. Then sit back and watch your favorite shows on HBO using the flat-screen TV. You can make your next business meeting or social event a success when you book our meeting room, conveniently located off I-85 near the Charlotte airport (CLT). Take advantage of 575 square feet of flexible, private space offering free Wi-Fi and more. There’s something for everyone to enjoy in Charlotte. Ride the roller coasters and waterslides at Carowinds, explore The Billy Graham Library, or shop ’til you drop at Concord Mills, the state’s largest shopping center. Don’t miss these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Charlotte University Place, NC
description: Choose the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Charlotte University Place, NC to be within minutes of the University of North Carolina at Charlotte and the PNC Music Pavilion. If shopping brings you to Charlotte, our hotel is conveniently close to Concord Mills, the Grande Promenade, IKEA, and Town Center Plaza. Traveling with kids? Drive 20 minutes to reach Discovery Place Science in downtown Charlotte or 30 minutes to Carowinds amusement park.Back at the hotel, extend your family fun in the seasonal indoor/outdoor pool or unwind in front of the lobby fireplace. If you prefer to decompress with stretching, visit our fitness center. Corporate travelers can use our 24-hour business center to fax, copy, or send emails, and our free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper to keep an eye on the stocks. Clean and cheerful, our spacious rooms and suites include useful items like refrigerators and microwaves to make your stay more convenient. When it's time to relax, stretch out on a king or a queen bed to watch your favorite TV shows or use the free Wi-Fi to stream your favorite playlist or dramatic series. If you need a convenient place to gather friends, family, or colleagues for a business or social function, book the meeting room at our hotel. With more than 1,000 square feet of space, the venue off I-85 accommodates up to 100 guests and includes patio access, a wet bar, and free internet access. We can set up a personalized web page with details for your event and help you arrange the room to meet your needs. Bringing a busload of friends to attend your festivities? There’s no need to worry since we offer free bus parking. There’s no shortage of fun things to see and do in Charlotte, such as riding the roller coasters at Carowinds or shopping for deals at Concord Mills. You can also see a headliner like Jimmy Buffett at the PNC Music Pavilion or get your NASCAR fix at Charlotte Motor Speedway. In town to attend your student’s graduation ceremony? We’re less than five minutes from the University of North Carolina at Charlotte.

name: Radisson Hotel Charlotte Airport
description: Unpack your bags after a 10-minute shuttle ride from Charlotte Douglas International Airport (CLT), and then unwind in our on-site restaurant at Radisson Hotel Charlotte Airport. Our hotel is two blocks away from the Woodlawn light rail station, giving you easy access to all the shops, museums, and restaurants in downtown Charlotte. When you're ready for a thrilling family activity, hop on I-77 for a quick trip to Carowinds amusement park, or head to Bank of America Stadium downtown for some Carolina Panthers football.If you’re in town on business, you can complete tasks or conveniently prepare for a meeting thanks to our 24-hour business center. When your work is finished, go for a refreshing swim in our seasonal pool or an exhilarating workout in the fitness center, open 24 hours. Spend your downtime in our plush lobby where you can watch a flat-screen TV, or head to the on-site bar for cocktails. Have an unexpected layover? Make yourself right at home in one of our 91 hotel accommodations that feature plush beds and free Wi-Fi. Order room service for convenient meals, and store leftovers in the in-room refrigerator. You can complete work at the desk or watch movies on the flat-screen TV. Business-focused rooms are available, as well as studio suites with a spacious layout and a sofa. Charlotte is as business-centered as it is beautiful and offers a fantastic backdrop for your next event. The Radisson is within a 10-minute drive of both the airport and downtown, making our hotel the ideal venue for weddings, meetings, showers, and reunions in the Queen City.                                     Want a quiet night in the comfort and privacy of your hotel room? Order from our room service menu.                                 Enjoy all-American favorites like salads and burgers at RCRH Bistro, our relaxing restaurant and lounge. Sip your favorite drink at the bar when you’re in a mingling mood. With our on-site sundry shop, vending machines, and 24-hour complimentary coffee station, you can always get the energy boost you need. Our location just off I-77 and within two blocks of the city's light rail station provides you with convenient access to downtown Charlotte's trendy restaurants, exciting museums, and vibrant arts and music scene. You can see the Knights play at BB&T Ballpark or cheer on the Hornets at Spectrum Center. Check out these popular destinations during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Concord (Kannapolis), NC
description: Stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Concord (Kannapolis), NC for a home base near Charlotte events but without the city crowds. Rest up at our peaceful location off I-85 for a busy race weekend at Charlotte Motor Speedway, a Panthers football game, a shopping trip to Concord Mills, or a day of thrill rides at Carowinds. You can find these attractions all less than a 40-minute drive away from the hotel.Enjoy a relaxed visit with complimentary services such as a free, hot breakfast every day and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. You can use our fitness center to get those morning workouts in. And nothing feels better than a dip in our indoor pool after a day in the Carolina sunshine followed by a session in the hot tub to soothe tired muscles. Retreat to a clean, quiet room or suite after a day of sightseeing, shopping, or sports events. Premium cable channels and free internet put you in the entertainment driver's seat while amenities like in-room microwaves and refrigerators can save you time and money. Book our intimate event space for up to 18 guests and enjoy free high-speed internet access. Our convenient location off I-85 is central for guests coming from Charlotte, Concord, and Kannapolis. Visit Bank of America Stadium for an exciting NFL Panthers game, or catch an outdoor show at the PNC Music Pavilion. Additional attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Goldsboro, NC
description: With a convenient location just off I-795 and US 70, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Goldsboro, NC offers hotel guests everything they need for a great business trip or vacation. Drive just five minutes to historic downtown Goldsboro and visit the Wayne County Museum, or take a five-minute walk to UEC Theatres 12 to catch a new movie. Corporate travelers appreciate being just 10 minutes from Seymour Johnson Air Force Base and the Wayne Executive Jetport (GWW) airport, and families love having easy access to Cliffs of the Neuse State Park.For a change of pace during your trip, lounge in our seasonal outdoor pool and soothing hot tub. Take advantage of our laundry facilities to wash your clothes, or drop your suit off for convenient dry cleaning. We also offer a well-equipped fitness center and a handy business center. Sleep soundly, buffered from the highway noise, in one of our quiet rooms and suites, each of which includes a refrigerator and a microwave. Need to unwind? You can connect your laptop or tablet to the free Wi-Fi or tune in to one your favorite cable TV channels. After a restful night’s sleep, wake up to a fresh-brewed cup of coffee from the in-room coffeemaker and then head down to our dining room for a free, hot breakfast, served daily. Free high-speed internet access, a wet bar, and seating for up to 40 guests make for successful meetings and events in our 850-square-foot meeting space. If you’re hosting out-of-town guests, your attendees are sure to appreciate our convenient location near I-795 and the GWW airport. During your stay at our Goldsboro hotel, you can explore one of the region’s most scenic natural areas at Cliffs of the Neuse State Park. Great for a family outing, attractions like the Wayne County Museum and the Village at Old Waynesborough Park offer their own unique perspectives of local history. If you’re a golfer, test your mettle at one of the beautiful area courses, like Lane Tree Golf Club. Don’t miss these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lake Norman Huntersville, NC
description: Recharge from a road trip or a day on the water at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lake Norman Huntersville, NC. Our hotel off I-77 is a few minutes’ drive to Lake Norman and Birkdale Golf Club, so it’s easy to make us your vacation headquarters. Large rooms and stylish suites offer space for the whole family, including your pet.After a day on the highway or the links, soothe sore muscles in the hot tub while the kids play in the heated indoor pool. Gather around the fire pit or stretch out on a lounge chair on our outdoor patio. In the morning, we offer a free, hot breakfast for everyone in your group. Throughout the day, enjoy hot coffee and tea and complimentary cookies in the lobby. Later, you can burn off calories with a visit to our fitness center. When you’re ready to settle in after a long day, head to your comfortable room with free high-speed internet access, a sleeper sofa, and a flat-screen TV with your favorite cable channels. Upgrade to one of our stylish suites to enjoy amenities such as a whirlpool tub, a separate living room, or a private bedroom with a balcony. Ask about pet-friendly options! Whether you’re hosting a family reunion or a corporate gathering, you can reserve one of our hotel’s flexible meeting rooms, with space for up to 80 people to attend. We provide audiovisual equipment and set up the space to your specifications. Our knowledgeable staff can assist with finishing touches such as food and beverage service. Want to visit the Queen City of Charlotte while you’re vacationing at Lake Norman? Our hotel is just a 20-minute drive from the companies, restaurants, and shops in Charlotte’s Uptown area. For some fun closer to the hotel, check out these attractions in Huntersville:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lumberton, NC
description: Looking for a hotel in Lumberton, NC? Whether you're in town for a few days or just passing through, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lumberton, NC provides comfortable accommodations for your entire family. Located just off I-95, our hotel is close to downtown Lumberton and The University of North Carolina (UNC) Pembroke. Our hotel is also less than five miles from the beautiful landscapes along Riverwalk, an ideal spot for a walk or a bike ride.After a long day of travel, you can relax in our seasonal outdoor pool or keep up with your regular exercise routine in our hotel's fitness center. If you’re in town for a while, you can also use free Wi-Fi to purchase tickets to local venues like the Carolina Civic Center. After visiting Riverwalk, bring your family back to your room and unwind with books or games. Each of our rooms and suites has a Serta Elite pillowtop mattress to give you a comfortable rest before a long day on the road. Before you doze off, use our free Wi-Fi to check your email or watch a movie on your TV with cable channels. Lumberton is located in North Carolina's coastal plains, meaning there are plenty of activities for everyone who stays and explores its charming landscape. You can pick up a new outfit at Biggs Park Mall or take your kids for a fun afternoon of learning at Exploration Station. Check out these nearby favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Charlotte/Matthews, NC
description: Conveniently located off E Independence Boulevard in Matthews, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Charlotte/Matthews, NC offers a quiet retreat outside of the bustle of the Queen City. Leisure guests can explore the shops, restaurants, and nightlife in downtown Charlotte, about 25 minutes away, or find thrills and spills at Carowinds amusement park, a 30-minute drive from the hotel. Business travelers appreciate being located about 30 minutes from Charlotte Douglas International Airport (CLT) and about 10 minutes from the corporate headquarters of Harris Teeter and Family Dollar.After catching a race at Charlotte Motor Speedway, you can unwind with a dip in our heated indoor pool. In the morning, enjoy an energizing workout in the fitness center and then treat yourself to a complimentary, hot breakfast in our dining room. We also offer guest laundry facilities and valet laundry service if you need to refresh your clothes between adventures. After a memorable evening exploring downtown Charlotte, retire to a comfortable hotel room with a 37-inch flat-screen TV and plenty of space to stretch out. You can store leftovers from nearby restaurants in the mini refrigerator and update friends on your travels using free Wi-Fi. Host up to 45 guests for an award ceremony, business conference, or social gathering near downtown Charlotte in our flexible event space. Take advantage of catering recommendations, free high-speed internet access, and group rates to ensure your gathering is a success. Matthews lies about 14 miles southeast of downtown Charlotte, where you can explore the Mint Museum, the first art museum in North Carolina, and Discovery Place, a hands-on science and natural history museum. Be sure to visit these popular attractions near the hotel:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Raleigh-Durham Airport, NC
description: Located less than two miles from Raleigh-Durham International Airport (RDU), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Raleigh-Durham Airport, NC is the perfect place to relax after a long trip. Take the free airport shuttle, and then unwind in your spacious room. In the morning, you can visit our complimentary, hot breakfast to get your day off to a good start. Nestled in the heart of the Tri-City area, our hotel sits near Research Triangle Park, making it perfect for business travelers. Are you visiting Duke, UNC, or NC State? We're less than 20 minutes from each school.Figure out your schedule for the day with our free internet, and then finish your company report at our business center before heading to the research park. Whether you're visiting one of the 200 companies at Research Triangle Park or touring a college campus, our guest rooms and suites will make your stay a pleasure. Relax with your favorite TV shows each night, and wake up with fresh coffee each morning before heading to the dining area to dive into our free, hot breakfast. Our ballroom can accommodate up to 150 guests or can be split into three smaller banquet rooms, making the Country Inn & Suites a great place for your next celebration or conference. Your guests will appreciate our hotel's proximity to Raleigh-Durham International Airport and Research Triangle Park. Ask about our special rates for visiting teams and other large groups. Once the airport shuttle drops you off at the hotel, it’s time to discover what this vibrant area has to offer. Venture into Raleigh for an ACC football game at Carter-Finley Stadium, or sing along with performers like Beyoncé and Maroon 5 at the PNC Arena, both located less than 15 minutes from your home base at our modern hotel. Check out these local attractions as well:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rocky Mount, NC
description: Situated just off US 64 and I-95, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rocky Mount, NC welcomes interstate travelers looking for an inviting place to rest after a long drive. Our hotel rooms and suites offer plush bedding, refrigerators, microwaves, and free Wi-Fi to make you feel at home. In the area for a tournament? We’re only four miles from Rocky Mount Sports Complex. We’re also near a variety of things to do like hiking and biking along the Tar River Trail and stargazing at the planetarium of the Children's Museum & Sciences at The Imperial Centre.After a busy day of meetings or travel, head to the hot tub to soothe your tired muscles, or swim some laps in the indoor pool. We also have a well-equipped fitness center so you can keep up with your workout routine. If you're traveling with your furry companion, don't worry—we're a pet-friendly hotel ($20.00 fee required per pet, per day; restrictions apply). When it's time to relax, our guest rooms and suites offer comfortable bedding, free Wi-Fi, and cable TV with HBO to help you unwind. When you wake in the morning, brew a cup of coffee in your room, or grab a drink from the refrigerator before you head down to our free, hot breakfast. Whether you’re searching for a place to give a presentation to colleagues or planning a family reunion, the event facilities at the Country Inn & Suites are a great choice. With capacity for 150 guests, our meeting rooms come with amenities like free Wi-Fi, audiovisual equipment, and access to catering services. Traveling with a group? Be sure to ask about the hotel's special group rates. Whether you're in town for a game at Rocky Mount Sports Complex or you're just passing through, take a break to enjoy local attractions like the Tar River Trail, which connects to six of the city’s parks, or head to Golden East Crossing Mall to shop at stores like American Eagle and Belk. Check out these nearby attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Shelby, NC
description: Pull off Highway 74 and park for free at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Shelby, NC, where you can get a good night's rest near the beautiful foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains. If you're in town to attend an event at the LeGrand Center, our hotel puts you a little more than a mile from the venue. The city’s historic downtown, teeming with an array of boutiques, dining, and entertainment, is only a quick ten-minute drive away. In the mood for a shopping spree? The hotel is a short distance from Cleveland Mall.Wind down after meetings or sightseeing in downtown Shelby with a dip in our seasonal outdoor pool. The complimentary coffee and cookies in the lobby allow you to recharge after a swim, a workout in our fitness center, or a friendly ball game on our on-site sports court. Prefer to stay productive? Put the finishing touches on a report or presentation in our business center. Each of our 58 spacious rooms and suites includes all the comforts of home like free Wi-Fi, a microwave, and a refrigerator. You can brew a hot cup of coffee using your in-room coffeemaker or stretch out on your comfortable bed to catch an HBO original on the flat-screen TV. Our spacious American Legion meeting room is the ideal place for corporate ceremonies, business meetings, or social get-togethers for up to 35 guests. The space comes equipped with a projector screen, free Wi-Fi, and parking, plus tables and chairs that can be easily arranged in a classroom-style formation. Welcome to Shelby, known as the City of Pleasant Living! If you're an outdoor enthusiast, you can easily access the hiking trails at Kings Mountain State Park, only a 25-minute drive southeast on Long Branch and Battleground roads. For fun closer to the hotel, browse exciting exhibits at the Earl Scruggs Center in Uptown Shelby or see the latest blockbuster at the AMC Classic Shelby 10 cinema located right next door at Cleveland Mall. The city of Charlotte is less than an hour’s drive away making it the perfect day-trip destination. Explore these popular sites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Smithfield-Selma, NC
description: Take an overnight break while traveling between New York and Florida with a midway stop along I-95 at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Smithfield-Selma, NC. Our hotel is conveniently located near shopping, restaurants, and museums. You can walk to the Carolina Premium Outlets, tour the Ava Gardner Museum, just two miles away, or drive less than four miles into Selma, NC to browse a treasure trove of antique shops.To recharge during your travels, enjoy a swim in the indoor pool, a workout at the fitness center, and a good night’s rest in rooms with premium channels like HBO. You can fill up every morning on our free, hot breakfast, and later choose a snack or beverage from our Inn Case Market if you need something to hold you over between meals. Designed for comfort and convenience, our 77 hotel rooms and suites feature refrigerators and microwaves for storing and preparing snacks. Put your feet up while you view an HBO movie on the 40-inch flat-screen TV or hop online using free Wi-Fi. Convenient to I-95 and businesses in nearby Selma, the meeting space at the Country Inn & Suites is ideal for hosting training seminars for up to 63 people. Take advantage of free Wi-Fi, a projection screen for professional presentations, and the business center for printing handouts. Watch a theatrical production at the Paul A. Johnston Auditorium, about a mile away from the hotel on the campus of Johnston Community College, or drive 14 miles to Four Oaks to visit Bentonville Battlefield, named a National Historic Landmark for its significance during the Civil War. You can also explore these other attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fayetteville-Fort Bragg, NC
description: Just off Highway 87, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fayetteville-Fort Bragg, NC makes it easy to hop off the road for a comfortable stay. Our hotel is two minutes from Fort Bragg, 20 minutes from downtown Fayetteville, and 25 minutes from Southern Pines and Pinehurst. Traveling with kids? Make the five-minute drive to nearby Carvers Creek State Park, or drive 20 minutes to Raven Rock State Park for an afternoon of hiking, fishing, and fresh air.With free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour business center, and a versatile meeting room, our hotel is ideal for corporate travelers. Have some downtime? Relax with a dip in our outdoor pool or unwind in the sauna. Before you head out to start your day, stop by our free, hot breakfast to fill up on your morning favorites. If you’re traveling with your furry companion, our hotel offers pet-friendly accommodations. Reserve your room or suite to enjoy plush beds and a refrigerator to stock with all your favorite treats. If you’re traveling on business, you can use free Wi-Fi and a work desk to stay productive. At the Country Inn & Suites, Fayetteville-Fort Bragg, NC, the Belmont Room offers a flexible space that can accommodate up to 100 guests in a variety of configurations.
