Enjoy on-site amenities like free high-speed internet access, tables, chairs, and a projector with a screen. Fayetteville offers a wealth of outdoor and indoor entertainment. Head to Ryder Golf Course to play 18 picturesque holes, or drive 20 minutes to downtown and immerse yourself in Fayetteville’s culture, food, and fun. Local area favorites include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Wilmington, NC
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Wilmington, NC places you conveniently between downtown Wilmington and the sparkling Atlantic shoreline. You can explore the city’s boutiques and stroll along Cape Fear River on the award-winning Riverwalk before heading to Wrightsville Beach for an afternoon of sun and sand. Our hotel is also about 10 minutes from Wilmington International Airport (ILM), the University of North Carolina Wilmington campus, and the well-known historic district.We make your family vacation more affordable by offering a free, hot breakfast and complimentary lodging for children 18 and younger. If you can’t get to the beach every day, simply make a splash in the indoor pool or relax in the hot tub. We also offer a business center that stays open 24 hours for the convenience of corporate travelers needing to finish projects or print important documents. Need an afternoon pick-me-up? Grab a free cookie and a cup of free coffee to tide you over until mealtime. After a UNCW Seahawks game or a stroll down the Riverwalk, relax in one of our spacious guest rooms or suites. Find the forecast for your beach day using free high-speed internet access, and then unwind with premium programming on the TV. Come morning, you can scan the headlines of your free weekday newspaper while you sip fresh coffee made with your in-room coffeemaker. Invite up to 40 guests for a graduation party or business seminar at the Country Inn & Suites. Our meeting room provides free high-speed internet access along with audiovisual equipment rentals and catering services. Out-of-town guests appreciate how close our hotel is to the Wilmington airport. Be sure to ask about our group rates, perfect for vacationing families and sports teams visiting UNCW. Whether you’re here to meet with clients or make memories with your family, you can find plenty of places to explore in Wilmington, including the beautiful Cape Fear Riverwalk. If you’re looking for something unique to the city, ask our concierge for the best shopping, recreation, and hidden gems in Wilmington. With UNCW right around the corner, you can catch Seahawks sports without a hassle. Be sure to check out these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Wilson, NC
description: Located right off I-95, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Wilson, NC welcomes guests who need a night to recharge after a day on the interstate. If you’re traveling with family, be sure to visit Imagination Station, the interactive science and history museum, or the County Line Raceway. Both attractions are less than 15 minutes from our hotel. For some fresh air, go hiking or boating at Lake Wilson or explore the Wilson Botanical Gardens. In town for a college visit? Schedule a tour of Barton College during your trip.After a long drive, settle into a comfortable hotel room to check the news with free Wi-Fi. Let the kids burn some energy in the indoor pool as you relax beside the water, or enjoy a quick workout in our fitness center. Traveling for your company? We offer a business center with copy and fax services so you can get your work done. Those traveling with pets will appreciate our pet-friendly policy, which lets your four-legged friend join you on your family vacation. When you're ready for a great night's sleep, unwind in one of our spacious rooms or suites. Flip on the 32-inch TV to watch your favorite shows before bed, and wake up the next morning with a fresh cup of coffee. Before heading for a hike at Lake Wilson, prepare a snack using the in-room microwave and grab a cold drink from the fridge. Looking for an event space near downtown Wilson? The Country Inn & Suites is conveniently positioned close to both I-95 and I-795, with two meeting rooms that can be combined to host up to 100 people. Ask our friendly staff to help with planning the details, from providing catering recommendations to arranging special rates for groups and US government employees. Have some family fun with a visit to Vollis Simpson Whirligig Park, home to 31 high-flying kinetic sculptures in downtown Wilson. Need some fresh air? Head 15 minutes to Lake Wilson to go hiking or enjoy an afternoon out on the water. Check out these intriguing attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Greenville, NC
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Greenville, NC offers a perfect home base for fans attending East Carolina football games or business travelers attending expos at the Greenville Convention Center. Our Winterville location also makes it easy to reach graduation ceremonies at Pitt Community College or appointments at Vidant Medical Center. You can go shopping at nearby Greenville Mall or take the 10-minute drive from our hotel to Uptown Greenville to browse shops, art galleries, and museums.Make our free, hot breakfast and fitness center the first stops on your daily itinerary. Let your kids splash around the outdoor pool before dropping by the lobby for a complimentary cookie. Free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel makes it easy to stay in touch with home while you’re traveling. Rest up for an ECU Pirates football game in one of our 60 rooms or suites, all of which are equipped with microwaves and refrigerators so you can easily prep refreshments for your tailgating party. After the game, sink into your comfortable bed to watch other matchups on the TV or to share photos using free Wi-Fi. When you wake up, you can enjoy your first cup of coffee made with your in-room coffeemaker. Whether you're looking for indoor activities like shopping at Greenville Mall or outdoor activities like hiking at River Park North, Greenville is chock-full of exciting options. Spend the day putting on the greens at Ironwood Golf & Country Club, less than 10 miles away, or drive just five miles to West Meadowbrook Park for disc golf instead. Prospective students touring college campuses can find both East Carolina University and Pitt Community College minutes away. Visit these popular nearby attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bismarck, ND
description: Located at the intersection of I-94 and US 83, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bismarck, ND is an ideal home base for exploring the heart of North Dakota's capital city. Our hotel near Bismarck State College makes it easy for you to tour the school with a potential student. Or, drive less than four miles to attractions like the Capitol Building and the Bismarck Event Center. When you finish shopping in downtown Bismarck, head to spots like Sertoma Park or Fort Abraham Lincoln State Park to appreciate the area's natural beauty.Are you visiting with kids? Our on-site water park offers hours of family fun with a 150-foot waterslide and a mushroom waterfall. Before going back to your suite, dry off and stop by the lobby for free coffee and cookies. If you're in town on business, connect to our free Wi-Fi in the business center to stay productive. Because our hotel is pet-friendly, you can also bring your furry friend along. Get ready for your next day's adventure with a good night's sleep in one of our spacious guest suites. Our welcoming suites provide microwaves and plush easy chairs. If you like to multitask, plan your itinerary with free Wi-Fi while watching your favorite TV show. Visiting Bismarck with a group? The flexible meeting room at the Country Inn & Suites can accommodate up to 80 guests and offers free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment. If you want to keep your guests informed of the event details, our friendly staff is happy to create a custom website for your gathering. The bustling capital of North Dakota offers plenty to do all year long. From cruises down the Missouri River to golf at Tom O'Leary Golf Course, you are sure to find something the whole family will enjoy. Check out these nearby favorites:

name: Radisson Hotel Bismarck
description: Located in the downtown financial and entertainment district, Radisson Hotel Bismarck is ideally placed for a business or sightseeing trip. You can easily walk to trade shows and sports tournaments at the Bismarck Event Center, top restaurants, and landmarks like the 1914 Belle Mehus Auditorium. In the city for a medical appointment? Our hotel is close to local hospitals, including Sanford Medical Center just around the corner. Getting here is easy thanks to our free shuttle to and from Bismarck Airport (BIS), only three miles away.After attending an event in our extensive conference facilities, take a restorative dip in our indoor pool. You can keep up your exercise routine in the fitness center. Stop by our on-site beauty salon to refresh your look before a meeting or a night on the town. Our pet-friendly accommodations make it easy for you to travel with the whole family, and nearby Sertoma Park provides the perfect setting for walking with your dog. Each of our 215 pet-friendly hotel rooms and suites features a spacious work desk, a coffeemaker, and room service to help you stay productive during your stay. When you’ve conquered your to-do list, relax with a book in the easy chair, or catch your favorite HBO show on the flat-screen TV. Traveling with your family? Consider booking a suite for extra space and a sleeper sofa. We also offer accessible rooms; please select the Queen Bed room type online or call the hotel directly to reserve an accessible room. Radisson Hotel Bismarck offers 12,000 square feet of event space for your next celebration or business gathering. The Galleria Ballroom features elegant lighting and a neutral color palette that you can easily embellish with your own decorations.Searching for a wedding venue in downtown Bismarck? Book our hotel for access to excellent event planners who can assist you in choosing everything from stemware and customized catering to room blocks at a reduced rate for your guests. At Terrace Restaurant, you can order classic Midwestern cuisine for breakfast and lunch. Allow our expert chefs to prepare for you a flavorful steak or pasta dish made with fresh ingredients, and enjoy your meal in our relaxed dining room.Ready to unwind? Meet with friends and colleagues for drinks and appetizers at Off Broadway Lounge. While you socialize, watch sports games on the TV or try your luck at blackjack. When you stay at the centrally located Radisson in downtown Bismarck, you’re surrounded by popular attractions, shops, and restaurants. Walk across the street to catch a concert at the historic Belle Mehus Auditorium, or soak up the scenery on a cruise along the Missouri River. For a primer on local history, visit the nearby North Dakota Heritage Center & State Museum, located on the landscaped grounds of the State Capitol Complex, to view exhibits spanning prehistoric fossils, exquisite native crafts, and more. Don’t miss these area favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fargo, ND
description: Whether you’re visiting Fargo for business, a college tour at NDSU, or an event at the FARGODOME, choose the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fargo, ND. You’ll love being near the many attractions Fargo offers, including West Acres shopping and the Red River Zoo. Sports teams appreciate being within five miles of the Sports Arena, Johnson Soccer Complex, and Jack Williams Stadium. And your family will love a swim in our hotel's indoor pool while you relax in the hot tub.While you’re our guest, take advantage of our complimentary airport shuttle from Hector International Airport (FAR). Start your day with a free, hot breakfast and dine on a choice of eggs and protein, rotating every day. And after a busy day, nosh on a free cookie and coffee or head to The Country Pub, our on-site lounge for tasty snacks and drink specials as you wind down with friends. Fresh, generous-sized guest rooms and suites create a restful haven with all the advantages of home. Catch a current movie on the flat-screen TV, or relax in a comfy chair and respond to emails thanks to the free Wi-Fi. Plan a dazzling wedding reception or a high-powered business meeting in one of our three conference rooms at the Country Inn & Suites. You can host up to 175 guests for a grand affair in our Meadow and Prairie Room, or preside over a smaller meeting in our Boardroom. Your guests will appreciate being able to fly into Hector International Airport and using our courtesy airport shuttle. Free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment rentals can enhance your event. The Country Pub invites you to socialize with your family, colleagues, or teammates while enjoying complimentary snacks and a refreshing beverage. Perfect for foodies, you can order your choice of Heggie’s pizza from the full bar while catching the news or a game on the three big-screen TVs. During the warmer months, enjoy our outdoor seating with a grilling area as you wind down after a day of business or sightseeing. Downtown Fargo offers an array of local eateries with menus celebrating the best the world has to offer. Thirsty? There’s plenty of choices ranging from excellent coffee to local breweries and wineries. Historic Bonanzaville, the Hjemkomst Center, and the Fargo Air Museum showcase the region’s history. And with three local colleges, there’s something happening nearly every day.

name: Radisson Hotel Fargo
description: Offering beautiful rooms with unbelievable views of the city, Radisson Hotel Fargo is an ideal place to stay for events and business conferences. Our convenient location places guests across the street from the Fargo Civic Center and less than three miles from the Fargodome. If you're flying into the area, Hector International Airport (FAR) is only four miles away, and the hotel offers free airport shuttle service. In the area for vacation? Learn about Norwegian heritage at the Hjemkomst Center, or see regional artists at the Plains Art Museum.Return to the hotel after a busy day, and enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink in the lounge before you relax in your room or suite. In the morning, you can head to the fitness center for a quick workout or prep for a meeting in the business center. Other thoughtful amenities include 3-Hour Express Laundry, same-day valet dry cleaning, and secure parking*. *Please note: The parking fee for overnight guests is $7, and valet parking is available for $12. In addition to plush bedding, free Wi-Fi, and flat-screen TVs, each of our 151 European-style hotel rooms and suites features unbeatable views of the surrounding area. Wake from a restful night’s sleep and sip on a hot cup of coffee in your room, or check email on your laptop at the work desk. With 5,000 square feet of event space and seven distinct meeting rooms to choose from, the Radisson is an ideal choice for banquets, business conferences, and weddings. Each meeting room comes with features like audiovisual equipment, natural daylight, and catering services. For an unforgettable day, book one of our wedding packages that include perks like butler service, personalized catering, custom linens, and ice sculptures. Located on site, Level 2 Eats + Drinks serves excellent dishes for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Enjoy a delicious steak or other grilled favorites, then top off your meal with one of the many dessert options. At Level 2 Lounge, you can unwind with a beer or a signature martini while you take in views of the Fargo-Moorhead skyline. In the morning, stop by the Beans Coffee Bar for a caffeine boost before you head out for the day. Prefer to dine in private? We offer daily room service along with three private dining rooms that can seat four to 16 people. Some of the best area attractions are less than one mile away, including the Fargodome, home to the North Dakota State Bison football team and a variety of concerts and trade shows each year. Don't miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Grand Forks, ND
description: Just off I-29, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Grand Forks, ND places you near the action at Ralph Engelstad Arena, a top event venue and home of the University of North Dakota's hockey, basketball, and volleyball teams. Before the big game, head to the nearby Columbia Mall or to Grand Cities Mall to shop for the latest merchandise. Our hotel is also conveniently located a short drive from conventions at Alerus Center and training at Grand Forks Air Force Base.When you’re ready to relax, unwind in one of our hot tubs while the kids have fun on the polar bear slide in the children’s pool. Stay in shape with a visit to our fitness center, and stay on top of work with the help of our business center. We also offer a free, hot breakfast every morning so you can get a filling meal and cup of coffee before heading to your flight at Grand Forks International Airport (GFK), just five miles away. After a day of touring the University of North Dakota, retreat to your room or suite and upload your pictures to social media with our free Wi-Fi. Enjoy a restful night's sleep in one of our plush beds, and then wake up with a cup of coffee from the in-room coffeemaker as you get ready for another fun day in Grand Forks. Families and groups traveling together benefit from booking our spacious suites, which feature a separate living room and a sleeper sofa. Planning a business meeting or a party for a Grand Forks Air Force Base graduate? Reserve our meeting space at the Country Inn & Suites, which can hold up to 44 people. Use free Wi-Fi to keep everyone connected. Our flexible event facility also features a 42-inch plasma TV so you can give an impactful presentation. If your attendees are staying overnight, inquire about booking a block of rooms in advance. Cheer on the Fighting Hawks during an athletic event at the University of North Dakota, just a five-minute drive from the hotel. The campus is also home to the North Dakota Museum of Art, which chronicles life on the Northern Plains through painting, photography, and sculpture. Take your family to a concert at Chester Fritz Auditorium or an athletic event at Ralph Engelstad Arena. Check out these local attractions as well:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Minot, ND
description: At the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Minot, ND, you can hop right on US 52 to reach destinations like Minot Air Force Base and the MOT airport. Take a few hours to unwind with retail therapy at Dakota Square Mall, less than a mile away, or treat your kids to an afternoon at Roosevelt Park Zoo, about 10 minutes from our hotel. Here for the state fair? The North Dakota State Fair Center is less than five miles away. Before your leave, schedule a tour of Minot State University, the third largest university in North Dakota.After a day of meetings, slide into our hot tub for a soothing soak while the kids splash in our heated indoor pool. You can plan the next day’s adventures with free Wi-Fi, or you can unplug for a bit with a workout in our fitness center. Exhausted after the rodeo at the ND State Fair Center? Rest up for the next day in one of our comfortable rooms or suites. Stock the fridge with snacks and drinks so that you can kick back in front of the TV for the entire evening. In the morning, brew a fresh cup of coffee to wake yourself up before enjoying our complimentary, hot breakfast. While you're visiting Minot Air Force Base or attending meetings downtown, take a break at the Dakota Territory Air Museum. Stroll around dozens of airplanes to get a feel for the area's aviation history and see a growing collection of military memorabilia. If you’re traveling with kids, be sure to visit Roosevelt Park Zoo or explore Scandinavian Heritage Park. Check out these other popular local attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Akron/Fairlawn
description: Situated near State Route 18 and I-77, Radisson Hotel Akron/Fairlawn offers an unbeatable location and amenities designed to make your trip to the Akron area more enjoyable. Take a leisurely ride on the Cuyahoga Valley Scenic Railroad through Ohio’s only national park, or catch a concert at Blossom Music Center, less than 10 miles from the hotel. Here with your family? Take the kids to visit the river otters and African lions at the Akron Zoo. Business guests appreciate our proximity to corporate offices in Fairlawn and downtown Akron. If you’re traveling with colleagues, plan an afternoon of wine tasting at Sarah’s Vineyard, about 20 minutes away, or drive about 35 minutes to have an adventure at Cleveland attractions like the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame.No matter what’s on your itinerary, recharge after an active day with a dip in our indoor pool, a workout in the fitness center, or a soak in the soothing hot tub. If you’re entertaining clients, you can grab a bite to eat at the on-site restaurant and then enjoy an evening of cocktails and conversation in the lounge. Available 10 am to 10 pm, our complimentary shuttle can help you get to meetings within a five-mile radius of the hotel. Each of our 128 rooms and suites features amenities to make you feel at ease, such as in-room coffeemakers and sleeper sofas for comfortable seating. You can use free Wi-Fi to catch up on email or social media or take your pick from the pay-per-view movies and cable channels on the flat-screen TV. Plan your next business seminar, bridal shower, or birthday party in one of four spacious meeting rooms at Radisson Hotel Akron/Fairlawn. Our hotel offers space for up to 100 guests and convenient amenities like free Wi-Fi. Contact our professional staff for help arranging every detail, from choosing the perfect catering menu to setting up the right seating configuration for your event.                                     Want to pamper yourself with a leisurely breakfast, or need a quick working dinner? Enjoy tasty meals from 200 West Restaurant and Bar delivered to your room or suite.                                 You don’t have to leave the hotel to indulge in a delicious breakfast or dinner in relaxed, contemporary surroundings. Order classic American dishes or treat yourself to a weekend brunch at our on-site restaurant, 200 West Restaurant and Bar. Unwind by the inviting fireplace in the dining room, or socialize with colleagues or clients over cocktails and appetizers in the lounge. Conveniently located near I-77, the Radisson is minutes from popular area attractions like Cuyahoga Valley National Park and Stan Hywet Hall & Gardens, a lavish Tudor Revival estate once home to the Goodyear Tire & Rubber Company founder. Kids love seeing grizzly bears and penguins at the Akron Zoo, and art aficionados can view work by Andy Warhol at Akron Art Museum. Don't miss these local favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fairborn South, OH
description: Located just off I-675, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fairborn South, OH is a convenient stop for leisure and business travelers. Schedule a tour of Wright State University, located just one mile from our hotel, or make a visit to Wright-Patterson Air Force Base. For family-friendly activities, explore other Ohio highlights like the National Museum of the US Air Force or browse the shops at The Mall at Fairfield Commons.If you’ve been at full speed visiting area attractions, slow down in your newly renovated room with free Wi-Fi, a microwave, a refrigerator, and a flat-screen TV. You can unwind in our heated indoor pool, go for a jog in our fitness center, or lounge with complimentary cookies and coffee from the lobby. We also offer a 24-hour front desk so we can meet your every need, no matter the time of day or night. After a long day of traveling, relax in one of our comfortable rooms or suites. Grab a cold drink from the refrigerator and heat up some popcorn in the microwave before watching a movie on the flat-screen TV. Wake up to a cup of hot coffee before enjoying our complimentary, hot breakfast. If you’re in town for business, our location makes it easy to attend meetings at the Dayton Convention Center or Wright-Patterson Air Force Base. If the weather’s nice, head to the fairways at Beavercreek Golf Club or make a trip to Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park. For a fun family activity, go bowling at Beaver-Vu Bowling or explore the National Museum of the US Air Force. Check out these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Cuyahoga Falls, OH
description: Choose the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Cuyahoga Falls, OH for a convenient location right off State Route 8 and only 10 minutes from Akron. In between games or school tours, you and your family can visit spots like the Akron Art Museum, Blossom Music Center, and the Akron Zoo. If you’re looking for an outdoor adventure, explore the trails at Cuyahoga Valley National Park or take your kids spelunking at Gorge Metro Park, less than a mile from the hotel.You can relax after your hike with a cookie from the lobby and some time in our heated indoor pool. In the morning, start with a quick workout in our fitness center, open around the clock, before filling up on a free, hot breakfast. Need to finish some work assignments? Visit our 24-hour business center or connect to the free Wi-Fi. When you’re done working or sightseeing, settle onto plush bed linens to watch the HBO movies you recorded on the flat-panel LCD TV with DVR. You can start the next day by brewing a cup of coffee or tea while using free Wi-Fi to research local attractions or check email. Traveling with family? Upgrade your stay to a spacious studio suite with a sofa bed or a one-bedroom suite with a living room. Romantic whirlpool suites are also available for special getaways. Close to I-76 and I-77, our hotel offers a great location for business meetings and family gatherings in our 576-square-foot event space. Take advantage of free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment to impress your guests, and be sure to ask about discounts for groups. Snacks and beverages are also available for a fee. Home to community festivals, great restaurants, and parks, Cuyahoga Falls provides an ideal escape for families. Enjoy the great outdoors by exploring rock ledges and caves at Gorge Metro Park, or make a splash at Water Works Family Aquatic Center. Spend a beautiful day walking the Glens Trail along the Cuyahoga River or exploring downtown Akron attractions. Don’t miss these nearby points of interest:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dayton South, OH
description: Whether you’re working in Centerville or shopping at the Dayton Mall, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dayton South, OH provides easy access to the area’s top businesses and attractions. Head to the nearby gardens at Cox Arboretum MetroPark for a glimpse of Ohio’s stunning foliage. For some family fun, let your kids enjoy a round of mini golf at The Magic Castle, located within minutes of our hotel off I-675 and I-75.Squeeze in a workout at the fitness center whenever it’s convenient for you, and then hop into the indoor pool for a soothing swim. If you have work to do, stop by the 24-hour business center. Join us for our manager’s reception on Tuesdays and Wednesdays (5:30 to 6:30 pm) and enjoy complimentary food and beverages (soda and adult beverages). With a microwave and a refrigerator in each of our rooms and suites, it’s easy to prepare snacks and sip cold drinks while you watch your favorite HBO series. Each morning, use the in-room coffeemaker to brew a cup of java and then dig into your favorite dishes at our free, hot breakfast. Welcome up to 35 guests to your business event or social gathering inside our 700-square-foot meeting room. With the help of audiovisual equipment, on-site catering options, and free high-speed internet access, events at the Country Inn & Suites are destined for success. We also offer the option to create a personalized web page unique to your event. Known as the Birthplace of Aviation, Dayton is home to the National Museum of the US Air Force as well as Wright "B" Flyer Inc. There, you can see a replica of the Model B—the Wright brothers’ first production airplane. History buffs love attractions like America’s Packard Museum and Carillon Historical Park. Don’t miss these additional highlights during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Elyria, OH
description: Choose the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Elyria, OH as your home base in northeastern Ohio near Lake Erie. Our hotel is only about a 30-minute drive from downtown Cleveland and 20 minutes from Oberlin College and Conservatory. Spend the day taking on the rides at Cedar Point amusement park, or catch a play at Stocker Arts Center before returning to the hotel to recharge.After a day of traveling, head to the front desk for free coffee and cookies. You can unwind in the heated indoor pool or hot tub before enjoying a good night's rest in your room. Start the day with a fresh cup of coffee before heading down to enjoy our free, hot breakfast. Our business center helps you stay productive, and weekday dry-cleaning and laundry services are available for stress-free extended stays.  You can prepare snacks and enjoy cold beverages with a microwave and a refrigerator conveniently located in each of our rooms and suites. If you prefer a hot beverage, brew a fresh cup of coffee or tea using the in-room facilities. All rooms also include free Wi-Fi and HBO. Located near I-80 and I-90, about halfway between Cleveland and Sandusky, our hotel’s meeting room is a great place to hold a corporate event for attendees traveling from both cities. Take advantage of the audiovisual equipment, catering recommendations, and planning assistance for an engaging event.  We also welcome teams through our Sports Approved Program. A charming suburb of Cleveland, Elyria is just 30 minutes from the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame and FirstEnergy Stadium, home of the Cleveland Browns. Our hotel’s convenient location off I-80 and I-90 puts you near a variety of dining and entertainment options. Check out these nearby favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Findlay, OH
description: Situated less than a mile from the University of Findlay, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Findlay, OH is the perfect base for Oilers fans and future students. Thanks to our hotel’s location just off I-75, it's easy for guests to visit Findlay’s top attractions, like the Mazza Museum, or make quick commutes to corporate offices like Cooper Tire & Rubber and ADP. To relax, spend a beautiful day playing the links at Sycamore Springs Golf Course or hiking at Riverside Park.Each morning, sit down to our free, hot breakfast and then join the kids for splash time in our heated indoor pool. Afterward, grab complimentary cookies and coffee from the lobby to enjoy with a book. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel, and a 24-hour business center helps you stay focused on work. No time to visit the trails at Van Buren State Park? We also offer a fitness center to help you stay in shape. Catch up on your favorite TV show with your pet by your side in one of our spacious, pet-friendly hotel rooms or suites. With a microwave, a refrigerator, and a coffeemaker, you can easily enjoy a snack and a refreshing drink at any time. Complete work at the desk and use free Wi-Fi to connect with family and friends. Romantic whirlpool suites, family-friendly rooms, and extended-stay options are available. Hosting a reception, meeting, or seminar in Findlay? Reserve our 1,200 square feet of flexible event space to accommodate groups of up to 75 guests. We have two versatile rooms to choose from, and we offer amenities like audiovisual equipment rental, breakfast service, coffee and cookie breaks, and free Wi-Fi. Our hotel also provides special services for weddings, tour groups, and traveling sports teams. Take some time during your visit to learn about Findlay’s 200 years of history, including the era when the city served as a major stop on the Underground Railroad. See the city’s antique Victorian homes, browse the eclectic shops, or tour the Hancock Historical Museum. Beyond history, our hotel off I-75 also puts you near kid-friendly fun at Riverside Park and great golf at Red Hawk Run Golf Club. With the University of Findlay less than a mile away, you won’t have to travel far for a campus tour, a game, or a graduation ceremony. Findlay’s can’t-miss attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lima, OH
description: Just three minutes off Interstate 75, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lima, OH is an ideal base for leisure and business travelers alike. Approximately three miles from Ohio State University-Lima, our hotel offers stress-free travel for prospective students and campus visitors. On your way to a meeting? Our convenient location offers quick commutes to major urban centers like Cincinnati and Toledo.During your stay, you can swim in our indoor pool, soak in the hot tub, or work out in the fitness center. Free Wi-Fi helps you stay connected with friends and family. Treat yourself to complimentary cookies, coffee, and tea in the lobby and relax with a book in front of the fireplace. Slide into bed under crisp sheets and get a good night's sleep in one of our comfortable rooms or suites. In the morning, brew yourself a hot cup of coffee, check email with free Wi-Fi, or catch a morning news show on your flat-screen HDTV. Furnished with comfortable chairs and a stylish table, our 10-person boardroom offers an ideal venue for your business meeting or social gathering. Helpful amenities include free Wi-Fi, beverage and snack service, and catering recommendations. Work with our professional event planning staff to execute a successful event. Located three minutes from the junction of State Route 309 and Interstate 75, our hotel puts you near Lima's finest museums, theaters, golf courses, and shopping centers. Explore the exhibits at Artspace/Lima or attend a concert at Crouse Performance Hall. Pack up the clubs for a golf outing while the shoppers in your family head for nearby Lima Mall. Don't miss these top attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Macedonia, OH
description: Situated about halfway between Akron and Cleveland, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Macedonia, OH offers an ideal romantic getaway or family vacation stay in northeastern Ohio. You can get to the slopes quickly at Boston Mills/Brandywine Ski Resort, go hiking in Cuyahoga Valley National Park, and gamble at MGM Northfield Park. Our hotel has easy access to I-271 and is less than 15 miles from Cleveland attractions, like Cleveland Metroparks Zoo and Progressive Field, the downtown MLB ballpark.Hospitality is key at our hotel, where you can snack on complimentary cookies and coffee at check-in or replace a missing personal item free of charge through our Did You Forget? Program. After your adventures, relax with a dip in our heated indoor pool and hot tub. We offer a business center, a fitness room, and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. In the morning, wake up to a complimentary, hot breakfast, featuring waffles, fresh fruit, eggs, and breakfast meats. Pop a snack in the microwave, open a beverage from the refrigerator, and watch HBO in your spacious room or suite. Free Wi-Fi and a free, hot breakfast are standard in our accommodations. When you want extra space, you can upgrade to a suite with additions like a whirlpool, a separate living room, or a sleeper sofa. Our flexible meeting space can accommodate up to 20 guests in a variety of room configurations. In addition to free high-speed internet and professional planning assistance, we provide beverage and snack service, a personalized web page for your event attendees, and discounted group rates. Nestled in the Cuyahoga Valley about half an hour from downtown Cleveland, Macedonia is a convenient spot for weekend escapes and extended vacations. If you’re traveling with kids, be sure to visit the Cleveland Metroparks Zoo or splash your way around Wildwater Kingdom. Sports enthusiasts can explore the nearby Pro Football Hall of Fame or take in a Cleveland Indians game at Progressive Field. Don’t miss these top attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Mansfield, OH
description: Located just off Highway 30 between Columbus and Cleveland, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Mansfield, OH makes an ideal base for visiting The Ohio State University at Mansfield campus next door. Families and business travelers alike appreciate the convenience of nearby shopping at Target, movies at Cinemark 14, and bike rides on the Richland B&O Trail. The hotel also offers proximity to fast-paced racing action at the Mid-Ohio Sports Car Course and local businesses like CSX, Omnisource, and many others.Wake up each morning to delicious, hearty fare at our complimentary, hot breakfast. If work is on the agenda, feel free to finish projects in the business center, and then reward yourself with a refreshing dip in the heated indoor pool. At the end of a busy day, clear your mind with a workout in the fitness center and browse your favorite sites with the free Wi-Fi. Let the Country Inn & Suites provide you with an ideal retreat—a comfortable hotel room featuring free Wi-Fi. After a long day touring the Historic Carrousel District or BibleWalk, kick back in your room and watch HBO. You can make treats with the microwave and keep your favorite drinks in the fridge. Upgrade to a spacious suite with a living room, a sleeper sofa, an additional TV, and other amenities to ensure your family is comfortable. Gather with clients, lead a training session, or host a small social affair for up to 12 guests at the Country Inn & Suites. Our meeting room comes with free Wi-Fi, and you can give informative presentations with the assistance of our audiovisual equipment. Work with our professional events staff to plan the ideal refreshments for your group. Stay at the Country Inn & Suites off Highway 30 to be a short drive from The Ohio State University at Mansfield and the historic Ohio State Reformatory. Nicknamed the “Racing Capital of Ohio,” Mansfield is home to one of the nation's most competitive tracks—the Mid-Ohio Sports Car Course. Cyclists can take advantage of the Richland B&O Bike Trail, history buffs can enjoy Oak Hill Cottage, and couples can spend an evening with a romantic dinner in the Historic Carrousel District. Don't miss these top attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Marion, OH
description: Located just off US-23, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Marion, OH puts you near the Harding Home and less than 10 minutes from the city’s historic downtown. Treat your kids to a race at Marion County International Raceway, or treat yourself to a glass of wine at Shamrock Vineyard. Our hotel is also situated just a few miles from live productions at Marion Palace Theatre.After a day of knocking down the pins at Bluefusion Entertainment, surf the web with free Wi-Fi beside the lobby fireplace. When you’re ready to unwind, head for the fitness center or plunge into our indoor pool. Open your laptop and connect to the web with free internet in one of our spacious rooms or suites. After a good night’s rest on crisp, cool sheets, you can brew a hot cup of coffee in the comfort of your room. Watch the news on your LCD TV and then head to our free, hot breakfast to start your day on the right foot. For small social and business gatherings, consider our hotel’s flexible meeting space in Marion. Guests appreciate easy access to nearby shopping centers and eateries, and Marion’s historic downtown is within easy reach. With space for up to 20 guests, our meeting room features offer free high-speed internet access, coffee and water service, and audiovisual equipment. Located about an hour north of Columbus, Marion is home to The Ohio State University – Marion and the Warren G. Harding Home & Memorial. Known as the World’s Popcorn Capital, the city boasts one of only two popcorn museums in the world. Our hotel sits on the east side of town, a little more than three miles from historic downtown and conveniently close to Marion’s most interesting sites. Don’t miss these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Toledo, OH
description: Located near I-90 and I-475 in the city of Maumee, Ohio, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Toledo, OH is an ideal home base for family vacations. Gear up for an exciting day in Toledo with our hotel’s free, hot breakfast, and then spend an afternoon hand-feeding leafy greens to the giraffes at the Toledo Zoo & Aquarium, or wandering among stunning flora at the Toledo Botanical Garden. Ready for a shopping spree? Head to The Town Center at Levis Commons, a 15-minute drive from our hotel. Corporate travelers appreciate our proximity to the headquarters of major companies like Dana and The Andersons, plus more than 250 local companies in the Arrowhead Park business district.After a day of meetings or exploring the Glass City, you can unwind with a workout in our fitness center or a swim in our heated indoor pool. Stop by the lobby for a complimentary cookie and a cup of coffee and relax with a free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper. Need to print out tickets or check your email? Our business center is open 24 hours for your convenience. At the Country Inn & Suites, you can kick back in your spacious room or suite and use free Wi-Fi to stay connected. Designed to feel like home, our rooms also include a microwave, a refrigerator, and cable TV channels like CNN, ESPN, and HBO. With a rich local history, proximity to downtown Toledo, and beautiful outdoor attractions like the riverside Side Cut Metropark, Maumee has something for everyone. Learn about the area’s involvement in the War of 1812 at Fort Meigs, or root for the Mud Hens at a Minor League Baseball game. Don’t miss out on these local favorites while you’re in the area:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Sandusky South, OH
description: Just off I-80/90 at exit 118, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Sandusky South, OH is a smart choice for vacation and business. Our hotel in Milan offers easy access to US 250,  making it easy for you to head for a day of fun at Cedar Point amusement park or a business event at the Kalahari Convention Center. For a low-key outing, stroll the village streets to see historic homes representing a wide variety of architectural styles. Our courteous staff is happy to recommend other points of interest and provide directions.Whether you have an early start or a late night, our on-site services match your schedule. Stop by our 24-hour business center to check email or print a report. You can take advantage of our seasonal outdoor pool to unwind or use the fitness center to work out. In case of a snack attack, our Inn Case Market has what you need. And before you head out, stop by our dining area to enjoy a free, hot breakfast to start your day right. A clean and comfortable room helps you relax. Stretch out on a king or queen bed and unwind by watching a favorite show on the flat-panel TV as you browse social media with the free Wi-Fi. Whether you’re a fan of history or thrilling rides, in town for business or just passing through on the Ohio Turnpike, Milan has a lot to offer. The Thomas Edison Birthplace Museum tells the story of one of America’s greatest inventors, the village of Milan offers a historic district of homes, and Cedar Point Amusement Park is brimming with things to do. While you’re here, visit these top attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Cleveland Airport West
description: Whether you’re in the Olmsted area for vacation or business, Radisson Hotel Cleveland Airport West invites you to relax just 15 minutes from the I-X Center. For your convenience, our hotel offers a free shuttle to Cleveland Hopkins International Airport (CLE), a 10-minute drive away, as well as to businesses and attractions near the hotel. If you love the outdoors, you can hike and picnic at Rocky River Reservation just two miles from the hotel. Drive 20 minutes to downtown Cleveland, where you can tour the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame or explore the world-class dining and entertainment along East 4th Street.While you’re here, you can plan an exciting itinerary each day using our free Wi-Fi and then fuel up for your adventures at the breakfast buffet at our on-site restaurant. For a quieter day, unwind at the hotel with a workout in our fitness center before joining your family for a swim in the indoor pool. After a busy day, order dinner from room service for a quiet night in. Each of our stylish rooms and suites features a comfortable seating area where you can check email or browse headlines via free Wi-Fi. Before you turn in, catch up on your favorite HBO shows on the flat-screen TV. In the mornings, start the day with a cup of coffee freshly brewed in your room. Whether you’re hosting a business seminar or family celebration, choose the Radisson hotel in North Olmsted, where our versatile event facilities can accommodate up to 150 people. We’re minutes from the Cleveland airport, making our hotel easy for attendees to find. All meeting rooms include free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment so you can stay connected and give impressive presentations. Located on site, Boulevards Restaurant is the perfect place to enjoy a daily breakfast buffet before heading out to a full day of meetings or sightseeing. For dinner, you can order classic American entrées like burgers, salmon, and Philly cheesesteaks. After your conference at the I-X Center, gather with fellow attendees at Boulevards Lounge for specialty cocktails and appetizers. If you’d prefer to relax in your room, you can order a delicious meal from room service. Our hotel is located five miles from the CLE airport and three miles from NASA’s Glenn Research Center. Looking for a cultural experience? Drive to downtown Cleveland and browse the museums on University Circle or see a performance in Playhouse Square. Don’t miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Toledo South, OH
description: Situated in Rossford at the intersection of I-75 and I-90, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Toledo South, OH is an ideal spot for exploring local attractions like Fort Meigs and the Huntington Center Arena. Stretch your legs with a quick jog in our fitness center, or walk alongside the Maumee River while you explore downtown Toledo. Here on business? Our hotel is less than 15 minutes from the SeaGate Convention Centre.If you want to relax, treat yourself to a soothing dip in our heated indoor pool or a soak in our hot tub. Use free Wi-Fi to check out the rides at Cedar Point, about an hour away, and then get up early to enjoy our free, hot breakfast before a day of riding the roller coasters. When you get back, stop by the lobby for cookies, coffee, and tea, which are available throughout the day. Feel at home in your room or suite by raiding the fridge for a cold drink and warming up leftovers in your microwave. You can stretch out on plush bedding and switch on the flat-screen TV to catch up on your favorite cable TV shows. In town on business? Use the alarm clock/radio to ensure you rise and shine in time to fuel up at our free, hot breakfast. With space for up to 60 guests, our meeting room is perfect for your business seminar or social event. Presentations are easier thanks to free high-speed internet access and audiovisual equipment. After the meeting, treat attendees to a delicious catered meal at a fraction of the cost thanks to our hotel’s discounts on local pizza and Cold Stone Creamery packages. From exciting local sports to fine arts, Toledo has something for every interest. Cheer on the Walleye hockey team as they hit the ice at Huntington Center, or spend nine innings with the Mud Hens at Fifth Third Field. For remarkable musical performances, buy tickets to see the Toledo Symphony Orchestra. Don’t miss these area favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Springfield, OH
description: Conveniently situated in the Bechtle Business District, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Springfield, OH is a business-friendly home base just off Highway 68. On a work trip? Enjoy easy commutes to the corporate offices of Navistar, Honeywell, and Rittal. After attending a meeting near the hotel, immerse yourself in nature with a mind-clearing stroll through Buck Creek State Park or the Wittenberg University campus. You’ll also appreciate proximity to the Clark State Performing Arts Center, Springfield Museum of Art, and Heart of Ohio Antique Center.Explore downtown Springfield, and then grab a cookie as you pass through the lobby on your way to our heated indoor pool. Thanks to free Wi-Fi, it’s easy to keep up with current events while traveling. If you’re here for work, fax and copy services are available through our business center, and on-site laundry facilities keep your attire looking fresh. Once you’ve returned from your Wittenberg University campus tour, unwind in a comfortable hotel room or suite with a hot cup of coffee or tea and a movie on HBO. When you wake from a restful night’s sleep, you can fuel up for the day ahead at our free, hot breakfast. Each room features a microwave and a refrigerator, perfect for storing and preparing afternoon snacks. Welcome to The Champion City! Discover unique treasures at the Heart of Ohio Antique Center, or watch the Wittenberg Tigers round the bases at Carleton Davidson Stadium. Looking for outdoor adventure? Head to Buck Creek State Park and spend the day hiking through the scenic trails or angling to catch white bass. Check out these nearby attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel at The University of Toledo
description: Whether you have an appointment at The University of Toledo Medical Center or tickets to a play at the Stranahan Theater & Great Hall, Radisson Hotel at The University of Toledo is an ideal home base for your visit. Located on the UT Health Science campus, our hotel is near the school's main and Scott Park campuses, both less than 10 minutes away. Enjoy convenient access to many popular attractions within five miles of our hotel, including the Toledo Zoo & Aquarium and Fifth Third Field. The city’s vibrant downtown is just a 15-minute drive away.During your stay, you can take advantage of amenities like free on-site parking and a 24-hour gift shop. If you’d like to keep up with your health routine while on the road, visit our fitness center for an invigorating workout. Traveling with the family? Our heated indoor pool provides hours of fun for kids. After a long drive on the Ohio Turnpike, relax in one of our 212 guest rooms and suites, which include amenities like a large work desk and free Wi-Fi. Before you drift off to sleep, you can watch your favorite shows on the flat-screen TV. The Radisson is located on The University of Toledo Health Science campus, which makes our meeting facilities ideal for graduation celebrations, medical conferences, and business expos. We offer more than 14,000 square feet of event space, including a grand ballroom and several smaller breakout rooms. Each meeting room features audiovisual services and free Wi-Fi. Located off the hotel lobby, our 31Hundred Restaurant serves fresh American cuisine. Start your day with a filling breakfast, and then come back for lunch to enjoy a pastrami sandwich, a Caprese salad, or a bleu cheese and bacon burger. During dinner, the chef prepares flavorful signature dishes.At the end of a busy day, stop by 31Hundred Sports Bar to unwind with a drink and an appetizer while you watch games on the 55-inch HDTVs. Our location near the Toledo Botanical Garden, Hollywood Casino, and SeaGate Convention Centre lets you experience all that the “Glass City” has to offer. In the area for a meeting? We're just 15 minutes from Toledo's fast-growing downtown. Don't miss these attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tulsa-Catoosa, OK
description: Located off I-44 and I-244 with direct access to the heart of Tulsa, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tulsa-Catoosa, OK provides an unbeatable location for travelers. Stay with us just nine miles from Tulsa International Airport (TUL) and within a short drive of major businesses like Cancer Treatment Centers of America, AT&T, and Tulsa Port of Catoosa. If you’re looking for a fun night out, our hotel is less than a mile from the Hard Rock Casino. For a family-friendly outing, head into the city to visit the BOK Center or Gilcrease Museum.It’s easy to stay stress-free at our hotel thanks to an outdoor pool and a fitness center that’s open 24 hours. Stop by the free, hot breakfast each morning and enjoy a satisfying meal before getting to work in our business center with free Wi-Fi. You can relax in the lobby with complimentary cookies, coffee, and a book from the Read It & Return Lending Library. Wake up surrounded by comfort at the Country Inn & Suites, where you can brew a cup of coffee and relax with free Wi-Fi or snuggle with your travel-loving pooch. Store drinks in the fridge and make snacks with the microwave to enjoy after a day touring the Tulsa Zoo or Philbrook Museum of Art. We offer an ideal space to gather with up to 25 of your colleagues or friends for a business seminar, training session, or small reception. Everyone can stay connected to the office using free Wi-Fi throughout the property. Take advantage of the business center with a printer and copier to prepare for the big event. If you’re a sports fan, be sure to catch a Tulsa Oilers hockey game at BOK Center or a Tulsa Drillers baseball team at ONEOK Field. Travel just minutes to the Hard Rock Casino to play the slots, and then treat yourself to a shopping trip at Woodland Hills Mall with your winnings. You can make the easy drive down I-44 and I-244 from our hotel to downtown Tulsa, where you can shop, drink, and dine along the Tulsa Riverwalk. Don’t miss these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Enid, OK
description: Book the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Enid, OK for your business trip or family vacation. Located on US 412, our hotel is ideally situated for visiting family at Vance Air Force Base or the United Methodist Health Care Center, and business travelers are less than 15 minutes from the Stride Bank Center. Guests flying in and out of Enid Woodring Regional Airport will appreciate staying less than 20 minutes away.After a busy day seeing the area, take a dip in the heated indoor pool, relax in front of your room’s flat-screen TV, or slip into one of our comfortable beds. In the morning, we provide a delicious fare at our complimentary, hot breakfast. Free Wi-Fi and our well-equipped business center are ideal for guests traveling for work, and the fitness center provides a great place to unwind after a nonstop schedule of meetings or touring area highlights. If you’re here with a group, enjoy free parking for RVs and buses. Drop your bags in one of our spacious rooms or suites and lounge in front of the flat-screen TV. If you need to get some work done, take advantage of free Wi-Fi before turning in for a peaceful night’s rest. Looking for a convenient meeting space just off US 412? Our 640-square-foot event room can accommodate up to 30 of your guests, and amenities include free Wi-Fi and an on-site business center. Two hours west of Tulsa and an hour and 40 minutes northwest of Oklahoma City, Enid is convenient to some of Oklahoma's best attractions. Take a stroll through the revitalized downtown, play golf on beautiful local courses, and learn about the area at nearby museums. From our location on US 412, you can easily access the Enid Speedway and Chisholm Trail Expo Center. Enid's can't-miss attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Norman, OK
description: Conveniently situated off I-35, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Norman, OK is three miles from the University of Oklahoma and the excitement of OU football games played at the Gaylord Family Oklahoma Memorial Stadium. Our hotel also places you near Sam Noble Museum and Fred Jones Jr. Museum of Art, and just 10 minutes from the restaurants and boutiques in historic downtown Norman. Need an outfit that showcases your school spirit? Shop for your favorite game-day gear at Sooner Mall, located just a short drive from our hotel.After catching a Sooners game, take a refreshing dip in our heated indoor pool or update friends on the score using free Wi-Fi. Wake up to waffles, warm coffee, and more at our free, hot breakfast. Let our friendly staff check you into one of our spacious rooms or suites. Stay connected online with free Wi-Fi or flip through the complimentary weekday newspaper from the comfort of your hotel room. Host a conference, reception, or social gathering in our flexible meeting space that can host an intimate event for 15 guests or as many as 40 invitees. Both meeting planners and attendees will appreciate access to free Wi-Fi, a projection screen, a TV with a DVD player, and more. Located just south of Oklahoma City and 30 minutes from Will Rogers World Airport (OKC), Norman is home to the University of Oklahoma. Packed with museums, sports venues, fine restaurants, and shopping, the city offers adventures for everyone. While you're staying at our hotel in Norman, we recommend the following attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Oklahoma City - Bricktown, OK
description: Only minutes from the city’s waterfront district and the Oklahoma State Capitol, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Oklahoma City - Bricktown, OK places you close to OKC’s best destinations. Our free shuttle can take you downtown or to Bricktown, where you can board a water taxi to explore the boutiques, restaurants, and sculpture gardens that line the Bricktown Canal. In town for a conference or a concert? From our hotel, you can easily hop on I-235 or I-40 to reach Cox Convention Center and Chesapeake Energy Arena in about 10 minutes.After a day of kayaking down the Oklahoma River, return to the comfort of your room or suite to enjoy free Wi-Fi and a fully equipped kitchenette. If you’re ready for more fun on the water, you can play with your kids in our outdoor pool. We also offer a fitness center and business center to help you stay on track with your gym and office goals. Each morning, refuel with our free, hot breakfast before heading out to explore more of Oklahoma City. We invite you to rest and recharge after an afternoon in Bricktown in one of our 107 rooms and suites. You can store drinks in the fridge, heat up a snack in the microwave, or prep a full meal in the kitchenette before planning your next day’s adventure using free Wi-Fi. Need more space? Our suites feature a seating area with a sleeper sofa, perfect for relaxing with your entire family. Conveniently located in OKC near major businesses, Devon Energy Center, and OU Medical Center, the Country Inn & Suites near Bricktown is the perfect place to host a small business seminar or board meeting. Organize the meeting room’s flexible seating to your advantage, and then give a perfect presentation with the help of a projector and free Wi-Fi. Centered on the mile-long Bricktown Canal, the beautifully restored warehouse district of Bricktown has quickly become one of OKC’s most popular entertainment areas. If you want to get beyond the bricks, downtown attractions like the Oklahoma City Museum of Art and the OKC Zoo are just a few miles away. Check out these points of interest during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Oklahoma City - Quail Springs, OK
description: Make the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Oklahoma City - Quail Springs, OK your home base in OKC. Easily accessible from John Kilpatrick Turnpike, I-44, and OK-74, we’re just a few minutes west of Quail Springs Mall and five minutes east of Mercy Hospital. Our hotel is perfect for guests visiting surrounding medical facilities and sports teams visiting for tournaments.With amenities like free Wi-Fi, a fitness center, and a heated indoor pool, our pet-friendly* hotel offers you a comfortable and restful stay. After a long day in the city, pick up a coffee in the hotel lobby before heading up to your spacious room or suite. And don’t forget to take advantage of our complimentary, hot breakfast each morning.*Nonrefundable fee applies We welcome your entire family—adults, kids, and pets alike—to our well-appointed rooms and suites. Store your snacks in the refrigerator, brew a cup of coffee, log on with free internet, and settle down to unwind. Host up to 75 guests for an intimate wedding reception, family gathering, or training seminar in our versatile meeting space. Enjoy free Wi-Fi, audiovisual equipment, and complimentary business services. We provide catering recommendations as well. As a Sports Approved hotel, we also offer our meeting facilities for team huddles and planning sessions. Welcome to Quail Springs, where big-city fun meets American cowboy culture. Located in north OKC, our hotel puts you near top attractions, including the Martin Park Nature Center, Oklahoma City Zoo, and Cox Convention Center. Be sure to add these sites to your itinerary:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Oklahoma City Airport, OK
description: Corporate travelers looking for a hotel near the OKC airport appreciate the location of the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Oklahoma City Airport, OK and our free airport shuttle service to and from Will Rogers World Airport (OKC). If you’re driving, you’ll appreciate the easy access to I-40 and I-44 for visiting such major attractions as the Bricktown District. Families enjoying the summer shouldn’t miss nearby White Water Bay water park or a trip to the National Cowboy & Western Heritage Museum.We understand the needs of business travelers and that’s why we offer a business center, a meeting room, and even dry-cleaning services. Everyone appreciates the free Wi-Fi to stay connected with family, friends, and the boss and the free, hot breakfast to start their day. And after a busy day of meetings or visiting nearby museums and memorials, you can enjoy relaxing in the heated indoor pool. After a day of travel or sightseeing, our spacious rooms and suites are a welcome haven for relaxation thanks to free Wi-Fi and a 32-inch LCD TV with HBO. Conveniences like a microwave and refrigerator let you enjoy all your favorite snacks and drinks while you’re traveling. Our meeting room can seat up to 50 guests for your next event including seminars, training sessions, and family reunions. Support your presentation with free Wi-Fi and an LCD projector with a screen, or chalk out your game plan with a dry-erase board. Our free OKC airport shuttle service makes it simple for hotel guests to get to and from the OKC airport. Known for its oil industry, western heritage, and distinctive cowboy culture, Oklahoma City is proud to be considered one of the top destinations for 2020. Our hotel’s location means you’ll find it easy to visit the city's top attractions, including Oklahoma City National Memorial & Museum, Myriad Botanical Gardens, and the Oklahoma State Capitol. Be sure to add these sites to your Oklahoma City itinerary:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Oklahoma City at Northwest Expressway, OK
description: Unpack your bags and unwind at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Oklahoma City at Northwest Expressway, OK. Situated near I-44 and OK-74, our hotel is less than two miles from Penn Square Mall and INTEGRIS Baptist Medical Center. If you’re looking for a fun family outing, head to the nearby OKC Zoo or Science Museum Oklahoma. Business travelers are close to companies like AT&T, The Hartford, and Williams-Sonoma.Start each day with our complimentary, hot breakfast, and help yourself to cookies and coffee in the lobby during the day. We offer free Wi-Fi throughout the building and a 24-hour business center. After sightseeing or meetings, relax by our outdoor pool or work out in our fitness center. Select a room or suite for your visit to the capital city with conveniences like a microwave, in-room coffee and tea facilities, and a mini fridge. We offer free Wi-Fi and 128 channels on an HDTV. If you want extra space, upgrade to a suite and enjoy perks like a separate living room, a sleeper sofa, or a whirlpool. Whether you’re planning an intimate gathering or a seminar for 100 guests, our hotel just off the Northwest Expressway is a convenient meeting point. We offer 1,600 square feet of flexible space equipped with free internet, a built-in overhead HD projector, an automatic screen, and a wireless microphone to help make your event a success. If you’re attending an Oklahoma City University graduation, celebrate with your new grad in the Bricktown entertainment district. Be sure to visit these attractions during your stay:

name: Radisson Hotel Oklahoma City Airport
description: Whether you flew into Will Rogers World Airport (OKC) or traveled I-40, Radisson Hotel Oklahoma City Airport offers a convenient home base for your family vacation or corporate trip to the Sooner State. You’ll find it easy to visit State Fair Park to enjoy the fair’s 11-day run or to head downtown to see the OKC Thunder play. Bricktown offers endless entertainment and dining options. The National Cowboy & Western Heritage Museum and the Oklahoma City National Memorial & Museum are two must-see places to visit nearby.After a day exploring the OKC Zoo or meeting with clients, return to the Radisson to enjoy a swim in the outdoor pool or stretch out on a lounger in the sun. We also offer a well-equipped fitness center for a cardio workout. For a bite to eat, you can stop by the snack shop for a cold drink and something light or head to the restaurant for dinner. When it’s time to leave, our complimentary airport shuttle service is available from 7 am to 10 pm and upon request. Reserve one of our 101 rooms and suites near Will Rogers World Airport for your next trip to Oklahoma City. Each offers a comfortable bed, free Wi-Fi, and a flat-screen TV with cable programming. If you don't want to leave your room to grab a meal, order room service for breakfast, lunch, or dinner. Perfect for small-scale social events, strategic planning sessions, catered business lunches, and board meetings, our event venue can accommodate up to 12 attendees. Our on-site event coordinator is happy to assist with catering, setup, and audiovisual equipment needs.                                     Order room service from the convenience of your hotel room or suite.                                 Boasting a contemporary ambience, the Hub Grill & Bar serves various finger foods and light bites. You can also order coffee in the morning, tea in the afternoon, and an alcoholic beverage in the evening. OKC is a modern metropolis proud of its Western heritage and forward-looking innovations. While you’re in town, make a point of visiting Scissortail Park, the award-winning green space across from the convention center in downtown Oklahoma City. Treat your family to a day at the OKC Zoo, a horse show, or a visit to the National Cowboy & Western Heritage Museum to learn about cowboys. Don’t miss these favorite attractions: By car:Drive on S Meridian Avenue for a little over three miles, and then take a slight left onto W I-40 Service Road. The hotel will be on your left.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tulsa, OK
description: Whether you just landed at Tulsa International Airport (TUL) or pulled off I-244, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tulsa, OK is an ideal place for you to get some rest. Stretch your legs by walking the streets of downtown Tulsa, or tour the plains of Africa and the forests of Asia at the nearby Tulsa Zoo. Take a chance at the Hard Rock Casino’s slots before spending your money at Woodland Hills Mall. Whether you get a thrill from watching races at Tulsa Raceway Park or viewing breathtaking paintings at Gilcrease Museum, you’ll find exciting new experiences near our hotel.Our free airport shuttle minimizes your time on the road and maximizes your downtime so you can lounge by the pool. Use the free Wi-Fi to connect to the office while you work in the business center with copy and fax services. Wake up with a workout in the fitness center before savoring the free, hot breakfast. We also offer free cookies, coffee, and candy throughout the day in the lobby, where you can relax by the fireplace and read the free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper. After a day of exploring Tulsa, kick back in your room or suite with a freshly brewed cup of coffee and a movie on HBO. You can use the free Wi-Fi to check your itinerary from the comfort of the desk. Store your favorite drinks in the fridge and make popcorn in the microwave. Make your stay extra special by reserving a suite with a whirlpool tub. We also offer suites with a separate living room and a sleeper sofa, perfect for families or groups needing more space. Your event attendees won’t have to travel far when you book our meeting room near Cox Business Center, I-244, and the TUL airport. You can host up to 25 guests in our event space featuring free Wi-Fi. Let our talented staff help you organize the important details, such as room configuration and local catering arrangements. We also offer a customized event website to ensure everyone has the important details at hand. Tulsa’s motto promises “a new kind of energy,” and the city delivers with exciting attractions like the Hard Rock Casino, the Tulsa Raceway Park, and the Tulsa Zoo. You can experience live shows at the Mabee Center and see the Tulsa Oilers play hockey at the BOK Center. Families enjoy the fair at Expo Square and baseball and soccer games at ONEOK Field. Stimulate your creativity with a tour of the Philbrook Museum of Art or the Gilcrease Museum. Don’t miss these must-see attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bend, OR
description: Experience the laid-back mountain lifestyle of Bend when you stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bend, OR. Located off Highway 20 and less than 30 minutes from Redmond Municipal Airport (RDM), our hotel is perfect for exploring Mount Bachelor, hiking Pilot Butte, and touring the High Desert Museum. Visiting a friend or family member at St. Charles Medical Center–Bend? You can shop at Forum Shopping Center or in the Old Mill District to find the perfect gift for your loved one.For a great start to each day, take advantage of our free, hot breakfast. You can swim laps in the outdoor pool and then catch up on your email using free Wi-Fi. Stop by the lobby for complimentary cookies, coffee, and tea before grabbing a book from the Read It & Return Lending Library. If you’re planning an event, our flexible meeting space offers the perfect environment for gatherings just three miles from downtown Bend. Wake up with a cup of coffee as you use free Wi-Fi to purchase tickets for a Tower Theatre concert, or enjoy a movie marathon in your room thanks to a microwave, fridge, and flat-screen TV. Families and groups vacationing in Bend love our suites with extra living space and a sleeper sofa. The Country Inn & Suites in Bend offers a versatile meeting room with free Wi-Fi that’s perfect for a corporate meeting or small party. Complimentary parking and a convenient business center help your guests enjoy the event stress-free. From the panoramic views atop Pilot Butte to the eclectic bars along the Deschutes River, Bend has fun activities for everyone. Learn about the Oregon high desert region and Native American history at the High Desert Museum, and then spend a sunny day playing golf at Old Back Nine at Mountain High. If you’re visiting in the winter, you can hit the ski slopes at Mount Bachelor. After a fun-filled afternoon, head to the Old Mill District, a pedestrian-friendly space in downtown Bend that’s ideal for shopping, bar hopping, and dining.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Portland Delta Park, OR
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Portland Delta Park, OR helps make travel easy by offering complimentary shuttle service to and from Union Station and North Portland attractions within a four-mile radius of the hotel, including the Portland Expo Center. If you’re charting your own course in a car, our location provides easy access to I-5 and free on-site parking saves time and money.Watch the action on the soccer fields of Delta Park from your park-view room, and visit the lobby for free cookies and coffee. Free high-speed internet access lets you stay in touch with home or the office. Traveling with family? Our free, hot breakfast helps your entire crew start each day strong, and our pet-friendly policy allows your furry friend to tag along. Each of our 171 rooms and suites blends comfortable furnishings with modern decor to create an inviting retreat. Brew a cup of coffee, catch up on email at the convenient work desk, and watch your favorite HBO series on a flat-screen TV. The Country Inn & Suites in Delta Park features multiple meeting spaces. The Columbia Room is available for meetings of up to 40 people. For smaller groups, choose the Mt. Hood Boardroom, which provides seating for up to 14 people. All attendees can take advantage of free Wi-Fi. We have fantastic catering partners, and audiovisual equipment is available on request. Our hotel is less than two miles from the Portland Expo Center, Portland International Raceway, Portland Meadows, and tax-free shopping destinations like the Jantzen Beach Center. Basketball fans appreciate our proximity to I-5, which offers easy access to the Moda Center, home of the NBA's Portland Trail Blazers. Don't miss these other local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Portland International Airport, OR
description: Located just two miles from Portland International Airport (PDX), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Portland International Airport, OR welcomes you to the Pacific Northwest with complimentary airport shuttle service and dedicated staff. Enjoy a convenient hotel stay near top attractions like the Portland Japanese Garden and Lan Su Chinese Garden, government agencies like the Oregon Air National Guard base, and major corporations like Boeing.Stay connected during your business trip or family vacation using our free Wi-Fi, and visit the fitness center to keep up with your health routine while on the road. You can unwind at our indoor pool after meetings or sightseeing excursions or enjoy time with friends at our fire pit on the hotel patio. Each of our 153 guest rooms and suites features tastefully modern decor and convenient amenities like a refrigerator and a microwave. Stretch out on a plush bed, enjoy your favorite cable shows, and stay connected with free Wi-Fi, all from a convenient location near the airport. Host up to 40 guests in our 792-square-foot meeting space. Our location near Portland International Airport is convenient for both local and out-of-town attendees. You can also request catering services and audiovisual equipment to enhance your event.                                 Start your day with our free, hot breakfast at the hotel's on-site eatery, Brenner's Restaurant. For dinner, satisfy your hunger with classic American fare such as wings, burgers, salads, and sandwiches. The Country Inn & Suites is near Portland’s lively arts and culture scene, athletic events, and awe-inspiring nature. Cheer on the Portland Timbers soccer team at nearby Providence Park, tour the Lan Su Chinese Garden, or shop at Lloyd Center. Don't miss these top-rated attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Portland Airport
description: Just three miles from Portland International Airport (PDX), Radisson Hotel Portland Airport provides a quiet and comfortable retreat for busy travelers. Hop on our free, 24-hour shuttle to and from the airport for easy connections, or book one of our park-and-stay packages and leave your car at the hotel for up to 15 days. If you’re in town for a while, take advantage of our shuttle to the Metropolitan Area Express (MAX) light rail station. It’s less than a 10-mile ride into downtown Portland, where you can browse local artisan wares at the Saturday Market, meander through the stunning Lan Su Chinese Garden, or see native and exotic animals at the Oregon Zoo.Whether you’re on a one-night layover or an extended Portland stay, find comfort in the tranquil views from our patio overlooking Colwood Lake. The hotel exterior has been completely renovated, landscaping updated and new outdoor seating installed, making it a pleasure to be outside. Inside, you can work out in our fitness center and use free Wi-Fi and a business center to stay on top of meeting prep. Need to pick up a special souvenir for someone back home? Stop by our gift shop before heading to the airport. Please note that no pets are allowed at the hotel, but we are located close to pet-boarding services. After a long day of travel, stretch out on a Simmons Luxury plush mattress in one of our 190 comfortable guest rooms and suites, all updated with new beds. Firm up your itinerary or catch up with the office using free Wi-Fi, and then heat up a snack in the microwave. Room service is the perfect option for a relaxed private meal, and you can brew a fresh cup of coffee using in-room facilities before catching an early flight. Located minutes from the airport and less than 10 miles from downtown Portland, the Radisson is the ideal destination for business meetings, conferences, and celebrations for up to 100 people. Three event rooms cover a total of 2,500 square feet, and our thoughtful staff is always on hand to help with details like seating arrangements, catering services, and audiovisual equipment. For added convenience, attendees can take advantage of our free 24-hour airport shuttle service.                                     With room service available from early morning until late evening, you can treat yourself to a great meal after your flight or enjoy breakfast in bed with your significant other.                                 Start your morning with a savory breakfast skillet or hearty buffet selections at our on-site restaurant, Lakeside Bar & Grill. For lunch and dinner, you can order from an outstanding selection of Pacific Northwest dishes made from locally sourced ingredients. After a busy day, the bar is a great choice for a specialty cocktail and light bites with colleagues or friends. Our convenient location near the airport is also close to several golf courses, including 18 holes at Broadmoor and nine holes at the Colwood Golf Center. Less than 10 miles from the hotel, Portland’s hip Pearl District features converted industrial buildings brimming with independent boutiques, brewpubs, global restaurants, and art galleries. The famously outdoorsy city has plenty of green spaces, including Washington Park, home to the Oregon Zoo, Hoyt Arboretum’s walking trails, and colorful blooms in the International Rose Test Garden. Don’t miss these local favorites during your stay:

name: Radisson RED Portland Downtown
description: Plug into the playful, positive vibes that keep Portland weird at Radisson RED Portland Downtown. If you’re looking for an active city hotel that buzzes with energy, that’s us.
