If you want a quiet room within a few blocks of Portland Art Museum, Arlene Schnitzer Concert Hall, and the waterfront, that’s us too.Our Radisson RED features fresh, fierce design touches in every studio, a come-as-you-are attitude, and lightning-fast free Wi-Fi. Bringing Bo, Bolt, or Buddy? Our pet-friendly policy means your whole squad can tag along. If you're driving into town, self-parking is available for $35 per night with in/out privileges. The following certification shows our hotel's commitment to guests' safety. For more information, visit Safehotels Certification. Inspired, inspiring, and modern, our studios let you connect to yourself and to the internet—free Wi-Fi for the win. With Love-Yourself Lighting, you can get red-carpet ready for a night out or lie back to admire art that delights all on its own. We’ve also covered all the basics. In-room coffee? Professional hair dryer? Picnic table? Check, check, and check. Our Boston Terrier, Baxter, insists that dogs are invited to the party at Radisson RED. Check out our pet policy and pack their suitcases because your four-legged friends are always welcome.Only domestic pets (dogs/cats) are allowed.No more than two (2) domestic pets are allowed per room.Guests must sign a pet policy agreement.If a dog weighs more than 40 pounds, guests should contact the hotel directly to discuss a waiver.The pet program at RED includes a bandana, a bed, and a water and food dish. Meetings shouldn't be dull. We hate dull. Our four meeting rooms total 4,100 square feet and are exclusively for those who hate dull, too.Power up your laptop and stream a slideshow, clear the space for a catered cocktail party, or connect to free Wi-Fi to collaborate without saying a word. What you do is up to you; we're just here to help. OUIBar + KTCHN definitely has a flair for flavor. The menu is teeming with international street fare and regional microbrews, meaning you can go global while supporting local. Best of all, you can order anywhere via our Radisson RED app.Our restaurant may have opening hours, but your stomach sets its own schedule. We get it. That’s why we also provide Grab & Go options, available 24 hours a day. There are so many things to do in the Downtown Arts District, it’s tempting to try it all. But if you don't venture farther out, you're only playing yourself. Board the light rail for events at the Oregon Convention Center, or Uber out to ski on Mt. Hood. The hipster spirit is strong in Alberta, where you can shop for frocks with fashionistas or see Evil Dead the Musical in a 1920s theater. Want to put your mark on the city? Bounce over to Boise for macramé and mimosas at DIY Bar. Here are a few classic must-visits: By rail:Take the Blue Star Downtown Express shuttle to the SW 5th and Clay station.By car:Drive about 10 miles southwest via NE Sandy Boulevard.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Prineville, OR
description: In the heart of central Oregon’s outdoor recreation paradise, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Prineville, OR hotel blends the charm of the Old West with contemporary comforts. Our location off US Route 26 makes it easy to visit area attractions such as the Prineville Reservoir, A.R. Bowman Museum, Crooked River, and Crook County Fair. Plus, we offer a number of pet-friendly rooms so your four-legged friend can join in the fun. After a restful night’s sleep in one of our rooms or suites, enjoy a free, hot breakfast to gear up for a hiking trip in Smith Rock State Park. Wherever you decide to explore, you can always come back to our hotel to take advantage of free parking and enjoy complimentary cookies in the lobby. After a day of hiking, biking, or golf, soothe your muscles with a soak in the hot tub or a swim in the indoor pool. Once you’re feeling fully refreshed, use our free Wi-Fi to plan your next outdoor excursion. Book one of our 63 guest rooms and suites to wake up each morning near central Oregon’s most fascinating landmarks. Before making the trek to Steins Pillar or the Painted Hills, use your in-room coffeemaker, refrigerator, and microwave to prepare snacks for the day ahead. Free Wi-Fi is available so you can easily share photos of your adventures. Families love the extra space available in our one-bedroom suites with a living room and sleeper sofa. Gather your colleagues and share ideas using the flip chart in our 774-square-foot meeting room. This versatile space can accommodate up to 50 people and provides every guest with free high-speed internet access. A 55-inch TV with a DVD player is available. Make memories with the family by exploring the great outdoors at one of the region's stunning state parks. Our hotel in Prineville is within 50 miles of Steins Pillar, the Lava River Cave, and the Painted Hills, a few of central Oregon's most famous natural landmarks. If you're not a nature enthusiast, catch the latest blockbuster at Pine Theater or go rollerskating with the kids at the local rink, less than a mile away. Don't miss these favorites:

name: Radisson Hotel Harrisburg
description: Located off Highway 15 in Camp Hill, PA, Radisson Hotel Harrisburg sits just across the Susquehanna River from downtown Harrisburg. During your stay, you can visit the Pennsylvania State Capitol, The State Museum of Pennsylvania, Whittaker Science Center, the Shops at Strawberry Square, and downtown restaurants, all located within five minutes of the hotel. Cheer on the Harrisburg Senators at a baseball game in City Island Park, or learn how Hershey bars are made at Hershey’s Chocolate World®. If you're here with the family, head over to Hershey Park, only a short drive away, to try out the park's two new roller coasters. Here for a business event at The Pennsylvania Farm Show Complex & Expo Center? Our hotel is about 10 minutes from the venue. If you're in town to visit a loved one at Geisinger Holy Spirit, the hospital is right next door to the hotel.Let us help you simplify travel with our complimentary shuttle service to Harrisburg International Airport (MDT), the Harrisburg Amtrak depot, and area bus stations. We can also shuttle you to local businesses within a five-mile radius. To save time and money, take advantage of our services like on-site dining, free Wi-Fi, a fitness center, an outdoor pool, and a full, newly remodeled convention center. Stay in one of our 250 hotel rooms and suites for a great night’s sleep on newly renovated beds with premium linens. Before you drift off, watch a pay-per-view movie or respond to emails using free Wi-Fi. In the morning, enjoy coffee brewed in your room as you browse a complimentary weekday newspaper. Our hotel features more than 30,000 square feet of newly remodeled event space, including the area’s largest column-free, oval ballroom. Ask our experienced staff to assist with first-class services and amenities, including catering, linens, audiovisual equipment, and lighting setup. Planning a wedding or a fundraising gala? Impress your guests in our 15,000-square-foot Grand Ballroom. We also offer customizable wedding packages with fresh floral centerpieces, a reception with hors d’oeuvres, and wine service. Order tasty dishes for breakfast, lunch, and dinner at Heirloom, An American Bistro. Our on-site restaurant features a menu with tempting items like French toast, eggs Benedict, crab cake sandwiches, and fresh daily seafood selections. At Bridges Lounge, also on site, you can enjoy appetizers and drinks while you unwind with colleagues or watch sports on TV. We also offer room service for early mornings, midday snacks, and relaxing dinners. Our hotel is located about three miles from popular attractions like the Pennsylvania State Capitol and The State Museum of Pennsylvania. When you finish touring museums, book a tee time at Armitage Golf Club. Don’t miss these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Carlisle, PA
description: With a convenient location just off I-81, the pet-friendly Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Carlisle, PA is the perfect starting point for your Cumberland Valley adventures. You can visit loved ones at the Carlisle Barracks, less than seven miles from the hotel, or tour the Dickinson College campus, an eight-minute drive from our hotel’s location. Take your time wandering the tree-lined streets of historic Carlisle, where George Washington and other historical figures once walked. Gettysburg National Military Park is less than an hour away, or your family can explore life-size World War I trenches at the U.S. Army Heritage and Education Center.If you’re traveling with kids, Hersheypark is less than an hour away. After a day filled with adrenaline-pumping roller coasters and waterslides, you can return to the hotel for a family game of Marco Polo in the indoor pool or a rejuvenating soak in the hot tub. And don’t forget that you can start the day with a free, hot breakfast. Whether you’re traveling for business or attending one of the many car shows in Carlisle, you’ll appreciate returning to an inviting room or suite at the end of a busy day. Use the free Wi-Fi to share your work or adventures while heating up a snack in the handy in-room microwave. Our Country Inn & Suites offers a flexible event space that’s perfect for your sports team meeting or a family event in Carlisle. Free Wi‑Fi makes it easy to stay connected as you host a business meeting. And our friendly staff can help keep attendees alert and well fed with local catering services. You’ll also appreciate convenient extras such as a complimentary room for bus drivers as well as free car and bus parking. There is so much to do in our historic city and the Cumberland Valley. You can spend the day challenging the family to zip-line tours, paintball courses, and the ski slopes at Roundtop Mountain Resort. Step into history with a visit to Gettysburg National Military Park or the U.S. Army Heritage and Education Center. And there are year-round car shows, hiking paths on the Appalachian Trail, and plenty of biking trails waiting to be explored. Don't miss these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Chambersburg, PA
description: Located just 20 minutes from Hagerstown Regional Airport (HGR) and with easy access to U.S. 30, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Chambersburg, PA is the ideal base for your next trip to Franklin County. If you are traveling with the family, choose our pet-friendly hotel to make everyone feel at home. With our location just off I-81, you’ll find it easy to visit the campus of Shippensburg University, which is a 12-mile drive from the hotel. Or you can pay your respects to the hallowed ground of the Gettysburg battle site, 25 miles away.After a day of touring or calling on local businesses, take advantage of our indoor pool and hot tub, or work out in the fitness center. You can snag a complimentary cup of coffee and a cookie to satisfy your sweet tooth before retiring to your room. Use the free Wi-Fi in the room or our convenient business center to catch up on work before dining out at nearby restaurants like Red Robin. Our pet-friendly rooms and suites offer a warm welcome to families, couples, and solo travelers. Each spacious room and suite includes a microwave, a refrigerator, free Wi-Fi, and a TV with cable channels, including HBO. Why not upgrade your stay with a one-bedroom suite to enjoy a spacious floor plan and a private bedroom? If you’re hosting a family event like a bridal shower or planning a business meeting, our small meeting room is an ideal choice. It offers seating for up to 20 guests and free Wi-Fi, and our professional team is happy to recommend local catering. If you’re a prospective student, take a campus tour or watch a sporting event at Shippensburg University, 12 miles from the hotel. Or walk in the steps of history by visiting the historic downtown or taking a day trip to Gettysburg National Military Park. Don’t-miss attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Erie, PA
description: Situated halfway between the bustling cities of Buffalo and Cleveland, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Erie, PA provides an ideal location near the incredible Lake Erie coastline. For a family-friendly activity, spend the day at Splash Lagoon indoor water park, just across the street from our hotel, or explore the 15 acres of wildlife at Erie Zoo. If you’re feeling lucky, make a visit to Presque Isle Downs and Casino to play the slots or watch the horse races. If the weather’s nice, be sure to walk around Presque Isle State Park, which features a variety of recreational activities and a beautiful peninsula on Lake Erie.After an exciting day of exploring the Flagship City, return to the Country Inn & Suites to post family photos online using free Wi-Fi. Maintain your healthy habits in our fitness center, or prepare for your presentation at a local corporation in our 24-hour business center. Ready to relax? Soak away your worries in our sparkling indoor pool or hot tub. When it’s time to go home, climb aboard our complimentary shuttle to Erie International Airport (ERI). After a fun day at Presque Isle State Park, unwind in one of our rooms and suites equipped with modern amenities such as free Wi-Fi and a 49-inch flat-screen TV. Before bed, prepare snacks using the in-room microwave and fridge while watching your favorite TV shows. Start your day with our free, hot breakfast before spending the day at Splash Lagoon. The Country Inn & Suites offers easy access to all of Erie's best attractions. Play putt-putt, zoom down the zip lines, or pamper yourself in the on-site spa at Peek'n Peak Resort. For a fun outing with your family or group, go on an adventure at Waldameer & Water World or see the variety of animals at Erie Zoo. Other can't-miss area attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Gettysburg, PA
description: Situated off US Highway 15 and Route 97, the pet-friendly Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Gettysburg, PA is ideal for family vacations and getaways with friends with its quiet location close to shopping and historic attractions. Guests can walk to the adjacent Outlet Shoppes at Gettysburg or drive five minutes to Gettysburg National Military Park. Our hotel is also located about two miles from the Gettysburg Museum and Visitor Center, three miles from Gettysburg College, and 13 miles from Liberty Mountain Resort skiing.Amenities like an indoor pool and fitness center, both open every day until midnight, give everyone something to do during downtime at the hotel. Our covered front porch and fireplace-lit lobby are perfect spots to kick back while checking social media with free Wi-Fi. Traveling with a four-legged friend? Ask about our pet-friendly accommodations. Furnished with items like coffeemakers and flat-screen TVs, our rooms and suites are designed to help you feel at home. You can brew a fresh cup of coffee in the morning and browse the daily headlines in a free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper. Free Wi-Fi and cable TV channels offer plenty of in-room entertainment. Need a comfortable place to hold a business meeting or party? Our hotel offers a meeting space that can accommodate up to 70 guests, making it perfect for seminars, corporate presentations, and family reunions. Free high-speed internet access and an array of audiovisual equipment help you stage a successful event. Drive just 10 minutes to attend a graduation ceremony or to tour the beautiful grounds of Gettysburg College. Our region is known for its historic farmland, and you can sample the fruits of an area wine producer at Adams County Winery. You can also visit a presidential retreat at Eisenhower National Historic Site, about three miles from the hotel. Don't miss these exciting attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Harrisburg at Union Deposit Road, PA
description: Plan a fun-filled vacation when you stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Harrisburg at Union Deposit Road, PA. Ideally located for easy day trips to Hersheypark, Chocolate World, and Hershey Gardens, the hotel is also less than seven miles from the boutiques and restaurants of charming downtown Hershey. Our hotel is also near Harrisburg Mall, so you only have to travel five minutes down the road to catch a blockbuster movie or go on a shopping spree. Reach the corporate centers of Lockheed Martin and Spectra Energy in just 15 minutes.When you are ready to relax, watch an HBO movie in your room or recharge with a swim in the heated indoor pool and a soothing soak in the hot tub. Upload vacation photos using free Wi-Fi and keep clothes fresh during your stay in our on-site laundry facilities. Need to print out movie tickets? Our business center is located in our hotel lobby. If you happen to lose track of something during your trip, you can report the loss through our lost and found site to see if someone has found the item at the hotel. Retreat to your room or suite and stretch out on the comfortable bed to watch DirecTV or surf the web with free Wi-Fi. Store snacks in your refrigerator to heat up in your microwave later, and wake up each morning to a hot cup of coffee thanks to the in-room coffeemaker. Invite up to 100 guests to a function in our centrally located meeting room in Harrisburg. Our accessible event space can be divided into two rooms and comes equipped with free Wi-Fi as well as an easel, a whiteboard, and a flip chart for presentations. Audiovisual equipment rentals are also available. Our location offers easy access to nearby attractions in Harrisburg as well as to the unique shops and trendy restaurants in downtown Hershey. Attend a Bears’ hockey game or ice-skating show at the Giant Center, or stay closer to the hotel to shop at The Point, Union Square, or the sprawling Harrisburg Mall. Discover these other attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Harrisburg Northeast (Hershey), PA
description: When you want to be in the center of it all—minus the crowds—stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Harrisburg Northeast (Hershey), PA. Our hotel’s peaceful location near the capital and the upcoming Hershey's Chocolatetown℠ affords quick access to downtown Harrisburg and top Hershey attractions like Hersheypark. We’re located just off I-81 at exit 77 behind the Sheetz Convenience Store on a site surrounded by trees, where guests can sleep soundly and get a quick start toward the Giant Center or the Pennsylvania Farm Show Complex and Expo Center.Start each day with an invigorating workout in the fitness center, a few laps in the heated indoor pool, and a delicious meal from the free, hot breakfast. Use the free Wi-Fi to look up details for your itinerary, or complete work in the 24-hour business center. When you need a break, enjoy a soak in the hot tub. We also offer complimentary parking and coin-operated guest laundry so you can enjoy a worry-free stay. Whether you need a romantic Whirlpool Suite or spacious standard rooms for your tour group, the Country Inn & Suites has the ideal accommodation. Each of our rooms features free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV with more than 20 HD channels, and a workspace. Families love our suites, which feature a separate living room and a sleeper sofa, where you can relax after making snacks with the microwave and fridge. We also offer dog-friendly accommodations for those traveling with furry companions. Plan a successful business gathering in our meeting room that can accommodate up to 15 guests. We offer free Wi-Fi to keep your attendees connected, as well as a complimentary coffee bar. Use the 24-hour business center to prepare for your meeting. You can work with our professional staff to design the best layout and discover great catering options for your event. Stay within 10 minutes of downtown Harrisburg events like the Harrisburg Shakespeare Festival and children’s plays at the Gamut Theatre. You can also travel just five minutes up I-81 to play the slots and bet on horse racing at Hollywood Casino at Penn National Racecourse. Families love our location a short drive from Hersheypark, Hershey’s Chocolate World, and Hershey Gardens. Take an engaging tour of the Antique Automobile Museum before seeing a thrilling show at the Giant Center. Add these attractions to your itinerary:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lancaster (Amish Country), PA
description: Look forward to a relaxing vacation of both shopping and sightseeing when you stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lancaster (Amish Country), PA. Our hotel is conveniently located across the street from Dutch Wonderland theme park and a stone’s throw from local Amish farms. See a show at the American Music Theatre or browse for bargains at the Tanger Outlets and The Shops @ Rockvale. Other family-oriented activities include Broadway-style Bible shows at Sight & Sound Theatres and educational programs at the National Watch & Clock Museum.During your trip, start your mornings with our free, hot breakfast before heading to the business center to catch up on work. Then, rejuvenate in our indoor pool, hot tub, and fitness center after an exciting day touring Amish Country. Connect to free WI-FI in your room or suite to keep in touch with loved ones. Experience the famous craftsmanship of Amish Country when you stay in one of our hotel rooms or suites, all decorated with traditional Amish-built wooden furniture and beds topped with intricately stitched quilts. Each room also comes equipped with modern conveniences like a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a DVD player, and free Wi-Fi. Host a memorable event for up to 60 participants in one of our two private meeting rooms. Ask our accommodating and professional staff to help with catering recommendations, party planning ideas, and audiovisual equipment setup. Our versatile meeting facilities include services such as free Wi-Fi and complimentary parking to all your special guests. Located down the street from a wide array of discount stores at Tanger Outlets and within minutes of upscale retail at The Shops @ Rockvale, our hotel puts you within minutes of the area's top shopping spots. We're also within easy reach of plenty of family fun. Don't miss these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lehighton-Jim Thorpe, PA
description: Conveniently located off I-476, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lehighton-Jim Thorpe, PA is only about five miles from Penn's Peak and Beltzville State Park. If you're taking the family on an outdoor adventure, the Pocono Mountains and Lehigh Gorge State Park are both less than an hour away. Only six miles from our hotel, the town of Jim Thorpe is home to cultural attractions like the Asa Packer Mansion Museum and Mauch Chunk Museum & Cultural Center.After a rigorous mountain hike or a long day of meetings, enjoy the warm, soothing waters of our hot tub. Spent the day at Beltzville Lake? Take advantage of our on-site laundry facilities to wash your swimsuit before you head home. After sightseeing, unwind in our hotel's fitness center or let the kids burn off some energy in our indoor pool. In the morning, enjoy the free, hot breakfast and catch up on the news with free Wi-Fi.  Enjoy space for the whole family in our large rooms and suites, which feature home comforts like refrigerators, microwaves, and coffee facilities. Request a crib or a rollaway bed if you need extra bedding. Reserve our conference room for events with up to 45 guests and enjoy a convenient location right off I-476. Our professional staff is available to assist with details such as audiovisual equipment and catering so you can feel confident your gathering will run smoothly. Our hotel is conveniently located only three miles from the beach, hiking trails, and boating docks at Beltzville State Park. We're also just minutes from Jim Thorpe, a scenic town known as the "Switzerland of America." Don't miss these favorites during your visit:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lewisburg, PA
description: Conveniently located right off Highway 15, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lewisburg, PA is just two and a half miles from Bucknell University. Across the highway from our hotel lies the West Branch of the Susquehanna River, which is perfect for canoeing and kayaking. Visit charming downtown Lewisburg to tour cultural attractions like the Packwood House Museum and the Samek Art Museum.After a day of sightseeing or outdoor fun, take advantage of our hotel’s welcoming amenities, such as our indoor pool and fitness center. Free Wi-Fi makes it easy to check email and share photos of your Bucknell student with loved ones back home. Relax in our large rooms and suites with space for the whole family and where kids 18 and under stay free with an adult. All rooms feature comfortable bedding, a work space, and handy appliances like a microwave and a refrigerator. For a nostalgic movie experience, catch a film at the Campus Theatre in downtown Lewisburg, one of the only Art Deco movie houses in the nation. While you're exploring downtown, stop by the famous Street of Shops, where you can buy vintage furnishings and antique collectibles from 375 stores housed inside a historical woolen mill. Don't miss these other favorites during your visit:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Harrisburg West, PA
description: Situated off US 15 near the I-76 turnpike, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Harrisburg West, PA places you between Pennsylvania's capital city and Mechanicsburg. You'll be near Harrisburg International Airport (MDT) as well as Hersheypark and Gettysburg, both great choices for family adventures. If you're touring Messiah College or visiting a student, the campus is just a 10-minute drive from the hotel.In town for a corporate trip? Take advantage of free Wi-Fi and our business center, open 24 hours a day. If you need to work out some tension before a big meeting, go for a swim in the indoor pool or a jog in the fitness center. Later, you can curl up with your favorite four-legged travel companion. Take advantage of our Grab and Go breakfast, available at the front desk. After a day of thrill rides at Hersheypark, recharge in one of our 66 guest rooms or suites. Put up your feet while you watch your favorite TV shows before bed and begin your mornings with a fresh cup of coffee while you browse the internet with free Wi-Fi. Our hotel's meeting space can accommodate up to 30 people. With access to free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment, your family get-together or business meeting is sure to be a success. Whether you're in Harrisburg to set up an exhibit at the Pennsylvania Farm Show Complex or tour the State Capitol downtown, there are plenty of local attractions to enjoy. Be sure to visit these favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Frackville (Pottsville), PA
description: Whether you’re doing business in the area or need a break en route to another destination, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Frackville (Pottsville), PA provides a comfortable place to recharge right off I-81. Located near Schuylkill Highridge Business Park, the historic Yuengling Brewery, and Pottsville’s restaurants and shops, our hotel is perfect for both business and leisure guests.Before you head out for appointments or a family excursion, don’t miss our free, hot breakfast. Hotel amenities like free Wi-Fi and a business center help you plan your itinerary. At the end of a busy day, unwind in our heated indoor pool and hot tub, or hit the fitness center for a revitalizing workout. From standard rooms to apartment-style extended-stay suites, each of our 78 accommodations offers a quiet retreat with home comforts like a coffeemaker, a refrigerator, and a microwave. Catch up on your email with free high-speed internet access, or kick back to binge-watch your favorite cable TV shows. A free weekday newspaper helps you stay on top of current events while you’re on the road. Whether you’re planning a seminar, a board meeting, or a club get-together, the Kennedy Room is an ideal choice for up to 20 guests. We offer amenities like free high-speed internet access, and catering services are available to enhance any event. From forest hikes to touring America’s oldest brewery, there’s plenty to do in Pottsville and the surrounding area. Take in rolling countryside views and explore Schuylkill County’s coal-mining heritage at the Pioneer Tunnel Coal Mine, or spot bald eagles at the Hawk Mountain Sanctuary, where paths connect to the Appalachian Trail. Many of our guests at the Country Inn & Suites make the 46-mile drive southwest to Hersheypark, an amusement hub founded by the chocolate magnate in the early 1900s. Check out these essential area attractions:

name: Radisson Lackawanna Station Hotel Scranton
description: Discover the perfect blend of Pennsylvania’s past and present at Radisson Lackawanna Station Hotel Scranton, which boasts French Renaissance-style architecture and modern amenities. Situated within walking distance of The University of Scranton and the Steamtown National Historic Site, our hotel was originally a train station that opened in 1908. Guests appreciate our proximity to The Marketplace at Steamtown, located in the heart of the Historic District, and McDade Park, three minutes away. Drive about 15 minutes south to access the ski slopes, stores, and water rides at Montage Mountain or see a show at the Mohegan Sun Arena. You can also take advantage of our free shuttle service to Wilkes-Barre/Scranton International Airport (AVP), just 10 minutes away.From the marble columns to the Tiffany stained-glass ceiling, our stately lobby welcomes you with class and sophistication. Our award-winning on-site dining gives you all-day access to decadent cuisine, and you can catch up on work with free Wi-Fi in our 24-hour business center. Traveling with your pet? We’re happy to welcome you and your four-legged friend to our pet-friendly hotel. Have a nostalgic getaway in one of 146 rooms and suites at the Radisson. Pamper yourself in the granite bathroom, and then curl up on your bed’s plush mattress to unwind in front of the flat-screen TV or browse the internet with free Wi-Fi. With an array of ballrooms, boardrooms, and hospitality suites, the Radisson can easily accommodate up to 1,000 guests for your upcoming corporate meeting or gala. Ask our friendly staff for custom catering options to impress your guests as they admire our historic building’s beautiful architecture. We also offer free Wi-Fi and audiovisual options to make your presentations shine.Create lifelong memories with a catered wedding reception in the elegance of the Grand Scranton Ballroom, or host an unforgettable banquet with the assistance of our dedicated event staff. Indulge in a delicious breakfast, lunch, or dinner at Carmen’s 2.0 Restaurant & World Tour Menu, one of our on-site restaurants. In addition to tasty culinary creations, Carmen’s features an award-winning wine and beverage selection. If you need a caffeine boost or something to satisfy your sweet tooth, stop by our Station Café, located in the hotel lobby. Sip premium coffee and dine on decadent desserts while you gaze up at the historical architecture. A family-friendly eatery by day and a social hot spot by night, Trax Bar + Kitchen offers a popular place to share appetizers, entrees, desserts, and drinks. Want a quiet breakfast after a late night? Room service is also available. Scranton history surrounds our hotel, located within walking distance of attractions like the Steamtown National Historic Site and the Scranton Iron Furnaces. Relax at a local park after a business meeting, or take your family to one of these nearby favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, State College (Penn State Area), PA
description: Conveniently situated near the Penn State campus, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, State College (Penn State Area), PA provides an ideal home base for your State College adventures. Visit your favorite student at Penn State University, just two minutes away, or gather your buddies for tailgating and game-day fun at Beaver Stadium. Craving some fresh air? Plan a trip to Bald Eagle State Park, Mount Nittany or Tussey Mountain, where you can spend an active afternoon hiking, boating and swimming in the summer and snowboarding or skiing in the winter. Our clean, quiet and spacious rooms are equipped with satellite TVs, microwaves, refrigerators and free Wi-Fi. While you surf the Web, admire local artwork displayed on the walls. Hosting a business meeting, interview session or graduation celebration in State College? Invite up to 50 guests to a special event in our flexible meeting space. Ask our friendly staff for catering recommendations, and make your event even more memorable using our surround-sound system and ceiling-mounted projector. Our free airport shuttle conveniently transports overnight guests to and from the hotel. Cheer on the Nittany Lions football team at Penn State, or attend baseball, softball and lacrosse games. Nature-lovers can enjoy a day of boating, fishing and sightseeing at Bald Eagle State Park. Be sure to check out these local attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Philadelphia Northeast
description: Located near I-95, US Highway 1, and the Bensalem Interchange of the PA Turnpike, Radisson Hotel Philadelphia Northeast is a great choice for both corporate travelers and families. Our hotel in Trevose puts you within easy reach of Parx Casino® and a huge number of local businesses, including Suez Water Technologies. Families love being just minutes from popular attractions like Sesame Place and the Philadelphia Mills® outlet mall. Visiting family or attending an appointment at Cancer Treatment Centers of America® (CTCA), Philadelphia? Our hotel is just 10 miles away.After your busy day at the park or the office, grab a bite to eat at our on-site restaurant and use free Wi-Fi to catch up with the news. If you have some extra time, relax on the sundeck while your kids splash in our indoor and outdoor pools. Afterward, head to the fitness center to keep up with your workout routine. Hotel amenities also include free parking and a local shuttle that operates Monday through Friday, 6:30 to 10:30 am and 1:30 to 9 pm. With a modern earth tone palette and plush beds, our 275 rooms and suites offer an inviting retreat. Brew a cup of coffee each morning, and use free Wi-Fi to stream a movie or your favorite show as you wind down each night. If you need to host a Philadelphia-area gathering with great transportation links, choose our Radisson hotel near I-276. We offer more than 20,000 square feet of flexible meeting space for up to 800 guests. Plan an elegant wedding reception with outstanding catering in our Forest Ballroom or our Walnut Ballroom. You can give a stellar presentation in one of our meeting rooms with the help of free Wi-Fi and audiovisual tools. Whether you’re fueling up for breakfast or settling in for a delicious dinner, Atrium Bistro is the perfect choice. With sizzling flat-iron steaks, signature sandwiches, and cheesesteak quesadillas, our on-site restaurant serves American favorites with an enticing twist. For a relaxing meal in, order room service. After work, you can kick back with friends or colleagues in our Library Lounge, which serves fine wines, handcrafted cocktails, and a wide array of premium beers from local, national, and international breweries. While you’re in the City of Brotherly Love, make the 30-minute drive down I-95 to see famous Philly attractions like the Betsy Ross House, Independence Hall, and the Liberty Bell Center. Our hotel also puts you within easy reach of Citizens Bank Park, home of the Phillies, and Lincoln Financial Field, home of the Eagles. Don’t miss these nearby favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Washington at Meadowlands, PA
description: Situated right off I-79, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Washington at Meadowlands, PA provides a winning location for everyone. Our hotel is just four minutes from The Meadows Casino if you’re a fan of gambling and harness racing. You can test your luck in finding a great bargain at Tanger Outlets Pittsburgh, which is about one mile away. The Washington area offers a host of attractions, from the Bradford House Museum to the Pennsylvania Trolley Museum. And we’re just 25 miles from downtown Pittsburgh, so you can easily explore all the best of the Steel City, including professional sports and world-class museums.We invite you to help yourself to the complimentary cookies and coffee in the lobby when you need a quick snack. You can use the free Wi-Fi to map out your travels, or you can ask our friendly and helpful staff for local recommendations. We offer a fitness center with strength and cardio equipment and a heated indoor pool for a splashing good time. If you’re here for business, you can use the 24-hour business center to fax, copy, and print from the computer. And whether you’re with us for one day or a full week or more, we hope you’ll feel welcome as a valued guest. After a busy day of travel or sightseeing, relax in a spacious room or suite and share your adventures on social media with free Wi-Fi. Afterward, settle in with snacks and drinks prepared using the in-room microwave and fridge as you watch an HBO marathon. With meeting space for up to 20 attendees, free Wi-Fi, ample free parking, and audiovisual equipment rental, our meeting room is a great choice for your next Pittsburgh-area event. Make your get-together one to remember by asking our staff for catering recommendations and group discounts for hotel rooms for your guests. No matter what brings you to town, you’ll find plenty of local attractions worth your attention. You can spend the day at The Meadows Racetrack or hunt for bargains at the nearby Tanger Outlets. There are 18th-century house museums offering guided tours and the 27-hole Lindenwood Golf Club course. Don’t miss these local attractions:

name: Park Inn by Radisson Sharon, PA
description: For a great stay near Sharon-area attractions like the Mercer County Golf Trail and Grove City Premium Outlets, book a hotel room or suite at the Park Inn by Radisson Sharon, PA. Located near I-80 and I-376, our hotel places you between Sharon and West Middlesex, just a short drive from regional airports and historic sites like The Avenue of Flags.Our modern accommodations offer home comforts like free Wi-Fi, a refrigerator, and a microwave, and spacious bi-level suites are available if you need additional room. Dine at our convenient on-site restaurant, J.W.’s Other Club & Café, or catch a game and enjoy drinks at the on-site lounge. Our heated indoor pool is a great spot to relax, and our fitness center features a variety of equipment plus a relaxing sauna. Hosting an event? We offer meeting space for up to 600 guests, perfect for weddings, conferences, and social events.We no longer accept cash paying guests at this time. Please have your photo identification and major credit card ready to check in. The photo identification and credit card must belong to the person checking into the hotel.  Please note that this facility is 100% smoke free and smoking in your room will result in a $250 charge for cleaning which will assume your deposit authorization. Thank you in advance for your cooperation. Make yourself at home in one of the Park Inn by Radisson Sharon, PA’s 153 comfortable rooms or suites, all of which feature plush bedding, microwaves, and mini refrigerators. You can finish up your trip planning at the spacious work desk before kicking back to watch cable on the flat-screen TV or using the free Wi-Fi to post photos of your Amish Country adventures. After a restful night’s sleep, wake up to a fresh-brewed cup of coffee from the in-room coffeemaker. Planning an event in West Middlesex? With 929 square meters of meeting space, modern AV equipment, free Wi-Fi and on-site parking, the Park Inn by Radisson Sharon, PA provides the perfect setting. Our meeting rooms accommodate up to 250 people and are ideal for company meetings or special events. Executive boardrooms host up to 12 guests and are great for interviews and client meetings. For a more formal event, the Grand Ballroom can host up to 400 attendees and features a flexible layout. Our West Middlesex hotel proudly features J.W.’s Other Club & Café, a full-service restaurant and bar located on-site. We serve breakfast, lunch, and dinner daily in a dining room with floor-to-ceiling windows that allow in abundant natural light.Our low-key lounge area is a great place to gather with other guests after an on-site meeting. Enjoy expertly crafted cocktails, as well as weekend nights with live bands, DJs, and dancing. And, of course, we always have the big game on TV. Stay at the Park Inn by Radisson Sharon, PA off I-80 to be within minutes of top attractions, such as Amish Country and Buhl Park. You can go shopping at Grove City Premium Outlets and The Winner, the world’s largest off-price fashion store, before indulging in chocolates from Daffin’s Candies. Golf is a highlight among things to do in Sharon, and our hotel is perfectly located on the Mercer County Golf Trail, within 15 miles of 14 courses. Don’t miss our unbeatable golf getaway packages. Top local attractions include: By car:The airport is just 15 miles away from the hotel. When arriving, be sure to follow signage for Route 18 South off exit 4B. The entrance to the hotel is just to the right at the bottom of the ramp. By car:The airport is 60 miles away from the hotel. When arriving, be sure to follow signage for Route 18 South off exit 4B. The entrance to the hotel is just to the right at the bottom of the ramp. The trip takes one hour.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, York, PA
description: Located just off I-83, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, York, PA provides you with a convenient stay near family-friendly destinations like Spooky Nook Sports, Hersheypark, and the York Fairgrounds. Our hotel is also just a few miles from the Colonial Courthouse and York Hospital, two of the most common destinations our guests visit during their stays.Take advantage of useful amenities like free internet, and soothe yourself with a dip in the heated indoor pool before retiring to your well-appointed room. You can expect complimentary cookies waiting for you at the front desk and a state-of-the-art fitness center to help you feel better about treating yourself to a snack. Days filled with business or leisure end in comfort back at your spacious hotel room or suite. Kick back and relax while watching an in-room movie or uploading photos of your day online using free Wi-Fi. Coming to York on business? Use the work desk to complete your presentation and the alarm clock/radio to ensure you rise and shine in time for breakfast. Don’t forget to ask about our corporate rates. From festive soirees to corporate training sessions, our flexible meeting space is the perfect venue for gatherings of up to 40 guests. Essential amenities like free Wi-Fi access and a DVD player help you execute polished presentations. Nicknamed the White Rose City, York is constantly blooming with activity. Stop by the Amish market for unique homemade items before heading to Hersheypark to get your thrills on roller coasters and waterslides. A 14-minute drive gets you to York Expo Center, where events ranging from car shows to county fairs occur throughout the year. Other must-see venues include:

name: Radisson Hotel Providence Airport
description: Located off I-95 and less than a mile from T.F. Green International Airport (PVD), Radisson Hotel Providence Airport provides easy access to top attractions in the Warwick, RI area. To make your travel easier, we also provide amenities like a free, 24-hour shuttle service and free parking. Whether you’re here for business meetings or to explore destinations like Pawtuxet Village, one of New England’s oldest villages, our hotel rewards you with a relaxing stay. You can attend a musical at Ocean State Theatre, browse the art galleries at Rhode Island School of Design and Museum, or try your luck at Twin River Casino. Our inviting rooms and suites with plush bedding will welcome you back.During your stay, take advantage of free Wi-Fi, our full-service restaurant, and our park-and-fly packages. Our well-equipped fitness center enables you to keep up with your workouts and our 24-hour business center helps you stay focused while you put the finishing touches on your presentation.  Each of our 111 rooms and suites features a contemporary blend of design and comfort. Brew a cup of coffee with the in-room coffeemaker, check your email at the large work desk, and catch your favorite HBO shows on a flat-screen TV before getting a good night’s sleep on plush bedding. With 11,000 square feet of flexible meeting space boasting a capacity of up to 350 people, our Radisson hotel offers the ideal venue for corporate conferences, family reunions, and wedding receptions. Helpful amenities like airport shuttle service and free Wi-Fi make your event more convenient for guests. Add a touch of class to any affair with on-site catering options. Reserve our smaller meeting rooms for more intimate presentations and training seminars. Whether you’re heading to the airport for a day of travel or you’re looking for a nice place to have a sit-down meal, we have dining options for you. You can start your morning with breakfast or lunch at our Courtyard Café, serving Starbucks® coffee, fresh pastries, frittatas, panini, and other mouthwatering selections.Featuring dishes created by our team of chefs from Johnson & Wales University’s famous culinary school, our Libations Kitchen & Bar uses locally sourced ingredients to prepare memorable, one-of-a-kind meals on site. Should you prefer to dine in the privacy of your room or suite, room service is also available. Warwick offers plenty of things to see and do, such as shopping at the Garden City Center, taking in a show at Providence Performing Arts Center, or touring the prestigious Ivy League school, Brown University. If you’re a sports fan, you can make the short drive to Gillette Stadium to cheer on the New England Patriots. Don’t miss these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Aiken, SC
description: Located close to I-20 and US 78, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Aiken, SC places you just outside the city’s historic downtown and within 40 minutes of the Masters Tournament at Augusta National Golf Club. Our hotel is about 15 minutes from the campus of USC Aiken, and business travelers appreciate our proximity to corporate offices, such as Swiss Krono and AECOM.After an all-day conference or a college tour, relax with a dip in our seasonal outdoor pool and then plan the next day’s activities using free Wi-Fi. Need to get work done? Check email or finish your presentation in our business center. If you’re in a hurry to get to a meeting, take advantage of express check-in and check-out. When you’re finished with golf for the day, enjoy a restful night in one of our guest rooms or suites, all of which feature Serta Elite® pillowtop mattresses. Before you sleep, reconnect with family or make plans for tomorrow using our free Wi-Fi. We also make your family trip more affordable by allowing children 18 and under to stay free with an adult. Tour the campus at USC Aiken, one of the South’s top regional public colleges, or head about 26 miles west to watch the Masters Tournament at Augusta National Golf Club. Check out these exciting local attractions as well and find something for everyone:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anderson, SC
description: When you choose the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Anderson, SC, you’ll receive more than just a warm welcome at check-in. Our convenient location off I-85 and U.S. 76 makes it easy for you to call on clients or roar with other Tigers in Clemson Memorial Stadium and Littlejohn Coliseum. If you’re looking for a hotel in Anderson that’s near Lake Hartwell, you’ll be pleased to know we’re conveniently located near boat ramps for the lake. You can call on nearby businesses such as Michelin and Duke Energy or spend the day discovering the historic town of Pendleton. You can stroll the paths of the South Carolina Botanical Garden to see numerous specialty gardens or visit downtown to browse the local shops.After a day of travel or sightseeing, there’s nothing better than a swim in our heated indoor pool. If you favor a more vigorous workout, head to our fitness center for a cardio session. You can catch up on work or print your documents in the well-equipped business center. And don’t forget to start each day with the delicious free, hot breakfast. Family pets are welcome if they weigh less than 50 pounds, and we offer a convenient walking area for your pet. If you have any questions about Anderson and the Upstate, just ask our friendly staff. Whether you’re unwinding after a Clemson game or a day of traveling on I-85, our pet-friendly rooms and spacious suites welcome you home. You can settle in to watch cable programming on TV while you order room service from Fatz Cafe across from the hotel. Whether you're in Anderson for a business meeting, a visit to Clemson University, or a livestock show at T. Ed Garrison Arena, there are plenty of things to see and do. Don’t miss the historic district for its architecture, and save time to enjoy outdoor activities on Lake Hartwell and in Carolina Wren Park. While you’re here, be sure to visit these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Beaufort West, SC
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Beaufort West, SC is located on US 21 Business, which means our hotel in Beaufort is three miles from the historic heart of the town. If you’re visiting Port Royal Island to attend a graduation ceremony at the Marine Corps Recruit Depot, MCRD, on Parris Island, we’re about nine miles away. A Marine liaison visits the hotel every Wednesday evening of graduation week to answer questions you might have. Downtown Beaufort, with its antebellum mansions and charming small-town vibe, is just a short drive away. While you’re in town, make time to explore our quiet seacoast beaches, visit the Parris Island Museum, or play a round of golf.After a busy day, you can unwind with a couple laps in the heated indoor pool or relax on the outdoor patio. For a more vigorous workout, our fitness center is always available. You can use free Wi-Fi to plan your itinerary while in town or just ask our friendly staff for the best things to do in Beaufort. After a full day, enjoy a peaceful night of sleep on a Serta mattress and comfortable bedding in one of our rooms or suites. You’ll appreciate the convenience of an in-room microwave, refrigerator, and HDTV. And with free Wi-Fi, you can easily share graduation memories on social media. Celebrate with a graduation party at the Country Inn & Suites, which offers a meeting space with free Wi-Fi. The hotel's staff can help you plan every detail and arrange the room to your specifications. Bringing a group? We offer group rates as well as bus parking to accommodate everyone in your party. From the antebellum mansions to the boutiques on palmetto-lined historic Bay Street, downtown Beaufort offers visitors a wealth of things to do. Whether you’re visiting Port Royal Island for a beach vacation, planning a golf getaway, or here to celebrate a special marine’s graduation, be sure to save time to visit these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Columbia Airport, SC
description: Looking for an affordable, family-friendly hotel near the airport? The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Columbia Airport, SC puts you just off I-26 and about two miles from the Columbia Metropolitan Airport (CAE). Take our complimentary shuttle for stress-free commutes, and then unwind with on-site amenities like free Wi-Fi. If you’re in town to see the Gamecocks play or take a college tour, the University of South Carolina (USC) is less than six miles away. Our hotel is also close to other downtown Columbia attractions, including Riverbanks Zoo & Garden.Decompress after your flight by soaking in our heated indoor pool or jogging on the treadmill in the fitness center. If you’re traveling for work, use the 24-hour business center to stay productive. Express check-out helps you get to the airport on time for your flight. After your flight or a day of sightseeing, unwind in one of our well-appointed rooms or suites, which offer amenities like free Wi-Fi and a microwave. Here with your family? Store your kids’ drinks and snacks in the fridge and reserve adjoining rooms to give your teens some space. Take time between flights to explore all that the city of Columbia has to offer. From our hotel in Cayce, you can head to the Riverbanks Zoo & Garden to watch the antics of sea lions and penguins or you can wander through the antique shops and artisan vendors at The Vista. Check out these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Columbia at Harbison, SC
description: Situated off I-26 in Irmo, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Columbia at Harbison, SC places you near Columbiana Centre and a variety of attractions on Harbison Boulevard. Also close to Fort Jackson, USC, and downtown Columbia, our hotel is perfect for those who want to visit the capital without the hassle of staying in the center of the city. If you’re planning a trip to Riverbanks Zoo with your family, use our free Wi-Fi throughout the facility to zero in on the best exhibits and check on opening times.Tired after a long interstate drive? Relax in the hotel’s hot tub while the kids swim in the indoor pool. If you need something in the middle of the night, the hotel front desk is open 24 hours. You also can use our fitness center and business center during your stay. We offer complimentary cookies and coffee in the lobby and a free, hot breakfast each day in the dining area. After a day of strolling through historic downtown Columbia, enjoy some downtime in a comfortable bed in our hotel rooms and suites. We offer amenities like a mini fridge, a microwave, and free Wi-Fi to make your visit easy and comfortable. If you’re traveling with family or you want more space, you can upgrade to a suite and enjoy extras like a separate living room, a kitchenette, or a whirlpool tub. Host a board meeting or training session at the Country Inn & Suites, which offers a meeting space for up to 12 people. The hotel provides free Wi-Fi and a personalized web page for your event, perfect for communicating last-minute details to your guests. When you stay at the Country Inn & Suites in Irmo, you’re near historic Columbia attractions, such as the governor’s mansion and the Woodrow Wilson Family Home. Sports fans and family members can cheer on the Gamecocks at the University of South Carolina. If you prefer a gallery experience, visit the Koger Center for the Arts and Columbia Museum of Art. Shop at Columbiana Centre, less than a mile from our hotel. Be sure to explore these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Columbia, SC
description: Located just off I-77, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Columbia, SC gives you easy access to downtown and local events like Family Day at Fort Jackson. Buy tickets for a Gamecocks football game at the University of South Carolina, shop at boutiques in Five Points, or take your kids for a fun-filled afternoon at Riverbanks Zoo & Garden, less than 10 miles from the hotel.After a day of exploring Columbia, make a splash in our indoor pool, then plan your next day’s adventure with free Wi-Fi. Before you head out in the morning, take time to savor our free, hot breakfast in the dining area or get a workout in at the fitness center. After a USC Gamecocks game or a day at the zoo, relax and recharge in your guest room or suite. Parents appreciate having a microwave and a refrigerator for snack-time convenience, and business travelers love using the in-room coffeemaker for the day's first cup of caffeine. South Carolina's capital has a wealth of shopping, dining, and entertainment options for you and your family. After attending graduation at USC or Fort Jackson, head to the Vista, a riverside district known for its mix of family fun and nightlife. Check out these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Florence, SC
description: Conveniently located at the intersection of I-95 and US 52, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Florence, SC provides a perfect place to rest during your Southern travels. NASCAR fans can see a race at Darlington Raceway or tour Darlington Raceway Stock Car Museum for a glimpse into the history of the sport. If the weather's nice, play a round of golf at Beaver Creek Golf Club or the acclaimed Country Club of South Carolina. You can also make the short drive from the hotel to Timrod Park, which features gardens, trails, and tennis courts, or schedule a tour of Francis Marion University.After a long day of driving, stretch your tired muscles with a swim in our outdoor pool or a jog in our fitness center. When you’re looking for things to do during your visit, use free Wi-Fi to find a nearby park or museum. After enjoying a free, hot breakfast in the morning, you can catch the daily headlines in a free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper. After a hot day at Darlington Raceway, enjoy the comfort of one of our rooms or suites. Sink into a Serta Elite® pillowtop mattress for a restful night's sleep, and then wake refreshed and brew a hot cup of coffee. Browse the free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper or check your email using free Wi-Fi before teeing off at Beaver Creek Golf Club. Celebrate a graduation or host a business meeting in our versatile meeting space for up to 50 people. We can help create a personalized web page for your event so that your guests stay informed of every detail. The meeting space includes audiovisual equipment and complimentary coffee, and our hotel staff is available to assist you with planning and setup. Whether you're visiting an area college or just looking for a place to stretch your legs, you'll find plenty to do during your stay. See a NASCAR event at Darlington Raceway or explore the Darlington Raceway Stock Car Museum to see classic cars. Play a round of golf at Beaver Creek Golf Club or the Country Club of South Carolina. Don’t miss these other local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Murrells Inlet, SC
description: Stay within minutes of the vibrant Murrells Inlet MarshWalk when you book a room at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Murrells Inlet, SC. Our hotel off Highway 17 Bypass puts you about 15 miles south of Myrtle Beach and just minutes from the shops, seafood restaurants, and lively bars along the MarshWalk. Charter a fishing boat at Crazy Sister Marina for deep-sea excursions, or head to Brookgreen Gardens to admire a collection of outdoor sculptures. Fuel your adventures with our free, hot breakfast, and recharge in your room at the end of the day with free Wi-Fi.When you’re not out fishing or sunbathing, you can enjoy a satisfying workout in our fitness center or go for a swim in the indoor pool. If you’re here for work, our on-site business center helps you prepare for meetings. Amenities like free parking and on-site laundry facilities add convenience to your stay. Each of our 71 rooms and suites includes home comforts like a microwave and a refrigerator. After a day of shopping at The Market Common, you can prepare a snack and watch an HBO movie on your flat-screen TV before drifting off to sleep. In the morning, enjoy your first cup of coffee made with your in-room coffeemaker while you check email using free Wi-Fi. Venture into this quaint fishing village to explore the popular half-mile-long MarshWalk, home to boardwalk vendors and numerous restaurants and bars, including several that offer nightly live music. Take the family to Gilligan’s Island Funland for miniature golf less than a mile from the hotel, or enjoy a hike together at Huntington Beach State Park. For more outdoor fun, visit these popular attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Myrtle Beach, SC
description: Centrally located on Highway 501 and just minutes from Myrtle Beach International Airport, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Myrtle Beach, SC welcomes families and groups to the Grand Strand. The hotel’s convenient location offers guests quick access to the area’s activities. Enjoy the attractions of Ocean Boulevard without the traffic and spend the day at Broadway at the Beach, Tanger Outlets, the Myrtle Beach Speedway, or the beach itself—all located just minutes from the hotel. After dinner and a show at nearby Medieval Times, head to the hotel for a soak in the hot tub.Plan your day of shopping, golfing, or sunbathing by checking the weather using free Wi-Fi. Need to freshen up your favorite beach attire? Take advantage of on-site laundry facilities. If you need a break from the beach, make a visit to our indoor pool instead! Make your stay more relaxing when you book one of our spacious rooms or suites. Prepare for the day by stocking the in-room refrigerator and microwave with drinks and snacks. Wake up to a fresh cup of coffee before heading down to our complimentary, hot breakfast. After a long day at the beach, return to your hotel room and unwind as you watch your favorite TV shows. Plan a business meeting or family gathering of up to 35 attendees at the Country Inn & Suites. Our hotel offers a flexible meeting space with amenities like audiovisual equipment, free Wi-Fi, and a projection screen. To help you organize and host a successful event, we can also provide catering options and the assistance of our experienced staff. Need a larger venue for gatherings such as a family reunion? You can find several within walking distance nearby as well as opportunities for group activities such as bowling. From Ripley's Aquarium (discounted tickets available) and Broadway at the Beach to more than 50 mini-golf courses, Myrtle Beach offers more than just miles of sandy shores. This action-packed destination is perfect for family trips and includes attractions that everyone in your group will enjoy. Check out these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Charleston North, SC
description: Situated off I-26 and within seven miles of Charleston International Airport (CHS), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Charleston North, SC provides an ideal base for exploring the Lowcountry. Drive just a little over 12 miles to historic downtown Charleston to tour Fort Sumter or stroll along the Battery, which features antebellum homes and a harborside promenade. If you're in the mood for sun and sand, Sullivan's Island is less than 30 minutes away, and Folly Beach and Isle of Palms are about a 40-minute drive from the hotel. Visit friends and family at the nearby Joint Base Charleston, or attend a business seminar at the Charleston Area Convention Center.When you return to your spacious room or suite, kick back to enjoy a movie on the 32-inch TV. Wrap up work assignments in our on-site business center with printing, faxing, and copying services, or stay on track with your health goals in our fitness center or indoor pool. Need a treat while you're on the go? Pick up some complimentary cookies in the lobby for a quick snack. Make the most of your stay in North Charleston in one of our spacious rooms or suites. Take advantage of an in-room refrigerator and microwave to enjoy your favorite snacks and beverages on the road or at the beach. Situated in the center of South Carolina's largest retail district, our hotel places guests within a two-minute drive of Northwoods Mall and about four miles from Tanger Outlets. Fans of college sports can catch a game at The Citadel or the College of Charleston, both less than 15 minutes from the hotel via I-26 East. You can take this same route to reach the sights of downtown Charleston in just 15 minutes. Be sure to check out these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Orangeburg, SC
description: Whether you’re taking a tour of South Carolina State and Claflin University or planning an outdoor excursion for two near Santee State Park, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Orangeburg, SC provides a welcome respite from your busy day. Located just off Interstate 26 and highways 301 and 601, our hotel provides guests with a convenient starting point for the day, thanks to our free, hot breakfast served each morning with Belgian waffles, eggs, yogurt, fruit, and more. Here on business? Take advantage of our on-site meeting space and free high-speed internet access.At the Country Inn & Suites, we simplify travel with free on-site parking and laundry facilities. Maintain your fitness routine with a trip to the fitness center or laps in the indoor pool, and then walk to any of the nearby restaurants for lunch or dinner. If you’re in town for work, we offer easy access to the Regional Medical Center and other local businesses. Find home comforts at our Country Inn & Suites, where each room features plush bedding, HBO access, and free Wi-Fi. Relax each morning with a cup of coffee and a free weekday newspaper before heading to the dining area for our free, hot breakfast. Traveling with the family? Upgrade your room to a one- or two-bedroom suite and don’t forget to make use of the microwave and fridge for preparing and storing snacks. Regardless of which room you choose, kids under 18 stay free with an adult. Our Country Inn & Suites is the ideal venue for hosting business meetings and events for up to 80 guests. Free high-speed internet access, a DVD player, and a TV make the perfect combination for any presentation. If you need to make last-minute touches to your speech, the business center is open 24 hours a day. Explore the great outdoors at Lake Marion, tee off at Hillcrest Golf Course, or meander through the Edisto Memorial Gardens. If you’re in town for a college tour, our Country Inn & Suites is located near both SC State and Claflin University. Check out these popular attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rock Hill, SC
description: Conveniently located off I-77, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rock Hill, SC provides an ideal home base for both families and business travelers visiting the area. Take your kids to Carowinds, about 11 miles from the hotel, or make the 30-minute drive to Charlotte and catch a Panthers game at Bank of America Stadium. Family members of Winthrop University students appreciate our location just two miles from the school. While you’re here, don't forget to explore downtown Rock Hill, Fort Mill/Tega Cay, Baxter Village, and the Riverwalk.Back at the hotel, you can enjoy a free, hot breakfast each morning before unwinding in your comfortable room each evening. Upload photos of your day at Carowinds using free Wi-Fi, or head to the business center to print or fax documents if you need to stay productive. After a busy day touring Winthrop University or riding coasters at Carowinds, sink into a plush bed in your room or suite while you watch a movie on the flat-screen TV with HBO. A microwave and refrigerator let you enjoy snacks and drinks in the comfort of your room. Looking for a place to gather your group? The Country Inn & Suites has a well-equipped meeting room for up to 20 guests. If you’re planning a wedding or other large event, our hotel is close to several popular venues, including the Hood Center and Brakefield at Riverwalk. Meeting delegates also appreciate our location near Charlotte and proximity to Winthrop University and area businesses. Whether you’re looking for sporting events or historical attractions, the Rock Hill area has something for everyone. Make plans to attend experiences like the Come-See-Me Festival, the St. Patrick’s Day on Main Festival, and ChristmasVille if you’re in town while they’re happening. You can also visit the site of a Revolutionary War battlefield at Historic Brattonsville or check out these favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Summerville, SC
description: Located off I-26, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Summerville, SC places guests less than 10 minutes from Charleston Southern University and 30 minutes from historic downtown Charleston, home to the exciting South Carolina Aquarium and beautiful Waterfront Park. Explore the historical plantations and charming boutiques near the hotel, or drive less than an hour to reach white-sand beaches along the Atlantic.You can start every day of your stay with our free, hot breakfast, and corporate guests can work with ease thanks to our business center, copy services, and free internet access. After work or a day of sightseeing, relax by the pool or hit the fitness center for an invigorating jog on the treadmill. Traveling with a furry friend? We’re pet friendly!Please call the hotel directly about our cash policy. Our large rooms and suites provide plenty of space for the whole family as well as free internet access, microwaves, and refrigerators. You can also request cribs and rollaways for your children. Amenities like a coffeemaker and TV with HBO help you feel right at home. Need a comfortable and convenient place to host an event near Chucktown? Reserve our conference room at the Country Inn & Suites, located just off I-26 in Summerville. Our meeting space accommodates up to 65 guests and is ideal for hosting seminars, business meetings, and small receptions. The room also includes a bar area and supports a variety of audiovisual equipment to ensure a successful and memorable event. Stay just 30 minutes from historic Charleston, where you can sit on the swings at Waterfront Park, shop on Market Street, or see the famous pastel-painted houses of Rainbow Row. Take the kids to the South Carolina Aquarium or browse the exhibits at The Charleston Museum. For entertainment closer to the hotel, check out downtown Summerville shops and bakeries. These destinations offer something for everyone:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Sumter, SC
description: Conveniently located off US 378 between I-20 and I-95, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Sumter, SC is just eight miles from Shaw Air Force Base and three miles from Swan Lake Iris Gardens. In town for a tennis tournament? You’ll appreciate the two-mile drive to the Palmetto Tennis Center. Our hotel proudly meets Sports Approved standards to support the needs of athletic teams. Other nearby hot spots in Sumter include the Sumter County Museum and Riley Park, where you can catch a baseball game or a concert.Take advantage of inviting hotel amenities such as an indoor pool and fitness center. We also offer a 24-hour business center for corporate guests needing Wi-Fi and printing services. If you need a boost to help you complete late-night projects, grab some complimentary coffee and cookies in the hotel lobby. Enjoy lots of space for the whole family in our spacious rooms and suites, equipped with comforting amenities like free Wi-Fi, fridges, and microwaves. Cribs and rollaway beds are also available on request. Our hotel is just a few miles from Sumter Mall and Sumter Gallery of Art, and you can also visit these popular sites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Brookings, SD
description: Located just six minutes from South Dakota State University (SDSU), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Brookings, SD provides the perfect home base for your Glacial Lakes adventures. After settling into your spacious hotel room or suite, take a romantic stroll or a family walk on the Dakota Nature Park trail just steps away from the hotel’s front entrance. If you're visiting your favorite student at SDSU, plan an educational visit to the South Dakota Art Museum or stop for a family photo op at the McCrory Gardens, both located on campus. Business travelers appreciate our proximity to the Swiftel Center and local businesses like Daktronics and 3M.After a day of business meetings or taking in the local sights, enjoy a relaxing soak in our hotel’s indoor pool and hot tub. If you need to put the finishing touches on a work presentation or catch up on your email, head to our 24-hour business center. Traveling with little ones? Plan a trip to the Children’s Museum of South Dakota or purchase tickets to an SDSU Jackrabbits game using free Wi-Fi. Begin your Glacial Lakes adventures in one of our 75 comfortable hotel rooms and suites. Heading to a tailgate at Dana J. Dykhouse Stadium? You can store your favorite beverages in the mini refrigerator and heat up snacks in the microwave before making your way to campus. In the morning, wake up to a fresh cup of coffee brewed with the in-room coffeemaker. Before heading to client meetings at nearby corporations like Daktronics or 3M, gather with your colleagues in our hotel’s intimate meeting space. Our stylish meeting room offers a boardroom-style setup with space for up to eight attendees. Your team can stay connected with free Wi-Fi, and our friendly staff will deliver refreshments upon request. From ice-skating rinks and water parks to history and art museums, a variety of entertainment options for business and leisure guests alike abound near our hotel. Don't miss these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dakota Dunes, SD
description: Conveniently located off I-29, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dakota Dunes, SD is only six miles from Sioux City. Visit Tyson Events Center for sporting events and concerts, or spend an evening at Hard Rock Casino. You can see a Broadway show at The Sioux City Orpheum, or pack your clubs for a day on the links at Two Rivers Golf Club, both within 10 minutes of our hotel.No matter what brings you to the Sioux City area, our hotel makes you feel welcome with amenities like a heated indoor pool, free Wi-Fi, and a fitness center. We also offer a business center for corporate guests who need fax and copier services to stay on top of work responsibilities. After a long day on the road, unwind in our spacious hotel rooms and suites. Relax in front of the flat-screen TV while you watch your favorite HBO shows. Enjoy convenient amenities like an in-room microwave and fridge, which make it easy to prepare snacks anytime of day. For a convenient meeting space off I-29, reserve our hotel conference room for up to 30 people. Our professional staff can assist with audiovisual needs, event planning, and setting up a personalized web page specifically for your gathering. We're just six miles from downtown Sioux City, where you'll find attractions like the LaunchPAD Children's Museum and the Sioux City Symphony Orchestra. Play a round of golf at Two Rivers Golf Club, less than a mile from our hotel. Don’t miss these local favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rapid City, SD
description: Just 20 minutes from Rapid City Regional Airport (RAP), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Rapid City, SD is a great launchpad for visiting Mount Rushmore and Badlands National Park. You can witness the stark, natural beauty of the Black Hills National Forest and nearby parks and monuments like Jewel Cave. Located off I-90, our family- and pet-friendly hotel is adjacent to Rushmore Mall and only a couple of miles from downtown shopping, dining, and attractions like The Journey Museum & Learning Center.When you check in, log on to free Wi-Fi and grab complimentary cookies and coffee in the lobby. Pack your swimsuits, because the kids won’t want to leave our indoor pool with a 100-foot waterslide. You can soak in one of two hot tubs while they swim. We offer a free, hot breakfast to fill you up before your adventure begins. Our family-friendly accommodations will make you feel at home while on vacation. If your family includes your dog, we offer pet-friendly options, too. Book a room with a mini fridge, a microwave, and free Wi-Fi. Upgrade to a suite for more space and amenities like an in-room whirlpool tub or a separate living room with a sleeper sofa. Ride a trolley through Rapid City with tour stops at Storybook Island children’s park and Sioux Park Formal Gardens. The Country Inn & Suites is conveniently located for you to visit nearby national parks and monuments, like Mount Rushmore. You can travel a little further to historic Deadwood. Make a plan to see these favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Sioux Falls, SD
description: Wake up to beautiful views of the Big Sioux River at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Sioux Falls, SD. Whether you’re here for business or leisure, our prime downtown location gives you easy access to both businesses and local attractions. Our position between I-29 and I-229 and just two miles from Sioux Falls Regional Airport (FSD) makes traveling to the hotel simple. If you want to explore or just need a break, interesting nearby attractions include everything from scenic walking and biking trails along the River Greenway to the Great Plains Zoo & Delbridge Museum of Natural History.Each morning, take advantage of our free, hot breakfast, including a grab-and-go option if you’re in a hurry. If you want to spend a day indoors at the hotel, our fitness center, heated indoor pool, and hot tub provide plenty of relaxing options. Whatever your daily itinerary, you can enjoy lunch or dinner along the riverfront at our on-site Falls Landing Restaurant. Whether you’re exploring the great outdoors or spending the day in a meeting room, our comfortable rooms and suites provide the perfect place to unwind. Use the in-room fridge and microwave to chill drinks and warm snacks while you keep up with friends using free Wi-Fi. When you’re ready to turn in, enjoy a great night’s sleep on comfortable down bedding. Many rooms also offer scenic views of the Big Sioux River. For a convenient meeting venue near the FSD airport, reserve our conference room with space for up to 40 guests. You and your attendees can enjoy lovely river views and free Wi-Fi. Let our professional staff assist you with details like audiovisual equipment, catering, and a customizable event website.                                     Want a relaxing meal after a long day of sightseeing in Sioux Falls? You can order room service to enjoy delicious dishes in the privacy of your room or suite.                                 For lunch or dinner, enjoy romantic riverfront dining on the deck of our on-site Falls Landing Restaurant. Overlook the water as you savor specialty burgers, sandwiches, wraps, and pizzas. Just step outside our back door to access the riverfront walking and cycling trail that leads to the stunning waterfalls of Falls Park. You can also tour award-winning outdoor art on SculptureWalk or visit the Butterfly House & Aquarium for educational fun. Don’t miss these popular local attractions: By car:Exit the airport, turning right onto N Minnesota Avenue. Drive a little over two miles and turn left onto E 6th Street. After half a mile, turn right onto N Weber Avenue. Drive for 0.2 miles and turn right onto E 8th Street. The hotel will be on your right shortly. By car:Take Exit 79 and turn right (from I-29 N) or left (from I-29 S) onto W 12th Street. Drive east for 1.6 miles, continuing onto W 11th Street. Take a slight left onto N Franklin Avenue and then take the first left onto E 8th Street. The hotel will be on your right in about 0.3 miles. By car:Take Exit 6 and turn right (from I-229 S) or left (from I-229 N) to drive westward on E 10th Street. Drive for 1.1 miles and turn right onto N Franklin Avenue.
