We offer free parking for guests who brought cars, and guests who didn’t can use our shuttle service to reach local hot spots within 10 miles of the hotel*. If you’re here for a corporate trip, catch up with work at the business center, or grab a drink at our on-site restaurant and lounge.*Shuttle service is subject to availability. After a busy day of airport travel, drop your bags in one of our 150 rooms and suites, and unwind on plush bedding while you surf the web with free Wi-Fi. If you’re hungry, use the microwave and refrigerator to prepare a snack while you watch your favorite show on the 55-inch flat-screen TV. Reserve one of our conference rooms at the Radisson hotel and enjoy next-door access to McAllen International Airport. Three breakout rooms can be used for small gatherings or combined into a space large enough for 300 attendees. We also provide audiovisual equipment, catering services, and planning assistance from our knowledgeable staff.                                     Take advantage of room service for a quiet meal in the comfort of your hotel room or suite.                                 Our on-site restaurant and lounge provides a complimentary breakfast buffet each morning and eclectic international cuisine for lunch and dinner. Stop by during happy hour for discounted drinks and complimentary appetizers. We also offer a convenient sundry shop with snacks and cold beverages. Whether you're here for business or a family getaway, you won't want to miss the many attractions just minutes from our hotel. Take your kids to the National Butterfly Center or the International Museum of Art & Science for a fun-filled day of learning. If shopping is on your agenda, you can walk to La Plaza Mall or drive 30 minutes to the Rio Grande Valley Premium Outlets. Check out these popular destinations:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Midland, TX
description: Located just off I-20, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Midland, TX gives guests easy access to Midland International Air & Space Port (MAF), the impressive Petroleum Museum, and downtown destinations like Midland College. If you’re traveling between Fort Worth and El Paso, our hotel offers the perfect place to take a break with amenities like a sparkling outdoor pool and a hot tub.Guests can enjoy our complimentary, hot breakfast as well as in-room conveniences such as a refrigerator and microwave. Traveling for business? Put the finishing touches on your presentations in our business center, and check email with our free high-speed internet access. Unwind before an important meeting in our on-site event venue with a workout in the fitness center or a quick scan of the free weekday newspaper. Whether you’re here for business or pleasure, you can unwind in our comfortable rooms and stay connected with our free Wi-Fi. In Midland with family? Let the kids burn off some energy at nearby Beal Park, and then return to watch your favorite shows on the flat-screen TV. If you’re here on business, grab a beverage from the fridge and make a snack in the microwave before sitting down at the work desk to focus. Celebrate with family or schedule a training session for up to 25 people at our comfortable meeting space with free Wi-Fi. Our friendly staff can help you plan every detail of your event, and we provide special group rates if your guests need to stay overnight. Whether you’re in town for a corporate conference, a family getaway, or a quick stop off I-20, be sure to check out Midland’s varied attractions before you hit the road. Enjoy everything from presidential and local history to nature trails and the arts.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, New Braunfels, TX
description: Stay in the heart of Texas Hill Country at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, New Braunfels, TX. Destinations like the Guadalupe River and the Gruene Historic District give this area its charm, while modern corporations like GE, Tyson, and Philips make it a convenient meeting point for business travelers. Families enjoy local hits like the Schlitterbahn Waterpark and Natural Bridge Caverns near our hotel.Start your morning with our free, hot breakfast before splashing around the outdoor pool. You can get an energizing workout in the fitness center or relax by the outdoor firepit. When you need to be productive, our business center provides computer and printing services. We also offer free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Each of our 74 rooms features free Wi-Fi to keep you connected with work or family, and the flat-screen TV offers entertainment at the end of a long day. An in-room microwave and fridge make it easy to keep your kids’ favorite snacks on hand, and you can brew a fresh cup of coffee at any hour. Reserve a studio suite so you have a sleeper sofa and extra space to stretch out. Our 755-square-foot meeting space accommodates up to 60 people, and our convenient location just off I-35 makes us easy to find. Connect to free Wi-Fi during the gathering, and rent audiovisual equipment for an impactful presentation. We also offer a variety of beverage and snack packages. While we offer easy access to major businesses like GE, Shell, and Caterpillar, leisure attractions are easily accessible, too. Sample wines at Dry Comal Creek Vineyards before going out for shopping and dining in Gruene Historic District. Explore the beautiful outdoors with a ski trip to Texas Ski Ranch or fishing outing at Canyon Lake. Visit these nearby hot spots:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Portland, TX
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Portland, TX offers the perfect blend of comfort and convenience just minutes from Corpus Christi attractions like the Texas State Aquarium, the USS Lexington, and the Corpus Christi Museum of Science and History. Spend an afternoon fishing for tarpon and redfish at Sunset Lake Park, just two miles away from the hotel, or at Indian Point Pier, less than five miles away. Sports enthusiasts love cheering on the Corpus Christi Hooks at Whataburger Field and catching the greyhound races at the Corpus Christi Dog Track.Soak up the sun with a dip in the outdoor pool, or stay on top of your workouts in the on-site fitness center. If you’re traveling for work, check in with the office at our well-equipped business center. When you're ready to relax, retreat to your room to watch HBO or to hop online using free high-speed internet access. Kick off your shoes and unwind in your spacious hotel room in Portland, TX. Take advantage of an in-room microwave and refrigerator to heat up leftovers and enjoy your favorite beverages on the road. Plan your next day’s adventures using free Wi-Fi. Portland is situated on a nearly 40-foot bluff that overlooks Corpus Christi Bay, making this charming city ideal for fishing, boating, and outdoor fun. Take the free ferry to check out the art galleries, the beach, and the nightlife at Port Aransas, or drive nine miles south on US 181 to reach Whataburger Field, home of the Corpus Christi Hooks baseball team. Don't miss these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Round Rock, TX
description: Situated just off I-35, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Round Rock, TX gives you access to the Greater Austin area while providing a quiet atmosphere outside the bustle of the city. If you’re here for a tournament, our hotel is located in the Sports Capital of Texas, home to Dell Diamond, Dragon Stadium, and Round Rock Sports Center. We’re also close to IKEA and attractions like Sixth Street in downtown Austin.After a game or a day of meetings, you can relax in our outdoor pool, nosh on free cookies in the lobby, and plan your next day’s itinerary with free Wi-Fi. Stretch out your muscles with a jog in the fitness center or a few laps in the pool. Before heading out to your event, you can fill up at our free, hot breakfast, and if you need to double-check your schedule, drop by our business center to use the computer. Whether you’re in Round Rock to watch a baseball game or visit Austin, our guest rooms and suites leave you well rested for the day ahead. Keep drinks handy in the fridge as you relax before bed, and wake up every morning with a fresh cup of coffee. Plan a session with your team or a rehearsal dinner before your wedding at the Country Inn & Suites, which offers a flexible meeting space for up to 50 people. Amenities include free Wi-Fi, catering, and audiovisual equipment rentals. We are also happy to create a personalized event web page that includes everything your guests need to know. From golf courses that roll over the Texas Hill Country to waterslide fun at the Rock’N River Water Park, Round Rock has something for everyone. Our location within a couple miles of the Round Rock Sports Center makes it easy for families to get to their events on time. Check out these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lackland AFB (San Antonio), TX
description: Located just off US-90, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lackland AFB (San Antonio), TX welcomes you with amenities like free cookies in our fireplace lobby and a well-equipped fitness center. Only minutes from the Air Force base, our hotel is also near Minor League Baseball’s Nelson Wolff Stadium. Business visitors appreciate our proximity to Port San Antonio, home to major aerospace and cybersecurity companies. Here with your family? Downtown San Antonio attractions like the River Walk and the Alamodome are less than 20 minutes away.Want to look your best before heading to the base? Use the iron included in your room or take advantage of our next-day dry cleaning service. If you need Lackland’s graduation schedule, check it out online in our business center or ask for it at the front desk. Before you leave for the big event, take advantage of our free, hot breakfast. After the graduation ceremony, you can cool off in the hotel’s outdoor pool or enjoy a relaxing soak in the hot tub before heading into the city to celebrate. After a long drive, unwind in one of our comfortable rooms with free high-speed internet access. Stock the in-room fridge with your favorite beverages and snacks to heat up in the microwave. Once you’ve settled in, kick back in front of the TV to watch a premium-channel movie. If you’re in town for an extended stay, consider booking a suite for a kitchenette and extra seating. Celebrate with your Air Force graduate at the Country Inn & Suites, which offers a flexible, 1,500-square-foot event space. Suitable for receptions, training sessions, and more, our meeting room can be configured in several ways and seats up to 80 guests. Our professional staff can assist you with planning and audiovisual equipment. Be sure to ask about the hotel’s military discount when you make a reservation. Here to attend the Lackland graduation parade? Our convenient location less than 20 minutes from downtown San Antonio makes it easy to explore the city before or after the main event. Remember the Alamo with a tour of the historic fort, or stroll along a section of the scenic River Walk. The 15-mile riverside park connects popular attractions like the famous Spanish Colonial missions and La Villita, a restored village filled with quaint restaurants and artisan shops. Visit these favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, San Antonio Medical Center, TX
description: Choose the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, San Antonio Medical Center, TX off I-10 for convenient access to top attractions like the San Antonio River Walk and Six Flags Fiesta Texas. Our hotel is also adjacent to the South Texas Medical Center and The University of Texas Health Science Center, so appointments or business meetings are easy to get to.After a long flight or busy schedule, you can unwind with a dip in the outdoor pool, work out in the fitness center, or relax with an HBO movie in your room. Whether you need to print out a business report or tickets to SeaWorld, stop by the business center to use our copy and printing services. If you need a late-night snack, visit the Inn Case Market, open 24 hours. Spacious and inviting, our 97 rooms and suites offer HDTVs with premium channels like HBO and refrigerators for storing your favorite beverages. With free Wi-Fi, you can easily share photos of your day at The Alamo or the San Antonio Zoo with family and friends. Lead a business meeting or host a social event for up to 25 people in our meeting space at the Country Inn & Suites. To ensure your event unfolds seamlessly, take advantage of audiovisual equipment rentals and enjoy access to our business center to copy and print handouts. Our hotel near the San Antonio Medical Center is surrounded by numerous attractions, from the 4D adventure ride at the 750-foot Tower of the Americas to the famous battle site at The Alamo. Visit these great attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, San Marcos, TX
description: Situated off I-35, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, San Marcos, TX is the perfect home base for exploring Central Texas. Our hotel's convenient location puts you near great shopping at the Tanger and Premium outlet malls, and you can easily reach antique stores and specialty shops in the Gruene Historic District. Kids love a day of thrills and spills at Schlitterbahn Waterpark or floating down the San Marcos River with an inner tube from Lions Club Tube Rental. In town to show your Bobcat pride? Texas State University is just a four-mile drive away.When you’re ready to unwind after a long drive or a game at Bobcat Stadium, take a dip in our heated indoor pool. Afterward, you can relax in your room while you plan your next day’s adventure using our free high-speed internet access. If you need to print out tickets for the big game, head to our business center. After a day of shopping and sightseeing, you’ll find a comfortable retreat in one of our spacious rooms or suites. Wake up to a fresh cup of joe brewed with the in-room coffeemaker, and catch up on headlines with a free weekday newspaper. Host your next graduation celebration, birthday party, or business conference for up to 40 guests in our flexible meeting room. Take advantage of free high-speed internet access and audiovisual equipment to ensure your presentation is a success. Our staff can help you with all the details and create a personalized webpage to keep your guests informed. Contact the hotel to ask about our special packages for meetings and other events. Located halfway between San Antonio and Austin on I-35, San Marcos makes an ideal base for exploring Central Texas. Whether you're here for graduation at Texas State University or a family getaway, be sure to check out such area attractions as the family-friendly Wonder World Park, the historic LBJ Museum, and San Marcos Premium Outlets, where you’ll find more than 145 stores.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, The Woodlands
description: Make yourself at home at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, The Woodlands, located north of Houston, TX and close to I-45. Surrounded by lush forests, our hotel lies minutes from the expansive Portofino Shopping Center and The Cynthia Woods Mitchell Pavilion, an amphitheater that hosts symphony performances and concerts by popular artists. When you’re ready to unwind, escape to your hotel suite with free Wi-Fi and a 50-inch flat-screen TV.Come morning, you can sit down to a free, hot breakfast of waffles, sausage, and oatmeal before a business meeting in Houston or a day of racing down waterslides at Six Flags Hurricane Harbor Splashtown. If you won’t have time to make it to the water park, don’t miss our outdoor pool and hot tub. To ensure you feel right at home, each of our 64 suites comes equipped with a sleeper sofa and a 50-inch flat-screen TV. Use the mini refrigerator and microwave to prepare snacks for movie night, or take advantage of free Wi-Fi to stream your favorite music to your laptop. Our hotel provides a peaceful, wooded setting for business meetings without sacrificing easy access to George Bush Intercontinental Airport (IAH) and the ExxonMobil Houston campus. Reserve our 231-square-foot boardroom for corporate gatherings of up to 20 people. With amenities like a 55-inch TV and free high-speed internet, you can keep attendees engaged while you present. Situated in the city of Shenandoah near the beautiful community of The Woodlands, our Country Inn & Suites hotel puts you close to attractions like concerts at The Cynthia Woods Mitchell Pavilion. Rent a kayak at Riva Row Boat House, or take your kids to the Aesop's Fables-themed labyrinth in Town Green Park. Don’t miss these family-friendly attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Temple, TX
description: Located off I-35 and US 190, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Temple, TX welcomes you to our convenient location. We're just steps away from Baylor Scott & White Medical Center, one of the top healthcare facilities in the country. You’ll be close to the VA Hospital as well as Temple College, while a quick trip down I-35 takes you to the University of Mary Hardin-Baylor, the Bell County Expo Center, and Fort Hood. If you’re here for leisure, our hotel is also close to family-friendly entertainment such as the Temple Railroad and Heritage Museum or Summer Fun Waterpark.We offer free Wi-Fi so you can stay connected with family and work or make plans to visit area attractions. After a long day, relax in the hotel’s indoor pool or lounge in the Texas sun on the patio. Enjoy an energizing start to your day with a jog in the fitness center before heading to our free, hot breakfast, which is available to all our guests every morning. Ready for some R&R after a college tour? You’ll find a comfortable retreat in one of our guest rooms or suites. Browse your favorite sites with free Wi-Fi or stay up to date on your favorite TV shows before you get a good night’s rest. The next morning, wake up with a fresh cup of coffee brewed in your room. Whether you’re in the area to visit Baylor Scott & White Medical Center, tour Temple College, or attend a graduation at Fort Hood, find some time to have fun in Temple. You can take an afternoon to go boating or hiking at Stillhouse Hollow Lake and its surroundings. Or drop by the Temple Railroad and Heritage Museum to learn about how the railroad affected local and national history. Don’t miss these local attractions while you’re here:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Texarkana, TX
description: Only 10 minutes from Texarkana Regional Airport (TXK) and positioned off Interstate 30, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Texarkana, TX is easy to find and convenient to the area's top attractions. Our hotel guests enjoy staying just four miles from downtown, which is home to Discovery Place, the Perot Theatre, and the Ace of Clubs House.In addition to a great location close to local restaurants, our hotel offers a free, hot breakfast and an indoor heated pool, both a favorite for families with kids. Travelers can take advantage of free Wi-Fi and a business center to wrap up work. Stay in shape while on the road with the help of our fitness center, which offers a multi-gym and cardiovascular machines. Enjoy plenty of space for the whole family in our rooms and suites, which are furnished with comfortable bedding and handy appliances. We even have cribs for your little ones if needed. Make snacks for your whole family with the microwave and fridge before settling in for a movie night on the cable TV. We also offer spacious one-bedroom suites with separate living rooms and sleeper sofas. For a convenient meeting space near the TXK airport, reserve our flexible event venue for up to 40 guests. Attendees can connect to free Wi-Fi and participate in powerful presentations with the help of our audiovisual equipment. Our professional staff is happy to assist with details such as off-site catering recommendations. Make your trip more efficient by booking our conveniently situated hotel, located just four miles from Texas A&M University-Texarkana and the businesses of downtown. Take your kids for a playdate at Discovery Place before attending a rodeo at Four States Fair & Rodeo. Be sure to explore these popular attractions while visiting the Four States area:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bountiful, UT
description: Located off I-15, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Bountiful, UT offers an affordable and convenient home base just 10 miles north of Salt Lake City. Attend an expo at the nearby Salt Palace Convention Center, see a show at Vivint Smart Home Arena, or simply relax at the hotel after your flight into Salt Lake City International Airport (SLC), just 15 miles away.After a day at nearby attractions such as the Lagoon amusement park, treat your family to a relaxing dip in our indoor pool. Before dinner, squeeze in a workout at our on-site fitness center or a soak in our hot tub. We also offer laundry facilities, which come in handy after a fun-filled day at the Great Salt Lake. Equipped for your comfort and convenience, our spacious room and suites include kitchen appliances and satellite TV channels. Watch your favorite show while sipping a cup of hot coffee and snacking on goodies stored in your in-room fridge. If you need them, cribs or rollaway beds are available upon request. For a convenient meeting space about 14 miles from the SLC airport, reserve our conference room. With space for up to 88 attendees, our facilities handle business and social gatherings with ease. Ask our professional staff for help with audiovisual equipment and catering recommendations to make your event more memorable. Tee off at three golf courses within a five-mile radius of the hotel, or enjoy world-class shopping at The Gateway and City Creek Center. Here with your kids? Have a great time at attractions like Cherry Hill water park and Boondocks Food & Fun. Don’t miss these other attractions:

name: Park Inn by Radisson Salt Lake City-Midvale
description: Boasting spectacular mountain views, the Park Inn by Radisson Salt Lake City-Midvale provides adventure seekers with an ideal home base halfway between the Great Salt Lake and Utah Lake. Our location is within walking distance of the TRAX station, which provides easy commutes to downtown Salt Lake City, home to popular attractions like Temple Square, the Capitol Theatre, and a variety of restaurants and shopping. Outdoor enthusiasts especially appreciate our location across the street from a local ski shuttle that can take you to popular ski resorts within 40 minutes of the hotel.Fuel your daily activities with a free breakfast in our dining room each morning, and then soothe your muscles in the hot tub after a day on the slopes at Alta Ski Area or Park City Mountain Resort. For even more relaxation, schedule a rejuvenating treatment at our on-site spa. We’re also proud to offer free parking for all guests and pet-friendly accommodations for a fee of just $20 per night. After scoring some new ski gear at City Creek Center, kick back in a hotel room or suite with home comforts like free Wi-Fi, a fridge, and a rain shower. Brew a fresh cup of coffee using the in-room facilities before you head out on your next adventure. Let the Park Inn in Midvale be your recharging station as you explore popular sites like Wheeler Historic Farm and Temple Square. No visit to downtown Salt Lake City is complete without a visit to the Capitol Theatre, which hosts musicals, concerts, and ballets throughout the year. If you’re traveling for work, we’re only 13 minutes from the Salt Palace Convention Center. Don’t miss these top attractions: By bus:Take the Salt Lake bus towards St. George, UT and exit at the Midvale bus stop. The hotel is straight ahead.By car:Drive about 30 minutes to reach the SLC airport, only 16 miles away from the hotel. By train:Take train number 701 towards Draper. Exit at Midvale Fort Union Station. The hotel is one block from the station.

name: Radisson Hotel Salt Lake City Airport
description: Radisson Hotel Salt Lake City Airport provides comfort and convenience about three miles from Salt Lake City International Airport (SLC). Whether you’re flying in for vacation, business travel, or a sporting event, you can ride the free 24-hour airport shuttle to and from our hotel. XPO Logistics, Inc. and other corporate offices are right down the road, and when you’re ready to visit downtown attractions like Temple Square and the Capitol Theatre, the TRAX light rail station is about a five-minute walk away. We also offer free on-site parking in case you’re renting a car during your stay.Before or after your flight, take a refreshing dip in our outdoor pool. The Radisson makes scheduling easy with 24-hour services like fitness and business centers, plus free Wi-Fi and 3-Hour Express Laundry service to freshen up your clothes. Tired from your flight? Stretch out on a plush pillowtop mattress in one of our 125 rooms and suites and catch up on your favorite show on DirecTV. You’ll find everything you need for a comfortable stay, including complimentary bottled water, free Wi-Fi, and a microwave to warm up snacks. One of the city’s most popular spots for groups, the Radisson offers discounted room rates through the Motorcoach Program. Here for a conference? The hotel also provides convenient services like a free airport and convention center shuttle for corporate travelers who are flying in for meetings. With on-site catering, free parking, and two meeting spaces that accommodate up to 65 guests, our hotel is sure to leave a great impression on your event attendees.                                     For a quiet night in, order a delicious meal right to your door via room service.                                 The Sapphire Grill is your dining destination at the Radisson. Whether you sit down for the breakfast buffet, a casual lunch, or a dinner reservation, our chef’s signature takes on American classics appeal to both the eye and the appetite. Save room for a specialty dessert after your surf-and-turf entrée, or relax in the lounge as you sip a cocktail from the bar. Monday through Friday evenings, you can mingle at our Manager’s Social. With a TRAX light rail station about a five-minute walk from the hotel, you can skip the rental car and zip into downtown Salt Lake City in less than 30 minutes. Stroll around Temple Square to see the striking, six-spired Salt Lake Temple, and then hit the shops or catch a big-name concert at the Vivint Smart Home Arena. Family favorites like the Discovery Gateway Children’s Museum are also close by. Check out these popular area attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Salt Lake City Downtown
description: When business brings you to Utah’s capital, Radisson Hotel Salt Lake City Downtown puts you within walking distance of meeting venues and transportation options. The Salt Palace Convention Center, host to dozens of conferences and expos throughout the year, is conveniently situated just across the street. Walk half a block to enjoy the beautiful grounds at Temple Square, or spend some time shopping at the high-end retailers at City Creek Center. The Eccles Theater offers Broadway shows, ballet performances, and musical entertainment just a brief walk from the hotel. For easy access to the expanse of Salt Lake City, take the light rail via the Vivint Smart Home Arena TRAX station, a few steps from our front door.Fuel your stay with your favorite Starbucks® coffee and gourmet drinks from Coffee and News, our coffee and gift shop in the lobby. Our on-site restaurant offers delicious dining, drinks in the tavern, and room service 24 hours a day. Go for a refreshing dip in our renovated heated indoor pool and hot tub. You can find everything you need for your cardio and weightlifting needs in our expansive fitness center. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel, and we also offer covered parking for our guests. The following certification shows our hotel's commitment to guests' safety. For more information, visit Safehotels Certification. Our 381 hotel rooms and suites are designed for maximum comfort, boasting plush beds and free Wi-Fi. Take in beautiful views of the mountains or skyline as you sip a cup of coffee before heading out to attend a tradeshow or explore the city. Upgrade your room and enjoy upper-floor vistas or Business Class perks like free breakfast. Suites provide additional space and privacy. Host an annual meeting, training seminar, wedding reception, or product launch in the flexible event space at our hotel with audiovisual equipment and free Wi-Fi. Thanks to on-site catering, you can arrange to have small plates and hors d’oeuvres or a delicious banquet spread. Our outstanding planning team and Yes I Can! attitude ensure you have everything you need to host an elegant, stress-free event. Sit down to a meal at our casual on-site restaurant, Copper Canyon Grill House & Tavern, which serves American cuisine prepared with fresh, local ingredients. You can start your day with a hearty breakfast buffet and then meet friends for a cocktail or two in the evening. If you need a caffeine fix, stop by Coffee and News and enjoy a fresh cup of coffee or your favorite Starbucks® drink. Centrally located in downtown Salt Lake City, our hotel is situated near sports and music entertainment at Vivint Smart Home Arena and is just a short walk from the Salt Palace Convention Center. You’re also within walking distance of transportation via the TRAX light rail, providing convenient access to additional capital city destinations. Don’t miss these local favorites: By car:Get on I-80 E from Crossbar Road and Terminal Drive. Head northeast on Terminal Drive. Take a slight right toward N 3700 W and then a slight right toward N 3700 W. Keep left to continue toward N 3700 W. Turn right onto N 3700 W. Take a slight right toward Crossbar Road. Continue onto Crossbar Road, and then merge onto Terminal Drive. Take the I-80 E ramp on the left to City Center/Ogden/Provo. Keep left at the fork, follow signs for I-80 E, and merge onto I-80 E. Continue on I-80 E to W 100 S/Karl Malone Drive. Merge onto I-80 E, and take exit 121 for 600 S. Continue onto W 600 S. Turn left onto S 300 W. Turn right onto South Temple, and the Radisson will be on the right.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, West Valley City, UT
description: Conveniently located off I-215, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, West Valley City, UT is just 15 minutes from Salt Lake City International Airport (SLC) and downtown Salt Lake City. Our hotel offers affordable accommodations plus quick access to hot spots like the USANA Amphitheatre and the Maverik Center, home of the Utah Grizzlies. Play a round of golf at Stonebridge Golf Club or shop and then have lunch at Valley Fair Mall.Ease the stress of a long day of meetings with a session in our hot tub or relax in front of the lobby fireplace with a complimentary cup of coffee. We also offer laundry facilities, which come in handy after a fun-filled day of swimming in the Great Salt Lake. In the morning, join us for a free, hot breakfast before riding the complimentary shuttle to your next destination. Enjoy space for the entire family, including your four-legged family members, in our newly updated rooms and suites, which feature new carpet and window shades. Unwind with an array of amenities like free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. When you’re ready to fall asleep, sink into the plush bed. Wake up to a fresh cup of coffee from the in-room coffeemaker to get your day started. For a convenient venue off the I-215 belt route and 15 minutes from the SLC airport, reserve our meeting room for up to 60 attendees. With 950 square feet of space, our conference room can accommodate a variety of setups, and our professional staff can assist with details such as audiovisual equipment and room reservations. For lunch and dinner, there are several dining options within walking distance such as Cracker Barrel, Applebee's, or Kowloon Café. You can also play golf on one of several nearby courses, watch motorsports at Rocky Mountain Raceways, and shop name brands at Valley Fair Mall. Hop aboard our free hotel shuttle to catch your flight at the SLC airport or visit area destinations such as:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Abingdon, VA
description: Located at the intersection of I-81 and US-11, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Abingdon, VA is a smart hotel choice for leisure and business travelers. Whether you’re here to hike, bike, or walk the Virginia Creeper Trail or to call on local businesses, our hotel puts you within easy reach of your destination. If you’re visiting southern Virginia on vacation, you won’t want to miss a chance to browse our local shops with a stroll along brick sidewalks in our historic downtown. You’ll also find a number of excellent restaurants and a vibrant fine art and crafts scene. Fans of NASCAR can catch a race at Bristol Motor Speedway, a 30-minute drive away.We invite you to start your day with our free, hot breakfast and then unwind with a swim in our seasonal outdoor pool. For a cardio workout, our guests have free access to the fitness center adjacent to the hotel. For a quick snack, stop by our lobby for a free cookie and coffee 24/7. Whether you spend your day hiking or calling on clients, our spacious rooms and suites are designed to help you relax. You’ll feel at home with plush bedding, an in-room coffeemaker, and a flat-screen TV with HBO. You can stay connected with our free Wi-Fi and up-to-date on the news with a free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper. Abingdon, a Virginia Historical Landmark, retains its small-town charm with brick sidewalks, tree-lined streets, and local shops, galleries, and museums. It’s also the gateway to the Virginia Creeper Trail for those interested in exploring our region. Experience the spectacle of NASCAR races at Bristol Motor Speedway or attend a performance by professional actors at The Barter Theatre. While you’re here, don’t miss these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Ashland - Hanover, VA
description: Pull off I-95 and enjoy a restful night's sleep at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Ashland - Hanover, VA. Known affectionately as "the center of the universe" for its central location in the state, Ashland offers you a convenient home base for your visit to Kings Dominion or other attractions in the region. Sports fans will appreciate our location near Richmond Raceway and Hanover Golf Club, while outdoor sporting enthusiasts will love being minutes from Bass Pro Shops and Green Top. Take a short drive from our hotel for great shopping at Short Pump Town Center before seeing a professional theater performance at Hanover Tavern.Unwind after a day of exploring the Ashland area with a relaxing soak in our indoor pool or hot tub. You can keep friends and family up to date on your adventures with free high-speed internet access. In the morning, wake up to a free, hot breakfast and indulge in selections like fluffy waffles, fresh eggs, and more. After a long day of travel, unwind in one of our spacious rooms or suites on a Serta Elite® pillowtop mattress while you watch a movie on the flat-screen TV. Convenient amenities like an in-room microwave and refrigerator allow you to enjoy your favorite snacks and beverages while traveling. Brew a fresh cup of coffee any time of day with access to a coffeemaker. Host up to 40 guests in our meeting room, perfect for corporate events, team meetings, or family gatherings. Our location off I-95 provides easy access for all your guests, and our meeting room can be configured four different ways depending on your needs. Enjoy free Wi-Fi, audiovisual equipment, and planning assistance to help you host a successful meeting or social event in Ashland. Ashland provides a relaxing escape roughly 15 miles from the bustling city of Richmond. While in town, visit Hanover Tavern for live performances or play a round of golf at Hanover Golf Club. For those traveling with children, be sure to make a trip to Kings Dominion or the Science Museum of Virginia. Don’t miss these other attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Charlottesville-UVA, VA
description: Less than two miles from the University of Virginia and within easy reach of the Blue Ridge Parkway and Shenandoah National Park, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Charlottesville-UVA, VA offers a comfortable home base for business and leisure guests alike. Our hotel is located just off US Routes 29 and 250, mere minutes from restaurants, shops, and entertainment at Charlottesville’s Historic Downtown Mall and The Shops at Stonefield. Here to cheer on a UVA football or basketball team? Cavaliers fans appreciate our proximity to Scott Stadium and John Paul Jones Arena.End a fun-filled day around the hotel’s outdoor fire pit or with a swim in our indoor pool. Need a quick snack? Grab a free cookie from the lobby or pick something up from our on-site Inn Case Market. If you’re traveling on company time, you can stay in touch with the office using free Wi-Fi in our business center or back in your room. In the morning, hit one of the treadmills or exercise bikes in our fitness center before swinging by our free, hot breakfast for an energizing start to the day. Each of our 87 contemporary rooms and suites includes amenities like a 50-inch flat-screen TV, so you can stretch out on your plush bed and drift to sleep watching an HBO movie. In the morning, peruse the free daily newspaper while coffee brews in the in-room machine. A microwave and a fridge make it easy to prepare snacks after touring historic sites like Monticello and Montpelier. Planning a reunion, client meeting, or training session near UVA? Book our 700-square-foot Jefferson Meeting Room. Take advantage of free Wi-Fi and audiovisual rentals for impressive presentations. Our hotel is less than seven miles from Charlottesville Albemarle Airport (CHO) and just three miles from downtown Charlottesville, making the Country Inn & Suites an ideal spot for local or fly-in guests attending your event. Create the perfect weekend getaway in this charming city situated in the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains. Shop at brand-name stores, take a winery tour, or go for a scenic drive on the Blue Ridge Parkway. You can spend a day touring the University of Virginia campus and watching the Cavaliers play at Scott Stadium. Kids love the hands-on exhibits at the Virginia Discovery Museum. Exciting nearby attractions include: By car:From the airport, head east on State Route 606. Turn right onto Towncenter Drive, and continue straight after the traffic circle. Turn right onto US-29 and drive approximately five miles before exiting on Angus Road. Take a left, an immediate right, and then another left to reach the hotel.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Chester, VA
description: Conveniently located off I-95, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Chester, VA places you only 10 minutes from the Dutch Gap Conservation Area and 20 minutes from Richmond International Airport (RIC). We're just 10 miles north of Fort Lee Army Base and near a host of historical attractions like Castlewood Plantation House and Magnolia Grange. In town on a college visit? Virginia State University, whose campus sits along the lovely Appomattox River, is about eight miles away from the hotel.To add to an appealing interstate location, we proudly offer welcoming amenities such as a heated indoor pool, a hot tub, and a fitness center. Upon your arrival, stop by the lobby for free cookies, coffee, and tea, available 24 hours a day. If you left anything at home during the chaos of packing up the family, we can help with a variety of items from our Did You Forget? Program. Additional amenities include a business center and laundry facilities. There's plenty of space for the whole family in our large rooms and suites, which each feature amenities like free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV with premium cable channels, and coffee facilities. A microwave and a refrigerator are also available so you can enjoy a snack any time of the day. Cribs and rollaway beds are available upon request. During your stay in Chester, make time to check out nearby historic landmarks such as Castlewood Plantation and Magnolia Grange. Fun things to do in the state capital of Richmond are also just 15 minutes north, and the beautiful campus of Virginia State University is a short drive from the hotel. Don't miss these nearby attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Doswell (Kings Dominion), VA
description: The thrilling rides of Kings Dominion are just a short walk across the street from the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Doswell (Kings Dominion), VA. Located north of Richmond and off I-95, our hotel offers easy access to shopping, restaurants, and even the state capital, which is less than half an hour away. After a day riding the roller coasters, be sure to check out the outdoor activities at The Meadow Event Park or Three Lakes Park and Nature Center. There’s also plenty to do at the hotel, such as swimming in the indoor pool and working out in the fitness center.Need a pick-me-up after a long drive? Enjoy free coffee and cookies in the hotel lobby. When you’re ready for your Kings Dominion adventure, you can purchase tickets at our front desk and then board our free shuttle, which runs from the hotel to the amusement park every 30 minutes. Enjoy plenty of space for the whole family in our rooms and suites, equipped with comfortable bedding and free Wi-Fi. After a restful night’s sleep, wake up to a fresh-brewed cup of coffee from the in-room coffeemaker, browse a free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper, and then head to our dining room for a free, hot breakfast, served daily. To make your Kings Dominion vacation more affordable, children 16 and under stay free with an adult. When you need a break from thrill rides, make the 30-minute drive to Richmond for a day of shopping at Short Pump Town Center or sightseeing at the Black History Museum and the Cultural Center of Virginia. Don’t miss these favorite attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Emporia, VA
description: Conveniently located off I-95, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Emporia, VA sits off Exit 11A on Route 58. Surrounded by shops, gas stations, and restaurants, our hotel makes an ideal stop for travelers passing through or in town for business. We are pet friendly and welcome your four-legged family members to stay.After a long drive, use the cardio machines in our fitness center to get your legs moving or let stress float away in our indoor pool. Grab some complimentary cookies to go with a coffee from our lobby, and then log on to free Wi-Fi to update family on your travel. Before you depart, enjoy a free, hot breakfast. Whether you’re traveling alone or with your family or group, you can rest easy in our large accommodations with handy appliances to simplify your stay, such as a microwave, a mini fridge, and a flat-screen TV. Upgrade to a suite for extras like a separate living room, a dining area, or a whirlpool tub. We also offer accessible rooms. For a convenient venue off I-95, reserve our 625-square-foot meeting room, which is suitable for a variety of gatherings and includes free high-speed internet access. Allow our friendly staff to assist with planning, setting up audiovisual equipment, and arranging catering options. If you’re in town for the Virginia Peanut Festival, our hotel is less than two miles from all the fun in downtown Emporia. You’ll also find Lake Gaston and the Southampton Motor Speedway less than an hour from our hotel. Check out these nearby attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fredericksburg South (I-95), VA
description: Book a room at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fredericksburg South (I-95), VA to be just minutes away from fascinating American history at spots like George Washington’s Ferry Farm, the Mary Washington House, and Historic Kenmore Plantation. Here with kids? You can take your family on a day trip to Kings Dominion or play miniature golf at Fun Land of Fredericksburg. Our hotel in Spotsylvania is conveniently located halfway between Richmond and Washington and gives you easy access to various shops and eateries right off I-95. Help yourself to cookies and a treat for your pet as you pass through our lobby, and then settle into your spacious room, which features a microwave, a refrigerator, and free Wi-Fi. In the morning, start your day with our free, hot breakfast. Take a break from sightseeing to let the kids splash in the indoor pool while you soak in the hot tub. You and your furry friend can curl up together and watch TV in one of our spacious rooms or suites. After a great night’s sleep on a comfortable bed, enjoy freshly brewed coffee or a cold drink from the fridge. Cribs and rollaway beds are available if you need them. Host a business meeting or social event with up to 170 guests in our flexible meeting space. Our dedicated staff can help make your gathering a success by offering free Wi-Fi, a personalized web page, and catering recommendations. An important site in Revolutionary War and Civil War history, Fredericksburg lies halfway between Richmond and Washington, DC. Our hotel is convenient to both I-95 and State Route 1 and offers easy access to historic sites, including Kenmore Mansion—the home of George Washington’s sister. You can visit the University of Mary Washington or take a cruise on the Rappahannock River.  Plan a trip to these nearby favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fredericksburg, VA
description: Close to I-95 and about eight miles from Stafford Regional Airport (RMN), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fredericksburg, VA provides an ideal base for exploring the city. Travelers enjoy easy access from our hotel to historic sites like Kenmore Plantation and Fredericksburg & Spotsylvania National Military Park, and prospective students can be on the University of Mary Washington campus in 15 minutes.Start your day off with our complimentary, hot breakfast before strolling through Old Town Fredericksburg, or unwind in our indoor pool and hot tub following an afternoon of touring UMW. Don’t forget to stop in the lobby and grab a free cookie and a cup of coffee on your way to and from sightseeing. If you need to devote some time to work, use our business center with complimentary faxing, copying, and printing services. After a day full of the city’s sights, you can return to your room or suite and watch HBO movies or post photos of your trip using free Wi-Fi. Pull out refreshing drinks from the fridge, heat up a meal in the microwave, or reenergize with a warm cup of coffee brewed in your room. Our meeting room can host baby showers, business meetings, and small parties of up to 45 people. The event space includes a 42-inch flat-screen TV for effective presentations and a wet bar area that's perfect for entertaining. Need catering recommendations? We’re happy to help! Cap off a day of sightseeing with dinner and a live performance at the Riverside Center Dinner Theater & Conference Facility, located less than a mile from our hotel. If you’re a history buff, don’t miss the James Monroe Museum and Memorial Library and George Washington’s Ferry Farm. Bringing the family? You’ll have a blast at Kings Dominion. Check out these attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Hampton, VA
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Hampton, VA makes it easy to take full advantage of the Hampton Roads region. Our convenient location affords quick access to the area's main points of interest, and both Hampton Coliseum and Hampton University are just a few minutes’ drive from the hotel. If you're here on vacation, you can reach Buckroe Beach in about 15 minutes and Busch Gardens Williamsburg in about 25 minutes.Add an extra level of relaxation to your getaway with a refreshing dip in our hotel’s heated indoor pool. Complimentary movie channels help keep kids entertained while they’re in the room, and you can surf the web with Wi-Fi while they’re watching TV. Need to burn off some excess energy? Go for a jog in our well-equipped fitness center. After a day spent discovering the various historic sites along the Colonial Parkway or tackling the rides at Busch Gardens, relax in your room or suite with a movie on the 32-inch TV. You can use free Wi-Fi to post photos of your day’s adventures or connect with family at home. Each room also has a fridge and a microwave in case you need to stock up on drinks and snacks for your kids. Hosting a meeting or a celebration in Hampton, VA? Our hotel’s versatile meeting space can accommodate up to 50 people for standing receptions or seated events. We can also help with audiovisual equipment and catering recommendations to make your event shine. Located about halfway between Colonial Williamsburg and Virginia Beach, our hotel is a prime home base for exploring the Hampton Roads region. Whether you’re into colonial history or mind-bending roller coasters, the Hampton, VA area has it all. Check out these points of interest during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Harrisonburg, VA
description: Conveniently located near James Madison University, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Harrisonburg, VA makes the perfect retreat for a comfortable night’s rest off I-81. Gear up for an afternoon of cheering on the Dukes, or head downtown to peruse the antique shops, only minutes away from the hotel. If you want to experience the natural beauty of the Shenandoah Valley, brave the deep caves at Endless Caverns or walk through the botanical gardens at the Edith J. Carrier Arboretum.Return from sightseeing and relax with a soak in the hot tub or a dip in our heated indoor pool. You can ease into the evening with a weekday newspaper or a movie. After a full night’s rest, wake up to a free, hot breakfast to fuel your travels. Feel right at home in your comfortable room or suite with a microwave for warming leftovers and a refrigerator for storing your favorite beverages. Curl up with a good book or watch a pay-per-view movie on the flat-screen TV. Explore Harrisonburg’s revitalized downtown district, home to the Virginia Quilt Museum and the Court Square Theater, which hosts independent films and musical acts. Take the family to enjoy interactive science exhibits at the Explore More Discovery Museum or spend an afternoon shopping together at Valley Mall. Check out these highlights:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dahlgren, VA
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dahlgren, VA is a top choice for visitors exploring the history and natural beauty of King George County or for meetings at the nearby Naval Surface Warfare Center. Our hotel, located just off Route 301 North, is within walking distance of Lockheed Martin and offers easy access to General Dynamics and the University of Mary Washington Dahlgren Campus. If you’re traveling for fun, don’t miss a visit to Oak Crest Vineyard & Winery for a taste and tour.If you’re in town for the celebrations of 300 years of history for King George county, you’ll find it easy to visit such nearby destinations as Caledon State Park and Dahlgren Heritage Museum. After a day of shopping or museum hopping, you can relax with a swim in the outdoor pool or a vigorous workout in the fitness center. For a quick snack, stop by our lobby for a fresh cup of coffee and a cookie or start your day with our free, hot breakfast. We invite you to celebrate family milestones or convene a business meeting in our 900-square-foot meeting room. Depending on the configuration you select, this event venue can host up to 75 guests. Whether you’re planning a board meeting or a family get-together, you can use the free Wi-Fi to share your presentation or brainstorm ideas on the whiteboard or a flip chart. Celebrating 300 years, King George County, where our hotel is located, offers visitors a wealth of historic and natural things to do. You can spot bald eagles in Caledon State Park, visit the birthplace of George Washington or Robert E. Lee, and sample Virginia wines at one of four wineries within a 30-mile radius of our hotel. Other enticing attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lexington, VA
description: Located in the heart of the Shenandoah Valley with convenient access to I-64 and I-81, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Lexington, VA is is a perfect starting point for exploring the area. Make the 14-mile trek from our hotel to the Natural Bridge of Virginia to visit the 34-story limestone bridge, or drive five minutes north to Hull's Drive-In Theatre to see an outdoor movie. Both Virginia Military Institute and Washington and Lee University are less than two miles away, making it easy to attend events or take tours.When you return to the hotel, let stress dissipate with a soothing soak in the hot tub while the kids play Marco Polo in the pool. Our on-site fitness center is also a great spot to burn energy, and a complimentary cookie from the lobby is the perfect post-workout treat. Want to share how proud you are of your college graduate? You can easily upload photos online using free Wi-Fi. When night falls, slip between the fresh linens on your comfortable bed knowing a free, hot breakfast awaits you in the morning. After an afternoon of exploring the Shenandoah Valley or touring local universities, kick back in one of our family-friendly rooms and suites with features like a microwave and refrigerator. During your trip to Lexington, take time to visit the shops, restaurants, and historic sites of the downtown area, just 10 minutes from our hotel. Make a visit to the Virginia Military Institute or Washington and Lee University to see family or take a tour of the campus. Don’t miss these top attractions during your visit:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Newport News South, VA
description: Enjoy the comfort and convenience of the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Newport News South, VA. With easy access to Route 17 and I-64, you can explore historic sites in nearby Jamestown, Williamsburg, and Yorktown or travel just 10 minutes to attend a concert at Hampton Coliseum. Located in the Hampton Roads area, our hotel serves as a convenient hub to discover the many sites in Newport News. We are also just a short drive from Busch Gardens Williamsburg and Water Country USA.You can start every day of your stay with our free, hot breakfast. Feel free to get a workout in at our fitness center with a treadmill, a bike, and an abdominal bench, or go for a swim in the pool for a refreshing way to stay in shape. When night falls, recharge in our rooms and suites with ESPN, HBO, and free Wi-Fi. Sleep comes easy in our rooms and suites that feature comfortable beds and warm décor. You can pack snacks and drinks since every room includes a microwave and refrigerator. Before you head out for the day, brew a fresh cup of coffee in your room while checking your itinerary using free our Wi-Fi. Need a venue for a family reunion, business seminar, or sports team meeting? Our 600-square-foot meeting room offers a flexible space for up to 50 guests. Free Wi-Fi, audiovisual equipment, and planning assistance are available to make your event a success. Delve into the exciting history of Newport News and its role during the American Revolutionary War and the Civil War by visiting area battle sites and museums like the Virginia War Museum. If shopping and restaurants are more your speed, check out Oyster Point close by the hotel. For family fun, don't miss these sites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Petersburg, VA
description: Steeped in history, Petersburg is a great place to explore Civil War battle sites and historical museums. Situated just off I-95, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Petersburg, VA provides an ideal home base during your stay. Located minutes from our hotel, The National Museum of the Civil War Soldier and Pamplin Historical Park provide a glimpse into life during the Civil War era. While in the area, tour the Berkeley Plantation or Petersburg National Battlefield before browsing the shops at Southpark Mall. For a day trip, travel about an hour to explore Colonial Williamsburg.Relax by the pool while the kids play Marco Polo in the sparkling water. Later, stop by the lobby to grab a free cookie and a coffee. In the mornings, start your day at our modern fitness center before enjoying our free, hot breakfast to fuel yourself for the day's adventures. After a day exploring Pamplin Historical park, relax in one of our spacious rooms or suites while watching ESPN or HBO on the plasma TV. In the morning, check your email using free Wi-Fi or browse the free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper. Make your next business meeting or social event a success when you host it at our hotel. Our meeting room accommodates up to 60 guests and features essential tools like free Wi-Fi, a plasma TV, and an 84-inch screen for presentations. Our friendly staff can even create a personalized web page for your event to keep guests informed. About 25 miles south of Richmond, Petersburg offers an in-depth look at Southern history with elegant mansions built in the 1700s and Civil War battle sites. Explore The National Museum of the Civil War Soldier or tour historical landmarks at Petersburg National Battlefield. Don't miss these other local favorites during your visit:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Richmond I-95 South, VA
description: Situated off I-95, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Richmond I-95 South, VA places you near the heart of Virginia's historic capital. Our hotel's convenient location, only 11 minutes from the bustle of downtown, provides easy access to popular attractions like the Metro Richmond Zoo and the Richmond Coliseum. You can stroll hand-in-hand with your loved one along the scenic James River, catch a live concert during the summer on Browns Island, or visit your favorite student at Virginia Commonwealth University, only 17 minutes from the hotel.Allow us to welcome you to Richmond with cookies and fresh coffee in the lobby, and ask our friendly staff for local dining recommendations at our 24-hour front desk. You can plan out your vacation itinerary using free Wi-Fi and keep every member of your family full with our free, hot breakfast. Bringing your four-legged friend along? Ask about our pet-friendly options. Each of our hotel rooms and suites provides the comforts of home with a microwave and refrigerator, making it easy to prepare late-night snacks and enjoy cold beverages. Need to stay energized to keep up with the kids? Brew a fresh cup of coffee with the in-room facilities. For an entertaining way to learn about Virginia's capital city, take a stroll along Richmond's Canal Walk, home to statues and educational exhibits. Winding just over a mile along the banks of the Haxall Canal and the James River, this walkway is open year-round. For indoor education, browse famous works at the Virginia Museum of Fine Arts, or take the kids to the Science Museum of Virginia. Don't miss these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Richmond West at I-64, VA
description: Receive a warm welcome at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Richmond West at I-64, VA, surrounded by the convenient shopping and dining of Henrico. You can take a tour of the Virginia Commonwealth University campus, less than 10 miles from the hotel, or cheer on the Spiders at the University of Richmond, 12 minutes away. Located in the northwest part of the city, our hotel makes it easy to hop on I-64 and get to the Richmond Raceway and the Greater Richmond Convention Center.Relax after a day of travel with a dip in the heated indoor pool or a soak in the hot tub. You can keep friends and family updated on your travels using our free Wi-Fi. Squeeze in a workout at our on-site fitness center, or catch up on work in the business center. In the morning, enjoy a breakfast full of items like fresh fruit, waffles, and cereal before heading out on your adventures. Feel at home with a refrigerator and microwave for storing and preparing your favorite beverages and snacks. You can brew a cup of coffee to enjoy while you watch a movie on the 32-inch flat-screen TV, or you can catch up on social media using our free high-speed internet access. Richmond, the historical capital of the Confederacy, is home to renowned Civil War museums where you can study the nation’s divided history. Check out various art museums to experience the city’s vibrant modern culture. Our hotel is an easy drive from The American Civil War Museum, the University of Richmond, and Virginia Commonwealth University. Don’t miss these other top attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Roanoke, VA
description: Whether you’re on a road trip or in the area for an extended stay, make the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Roanoke, VA your home base. Located near Roanoke-Blacksburg Regional Airport (ROA), our hotel is a short drive from the scenic Blue Ridge Parkway and an easy stop for travelers driving on I-81, US-220, and US-460. Our proximity to Hollins University and Roanoke College makes us an attractive option for students and families visiting the campuses.After a day of exploring museums in downtown Roanoke or a mountain drive, relax in our indoor pool or hit the treadmill in our fitness center. Start each morning with a free, hot breakfast, and help yourself to complimentary coffee and cookies in our lobby throughout the day. Our accommodations range from streamlined standard rooms to extra-large suites, all featuring high-quality bedding, microwaves, and refrigerators for your comfort and convenience. Use free Wi-Fi to share photos of your Blue Ridge vacation on social media, or kick back in front of the 32-inch flat-screen TV. After a restful night, start your day with a freshly brewed cup of coffee and a free weekday newspaper. With nearly 1,200 square feet of space, our on-site event facilities can accommodate up to 80 guests. In addition to flexible room configurations, we offer free Wi-Fi, notepads, and pens for your convenience. Complimentary coffee, tea, and water service are also available, and our professional staff can assist with audiovisual equipment options. Nestled in the Blue Ridge Mountains, Roanoke offers activities for every taste, from vibrant downtown museums and exhilarating hikes to stunning scenery along the Blue Ridge Parkway. You can see a contemporary art exhibition at the Eleanor D. Wilson Museum on the campus of nearby Hollins University, or you can stroll around Walrond Pond, a 10-minute walk from our hotel. Don’t miss these top attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Washington Dulles International Airport, VA
description: Save big when you stay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Washington Dulles International Airport, VA, where we offer free shuttle service to Dulles International Airport (IAD) and to locations within a three-mile radius. For a fun afternoon with your family, you can take an entertaining and informative tour of the Steven F. Udvar-Hazy Center, visit the George C. Marshall International Center, or relax at Great Falls Park. Central Washington, DC attractions like the National Mall are only 40 minutes away from our hotel.Maintain your workout schedule in the fitness center and start each day with a hearty meal from our free, hot breakfast. Our fireside lobby with a 24-hour front desk is the perfect place to relax while you browse the internet using free Wi-Fi or help yourself to a free cup of coffee or a cookie. If work brings you to Sterling, take advantage of the business center, open 24 hours. Need a snack or to replace something you forgot to pack? Visit our convenient on-site market.Our free IAD airport shuttle is available Monday through Friday, 5:15 am to 10:45 pm, and Saturday through Sunday, 6:15 am to 10:45 pm. Reserve a spacious hotel room or suite for your next vacation and enjoy a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Use the coffeemaker for a convenient cup of joe and make snacks at your leisure with the microwave and fridge. You can peruse the free weekday newspaper after completing work at the desk with an ergonomic chair. Stay in an ideal location just minutes from Dulles International Airport (IAD), 20 minutes southeast of Leesburg, and approximately 40 minutes west of Washington, DC. Loudon County Wine Country and the popular Great Falls Park are also nearby. Take in local history at Morven Park and explore the natural beauty of Green Spring Gardens. If you’re in town for work, make time between meetings in the Dulles Technology Corridor to visit these top attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Virginia Beach (Oceanfront), VA
description: Take I-264 as far east as possible and you’ll find the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Virginia Beach (Oceanfront), VA. No other hotel puts you closer to the ocean or the excitement on Beach Street USA than our hotel on scenic Atlantic Avenue. Take a few steps out of our back door to wander the beach and the Virginia Beach Boardwalk, or follow the shoreline six miles north to see America’s oldest lighthouse. If you want to explore the immediate area, the VB Wave Trolley runs right past the hotel and stops at numerous shops, museums, and more along Atlantic Avenue. Our hotel is also ideally situated for festival-goers and event attendees year round.  In addition to a prime oceanfront location, our hotel also offers a free, hot breakfast, free garage parking, and a heated indoor pool for those not-so-sunny days. We also offer free Wi-Fi and a fitness center for your convenience. Need a quick pick-me-up after walking to area beach shops and restaurants? Enjoy free coffee and cookies in the hotel lobby. All of our spacious guest rooms and suites feature balconies or patios perfect for taking in gorgeous views and the soothing cadences of the Atlantic Ocean. Extras like free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, microwaves, and refrigerators help to make your beach vacation even more enjoyable. For a lovely beachside gathering, reserve our meeting space complete with audiovisual equipment and free Wi-Fi. Our meeting room offers a variety of seating arrangements and can accommodate small gatherings with only 20 guests or large conferences of up to 110 guests. Walk through our front doors to access vibrant Beach Street USA, or escape out the back to bask on the ocean shore. Take a seven-minute walk to Jungle Golf for some mini-golf, or hit the Virginia Beach National Golf Club, located just 10 miles away. Check out these local hot spots:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Williamsburg East (Busch Gardens), VA
description: Settle in at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Williamsburg East (Busch Gardens), VA, located just over a mile from Busch Gardens and Colonial Williamsburg. Our hotel puts you near golfing, shopping, and elegant dining opportunities on the Virginia Peninsula. Come in fresh from a day of thrills at Busch Gardens or Water Country USA and relax on our patio with a cup of coffee and a complimentary cookie from the lobby. Before your college tour of William & Mary, energize your day with fresh waffles, bacon, eggs, and more at our free, hot breakfast. When you return to the hotel, you can enjoy a refreshing dip in the sparkling outdoor pool or head to the fitness center to squeeze in some cardio. In town for work? Guest laundry facilities help you to keep your business attire looking its best. After a fun-filled day at Busch Gardens, return to your room and sink into plush bedding. You can update social media with the help of free Wi-Fi or turn on the TV to catch up on your favorite shows. In the morning, brew a fresh cup of coffee with the in-room coffeemaker before you join us for our free, hot breakfast. Our breakfast room at the Country Inn & Suites provides a great place to meet with your team before the big game. Traveling to Williamsburg with a group? We offer affordable group rates and one complimentary room for every 20 booked. Whether you’re interested in early American history, taking a college tour at William & Mary, or looking for exciting thrills at Busch Gardens, a visit to Williamsburg is just the ticket. Shop at nearby Williamsburg Premium Outlets, take home a piece of pottery from the Williamsburg Pottery Factory, or learn about the struggles of the early settlers at Jamestown. Make time to visit these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Williamsburg Historic Area, VA
description: Whether you're traveling for a romantic getaway or a family adventure, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Williamsburg Historic Area, VA makes it easy to explore the birthplace of our nation by putting you one mile away from Colonial Williamsburg. Start your morning with a free, hot breakfast in the hotel’s dining area, and then spend the day exploring the rich history of Jamestown or Yorktown. If you're in the mood to get your adrenaline pumping, all the thrill rides at Busch Gardens are just a short drive away. Wind down for the day at a local shopping center or restaurant before retiring to our Williamsburg hotel to relax.Let the kids splash around in the indoor pool while you post pictures of your day using free Wi-Fi. If you like to end the evening with a workout, the hotel’s fitness center is well equipped to suit your needs. With complimentary coffee and cookies, you can enjoy a refreshment any time of the day. Relaxing in our rooms and suites is the perfect way to end a day of exploring Colonial Williamsburg. Settle into a queen- or king-size bed and flip on HBO, enjoy a snack, or chat with friends online using free Wi-Fi. Learn how you can save money with our extended-stay rates. Our inviting breakfast room or Ivy Meeting Room is ideal for team meetings, family reunions, or other small events. Free Wi-Fi makes it easy to stream information for your group. Enjoy special rates when you book our group accommodations. Blending historic adventure with an amazing outdoors, Williamsburg lies at the center of America's Historic Triangle along with Busch Gardens and shopping outlets. Explore America's colonial heritage or stroll through the campus of the nation's second-oldest university, the College of William & Mary. Popular local attractions include:

name: Park Inn by Radisson Williamsburg Historic
description: Located at the intersection of popular shopping, dining, and sightseeing opportunities, the Park Inn by Radisson Williamsburg Historic provides an unbeatable home base for your Virginia getaway. Plan an educational outing to nearby Colonial Williamsburg and Yorktown Battlefield, or enjoy a day of thrills with the family at Busch Gardens Williamsburg or Water Country USA. Our prime location also places you close to shopping deals at Williamsburg Premium Outlets and unique finds at High Street boutiques, both within two miles of the hotel.When you return from your William & Mary campus tour, unwind in one of our 122 rooms or suites featuring HBO and individual room climate control. Need to touch base with home or the office? Free property-wide Wi-Fi keeps you connected, and our business center provides a convenient place to check your email. Each morning, join us in the dining room for a complimentary continental breakfast. Lounge in style in one of our well-equipped rooms or suites with in-room coffee facilities at the Park Inn by Radisson Williamsburg Historic. Individual room climate control helps you keep the air at a comfortable temperature, and free Wi-Fi makes it easy to upload photos of your trip to Colonial Williamsburg. Adventure awaits just minutes from our hotel in Williamsburg, where you’ll find a variety of vibrant boutiques along High Street and great restaurants in New Town. Tour the picturesque campus of William & Mary, just two miles away, or travel back in time with a visit to Jamestown Settlement. During your stay, make time to visit these top attractions: By car:The airport is 43 miles from the hotel. Take I-64 East for the easy 45-minute drive.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Winchester, VA
description: For a quiet stay off I-81 in the beautiful Shenandoah Valley, book the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Winchester, VA. Our hotel is a short walk from the Alamo Drafthouse Cinema, where you can enjoy a specialty pizza, craft beer, and a movie before returning to your comfortable hotel room or suite. Tour the many wineries and breweries in the area, or take in a round of golf at a nearby course. Visit local attractions such as the Shenandoah Valley Discovery Museum, Kernstown Battlefield or Museum of the Shenandoah Valley. At the end of the day, unwind at a local spa or one of nine restaurants within walking distance of the hotel.Cap off your day with a dip in our heated indoor pool, or burn off a few calories on the cardio equipment in the fitness center. Our Winchester hotel also offers laundry facilities and a 24-hour business center to make your stay more convenient. Pets and large vehicles are welcome but may be subject to additional fees. Please call the hotel for details. Make yourself at home in one of our comfortable rooms or suites, some of which are designated pet-friendly. You can finish up your trip planning at the work desk before kicking back to watch HBO or using the free Wi-Fi to post photos of your day in Old Town. After a restful night’s sleep, wake up to a fresh-brewed cup of coffee from the in-room coffeemaker, browse a free weekday USA TODAY® newspaper, and then head to our dining room for a free, hot breakfast, served daily. To help make your Shenandoah vacation more affordable, children 18 and under stay free with an adult. The meeting space at the Country Inn & Suites, Winchester is an ideal choice for your seminar, reception, or reunion with up to 45 guests. Enjoy free internet and easy access to I-81, plus the help of our friendly, knowledgeable staff. Ask about catering recommendations and audiovisual equipment like a screen and a sound system. When the weather is nice, you can even take the celebration outside to our patio. Visitors come to Winchester to experience its natural beauty, historic charms, and romantic ambiance. Nestled between the Blue Ridge and Appalachian Mountains, the city is home to intriguing historical spots like Belle Grove Plantation and Stonewall Jackson’s Headquarters. Top local attractions include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Potomac Mills Woodbridge, VA
description: Welcome to the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Potomac Mills Woodbridge, VA, conveniently located just off I-95 along Prince William Parkway. Our hotel is minutes from Potomac Mills, Virginia’s largest outlet mall, and a short drive from historic Old Town Alexandria, Marine Corps Base Quantico, and Washington, DC. Ready to get outdoors? Nearby Leesylvania State Park offers hiking trails and kayaking on the Potomac River.Start your day with freshly made waffles, crisp bacon, and more at our free, hot breakfast. Coffee, tea, and hot chocolate are also available throughout the day. During your stay, you can keep up your exercise routine in the fitness center or take a refreshing dip in the pool before relaxing in the hot tub. Grab a complimentary cookie in the lobby on the way back to your room. Need to put your feet up after a day of shopping at Potomac Mills? Each of our spacious rooms and suites includes amenities like a 43-inch flat-screen TV with cable channels. A refrigerator and a microwave make it easy to prepare a midnight snack, and you can stay connected with free Wi-Fi. Traveling with kids? Rollaways, cribs, and adjoining rooms are available. Looking for a venue to hold a meeting, training session, or social gathering in Woodbridge? Our sizable, light-filled event space is equipped with free high-speed internet, and we can provide catering recommendations and audiovisual equipment. If your guests are staying overnight, ask us about reserving a block of rooms. Our convenient location just off I-95 ensures easy commutes to Washington, DC and Virginia cities like Fredericksburg, but there are plenty of great activities practically on our doorstep. Bargain hunters are minutes from more than 200 outlet stores at Potomac Mills, plus restaurants and a multiplex. More of an outdoor person? Hike wooded trails at Leesylvania State Park or Prince William Forest Park, or go kayaking on the Potomac River. For more inspiration, check out these ideas:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Wytheville, VA
description: Pull off near the intersection of I-77 and I-81 to reach the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Wytheville, VA, located a mile from the Thomas J. Boyd Museum. In addition to putting you close to a number of dining options, our hotel’s convenient location makes it easy to explore popular sites like the George Washington and Jefferson National Forests and the Edith Bolling Wilson Birthplace Museum.After enjoying the attractions of Wytheville, head back to the hotel to relax in the heated indoor pool or hot tub before winding down with an HBO movie. Wake refreshed and help yourself to complimentary breakfast, or grab some cookies, coffee, or tea in the lobby before hitting the road. Need to check in at the office? Use our business center 24 hours a day or free Wi-Fi in your room. If you don’t want to forgo your workout routine while traveling, take advantage of our on-site fitness center. Take a break in your travels and catch the game on ESPN or chat with friends using free Wi-Fi, available in all our rooms and suites. To help your family save money, we also offer free lodging for children 18 and under who stay in the same room with an adult. In the heart of southwest Virginia, Wytheville boasts the home of a fascinating former First Lady, exquisite natural beauty, and cultural attractions like the African American Heritage Museum. You can hike the Appalachian Trail and marvel at its scope or take the African American Heritage Driving Tour. Other don’t-miss sights include:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Seattle-Bothell, WA
description: Conveniently located off I-405, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Seattle-Bothell, WA is less than 20 miles from downtown Seattle. You can save money and avoid city traffic without sacrificing proximity to attractions like the Seattle Aquarium and businesses in nearby Bellevue. Visiting the University of Washington Bothell? Our hotel is about five minutes from campus. You can also travel about three miles to the vineyards of Woodinville Wine Country and spend the afternoon tasting pours from more than 100 wineries. Before heading to Seattle to visit Pike Place Market or the Space Needle, stop by our free, hot breakfast to start the morning off right. After a fun-filled day, our seasonal outdoor pool provides the perfect place to catch some rays. Linger over a book in the expansive courtyard, or head indoors to video chat with your family using our free Wi-Fi. For a treat between meals, grab a complimentary cookie and a cup of coffee from the lobby. Here for work? We offer a free shuttle to North Creek and Canyon Park business centers. The following certification shows our hotel's commitment to guests' safety. For more information, visit Safehotels Certification. For a convenient, comfortable stay in Bothell, settle into one of our 166 rooms and suites with free Wi-Fi.
