Warm leftovers in the microwave, relax in the armchair, and watch a show on the flat-screen TV. With an in-room refrigerator, you can store cold drinks and snacks for your kids. Approximately 30 minutes from the Sea-Tac airport, our hotel offers 1,600 square feet of affordable meeting space for everything from family reunions to corporate training seminars. Our flexible facilities can accommodate up to 150 guests and make your job easier with amenities like free Wi-Fi, audiovisual equipment rentals, and full-service on-site catering.We also welcome weddings with convenient packages and beautiful venue options like the Grand Salon, the Library, and the Garden Patio, which features a serene rose garden. The Country Inn & Suites offers an ideal home base in Bothell, a quiet suburb with easy access to I-405, North Creek Business Park, and corporations in the Canyon Park neighborhood. Plan a weekend getaway to explore Woodinville Wine Country with someone special, or take a day trip to Seattle to visit sites like Pike Place Market and the Seattle Aquarium. Don't miss these popular destinations:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Seattle-Tacoma International Airport, WA
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Seattle-Tacoma International Airport, WA welcomes you with a free shuttle ride to our hotel. Our shuttle also gives you access to the Link light rail, which offers easy commutes into Seattle. Enjoy aviation-themed fun at the Museum of Flight and iFLY Seattle, or catch a Seahawks football game at CenturyLink Field. Our location near the Sea-Tac airport and between Highway 99 and I-5 provides you direct access to downtown Seattle in just 20 minutes.Use the fitness center to keep up with your workout routine during your stay. You can snack on a complimentary cookie and cup of coffee from the lobby while you take advantage of our 24-hour laundry facilities. A free, hot breakfast fuels you for the day, and free Wi-Fi enables you to research local attractions while you plan your Seattle itinerary. Driving into town? We also offer free parking. Let your kids watch their favorite show on TV while you use the microwave and fridge to prepare snacks and chill drinks. You can upload vacation photos with the free Wi-Fi or settle into the desk to knock out some work. We cater to your technology needs  with 13 conveniently located outlets, including a USB connection. For additional space to kick back, reserve a one-bedroom suite with a living room and a plush sofa bed. The Country Inn & Suites offers group-friendly accommodations near the SEA airport. Our hospitality room offers flexible seating options for up to 20 event attendees, perfect for a board meeting or a training session. Take advantage of free Wi-Fi, audiovisual equipment options, and a 60-inch TV with HDMI connections to give a rousing presentation. The Emerald City offers plenty of local culture, sports, and live music, all set against the striking beauty of the Pacific Northwest. Use our 24-hour airport shuttle to connect with the Link light rail to reach downtown attractions like the iconic Space Needle or CenturyLink Field. Make memories with your kids by spending a day at Tukwila Family Fun Center & Bullwinkle's Restaurant, featuring great food and fun activities like go-karts and mini-golf. Must-see attractions include:

name: Radisson Hotel Seattle Airport
description: Located across the street from Seattle-Tacoma International Airport (SEA) and within walking distance of the Link light rail to downtown, Radisson Hotel Seattle Airport makes commuting to work or play easy while you’re in the Emerald City. You can ride to and from Sea-Tac via our complimentary 24-hour airport shuttle and confirm flight schedules using our free Wi-Fi. If you’re looking for fun outings between meetings, don your blue and green gear to cheer on the Seahawks at CenturyLink Field. No Seattle trip is complete without a visit to Pike Place Market, home to artisanal merchants and the famous fish-throwing seafood sellers.After a busy day of travel, our heated indoor pool is a perfect haven for relaxation. A well-equipped fitness center lets you keep up with your workout routine, and a business center helps you review notes in between meetings. When you’re ready for a bite to eat, head to our on-site restaurant for delicious fare and a glass of wine. Traveling with a four-legged friend? Our hotel is dog friendly (fees apply). The following certification shows our hotel's commitment to guests' safety. For more information, visit Safehotels Certification. After your flight into the SEA airport, recharge in one of our 204 spacious rooms and suites featuring plush Simmons Beautyrest® pillowtop mattresses. Our modern rooms boast thoughtful touches like coffee and tea facilities to keep you fueled for local adventures and an in-room refrigerator to store your restaurant leftovers. Boasting eight meeting rooms and space for up to 220 guests, the Radisson is the perfect choice for corporate functions and family gatherings near the SEA airport. Enjoy your choice of indoor and outdoor spaces that come with flexible setup options and an array of amenities like free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment rentals. We also offer a variety of meeting packages and menus to help you craft an unforgettable event.                                     Order from the convenient room service menu for breakfast in bed, a convenient lunch, or a late-night dinner any day of the week.                                 Enjoy every meal at the hotel’s on-site restaurant, RBG Bar & Grill, which serves Pacific Northwest cuisine for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Stop by for regionally sourced seafood and produce highlighted in dishes like grilled wild-caught salmon, and pair your meal with something from the restaurant’s range of fine wines and craft beers. When you're ready for some fun, walk to the Sound Transit light rail’s Sea-Tac/Airport Station, located just a half mile from the Radisson, to access Seattle sights like Pike Place Market, downtown shopping, Seattle's Great Wheel, and the Space Needle. If you want to explore more of the Pacific Northwest's largest city, check out these nearby attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Beckley, WV
description: Situated near I-64 in southern West Virginia, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Beckley, WV beckons visitors to explore the natural beauty of Appalachia. Take a leisurely stroll less than a mile from the hotel to Tamarack, where you'll find an array of artisanal crafts including handblown glass, ornate quilts, and dazzling jewelry. You can learn all about the area's mining history at the nearby Exhibition Coal Mine or snap some amazing panoramas at New River Gorge National River. If you're looking for heart-pounding entertainment, plan a day of ATV riding, white-water rafting, or zip-lining at nearby spots like Burning Rock Off-Road Park and Adventures on the Gorge.When you return from your excursion, enjoy a dip in the swim-under indoor/outdoor pool or relax in a lounge chair with a free weekday newspaper. Thanks to our hotel’s pet-friendly policy, you can take your four-legged friend for a walk around the property before settling into your comfortable room or suite for the night. Other hotel amenities include free Wi-Fi, a fitness center, and our free, hot breakfast. After a fun day of exploring Beckley, treat your body to a great night's sleep on a Serta Elite® pillowtop mattress, included in every one of our rooms and suites. You can keep your favorite beverages cool in the refrigerator and bring snacks from home to heat up in the microwave. We also have a number of pet-friendly rooms available. The Country Inn & Suites is adjacent to the Mountaineer Conference Center, which boasts more than 3,100 square feet and has space for up to 325 guests. Conference center amenities like a dance floor, audiovisual equipment rentals, and catering services help you make the most of your gathering in beautiful Beckley. Adventure-seekers choose our centrally located hotel, which places you within minutes of hiking, canoeing, tubing, ATV riding, and more at local outdoor adventure spots like Winterplace Ski Resort and the New River Gorge. Beckley is also steeped in a rich history and culture, best seen at the Exhibition Coal Mine and the Wildwood House Museum. Check out these favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Charleston South, WV
description: Pull off I-64 and into the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Charleston South, WV, tucked away in the scenic Appalachian Mountains. Nature lovers can catch a breath of fresh air with an energizing hike and a fishing excursion at Kanawha State Forest, or plan a relaxed picnic at scenic Cato Park. When you’re ready to explore the city, tour the grounds of the West Virginia State Capitol building, just 10 minutes from our hotel, or pack a baseball glove and head to Appalachian Power Park to attend a West Virginia Power game. Business and leisure guests alike can find entertainment at the Charleston Civic Center, home to concerts, conferences, and trade shows throughout the year.After a short drive from Yeager Airport (CRW), settle into your pet-friendly hotel room or suite. If you want to relieve jet-lagged muscles, you can take a dip in our hotel's soothing hot tub or lounge poolside. Need to catch up on work? Use our well-equipped business center, complete with free Wi-Fi as well as print and copy services. Kick back with your furry friend on a plush bed in one of our pet-friendly hotel rooms or suites. You can heat up snacks in the microwave and enjoy the big game on the flat-screen TV. Prefer some quiet time? Brew a cup of tea or coffee and settle in for the night. Please note that availability of pet-friendly rooms is limited to 5 rooms. Please be sure to make reservations that is listed as pet-friendly at the time of booking if necessary. Usher up to 55 guests into the elegant meeting space at the Country Inn & Suites. Located near I-64 and just 13 minutes from the CRW airport, our hotel offers a convenient location for out-of-town guests. Take advantage of amenities like free Wi-Fi and an LCD projector, and be sure to ask our friendly staff for catering recommendations so your guests can savor local cuisine. Nestled in the Appalachian Mountains, Charleston is home to attractions like the vibrant Clay Center, offering a steady calendar of concerts, art exhibits, and Broadway plays, and the trendy Charleston Town Center, featuring over 100 stores and restaurants. Get in touch with nature by hiking through the Kanawha State Forest, or take a scenic drive along the Midland Trail. Don’t miss these Charleston-area attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Princeton, WV
description: Located near I-77, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Princeton, WV lets you recharge after your drive to Princeton. The perfect destination for families, couples, and business travelers, our hotel offers services like a fitness center and business center. We also make it easy to reach local dining, shopping, and entertainment venues. Learn about the local area at the Princeton Railroad Museum, or catch a live touring performance at the Chuck Mathena Center.Back at the hotel, enjoy our ample room amenities. Keep up with current events by reading a free weekday copy of the local newspaper or checking the news with free Wi-Fi. Be sure to spend some time in our heated indoor pool to ease your travel fatigue. Need to host an event? Check out our meeting space for up to 35 guests. After a day of travel and adventure, kick back in your room or suite with a cold, refreshing drink from the fridge while streaming your favorite shows with our free Wi-Fi. Enjoy options such as pet-friendly rooms and a free hot, breakfast. The Country Inn & Suites, Princeton, WV offers 650 square feet of meeting space capable of seating up to 35 guests. With easy access to I-77, it’s the perfect venue for business travelers. In addition to free Wi-Fi, presentation aids, and a business center, our friendly staff is on hand to assist with everything from event planning to catering arrangements. Spend the day exploring the beauty of Appalachia at Pipestem Resort State Park, a scenic location with a nature center, hiking trails, and tram rides. For some local fun, cheer on the Princeton Rays at H. P. Hunnicutt Field or watch a pulse-pounding race at Princeton Speedway. Don't miss out on these area favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Appleton, WI
description: About 30 minutes from Lambeau Field in Green Bay, the pet-friendly Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Appleton, WI offers a quiet and convenient location off I-41. If you're arriving by plane, the hotel provides a free airport shuttle to and from Appleton International Airport (ATW), perfect for business or game-day travelers. After cheering on the Packers, treat yourself to a laser show at the Barlow Planetarium or return to the hotel and walk along the paved pathway to shop at Fox River Mall next door.Unwind in the evening with a soothing dip in our indoor pool or an invigorating workout in our fitness center. We offer complimentary cookies in the lobby so you can reward yourself for staying active. The next morning, you can enjoy a free, hot breakfast before sitting down on the front porch to relax. Be sure to check the kick-off time for the big game using our free Wi-Fi. Curl up in a spacious room with your favorite four-legged traveling companion and a freshly brewed cup of coffee. You can cap off the night with an exciting movie on HBO or scroll through your social media accounts using free Wi-Fi. Spacious one-bedroom suites provide your family plenty of room to spread out in the living room. Planning a romantic getaway? Upgrade your stay to a memorable whirlpool suite. Located minutes from I-41 and the ATW airport, our hotel is the perfect place to host your business meeting or social event in Appleton. We offer 500 square feet of meeting space with access to free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment. Our friendly staff is on hand to assist with setup, catering arrangements, and complimentary water service. Be sure to ask about our group rates for your overnight guests. If you’re traveling with a sports team for a game at Community First Champion Center, take advantage of our event space for a team huddle. Spend nine innings at Fox Cities Stadium with the Wisconsin Timber Rattlers—a local Brewers farm team—or walk the streets of downtown to browse souvenir shops and other small businesses. Take your kids for a thrilling tour of the History Museum at the Castle before attending a show at the Barlow Planetarium. Don't miss these favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Milwaukee West (Brookfield), WI
description: Ideally situated near I-94, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Milwaukee West (Brookfield), WI provides a welcome retreat from the hustle and bustle of downtown Milwaukee. Get ready for family fun at the Milwaukee County Zoo, a Milwaukee Brewers game at Miller Park, or Brookfield Hills Golf Course, all just a 10-minute drive from the hotel. Business travelers appreciate our proximity to conference and expo centers, as well as GE Healthcare Institute, Children's Wisconsin, and Froedtert Hospital. During your free time, enjoy shopping and dining options at Brookfield Square mall and The Corners of Brookfield, just a few minutes away.Get energized for your busy Brew City itinerary with a workout in our fitness center, followed by a complimentary, hot breakfast. Free Wi-Fi and a contemporary business center help you stay connected during your stay. After appointments or sightseeing, unwind in our indoor pool and hot tub. Free cookies ensure your day ends on a sweet note. You can have a great meal without hitting the road at our on-site restaurant, Champps Americana. Whether you choose a standard room or a spacious suite, all of our accommodations come with convenient amenities like microwaves and refrigerators. You can stay connected with free high-speed internet access and make a cup of fresh coffee or tea when you need a lift. Traveling with a four-legged companion? Pet-friendly rooms are available for a $75 fee. With more than 3,000 square feet of event space, the Country Inn & Suites in Brookfield is an ideal destination for meetings and special celebrations, including weddings. Choose from four flexible rooms, featuring natural light and warm cherrywood decor. Event attendees benefit from free Wi-Fi and complimentary parking. Our experienced staff can organize audiovisual equipment and customized catering menus for a memorable gathering. Group room blocks and Radisson Rewards for Business are also available. Start your day with delicious favorites like eggs, bacon, and fluffy Belgian waffles from our free, hot breakfast. Coffee, tea, and juice are perfect pairing options for your meal. For lunch and dinner, you can chow down on a burger or mouthwatering pasta at Champps Americana, located on site at the hotel. From the Milwaukee County Zoo to dinosaur specimens at the Milwaukee Public Museum, there are plenty of family activities within easy reach of the hotel. Looking for things to do between business meetings? Practice your swing at the nearby Brookfield Hills Golf Course, or treat yourself to some of the area’s best shopping a mile from the hotel at Brookfield Square. You can sample craft beer at numerous local breweries carrying on the Brew City tradition. Get inspired by these area attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Chippewa Falls, WI
description: Situated just five minutes south of downtown, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Chippewa Falls, WI off Highway 124 is a family-friendly hotel focused on exceptional service. During your stay, you can take the kids to visit the animals at nearby Irvine Park & Zoo or rent a canoe at Loopy’s Grill for an excursion down the Chippewa River. If you’re a beer-lover, you can drive less than three miles north for tours and tastings at the Leinenkugel’s brewery.After a busy day of sightseeing, make a splash in our heated indoor pool, soak in the hot tub, or browse the web with our upgraded free Wi-Fi, featuring a 200 Mbps fiber internet connection. Before you head off for a great night’s sleep, treat yourself to a free cookie in the lobby. If you exercise routinely, make use of the free passes to Highland Fitness to stay on track. Don’t miss an opportunity to meet other guests and enjoy complimentary snacks Monday through Thursday evenings in the lobby. Here with your sports team? Use the laundry facilities to keep uniforms looking fresh.Please note that our facility is 100% non-smoking and pet-free. After a day of fun in downtown Chippewa Falls, make yourself at home in your modern room or suite. Thanks to an in-room microwave and a refrigerator, you can enjoy popcorn and a cold drink while watching an action-packed movie on HBO. Experience the beauty of Chippewa Falls at Cabin Ridge Rides, a sprawling tract of land that features horse-drawn carriage rides and picnic areas with space for bonfires. To learn some local history, browse the Civil War artifacts at the Chippewa County Historical Society. You can check out kid-friendly spots like Ojibwa Golf & Bowl and adult-focused hangouts like Marc-On Shooting and Bye the Willow Lounge & Event Center. Don’t miss out on these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fond du Lac, WI
description: Situated off I-41 near the foot of Lake Winnebago, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Fond du Lac, WI welcomes you to relax and refresh during your travels. Pack up the family for a day of fun at Lake Winnebago, or head to Fondy Sports Park to enjoy rock climbing and off-road go-karting. Rolling Meadows Golf Course is less than a mile from our hotel, and unique shopping is nearby.Wake up each morning in your contemporary room, and head to our complimentary, hot breakfast. Take care of a little work in our business center, and reward yourself with a swim in our indoor pool. We offer complimentary cookies and coffee in the lobby and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. After a day of adventure, kick back in your stylish room or spacious suite with a cold drink from the stash in your fridge and a snack warmed up in the microwave. Stream your favorite shows with free Wi-Fi or tune into Showtime while you settle into comfy beds. Guests can choose a suite for extra space and amenities that include a separate living room, a sleeper sofa, a whirlpool tub, or a wet bar. For a boardroom session or small conference, take advantage of our meeting room, equipped with free Wi-Fi, seating for up to 10 guests, and presentation aids. We offer great programs for traveling groups that include a block of rooms, a welcome reception, and a gift before you leave. If you wish every day were Christmas, visit the Kristmas Kringle Shoppe to enjoy the sights and sounds of the holiday season all year long. Travel back in time more than 100 years at the Galloway House & Village, complete with a Victorian-style mansion. Outdoor enthusiasts can find things to do in all seasons near our hotel. These nearby attractions offer something for everyone:

name: Radisson Hotel and Conference Center Fond du Lac
description: Located four miles from the south end of Lake Winnebago, Radisson Hotel and Conference Center Fond du Lac offers our guests a quiet retreat about 70 miles from Madison, Milwaukee, Manitowoc, and Green Bay. Board our complimentary shuttle for stress-free travel to local businesses within a five-mile radius of the hotel, or walk across the street to Rolling Meadows Golf Course for a friendly round with business colleagues. There’s nothing better than an afternoon of fishing on Lake Winnebago or a romantic sunset cruise along the Horicon Marsh.After hosting a day of meetings in our expansive conference center, unwind in the large recreation area with a game of pool or a leisurely swim in the indoor pool. If you need an invigorating workout, visit our well-equipped fitness center to keep up with your health routine while on the road. Our 24-hour business center and free Wi-Fi make it easy to take care of last-minute business and prep for upcoming meetings. When it’s time for a bite to eat, Benvenuto’s Italian Bar & Grill offers a wealth of enticing entrées, made-from-scratch sauces, and nightly happy hour specials. Enjoy room service when you’re working late or crave a sweet treat. Our 133 rooms and suites provide a peaceful getaway near the splendor of Lake Winnebago. Start your morning with a fresh cup of coffee or tea brewed in your room. You can connect to free Wi-Fi to review your notes before hosting a meeting or relax with a favorite show on a 42-inch flat-screen TV. Perfect for hosting a dazzling wedding reception for 400 guests or a professional conference for 600, our flexible conference center boasts 11 meeting rooms with 24,000 square feet of combined event space. Our skilled event coordinators are happy to assist you with planning and personalizing the details of your event, from audiovisual equipment rentals to on-site catering. Prefer to dine in the privacy of your room? Order an entrée and a sweet treat like tiramisu or cheesecake from room service. Experience the best of casual dining at our on-site restaurant, Benvenuto’s Italian Bar & Grill. Tantalize your taste buds with Italian favorites such as manicotti, chicken parmigiana, signature calzones, and hand-tossed pizzas. The restaurant makes all of its sauces and soups from scratch daily, and the bar hosts a nightly happy hour.  Located near highway 41, our Radisson hotel provides guests with a central location near an abundance of outdoor activities to explore in Fond du Lac. You can attend a yoga class at the Thelma Sadoff Center for the Arts, race go-karts at Fondy Sports Park, or spend the day on the water at nearby Lake Winnebago. Don’t miss these local favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Ft. Atkinson, WI
description: Located at the intersection of Highway 26 Bypass and Highway 12, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Ft. Atkinson, WI is the ideal base from which to enjoy all that the area has to offer. Nature lovers can breathe the fresh air and take in picturesque scenery at Dorothy Carnes Park in the Rose Lake State Natural Area, just a five-minute drive from the hotel. Treat the kids to a fun day at Busy Barns Adventure Farm followed by a live show and meal at Fireside Dinner Theatre, eight minutes away. Our hotel also places you close to major local companies in Fort Atkinson like Spacesaver Corporation and On-Cor.You can unwind in our indoor pool after a tour of the University of Wisconsin-Whitewater campus. Keep up with your exercise routine using the treadmills, ellipticals, and weight machines available in the fitness center. Then, post photos of your Fort Atkinson adventures using free Wi-Fi, and enjoy a complimentary, hot breakfast each morning of your stay.  Let us create the setting for your upcoming wedding reception, business seminar, or management conference. You can host up to 300 guests thanks to our flexible and customizable venue space. Enhance your gathering with audiovisual equipment, free Wi-Fi, and delicious catering recommendations. From planning to execution, our professional team will be there every step of the way to ensure that your important event is a resounding success. Our hotel is a short drive from the University of Wisconsin-Whitewater, making it easy to arrange a campus tour or cheer the Warhawks from the grandstands. If you prefer to be part of the action, head over to King Pin Adventure Golf or Rock River Lanes bowling alley for competitive family fun. Experience Wisconsin's inspiring natural beauty by hiking along the Dorothy Carnes Park trails and, during warm-weather months, check out Barrie Park's free summer outdoor concert series. Enjoy these nearby attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Germantown, WI
description: Located just 30 minutes from downtown Milwaukee, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Germantown, WI provides a peaceful alternative to the hustle and bustle of the city. If you have time to explore, make the drive from our suburban hotel into the city to explore Milwaukee County Zoo, browse unique shops, and sample fine cuisine. You can also visit the Bast Bell Museum or fit in a round of golf at Kettle Hills Golf Course.After a day of fun, leave the city life behind to relax on our front porch or recharge with a workout in our fitness center. You can take to the water in our indoor pool and then grab a free cookie in the lobby before calling it a night. After a busy day or long flight, unwind in our hotel rooms and suites with a freshly brewed cup of coffee. Prepare a snack in the microwave and grab a beverage from the in-room refrigerator while you relax for the night. Our convenient location beside Florian Park and close to Milwaukee is perfect for your business meeting or social function. We offer a meeting room equipped with free Wi-Fi, seating for up to 50 guests, and presentation aids. Our friendly staff is also on hand to assist with event planning and setup. Germantown gives you easy access to top Milwaukee attractions and local destinations. Explore a rotating collection of classic cars and artifacts at the Wisconsin Automotive Museum, or take in beautiful views from Holy Hill. No trip to the area is complete without a visit to these local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Green Bay East, WI
description: Located just off I-43, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Green Bay East, WI is within a 10-minute drive of Green Bay’s shoreline, putting you near some of the city’s best attractions. Find family-friendly fun within six miles of the hotel at Bay Beach Amusement Park and Bay Beach Wildlife Sanctuary, home to wolves and raptors. If you’re a Packers fan in town for a game weekend, you can reach Lambeau Field in less than 20 minutes. Visiting a student at the University of Wisconsin-Green Bay? The campus is just five miles from our hotel. For corporate travelers, downtown companies are about five miles away, and you can drive to Green Bay-Austin Straubel International Airport (GRB) in less than 20 minutes.From complimentary cookies and fireside seating in the lobby to a dedicated space perfect for hosting birthday parties, the Country Inn & Suites, Green Bay East is designed to make your entire family feel welcome. Before heading out for meetings or a weekend game, fill up with our complimentary, hot breakfast. While you’re here, you can use free Wi-Fi to plan your itinerary and keep up your workout regimen in our fitness center. For a relaxing afternoon, enjoy a dip in the pool or a soak in the hot tub. Children can make a splash in the separate kids’ pool with a novelty slide. Settle into one of our airy rooms and suites, which are equipped with amenities to help you relax and get things done, including cable TV and free high-speed internet access. Keep your favorite post-game beverages chilled in the refrigerator, or warm up a snack in the microwave after a busy work day or a family adventure. The NFL’s legendary Green Bay Packers draw hordes of football fans to Lambeau Field, but there are plenty of great nearby attractions outside the stadium walls. Planning some family time? The thrill rides at Bay Beach Amusement Park and the wetland habitats of Bay Beach Wildlife Sanctuary are less than a 10-minute drive from our hotel. Check out these inspiring ideas: By car:From the airport, turn right onto Airport Drive/WI-172 E and drive a little over eight miles. At the fork leading to I-43 N, keep left and merge onto the interstate. After almost three miles, take exit 183 and turn right onto Mason Street. At the first intersection, turn right onto Challenger Drive, and then turn right again onto Voyager Drive. The hotel will soon be on your right.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Green Bay North, WI
description: Whether you're here for a family getaway, a Packers game, or a business trip, the dog-friendly Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Green Bay North, WI provides a welcoming home away from home. Drive about five miles to visit the beautiful Green Bay Botanical Garden, and then challenge your kids to bowling next door at The Gutter. Going to a Packers game? Our hotel provides a complimentary game-day shuttle to Lambeau Field, situated just a few minutes away.Rest up in your comfortable room or suite and then enjoy a free, hot breakfast before you head out to nearby attractions like Oneida Casino or NEW Zoo & Adventure Park. When you’re ready to unwind, you can enjoy a dip in the heated indoor pool or hot tub or a jog on the treadmill in the fitness center. Before packing up for home, use our on-site laundry facilities so you can leave with fresh clothes in your suitcase. Whether you’ve spent the day cheering on the Packers or shopping in downtown Green Bay, you can find comfort at the end of a fun-filled day in one of our rooms or suites. Catch a movie on the 42-inch flat-screen TV, or hop online to check emails using free Wi-Fi. Enjoy popcorn fresh from the room's microwave and a cold drink from the refrigerator. Our on-site meeting room is a great place to host small parties, team huddles, and board meetings. The well-appointed room comes with free Wi-Fi and audiovisual equipment. Additionally, our friendly, knowledgeable staff can assist with all of the planning details to ensure your event is a success. Green Bay is not only a near-sacred destination for football aficionados, but it's also a great city for families to explore. You can catch a live show at Meyer Theatre, shop at Bay Park Square, or hit the zip lines at NEW Zoo & Adventure Park. If you’re visiting with your significant other, make a date at Oneida Casino to play the slots and enjoy live entertainment. Don’t miss these great destinations:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Green Bay, WI
description: Located less than 10 minutes from Lambeau Field, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Green Bay, WI is the perfect home base for Packers fans. When you’re not cheering alongside other cheeseheads, stop by the Bay Beach Wildlife Sanctuary to view rescued animals native to the Ashwaubenon area. Flying into town? Our hotel is just four miles from Green Bay Austin Straubel International Airport (GRB).Wake up to our complimentary, hot breakfast, and then get decked out in green and gold before heading to the stadium for some gridiron action. If you’re traveling with a group or meeting colleagues, our spacious lobby is an ideal gathering point. Kids love our free cookies and indoor pool, and you can boost your wellbeing with a soak in the hot tub or a jog in the fitness center. Whether you’re on a football-focused family trip or traveling for work, choose from our spacious accommodations with convenient amenities like microwaves and coffeemakers. You can keep beverages and restaurant leftovers in the fridge, and stay connected with free high-speed internet access. We also welcome four-legged visitors to our pet-friendly rooms. Home of the legendary Packers, Green Bay is a great destination for sports, from college basketball at the Resch Center to tournaments and family bowling at the 60-lane Ashwaubenon Bowling Alley, just steps from the hotel. You can treat yourself to a shopping spree at nearby Bay Park Square or catch the latest blockbusters at the mall’s multiplex. Don’t miss these popular Green Bay attractions during your stay:

name: Radisson Hotel & Conference Center Green Bay
description: Whether you’re in Green Bay for a convention, a family vacation, or an NFL football game, you can have a comfortable stay at Radisson Hotel & Conference Center Green Bay. Our hotel’s convenient location places you across the street from Austin Straubel International Airport (GRB) and about four miles from Lambeau Field, home of the Green Bay Packers. After a morning of meetings, try your luck at the tables and slot games of Oneida Casino, connected to the hotel via an interior walkway. If you crave a dose of the great outdoors, visit Thornberry Creek at Oneida, which offers exceptional golf less than four miles away.Our well-equipped fitness center helps you stay active, and the sauna and indoor pool area offer a soothing place to decompress. When you’ve worked up an appetite, dine at our on-site restaurant, Duck Creek Kitchen & Tap (coming soon), or recharge with an espresso from SkyWorld Coffee and Custard. You can take advantage of our hotel’s free 24-hour shuttle for easy travel to and from the GRB airport. Enjoy a peaceful night’s sleep on premium bedding in one of our 391 hotel rooms and suites. Prepare for a business presentation at the large work desk, or connect to free Wi-Fi to share vacation photos. All rooms include a mini fridge as well as a safe. Our suites offer extra space when you need it, and some include additional features like a jetted tub and a separate living room. Our conference center provides 30,000 square feet of customizable event space, perfect for hosting up to 2,000 guests. Impress your attendees with beautiful decor and premium services like award-winning catering and top-of-the-line audiovisual equipment. If you’re hosting a small gathering, ask about our well-appointed boardrooms. Our professional staff is ready to help with everything from scheduling to room setup to ensure a memorable event.Here for a sporting event? Traveling teams can take part in the Sports Approved Program, which includes complimentary use of an event space for a strategy session. Duck Creek Kitchen & Tap (coming soon) is the perfect place to enjoy a hearty breakfast and a dinner of mouthwatering steak or seafood. End your meal with a classic Wisconsin sampling of homemade deep-fried cheese curds.After you’ve finished up the last meeting of the day, you can head back to Duck Creek Kitchen & Tap for a round of drinks with colleagues. The bar invites casual conversation with delicious cocktails, a variety of local beer, and a selection of fresh-squeezed fruit juices.If you need a pick-me-up, order a pastry or a freshly brewed coffee from SkyWorld Coffee and Custard in the lobby. A trip to Green Bay isn’t complete without a visit to famed Lambeau Field and the Packers Hall of Fame, just minutes from our hotel. Kids and adults who like trains won’t want to miss the National Railroad Museum. Take some time to visit these attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Kenosha, WI
description: Just 10 miles from Carthage College and the University of Wisconsin-Parkside, the recently renovated Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Kenosha, WI is the perfect home base for prospective students and visiting families. Our hotel is also great for outdoor enthusiasts, with Southport Marina and Lake Michigan to the east and Wilmot Mountain to the west. Thanks to our location right off I-94/I-41, you can easily treat the kids to high-adventure thrills at Six Flags Great America, just a 15-minute drive from the hotel.During your downtime, unwind in the soothing waters of our hot tub while the kids splash in the indoor pool. If you need to catch up on work, take advantage of free Wi-Fi and printing services in our business center. Our on-site fitness center enables you to keep up with your daily exercise routine. Before heading out to shop at Pleasant Prairie Premium Outlets, stop by the free, hot breakfast for a delicious meal. Find space for the whole family in our hotel rooms and suites. Let the kids choose a show on the flat-screen TV while you make a snack with the microwave or grab drinks from the fridge. You can brew yourself a cup of coffee to enjoy while you read the free weekday newspaper or browse the web with free Wi-Fi. If you’re planning a romantic getaway, upgrade to a whirlpool suite. For a convenient event venue near Kenosha Regional Airport (ENW), reserve our meeting room, which can accommodate up to 40 attendees. We offer free Wi-Fi, and you can give impressive presentations with our on-site audiovisual equipment. We also have a business center with tools to help you prepare for your gathering. Let our professional staff help you design the perfect room setup and connect you with trusted off-site catering options. Have you ever wondered how a jelly bean is created? Find out at a factory tour of the Jelly Belly Warehouse. Once you’ve had your fill of candy, you can wander through the stores at the nearby Pleasant Prairie Premium Outlets. Take your family for a fun-filled day at Six Flags Great America or Wilmot Mountain Ski Resort. Don’t miss these favorites while you’re staying with us off I-94/I-41:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, La Crosse, WI
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, La Crosse, WI offers a comfortable retreat off US Highway 53 and just south of I-90. Located a few miles from the University of Wisconsin-La Crosse and other nearby universities, our hotel is an ideal home base if you’re visiting a college student. Here for a vacation? There’s plenty to do from exploring downtown, fishing year-round at Lake Onalaska, and hiking along trails overlooking the river or to Grandad Bluff. If you’re in town on business and flying out through La Crosse Regional Airport (LSE) on French Island, the hotel is just a short drive away.After a day spent exploring French Island, return to the hotel and unwind with a swim in the indoor pool or a soak in the hot tub. During warmer weather, relax on the outdoor patio by the firepit as the sun slowly sets. If you prefer more vigorous activity, head to the fitness center to use the equipment for a cardio workout. You can print your boarding tickets in the business center, and then grab a fresh cookie, a complimentary newspaper, and a warm cup of coffee in the lobby. In the morning, don’t miss the free, hot breakfast served daily in the dining area. Each of our 91 rooms and suites welcomes you with a comfortable bed, a flat-screen TV, and free Wi-Fi. An in-room microwave and refrigerator as well as a free, hot breakfast add even more value to your stay in La Crosse. For a convenient venue near downtown and about four miles from the LSE airport, reserve our contemporary meeting room. You can host up to 26 guests for a corporate gathering or a small social event. You’ll find it easy to appreciate the scenic beauty of La Crosse with a ski trip to Mt. La Crosse or a day at Myrick Park. You can spot eagles along the Mississippi or stroll downtown to spot one of 31 public art installations. Whether you're in town to meet with colleagues or to enjoy your vacation time, you should visit these local attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel La Crosse
description: Adjacent to the La Crosse Center and within walking distance of Riverside Park, Radisson Hotel La Crosse welcomes you to Wisconsin! Enjoy a picturesque stroll along the Mississippi River, just steps from our hotel, or plan a scenic trip up the river with La Crosse Queen Cruises. You can also walk to downtown restaurants, charming shops, and a lively nightlife scene.Arriving by train or plane? Simplify your travel plans with our free shuttle from the nearby Amtrak depot and La Crosse Regional Airport (LSE). If you’re driving into La Crosse, take advantage of our complimentary parking. Once here, enjoy the free Wi-Fi, 24-hour business center, heated indoor pool, and fitness center, and don’t forget to stop by our on-site restaurant, Three Rivers Lodge (TRL).  The following certification shows our hotel's commitment to guests' safety. For more information, visit Safehotels Certification. Our 169 hotel rooms feature contemporary furnishings, a soothing color scheme, and scenic views. In addition to pillowtop beds and flat-screen TVs, our rooms include vibrant art pieces of notable La Crosse landmarks. Featuring 11,500 square feet of versatile meeting space, Radisson Hotel La Crosse provides an ideal setting for your upcoming business event or social gathering. Our dedicated event staff and on-site services allow you to host a stunning wedding reception in our elegant Ballroom or hold a team meeting in the privacy of one of our smaller meeting rooms.                                     Start your morning with an indulgent breakfast in bed before your cruise down the Mississippi. Up late working on tomorrow’s presentation? You can order some snacks from the room service menu to keep your brain fueled into the night.                                 Enjoy a delicious meal and panoramic views of the Mississippi River in the lodge-inspired setting of our on-site restaurant, Three Rivers Lodge (TRL). TRL offers delicious desserts and a seasonal menu for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. The restaurant also features a full-service bar with fine wines, microbrews, and handcrafted cocktails. Situated just a few steps from the hotel, Riverside Park offers the perfect place to get some fresh air and take in scenic views of the Mississippi River. For an even better vantage point, book the La Crosse Queen for a cruise along the picturesque Mississippi. Don’t miss these area favorites during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Appleton North, WI
description: If you're visiting the Appleton area, reserve a room at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Appleton North, WI to stay just off I-41 and only five miles from Lawrence University. Our hotel in Little Chute is conveniently located five miles from downtown Appleton, where you can find attractions like The Trout Museum of Art and The Building for Kids children's museum. If you're in the mood for shopping, stop by the popular Fox River Mall, home to more than 180 stores.After a busy day of exploring Appleton, return to the hotel to unwind at our indoor water park. Kids can play on the waterslide and jungle gym while adults relax in the hot tub. Take care of wet towels and swimsuits in our laundry facilities, and upload family photos using free Wi-Fi as you wait for your clothes to dry. We also offer a fitness center, perfect for stretching out after time on the road. After a day of adventure, nothing beats kicking back in your room or suite with a cold drink from your fridge and a snack warmed up in the microwave. Need a caffeine fix? Take advantage of the in-room coffeemaker and complimentary coffee.  Looking to host an event in Appleton? We offer an inviting boardroom with seating for up to 25 guests. For larger groups of up to 40, our dining area is available after breakfast. Enjoy free Wi-Fi, presentation aids, and refreshments during your meeting. Our friendly staff is on hand to assist with catering arrangements and event planning. Take a day trip to Green Bay to cheer on the Packers and visit the NEW Zoo & Adventure Park, or spend your entire trip enjoying the many attractions of Appleton. You can go on a shopping spree at Fox River Mall or catch a pulse-pounding competition at the Wisconsin International Raceway, which hosts events every Saturday night during race season. Don't miss these favorites within 15 minutes of the hotel:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Madison Southwest, WI
description: Located off Highway 18 just six miles from the University of Wisconsin–Madison, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Madison Southwest, WI gives you easy access to campus tours and Badgers home games. Our hotel is positioned between the communities of Verona and Fitchburg, which places you close to downtown Madison and popular attractions such as Henry Vilas Zoo, Alliant Energy Center, and Madison Children’s Museum. Flying in for a business meeting? Take advantage of our complimentary shuttle to Dane County Regional Airport (MSN) and to the Epic Systems campus.After touring UW–Madison, you can return to the comfort of your room with free Wi-Fi or relax in the hot tub or heated indoor pool. Prepare for a corporate presentation in our business center, and host a meeting in our well-equipped event space. Be sure to start each day with our free, hot breakfast. Allow our friendly, welcoming staff to help you check in to one of our spacious rooms or suites, where you can enjoy an in-room refrigerator and microwave. For added space, reserve a one-bedroom suite with a separate living room and a sleeper sofa. For a convenient venue near the MSN airport, reserve our meeting room that can accommodate up to 20 guests. We can provide a custom event web page to keep your guests informed about every detail, and our professional staff is available to set up audiovisual equipment and offer catering recommendations. Madison’s vibrant downtown offers everything from a tropical waterfall at Olbrich Botanical Gardens to Wisconsin’s premier events at Alliant Energy Center. For entertainment closer to the hotel, start your day with hiking and biking at Quarry Ridge Recreation Area, and then enjoy an evening of bowling and drinks at Ten Pin Alley. Check out these favorites during your visit:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Madison, WI
description: Nestled east of downtown Madison and off the Beltline Highway, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Madison, WI provides a home away from home near a variety of attractions. Drive 15 minutes from the hotel to cheer on the Badgers at the University of Wisconsin–Madison, or experience a taste of the foodie culture at Capitol Square. Visiting with the family? Treat the kids to an afternoon at Henry Vilas Zoo or the Madison Children's Museum. After you arrive from Dane County Regional Airport (MSN), kick back in your hotel room and connect to free Wi-Fi while you snack on a complimentary cookie from the lobby. Enjoy a refreshing swim in the indoor pool, or take a stroll by the Yahara River, right outside our door. If you’re here for meetings, the business center is a great place to catch up on work. Each morning, our free, hot breakfast provides an energetic start to your day. Enjoy a restful night’s sleep in one of our rooms or suites before attending a wedding at Monona Terrace or a Badgers game at the University of Wisconsin–Madison. Travelers with children can find space for the whole family in our one-bedroom suites, which feature a separate living room and a private bedroom. Standard amenities include free Wi-Fi, a microwave, and a refrigerator. Plan a gathering for up to 30 people in our meeting facilities. Our staff can help with catering recommendations, and we can create a customized event website to keep your guests up to date on the latest information. If you’re traveling with a group, we offer discounted rates to make stays more affordable and convenient. It’s easy to find fun things to do right outside the Country Inn & Suites. Take a leisurely stroll along the Yahara River, located next to the hotel, or visit Olbrich Botanical Gardens to explore an award-winning green oasis. History buffs won’t want to miss a tour of Wisconsin’s Capitol building, less than four miles from the hotel, before heading next door to the University of Wisconsin–Madison, the alma mater of architect Frank Lloyd Wright. Nearby attractions include:

name: Radisson Hotel Madison
description: Located off Highway 12/14, Radisson Hotel Madison offers easy commutes to the University of Wisconsin and nearby corporations like Epic, CUNA, and University Research Park. If you’re in town for a family vacation, you’ll appreciate our proximity to the Henry Vilas Zoo and tours at Wisconsin’s State Capitol. Less than a mile away, West Towne Mall features more than 80 popular stores for all the shopping addicts, while Camp Randall Stadium, a 12-minute drive from our hotel, keeps Badgers football fans happy.When you’re not meeting clients or touring local attractions, recharge with on-site amenities like an indoor pool, a hot tub, and a fitness center, open 24 hours. Afterward, enjoy a meal at the on-site Twist Bar & Grill. Time to get back to work? Our 24-hour business center makes it easy to stay productive with services like copying, faxing, printing, shipping, and receiving. When it’s time to leave Madison, hop on our complimentary shuttle to Dane County Regional Airport (MSN). Wake up in one of our 153 stylishly decorated rooms and suites, where you can enjoy a cup of coffee or tea from the in-room machine. At night, Business Class guests can relax with a complimentary drink. Coming to Madison with your children? Our spacious suites include standard amenities like refrigerators as well as sleeper sofas. Whether you’re signing a business deal or saying, “I do,” the Radisson hotel in Madison offers four flexible event venues for any occasion. Our meeting packages include audiovisual support and a variety of dining and refreshment options to suit your needs. Plan your wedding reception with us, and stay in a complimentary hotel suite on your wedding night.                                     For a quiet meal in your room or suite, order from our room service menu.                                 Get a taste of Wisconsin at Twist Bar & Grill, which offers delightfully cheesy options like Wisconsin Mac and Cheese and Wisconsin Nachos. Make our delicious breakfast your first stop of the day, and then drop by at dinner for soups, salads, sandwiches, seafood, and steaks. If you’re in the mood for a snack and a beer, head to our popular bar. Catch the big game on one of our flat-screen HDTVs, or chat with colleagues while you enjoy a refreshing cocktail. Wisconsin’s state capital is full of interesting attractions like the granite-domed Capitol building and Henry Vilas Zoo, which offers free admission to all visitors. Nature lovers can explore outdoor destinations such as Elvers Park and the Ice Age National Scenic Trail. Visit these attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Marinette, WI
description: Conveniently located just 11 minutes from Menominee-Marinette Twin County Airport (MNM), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Marinette, WI sits in the heart of the waterfall capital of Wisconsin. Enjoy hours of fun at the DeYoung Family Zoo, just half an hour away, or plan a day trip to the beaches of Green Bay, which offer sunbathing and boating. Nature enthusiasts love our proximity to 14 scenic waterfalls as well as local fishing and hiking spots, including Stephenson Island, just a seven-minute drive from the hotel. If you’re here on business, our hotel places you just minutes from meetings at local corporations like Kimberly-Clark and Johnson Controls.After a day of fishing in Menominee River or Lake Michigan, you can prepare your catch of the day with our hotel’s fish-cleaning station. If business has brought you to town, we’ve made it easy to complete projects with free Wi-Fi and an on-site business center, ideal for faxing, copying, and printing important documents. Before turning in for the night, enjoy a relaxing dip in our indoor pool or a soak in the hot tub. Rest comfortably in our suites and pet-friendly rooms, each furnished with handy appliances like a refrigerator and a microwave. You can brew your morning coffee and spend a few extra minutes snuggled up with your furry friend while you catch the news on the flat-screen HDTV. For a convenient venue near the MNM airport, reserve our spacious conference room that can accommodate up to 30 guests. If you need a more intimate setting, our breakfast room is ideal for smaller gatherings of up to 20 attendees. Whether you’re hosting a group interview session or a celebratory bridal shower, our hotel’s professional staff is on hand to assist with details such as audiovisual equipment, catering, group discounts, and room blocks. Get a taste of local culture with visits to the Crivitz Museum and the Marinette Historical Museum where you can learn about life for 19th-century settlers and the area’s logging industry. You can also embark on a hike to any of the county’s 14 rushing waterfalls, or spend an evening being entertained at the Theatre on the Bay. Don’t miss these favorites while in town:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Madison West, WI
description: Conveniently located in the quiet suburb of Middleton, just off Highways 12 and 14, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Madison West, WI is about seven miles from downtown Madison. Get to know the Madison area by walking along the Pheasant Branch Conservancy trail nearby, or see a different side of nature at Henry Vilas Zoo. Alliant Energy Center, the University of Wisconsin-Madison, and Greenway Station are also within easy reach of the hotel.When you’re not out enjoying the local sights, take advantage of our relaxing hotel amenities, such as the heated indoor pool. If business has brought you to Middleton, you’ll find it easy to complete projects with free Wi-Fi and a work space in the comfort of your room. We also offer a fitness center to help you keep up with your routine. All our guests are welcome to enjoy our complimentary, hot breakfast. Our 84 large rooms and suites feature space for the whole family. All are furnished with handy appliances like microwaves and refrigerators, and you can enjoy access to HBO shows on our TVs. Cribs are available for added convenience. Head into downtown Madison to experience interesting attractions like the Chazen Museum of Art, the Madison Children’s Museum, and Camp Randall Stadium, home of the University of Wisconsin Badgers football team. Don’t miss these other favorites while you’re in town:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Milwaukee Airport, WI
description: Conveniently located off I-94, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Milwaukee Airport, WI is just two miles south of General Mitchell International Airport (MKE). Cheer on the Brewers at Miller Park, 14 minutes from the hotel, or enjoy a day of family fun at the Milwaukee County Zoo, a short drive away. In town for a conference or trade show? The Wisconsin Center in the heart of downtown is flanked by some of the city’s finest restaurants and cultural spots like the Milwaukee Public Museum.Take advantage of our hotel’s complimentary shuttle for convenient service to and from the MKE airport. After a long day of travel, you can get your legs moving in the fitness center or relax in the soothing waters of our hot tub. If you’re visiting for work, touch base with the office in our well-equipped business center. Hosting a family reunion, interview session, or social gathering in Milwaukee? Our meeting space is an easy drive from the MKE airport and only minutes from downtown Milwaukee. The 625-square-foot meeting facility can accommodate up to 40 attendees and includes services like free Wi-Fi and parking. Our friendly staff will be on hand from set-up to cleanup to ensure your event is a success. From the shores of Lake Michigan to the trade shows at the Wisconsin Center, there are plenty of things to do and see in Milwaukee. Reserve a table at one of the city’s trendiest eateries or pick out a new outfit at its fashionable boutiques. Treat yourself to a live concert at the Fiserv Forum or try your luck at Potawatomi Casino. Visit these and other local favorites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Platteville, WI
description: Conveniently located off Business Highway 151, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Platteville, WI is less than a mile from the University of Wisconsin–Platteville. Our hotel is also just minutes from downtown. Take a leisurely stroll up South Water Street to enjoy downtown’s charming shops, and pop into a nearby restaurant for a great meal. If you’re traveling with kids, visit The Mining & Rollo Jamison Museums for educational fun before settling in your room or suite to watch DIRECTV.We’re proud to provide amenities that make your visit easier, from our free, hot breakfast and free parking to on-site laundry facilities and a modern fitness center. After a day browsing downtown art galleries, you can let the kids splash in the indoor pool while you warm up in the hot tub. Traveling for work? Stay productive in our well-equipped business center and check email with free Wi-Fi. With lots of space, bright natural light, and cribs and rollaway beds available if you need them, our rooms and suites are designed to make family trips more enjoyable. Whether you’re attending graduation at UW-Platteville or vacationing with your kids, you can use free high-speed internet access to share the highlights of your trip online. When you want to wind down, catch the latest family flick at Avalon Cinema, just a 10-minute walk up South Water Street. Our hotel is also less than two miles from the Platteville Golf and Country Club, where you can play the best greens in the area. For an easy day trip, head north to see Governor Dodge State Park and The House on the Rock. Don’t miss these favorites while you’re visiting:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Port Washington, WI
description: Conveniently located off I-43, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Port Washington, WI is two miles from the city marina and charter fishing docks. You’ll find Harrington Beach State Park just nine miles north of the hotel. Continue north for about 20 minutes to reach Sheboygan, home of the PGA Championship Whistling Straits Golf Course.In addition to a great location by Lake Michigan, our hotel offers an indoor pool, a hot tub, and an arcade room for family fun. When you get hungry, head to the on-site sports pub to enjoy a drink and a snack. With our free, hot breakfast, you can fill up before heading out on your fishing excursion. Need to double-check your itinerary? Stop by our business center on your way out the door. Check the weather on your computer with our free Wi-Fi as you unpack and prepare for your Lake Michigan adventures. The kids can kick back on the comfortable beds and watch the flat-screen TV while you enjoy a little caffeinated treat from the in-room coffeemaker. For a convenient venue near the lake and right off I-43, reserve the Lakeview Conference Center, which can host 450 guests. While our Boardroom offers a professional atmosphere with 10 leather chairs, the Country Retreat Room is perfect for small social gatherings.                                 Our on-site restaurant and bar, Seven Hills Pub & Grille, is a popular dining spot for locals and tourists. Join us for dinner from Tuesday through Saturday, and then head to the pub area to enjoy an evening drink with friends. There’s more to the city’s marina than boating and fishing. Enjoy fine dining, unique boutiques, and a variety of festivals that take place at this scenic spot. Get your steps in on the nearby Ozaukee Interurban Trail, or head up to Whistling Straits to work on your swing. Don’t miss these favorite attractions while staying with us:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Prairie du Chien, WI
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Prairie du Chien, WI is surrounded by the natural beauty of the upper Mississippi River. Guests appreciate our location for its easy access to Iowa, Wyalusing State Park, and Pikes Peak State Park. If you forgot to pack something, head next door to Cabela’s, which has everything you need to enjoy outdoor activities. Families with children love our indoor water park, Bear Foot Bay, which offers an activity pool with water basketball, a 25-foot waterslide, water geysers, and a waterfall spa. You can start your day with a complimentary, hot breakfast at the hotel and end it with dinner at the adjacent Buckhorn Grill & Pub.The Country Inn & Suites offers everyone a great value with perks that include free Wi-Fi, a free weekday newspaper, a business center, and pet-friendly rooms. You can keep up your healthy routine with a workout on the cardio equipment in our fitness center. Create special memories when you treat your family to our family-friendly suites with bunk beds and games for the children and a private bedroom for you. Traveling with your four-legged family member? We’re a pet-friendly hotel! And business travelers appreciate the free Wi-Fi and comfortable beds. If you’re planning a team meeting, a family celebration, or a client presentation in Prairie du Chien, our meeting room is a smart choice. This venue can accommodate up to 20 attendees, and our helpful staff is happy to assist with audiovisual equipment, beverage service, and group rates. You can prep for your event using our business center.                                 Join us each morning for the complimentary, hot breakfast, which includes items such as fresh fruit, eggs, and waffles. The hotel is also adjacent to Buckhorn Grill & Pub, where you can dine on pasta, salads, and burgers and play a game of pool. Explore local history, trace the paths of early explorers, or indulge in active pursuits like hiking, biking, and horseback riding through local parks and along the Mississippi River. From award-winning wines at Eagles Landing Winery to a riverboat casino across the river, don't miss these favorites during your visit to Wisconsin's second oldest city:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Sparta, WI
description: Conveniently situated off I-90, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Sparta, WI offers the perfect retreat for hotel guests visiting the Bicycling Capital of America. Our hotel's convenient location provides easy access to the Elroy-Sparta State Bike and La Crosse River state trails, as well as other nearby attractions like the River Run Golf Course and the Deke Slayton Memorial Space & Bicycle Museum. Spend the day horseback riding at Redrock Trail Rides, or visit Ben Bikin', a 32-foot-tall statue that overlooks downtown and is the world's largest bicyclist.After enjoying a ride on the bike trails or a trip to one of the local museums, relax with a dip in our heated indoor pool or a soothing soak in our hot tub. In the morning, savor a cup of coffee while perusing a free weekday newspaper before heading down to the dining area for the free, hot breakfast. Pets are welcome in select rooms for $20 per night. Be sure to call ahead so you can bring them along too. Reward yourself after a fun day of sightseeing with a relaxing evening in one of our spacious rooms and suites. Enjoy the convenience of an in-room refrigerator and microwave to keep your favorite beverages and snacks handy, and use our free Wi-Fi to share photos on your social media networks. For a convenient venue right off I-90, reserve the meeting room at our hotel for business meetings, family reunions, and receptions with up to 50 guests. Allow our friendly staff to assist with room setup and event logistics while you focus on your guest list. In addition to outdoor trails and parks, Sparta offers entertainment that the whole family can enjoy, rain or shine. Let the kids play on the 40-foot train at The Little Falls Railroad & Doll Museum, or wave hello to Ben Bikin' on Main Street. If you’re visiting with a group of friends, be sure to enjoy a round at River Run Golf Course or an afternoon horseback ride at Redrock Trails.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Stevens Point, WI
description: Conveniently located right off I-39, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Stevens Point, WI is just half a mile from the University of Wisconsin-Stevens Point. Families enjoy being close to campus and to downtown attractions like the Central Wisconsin Children’s Museum. If you love the outdoors, head out the back door of our hotel for a bike ride on The Green Circle Trail or a wetlands stroll in the 280-acre Schmeeckle Reserve. Corporate travelers appreciate our proximity to major regional companies as well as Central Wisconsin Airport (CWA), just 19 miles from the hotel.After business meetings or a college tour, revive yourself in our heated indoor pool and spa. Our fitness center is open 24 hours, so it’s easy to fit in a workout during your stay. Welcoming perks like complimentary cookies and a fireplace-warmed living room help families feel at home. Each morning, you can use free Wi-Fi to catch up on the news while you enjoy our free, hot breakfast. Whether you’re traveling for business, visiting the university, or planning a family getaway, our inviting hotel rooms and suites have useful amenities to enhance your stay. A work desk and free Wi-Fi can help you conquer your to-do list. You can stock the fridge with snacks to warm up in the microwave and watch the latest HBO movies on the flat-screen TV. Rollaway beds are available to accommodate extra guests, and four-legged family members are welcome for a $25 fee. With space for up to 35 people, plus free Wi-Fi and a big-screen TV, our airy meeting room is ideal for gatherings of all kinds, including reunions and seminars. Attendees will appreciate our convenient location just off I-39 and within walking distance of the University of Wisconsin-Stevens Point. On the edge of the Schmeeckle Reserve and steps from The Green Circle Trail, our hotel makes a great starting point for exploring local parks, woods, and wetlands. Love sports? See a college basketball game at the University of Wisconsin-Stevens Point, or tee off at SentryWorld’s scenic golf course. Craft beer fans can tour a brewery established before the Civil War, and families won’t want to miss the Central Wisconsin Children’s Museum. Get inspired by these local attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Mt. Pleasant-Racine West, WI
description: The Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Mt. Pleasant-Racine West, Wisconsin is conveniently located off I-94/I-41 in Sturtevant less than 10 minutes from downtown Racine and approximately 20 minutes from General Mitchell International Airport (MKE). For business travelers, enjoy a quick commute from the hotel to business meetings at CNH Industrial and Bombardier Recreational Products. Vacationing with the family? Make memories at the Racine Zoo, Six Flags Great America, and Miller Park, home of the Milwaukee Brewers. You can also plan a day trip to downtown Milwaukee, just 30 minutes away.After your flight or sightseeing adventure, retire to our hotel and swim in the heated indoor pool, soak in the hot tub, or work out in the fitness center. Traveling for work? Complete important tasks in the business center or in your hotel room using free Wi-Fi. When the day is over, get a great night’s sleep and wake up refreshed the next morning to a free, hot breakfast. Put your feet up in a spacious room or suite with fresh linens, plush beds, and home comforts like microwaves and fridges. Savor that first cup of coffee in the morning while still in your PJs thanks to an in-room Keurig® coffee machine. Host business meetings or intimate gatherings for up to 25 attendees in our 384-square-foot event space. Planning a corporate meeting? Visit the on-site business center to print information or make copies for your presentation. Your guests will appreciate our proximity to several area businesses and General Mitchell International Airport. Travel just 30 minutes to Milwaukee to cheer on the Brewers at Miller Park or ride the rollercoasters at Six Flags Great America in Gurnee, IL. Looking for something to do closer to the hotel? Head 10 minutes east to Racine's beachfront to soak up the sun, shop, or dine. Don't miss these exciting nearby attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, West Bend, WI
description: Cruise off Highway 45 and into comfort at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, West Bend, WI, about 30 miles north of Milwaukee. Our prime location puts you close to many outdoor attractions, including 12 runs at Sunburst Winter Sports Park, 36 holes at Kettle Hills Golf Course, and a three-mile trail of animals up-close at Shalom Wildlife Zoo. Head to the beautiful Kettle Moraine State Forest, about 14 miles from our hotel, to hike, bike, or take a scenic drive. For something different, you can search for treasure in West Bend, the Midwest’s “Geocaching Capital.”Complimentary cookies, fresh fruit, and coffee await you at check-in. The hotel’s heated indoor pool and hot tub are wonderful places to unwind. To get work done during your stay, stop in at our business center and connect to free Wi-Fi. If you want to keep up with your exercise routine, we offer complimentary passes to a nearby fitness center. Settle into a room or suite with a microwave, a fridge, and coffee and tea facilities. Cable TV with HBO and free Wi-Fi offer entertainment. Upgrade to a suite to enjoy more space and extras like a whirlpool or a living room with a sleeper sofa. A charming suburb of Milwaukee, West Bend is roughly a 40-minute drive from Miller Park, where you can visit the statue of former Milwaukee Brewers’ legend Hank Aaron. While in the city, tour the Harley-Davidson Museum or take the family to a wildlife show at the Milwaukee County Zoo. Closer to the hotel, stroll along the three-mile West Bend Riverwalk and Sculpture Walk, lined with some 25 chiseled works of art. For fun activities to see and do, check out these sites:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Gillette, WY
description: For a convenient and comfortable stay off I-90, choose the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Gillette, WY. Traveling with kids? You can enjoy a fun-filled day at CCSD Adventurarium or Gillette Thunder Speedway, both located less than 10 minutes from our hotel. Just three miles away, Cam-Plex hosts everything from rodeos to music performances, while Rockpile Museum tells the story of the West from a Wyoming perspective. For a taste of the great outdoors, Keyhole State Park makes an easy day trip just 45 minutes away.Whether you’re in Gillette for a while or passing through, our hotel provides the essentials for a restorative stay. In the mornings, visit our fitness center to get going, and then fuel up for the day’s adventures with our free, hot breakfast. When you return, stop by the lobby for free cookies, coffee, or hot chocolate, and don’t forget to post photos of your adventures using our free Wi-Fi. Each of our rooms and suites includes amenities like fridges and microwaves to make you feel right at home. At the end of a busy day, you can kick back, grab a chilled beverage, and heat up a snack before watching a favorite show on the flat-screen TV. Or use our free Wi-Fi to connect with friends and family. You can practice your swing at Bell Nob Golf Course during the day and then drive into downtown Gillette for a Powder River Symphony performance in the evening. If you’re up for a quick road trip, head toward the Bear Lodge Mountains and you’ll catch a glimpse of Devils Tower National Monument, a fascinating rock formation that rises to more than 1,250 feet above the surrounding prairie. Don’t miss these exciting attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel West Memphis
description: Positioned off I-40/I-55 near the Tennessee border, Radisson Hotel West Memphis in Arkansas places you just across the Mississippi River from downtown Memphis. We offer a shuttle to and from the Memphis airport (MEM) and area attractions like Southland Casino Racing. Our hotel is ideal for corporate travelers meeting at the FedEx or AutoZone headquarters and for vacationers exploring the Birthplace of Rock ’n’ Roll.After a fun day at Graceland, return to the comfort of your room or suite and enjoy free Wi-Fi and a mini fridge. You can unwind with a swim in the seasonal outdoor pool or a jog in the fitness center. Afterward, head to our on-site restaurant for a delicious dinner, or entertain clients at our on-site bar. Each morning, we provide a complimentary breakfast to help you start your day. Need to print out important notes for an on-site meeting? Stop by our 24-hour business center. Ready to relax after walking along the river in Tom Lee Park? Our 123 hotel rooms and suites feature modern decor and plush mattresses to help you recharge in complete comfort. Turn on the flat-screen TV to catch your favorite show, or use free Wi-Fi to catch up on email. You can order room service for a delicious meal after a day of meetings. Whether you’re meeting with eight guests in our boardroom or throwing a grand wedding reception, Radisson Hotel West Memphis can help make your gathering a success. Take advantage of more than 10,000 square feet of space for corporate get-togethers, and ask our dedicated event coordinators for help with every detail, from catering to setting up audiovisual equipment.                                     When your day runs long, take some time to relax in the comfort of your room or suite with a delicious meal from room service.                                 At Radisson Hotel West Memphis, we proudly serve a delicious complimentary breakfast each morning and a variety of delicious menu items for dinner. Stop by our on-site lounge for a cold cocktail after work. Looking for a quick bite? Our market provides an array of snacks and drinks for a meal on the go. While you’re in West Memphis, you can hop aboard our area shuttle to check out the slots at Southland Casino Racing, the bluesy vibes of Beale Street, and the groundbreaking exhibits at the National Civil Rights Museum. You’ll also find top concerts and the NBA’s Memphis Grizzlies at nearby FedExForum. Explore these attractions during your stay: By car:From Plough Boulevard, follow I-240 W, and then continue on I-55 N. Take the I-55/US-61 exit toward St. Louis/Little Rock to cross the river into Arkansas and remain on I-55. Take exit 5 toward Ingram Boulevard, and then turn right onto Ingram Extended. Turn right onto Goodwin Avenue, right onto N 18th Street, and then right onto S Service Road. The hotel will be on the right.

name: Radisson Blu Anaheim
description: Centrally located in the Anaheim Resort area, the Radisson Blu Anaheim is convenient for families planning a magical vacation to Disneyland® Resort or business travelers attending nearby events and conventions. Sports enthusiasts can catch a game at Angel Stadium, and concert goers will have easy access to Honda Center—each just two miles from the hotel.After an exciting day, return to the hotel and unwind with premier accommodations and amenities, including two outdoor heated pools and hot tubs. Our main level pool features a splash pad and cabanas, so your kids can have fun while you lounge in the shade. For a more sophisticated atmosphere, head to the rooftop pool area and relax with friends around a fire pit, enjoy local fireworks, or grab a specialty drink from BluSkyBar. With fresh, locally sourced ingredients and stunning rooftop views, there’s no finer place to experience Southern California. With clean, modern style and free Wi-Fi in our guest rooms and suites, the Radisson Blu Anaheim offers ideal accommodations for families visiting Disneyland® Resort. If you’re traveling with extended family, you can ask about our convenient connecting rooms and bunk-bed rooms. Here for work? Reserve one of our spacious suites, which feature comfortable seating areas and exceptional views of the parks. Ideal for a wedding reception or corporate conference, our two boardrooms are outfitted with state-of-the-art equipment along with free Wi-Fi. Each meeting space can accommodate up to 30 guests, and they can be combined to host up to 70. Experience diverse flavors and fresh local ingredients when you sample delicious Californian cuisine at FireLake Grill House and Cocktail Bar. Featuring a wide selection of local craft beers, California wines, and specialty cocktails to complement any dish, Firelake is an excellent option for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. If you're looking for a convenient start to your morning or a relaxing end to a long day, in-room dining offers the perfect solution.Want amazing views and cocktails to match? Make your way to BluSkyBar for an unforgettable rooftop restaurant and bar experience on the 12th-floor. Watching the vibrant sunsets and dazzling city lights of the Anaheim Resort makes this spot the best place to be, especially when fireworks ignite the sky. Private dining is also available for those traveling with a small group or hosting an event. Whether you’re in Orange County for a Disney® getaway or a business conference, you’ll find plenty of things to do to keep your family or your clients entertained. Explore the culinary offerings at the Anaheim Packing District and Anaheim GardenWalk, or enjoy some fresh air as you walk among the redwoods at Carbon Canyon Regional Park. Don’t miss these attractions during your visit:

name: Radisson Hotel West Sacramento
description: Ideally situated just off I-80, Radisson Hotel West Sacramento places you within 10 minutes of downtown Sacramento and just 15 minutes from Sacramento International Airport (SMF). Near our hotel, you’ll find River Walk Park, a popular green space that overlooks the Sacramento River, and the Crocker Art Museum, which houses one of the most prestigious art collections on the West Coast. In town for a business trip? Our hotel is close to the California Highway Patrol Academy, the California Department of General Services, and other companies headquartered in the state’s capital.After a day downtown, unwind in your comfortable room or suite with free Wi-Fi. If you need to host a meeting on site, we provide expansive event facilities that can accommodate up to 250 guests. When you’re ready to unwind, head to one of our 140 hotel rooms and suites to watch your favorite shows on the flat-screen TV or browse the web with free Wi-Fi. Each room offers a work desk, a microwave, and a fridge for your convenience. For even more room to stretch out, upgrade to one of our spacious one-bedroom suites.
