With nearly 4,000 square feet of meeting space spread over four well-equipped meeting rooms, our hotel is a great choice for hosting clients from nearby businesses like Xerox State Healthcare, Hunter Douglas, and Beckman Coulter. Work with our dedicated event staff to plan every detail of your corporate conference, training seminar, or wedding reception for up to 250 guests. Whether you’re in the area to attend the Farm-to-Fork Festival or to meet with clients downtown, you’ll appreciate how close our hotel is to all that Sacramento has to offer. Take in the fresh air and gorgeous vistas at River Walk Park, and then cross the Tower Bridge to reach Old Sacramento, which offers a wealth of historical architecture, charming boutiques, and waterfront cafés. Discover these points of interest during your stay: By car:Head north on Airport Boulevard, and then keep right to stay on Airport Boulevard E.Keep right to stay on Aviation Drive, and then continue onto Crossfield Drive.Turn left, and then merge onto Airport Boulevard.Merge onto I-5 S via the ramp to Sacramento.Take exit 522 to merge onto I-80 W toward San Francisco.Take exit 82 for I-80/US-50 toward Sacramento, and then merge onto I-80BL E/US-50 E.Take exit 1 for Harbor Boulevard S.Turn right onto Beacon Boulevard, and then turn right onto Halyard Drive. The hotel will be on the left.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Colorado Springs Airport, CO
description: Nestled at the base of Pikes Peak just minutes from Colorado Springs Airport (COS), the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Colorado Springs Airport, CO provides guests with a convenient home base close to outdoor adventure. Throw on your hiking boots for a trek to Seven Falls, just nine miles from the hotel, or enjoy an awe-inspiring stroll through the Garden of the Gods, where you can get an up-close look at the region’s crimson-colored rocks. Home to several air force bases, Colorado Springs is also a hub for aviation museums, including the National Museum of World War II Aviation and the Peterson Air & Space museum.After touching down at the COS airport, grab your bags and enjoy an easy ride to the hotel aboard our complimentary airport shuttle. Our well-equipped fitness center helps you stretch your muscles post-hike, and our business center provides a convenient place for you to touch base with the office. Start each morning with our free, hot breakfast, and in the evening enjoy a lively social hour at our Manager’s Reception, hosted Monday through Thursday from 5 to 7 pm. After a day of mountain biking or hiking, retire to your suite to warm up with a cup of hot chocolate prepared on the stove. Post your favorite action shots to social media while lounging on the sleeper sofa, or sit down to a meal at the kitchen table. All suites include a kitchenette with a stove, a microwave, a refrigerator, and dishware. Located less than 10 minutes from the COS airport, the Country Inn & Suites provides an ideal gathering place for out-of-town travelers. Whether you need an intimate boardroom for 12 guests or a larger space for up to 75, our hotel offers three flexible meeting facilities sure to fit your needs. Outdoor enthusiasts find a welcoming haven in Colorado Springs, home to magnificent mountain views, serene hiking trails, and challenging climbs. Be sure to snap photos of the iconic red rocks as you stroll through the Garden of the Gods, and afterward shop for souvenirs in downtown Colorado Springs. Don’t miss these top-rated attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Miami Beach
description: In the Mid-Beach neighborhood next to the boardwalk, Radisson Hotel Miami Beach offers a stylish waterfront location for your Florida trip. You can attend your corporate session or trade show at Miami Beach Convention Center, less than 10 minutes from the hotel, and then join the party at nearby South Beach or the Art Deco Historic District. To enjoy the salty coastal breeze, walk just steps to the beach or book a tee time at Miami Beach Golf Club.When you’re ready to unwind at the hotel, you can sunbathe next to the outdoor pool or find your zen in our butterfly garden. Allow our concierge service to help you find the best things to do in the Miami area, and then grab a delicious meal at one of our casual dining venues. Valet parking is available 24 hours a day so you don’t need to worry about beach traffic, and package handling is available for USD 9 (plus tax) per item. Since we don’t charge any resort fees, you can take full advantage of our prime location within walking distance of the beach throughout your stay. Start your Miami Beach travels on a high note in our hotel rooms and suites with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Before a stroll on the boardwalk or a morning of meetings, brew a fresh cup of coffee or tea in your room. If you’re traveling with family, upgrade to a suite and enjoy a sleeper sofa and a separate living room. Whether you’re hosting a corporate summit at the beach or celebrating a quinceañera, you can find the ideal event space at the Radisson. Our indoor meeting rooms are perfect for groups of 70 or fewer, and our outdoor spaces work well for grand cocktail parties and team-building events. For a special touch, work alongside our catering staff to prepare a delicious spread for your gathering.                                 Start your morning with an extensive breakfast buffet overlooking the pool at Nikki Tatum’s Bistro. In addition to tapas and entrées, BARcelona offers an extensive wine selection, local beers, and premium liquors. Have a full day of meetings at Miami Beach Convention Center? Swing by the Little Havana Kiosk for coffee and a pastry to go. We also offer poolside dining at the Surf Club and 24-hour room service. Whether you’re in South Florida for a coastal getaway, a corporate function, or an event like the Miami International Boat Show, you’ll discover plenty to explore near our hotel. Stay active on the tennis courts and golf course at Normandy Shores, and then relax with a stroll through the unique sculptures at The Bass Museum of Art. For a walk on the wild side, you can head to the fantastically creative streets of the Miami Design District. Check out these attractions during your stay: By car:From the airport’s Departures road, continue onto NW 21st Street.Use the right lanes to take the FL-112 E ramp to Miami Beach / I-95 (please note that this is a toll road).Continue on FL-112 E, and then continue on I-195 E.Continue on W 41st Street to Collins Avenue. The hotel will be on the right.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tampa RJ Stadium
description: Ease off US 92 and find a relaxing retreat near beautiful Tampa Bay at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Tampa RJ Stadium. Convenience meets comfort at our well-positioned hotel, which places you within five minutes of popular attractions like Raymond James Stadium and George M. Steinbrenner Field. We also offer easy access to St. Joseph’s Hospital, the Westshore business district, and the corporate offices of Microsoft, Amgen, and Bloomin’ Brands.When you’re ready for a break between excursions, unwind in the hot tub or clear your mind with a stroll along the scenic trail just outside the hotel’s front door. If you prefer more rigorous exercise, visit our well-equipped fitness center or swim some laps in the outdoor pool. A 24-hour business center is also available if you need to put the finishing touches on a presentation. Whether your travel plans include sunbathing at Clearwater Beach or attending a conference in downtown Tampa, our comfortable hotel rooms and suites invite you to relax with amenities like free Wi-Fi and a free, hot breakfast. Before you hit the town, head to our free, hot breakfast before grabbing a drink that you stored in the in-room mini fridge. If you need a convenient meeting space near Tampa International Airport (TPA), look no further than our hotel. The Tampa Palms room can accommodate up to 100 guests for elegant wedding receptions, while our smaller Executive Boardroom is perfect for corporate training sessions. In addition to free Wi-Fi and a projection screen, you can take advantage of planning assistance from our skilled event coordinator. Begin your Tampa adventures at the Country Inn & Suites, which places you close to family-friendly attractions like Busch Gardens Tampa Bay and The Florida Aquarium. Shopping abounds at International Plaza and Bay Street, located about 10 minutes away. If you’re in town for an annual event like the Gasparilla Pirate Festival or Sunset Music Festival, make time to visit these local favorites: By car:Head south toward Airport Access Road/Bessie Coleman Boulevard, and then in 0.8 miles, turn left onto Airport Service Road.At the traffic circle, take the first exit and stay on Airport Service Road. Turn right to stay on Airport Service Road, and then continue onto N Obrien Street.Turn left onto W Spruce Street, and then continue straight as the road turns into W Boy Scout Boulevard.Continue onto W Columbus Drive, and then turn left onto US-92 E.In 335 feet, turn left, and then turn left again. In 154 feet, turn right, and then turn left. The hotel will be on the right.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Macon West, GA
description: Whether you’re visiting local colleges like Mercer University and Middle Georgia State University or meeting at businesses like Coliseum Hospital, you’ll find a convenient home base at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Macon West, GA. Thanks to an ideal location at the intersection of I-475 and US-80, you can skip the traffic and enjoy quick commutes to destinations like Lake Tobesofkee. When you’re ready for a great meal or a show at the Macon Centreplex, drive about 20 minutes east from the hotel to reach downtown Macon.Open daily from 8 am to 10 pm, our indoor pool and fitness center offer morning exercise and afternoon relaxation alike. Stop by our free, hot breakfast for a delicious first meal with your family, and then pick up snacks for the road at our Inn Case Market. We offer free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel and a convenient business center if you need to print important documents for a meeting. When you’re ready to unwind, head to one of our 67 spacious hotel rooms and suites. From free Wi-Fi to a coffeemaker and refrigerator, we’ve included all the amenities you need to prepare for a great day of sightseeing or meetings. Give your next event a boost by booking the well-equipped meeting room at our Country Inn & Suites. With 1,200 square feet and room for up to 25 attendees, our on-site event facilities can accommodate everything from boardroom meetings to birthday parties. We also offer amenities like projectors and free Wi-Fi to ensure that your presentation is a success. No matter what brings you to Macon, set aside time to explore Georgia’s natural beauty at top outdoor destinations like Lake Tobesofkee. You can tour the tree-lined campuses of nearby universities like Mercer and Middle Georgia State, or you can make the quick 20-minute ride into downtown to shop the boutiques and have a great meal. Here are a few of our favorite local attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Schaumburg
description: In a leafy setting near I-90, Radisson Hotel Schaumburg offers a peaceful home base in a suburban business hub just 40 miles from downtown Chicago. On a work trip? Our hotel is only a few minutes from an impressive cluster of corporate offices, including Amada America, BMW, Sodick, Kuriyama, and Yamazen. Sports teams or families in town for local tournaments appreciate our proximity to Harper College’s ball fields and stadium, less than two miles away. If you’re flying in to O’Hare International Airport (ORD), take advantage of our free shuttle service. We’ll also drop you off and pick you up at destinations within a five-mile radius of the hotel, including the popular Woodfield Mall.Set yourself up for a busy day of client meetings with our complimentary breakfast. Need to print out documents or scan expense receipts? Swing by the convenient business center. If you’re visiting in the warmer months, you can cool off with a dip in our seasonal outdoor pool. Our fitness center is open 24/7, so you can find a convenient time to squeeze in a workout no matter how packed your itinerary. When you arrive, you can stock the in-room fridge with your favorite drinks and snacks. Prepare for client meetings using free Wi-Fi, and then stretch out on a comfortable bed and catch up on your favorite shows on the flat-screen TV. In the morning, amenities like a coffeemaker, a professional hair dryer, and an iron ensure that you’re perfectly put together and ready to take on the day. Need to host a presentation for clients or gather your sports team for a pre-tournament pep talk? Book the convenient meeting room at our Radisson in the heart of Schaumburg’s dynamic business district. Our versatile event space can accommodate up to 30 attendees and includes a projector, a flat-screen TV, and other audiovisual equipment.                                     If you want to savor a leisurely brunch in bed or need a quick snack to power through an important presentation, delicious daytime room service options are just a phone call away.                                 Start your day with freshly brewed coffee and a hearty complimentary breakfast in our hotel dining room. In the evening, you can meet colleagues for drinks or dinner at Radisson Bistro, our on-site restaurant and bar. Enjoy fresh American favorites paired with a selection of wine, beer, and expertly mixed cocktails in a relaxed atmosphere. Whether you’re here for corporate meetings or a Harper Hawks basketball tournament, make the most of your off-duty time in the verdant suburban village of Schaumburg. If golf is your game, choose from several local courses, including the highly rated Schaumburg Golf Club. Or wander through the serene 20-acre International Sculpture Park to see striking large-scale installations. More interested in browsing designer labels? The huge Woodfield Mall offers local boutiques alongside name-brand stores like Coach, Lululemon, and Armani Exchange. Get inspired by these Chicago-area attractions: By car: Drive southwest on I-190 W, and then take I-90 W to Roselle Road in Schaumburg. Take a left and then a right on Valley Lake Drive. The hotel will be on your left.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Brooklyn Center, MN
description: Situated off I-694 and I-94, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Brooklyn Center, MN offers an affordable, convenient home base less than eight miles from the National Sports Center. Our hotel is also within easy reach of Minneapolis’ top attractions, including U.S. Bank Stadium, Target Field, and Target Center. Spend a beautiful day hiking at Minnehaha Falls Regional Park before wrapping up your night with dinner and drinks on the riverfront. Our hotel is also just half an hour from Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport (MSP).After a busy day in the Brooklyn Center and Brooklyn Park area, your family or team can unwind with free Wi-Fi and Serta Elite® pillowtop mattresses in one of our rooms or suites. Before you hit the road for your next adventure, visit our cheerful dining area for waffles, fruit juice, and eggs at our free, hot breakfast. Between meals, enjoy complimentary coffee, fruit, and cookies in the lobby. Our indoor pool allows kids to burn off some energy, and our fitness center helps you keep up with your workout goals. The following certification shows our hotel's commitment to guests' safety. For more information, visit Safehotels Certification. Wake refreshed from a good night's sleep on the Serta Elite® pillowtop mattress in one of our rooms, and then lounge in front of the flat-screen TV and browse the premium cable channels. You can brew your morning coffee and surf the internet with free Wi-Fi. We also offer one-bedroom suites with a separate living room and a sleeper sofa, perfect for families and groups needing extra space. With the National Sports Center less than eight miles from our hotel, the Country Inn & Suites is an ideal stop for sports teams and their sponsors. Need a home base for your wedding at the Earle Brown Heritage Center, Leopold's Mississippi Gardens, or the Edinburgh USA golf course? Our hotel can help your event feel extra special with shuttle transportation and a customized event website. For smaller gatherings, you can host up to 25 guests in our sunny breakfast area. Located just north of Minneapolis, our quiet and affordable hotel lets you save money for fun outings to major entertainment events at Target Center, Target Field, and U.S. Bank Stadium. Our hotel is also just minutes from Minneapolis-area nightlife, natural parks, and the Minneapolis Convention Center. Take your family for a fun outing at Topgolf or to shop and explore the theme parks inside Mall of America®. Don't miss these top attractions:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dunn, NC
description: Situated just off I-95 and seven miles south of I-40, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Dunn, NC provides an inviting place to relax after a long interstate drive. If you’re taking a break from the road or vacationing with family, our location places you close to antique shops, the highly rated Anderson Creek golf course, and the trailheads and boat access points along the Cape Fear River. Visiting students at Campbell University? The hotel is just 20 minutes from campus.After a day exploring Raven Rock State Park with your dog, head back to the hotel to unwind in a pet-friendly room or suite with free Wi-Fi. You can start each morning with our free, hot breakfast, served daily from 6 to 9 am, and then grab a snack for later from our Inn Case Market. You’ll also appreciate our fitness center, perfect for keeping up with your workout regimen. Planning a small party or business session? We offer a versatile meeting room and a business center to help make your event successful. Each of our 69 rooms and suites includes home comforts like free Wi-Fi, a mini fridge, and a microwave. A work desk gives you space to organize for meetings, and essentials like a hair dryer and iron ensures that you look your best for appointments or outings. We offer a meeting space that’s ideal for holding corporate functions and family celebrations. Free Wi-Fi, a microwave, a mini fridge, and access to our business center ensure that you have the tools needed for success. Known for its beautiful golf courses, Civil War sites, and natural areas, Dunn has plenty of things to see and do. You can cheer on the Fighting Camels wrestling team at Campbell University before heading to the fairways of Keith Hills Golf Club. Kids and adults alike love visiting the adorable animal ambassadors at Animal Ed.ventures Sanctuary. Check out these attractions during your stay:

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Greensboro, NC
description: Whether you’re in the area for a sports tournament, meetings downtown, or a weekend getaway, the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Greensboro, NC is the ideal home base for your trip to the Triad region. If you’re visiting nearby schools, our hotel is a quick drive down I-40 from Bennett College, North Carolina A&T State University, and The University of North Carolina at Greensboro. Need to buy some new athletic wear before your game at the Greensboro Coliseum Complex? Simply walk a couple of blocks to Four Seasons Town Centre, the city’s largest indoor mall.After a day of exploring Greensboro, you can return to the hotel to unwind with a few laps in the outdoor pool or a jog in the fitness center, which is open 24 hours. If you need to print out schedules for your group or put the finishing touches on a presentation, our 24-hour business center is waiting for you. For a great way to end the day, relax in front of the lobby fireplace with a cup of coffee as you browse online using free Wi-Fi. Each of our 86 rooms and suites features a variety of amenities, including a microwave and mini fridge, to help you feel at home. You can head to the hotel’s dining area each morning to enjoy a free, hot breakfast, or you can wake up with a fresh-brewed cup of coffee in the privacy of your room. For added space to accommodate your purchases from Four Seasons Town Centre, reserve a studio suite with a sleeper sofa. From our hotel’s great location near downtown, you can explore the city’s many colleges, golf courses, and sports facilities. Head to the Greensboro Transit Authority bus station beside Four Seasons Town Centre to reach even more shopping at Friendly Center or a ballgame at First National Bank Field. If you’re in the area for a business trip, you’ll find corporate offices for Volvo, Tanger Outlets, and the ACC less than 10 miles away.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Roanoke Rapids, NC
description: Find a comfortable place to rest after a long drive on I-95 at the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Roanoke Rapids, NC near the Virginia border. You can plan a day in nature at Roanoke Rapids Lake or Lake Gaston, both about 20 minutes from the hotel, or at Roanoke River National Wildlife Refuge, about an hour away. If you’re traveling for business, our hotel is close to companies like W.R. Grace, Patch Rubber, KapStone Kraft Paper, Enviva Pellets, and Vidant North Hospital. In the area for construction work? We offer parking for trucks and other large vehicles.At check-in, you can pick up complimentary coffee and cookies in the lobby before unwinding by our indoor pool or working out in our fitness center, open 24 hours. Our business center offers copy and fax machines, and free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Be sure to stop in our dining area for a free, hot breakfast each morning. Each of our hotel rooms and suites offers a fridge, a microwave, and free Wi-Fi. If you’re traveling with family and need extra sleeping space, upgrade to a suite to enjoy a separate living room and a sleeper sofa. We also provide pet-friendly rooms to accommodate the four-legged members of your group. The beautiful Roanoke River offers plenty of outdoor adventure both on and off the water. Spend a day hiking, swimming, and picnicking, or head to Roanoke River National Wildlife Refuge to explore the wetlands and meet the creatures that inhabit them. If you’re here for a tour of Chowan University, our hotel is about 45 minutes from campus. For indoor fun, you can get tickets to Roanoke Rapids Theatre, which features music, comedy, and variety shows. Check out these nearby attractions:

name: Radisson Hotel Oklahoma City Northwest
description: Whether you’re in Oklahoma’s bustling capital for business or leisure, Radisson Hotel Oklahoma City Northwest has an ideal location for your trip to downtown offices, attractions like Bricktown, and Will Rogers World Airport (OKC). Hop on Highway 74 to reach the walking trails, fishing spots, and sailboat races at Lake Hefner, or make the quick drive down Northwest Expressway to visit Penn Square Mall.You can arrange for our complimentary airport shuttle to take you to the hotel, where free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool, and pet-friendly rooms are waiting for you. Want to reenergize after your flight? Head to Matthew’s Bar & Grill, our on-site restaurant that’s open for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. For a meal in the privacy of your room or suite, pick up a snack from our 24-hour sundry market or order something delicious from room service. If you’re planning a corporate event or social gathering in OKC, our versatile meeting venues provide space for 450 guests, the latest audiovisual equipment, and plenty of catering options. Designed for both work and relaxation, our 162 hotel rooms and suites provide premium bedding, a large desk, and a flat-screen TV. We also offer pet-friendly and accessible options to meet the needs of all our guests. Pamper yourself by upgrading to a suite, which features a minibar and a seating area with a sleeper sofa. With more than 11,000 square feet of flexible space, our hotel’s meeting rooms can accommodate up to 450 attendees for your sales conference, wedding reception, or class reunion. We offer full catering services with menu options that are sure to delight your guests, and we can help you find the perfect event planner and rental services to put the finishing touches on the occasion. Complete your evening in OKC with a great dinner and a glass of wine at Matthew’s Bar & Grill, our hotel’s on-site restaurant and bar. For a more casual setting, Matthew’s Lounge serves light meals and local craft beer, perfect for a night out with friends. Just minutes from both the natural beauty of Lake Hefner and the nightlife of downtown OKC, our hotel places you near a wide range of attractions. If you’re here for a medical appointment, we’re only half a mile from INTEGRIS Baptist Medical Center and less than two miles from INTEGRIS Deaconess Campus. Celebrate a successful treatment or a deal with clients at Dave & Buster’s, situated just across the highway from the hotel, or spend an afternoon browsing the shops at Penn Square Mall. You can check out these points of interest during your stay:

name: Park Inn by Radisson Florence, SC
description: Ease your car off I-95 to find a welcoming retreat at the Park Inn by Radisson Florence, SC. Situated minutes from downtown, Florence Regional Airport (FLO), and the Florence Center, the hotel provides a convenient location for business and leisure guests alike. Whether you’re attending an event at nearby Francis Marion University, visiting a loved one at McLeod Regional Medical Center, or simply taking a break from your interstate drive, our hotel provides comfortable accommodations for an exceptional stay.Fuel your Florence adventures with a complimentary continental breakfast, and enjoy a quiet evening in one of our 60 guest rooms with mini refrigerators and free Wi-Fi. Our on-site game room boasts adult- and kid-friendly games like pool and foosball, and our snack shop provides convenient treats throughout your stay. Before you turn in for the night, squeeze in a workout in the fitness center, take a dip in the indoor pool, or relax by our patio’s fire pit. Unpack your bags and settle into one of our standard rooms with your choice of a plush king bed or two queen beds. All rooms include a complimentary breakfast and a mini fridge, ideal for storing road-trip snacks or a decadent dessert from a local restaurant. Whether you’re attending a conference at the Florence Center, practicing your swing at Beaver Creek Golf Club, or cheering on your favorite driver at the Darlington Raceway Southern 500, the Park Inn in Florence places you close to the area’s top attractions. Our convenient location off I-95 also lends easy access to Florence Regional Airport, downtown Florence, and local corporations like Otis Elevator Company. Check out these nearby favorites: By car:Drive about six miles along US highways 76 and 52 to reach the hotel.

name: Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Pierre, SD
description: Welcome to the Country Inn & Suites by Radisson, Pierre, SD, located just steps from all that downtown Pierre has to offer. Our charming city has plenty to keep you busy, from the South Dakota State Capitol, just a 10-minute walk from the hotel, to LaFramboise Island Nature Area, a green escape from the bustle of city life. You can catch a live concert at the Steamboat Park amphitheater every summer, and you can take your kids to the South Dakota Discovery Center for hands-on learning all year long. At the end of your trip, hop on nearby Highway 83 or head 10 minutes east to Pierre Regional Airport (PIR) to head home.Wake up to the smell of freshly brewed coffee at our free, hot breakfast, served seven days a week. We help you save time and money with convenient on-site amenities like a fitness center, truck parking, and free Wi-Fi. We even welcome pets for a small fee. Here for an extended stay? Grab a cup of complimentary coffee from the lobby and take care of your laundry in our on-site facilities. With free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, and free premium movie channels like HBO, you’ll have plenty to keep you busy in our spacious hotel rooms and suites. Store drinks in the refrigerator for after-work refreshments, and treat yourself to a hot snack thanks to an in-room microwave. From team huddles to grand galas, our flexible meeting venue can host a variety of events. Our hotel offers more than 8,000 square feet of event space spread across five meeting rooms, which can accommodate gatherings both small and large. Fishing, cross-country skiing, biking, hiking, and bird-watching are just a few of the things that make Pierre an unforgettable destination for lovers of the great outdoors. After your trip to nearby green spaces like Steamboat Park, you can grab a great meal at one of the restaurants within walking distance of our hotel. Here for work? The South Dakota State Capitol is about 10 minutes away on foot. Check out these local attractions: By car:Once you reach the intersection of Airport Road and Piper Street, turn right onto Airport Road. Continue straight onto E 4th Street, and then turn left onto N Euclid Avenue (US-14 W/US-83 S). Turn right onto E Pleasant Drive to continue on US-14 W/US-83 S, and then turn left onto S Pierre Street. Turn left onto E Sioux Avenue. The hotel will be on the left.
